column9: 0.029#TD4035E.TXT.r#150610#150610#TD4035E.TXT.r_4508# 'dod pa na spyod pa'i sdug bsngal gyi bden pa dang  kun 'byung ba'i bden pa dang  gzugs na spyod pa'i sdug bsngal gyi bden pa dang   kun 'byung gi bden pa dang  gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i sdug bsngal gyi bden pa dang  kun 'byung ba'i bden pa dang  'dod pa na spyod pa'i dbang gis de yongs su shes pa'i 'bras bu dang  de yongs su shes pas rab tu phye ba'i 'gog pa'i bden pa dang  lam gyi bden pa dang  gzugs  na spyod pa'i dbang gis de yongs su shes pa'i 'bras bu dang  de yongs su shes pas rab tu phye ba'i 'gog pa'i bden ba dang  lam gyi bden pa dang  gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i dbang gis de yongs su shes pa'i 'bras bu dang  de yongs su shes pas rab tu phye ba'i 'gog pa'i bden pa dang      // /
column10: 0.029#TD4094.2E.TXT.r#1889496#1889496#TD4094.2E.TXT.r_700# khyim bdag de bzhin du kha cig 'di skad du bdag gis sdug bsngal gyi bden pa mngon par ma rtogs par kun 'byung gi bden pa mngon par rtogs par bya zhes bya ba nas / /

column3: lus 'di ni rga ba'i chos yin no zhes 'byung ba lta bu'o // / +nges pa la ni dge slong gi chos bzhi rnams zhes 'byung ba lta bu dang  de bzhin du dge slong dag srog gcod pa ni  chos ma yin la srog gcod pa spangs pa ni chos yin no zhes rgya cher 'byung ba lta bu'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#516610#516619#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8673# kun 'byung gi bden pa ni sdug bsngal gyi bden par gsungs    pa'i phyir sdug bsngal gyi bden pa yongs su shes su zin kyang da dung kun 'byung ba'i bden pa dang  rjes su 'brel ba'i phyir kun 'byung gi bden pa ni spang bar bya ba yin par bshad dgos so // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#516620#516633#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8673;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8674;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8675# kun 'byung gi bden pa ni sdug bsngal gyi bden par gsungs    pa'i phyir sdug bsngal gyi bden pa yongs su shes su zin kyang da dung kun 'byung ba'i bden pa dang  rjes su 'brel ba'i phyir kun 'byung gi bden pa ni spang bar bya ba yin par bshad dgos so // /
column6: 0.0#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2722532#2722539#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_2884;TD4038.1E.TXT.r_2885;TD4038.1E.TXT.r_2886# kun 'byung  ba'i bden pa ni sdug bsngal gyi bden pas bsdus pa yin pa'i phyir / / +sdug bsngal gyi bden pa yongs su shes su zin kyang / /

column3: chos lugs la ni yul chos dang rigs chos zhes 'byung ba lta bu'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#516634#516641#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8674;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8675# mngon sum du bya ba ni mngon sum du byas pa'i don yin te / / +'gog pa'i bden pa mngon  sum du mthong ba'i phyir mi skrag cing dga' ba yongs su 'dzin pas de'i phyir de'i 'og tu ni 'gog pa'i bden pa ni mngon sum du byas pa yin par bshad do // /

column3: spangs pa zhes bya btang ba dang / / +bral dang gnod dang bag la nyal // / +bton pa'o spangs pa la sogs pa'i // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#516642#516662#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8675;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8676# 'gog pa'i bden pa mngon  sum du mthong ba'i phyir mi skrag cing dga' ba yongs su 'dzin pas de'i phyir de'i 'og tu ni 'gog pa'i bden pa ni mngon sum du byas pa yin par bshad do // /
column5: 0.025#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2722564#2722564#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_2890# ji skad smos pa'i don gsum po dag bsgrub pa'i phyir lam goms par bya dgos pas na / /

column3: spangs pa  zhes bya gnyis su bzhed // / +spangs pa zhes bya ba btang ba la ni longs spyod kyi phung po che ba'am / /
column4: 0.017#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2722564#2722564#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_2890# ji skad smos pa'i don gsum po dag bsgrub pa'i phyir lam goms par bya dgos pas na / /

column3: chung ba yang spangs nas zhes 'byung ba lta bu'o // / +rgyun dang bral ba la ni sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams spangs nas zhes 'byung ba lta bu'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#516663#516674#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8676;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8677;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8678;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8679# lam goms par byas nas gdod ji skad smos pa'i don gsum po dag mngon par 'grub pas de'i phyir tha mar lam  gyi bden pa ni bsgom par bya ba yin par bshad pa yin no zhes 'byung ngo // /

column3: 'jig rten pa'i lam  gyis gnon pa la ni / / +'dod pa rnams la 'dod pa'i 'dun pa spangs nas des lan mang du gnas shing / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#516675#516685#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8678;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8679;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8680# ci'i phyir sdug bsngal ba 'ba' zhig yongs su shes par bshad ce na / / +smras pa / / +'di ni bstan bcos bye brag tu bshad pa chen po las ji  skad du mdo sde dag las ni sdug bsngal gyi bden pa kho na yongs su shes par bya bar gsungs na ci'i phyir chos mngon pa las chos thams cad yongs su shes par bstan zhe na / /

column3: tshangs pa'i 'jig rten dang skal ba mnyam par skyes zhes 'byung ba lta bu'o // / +bag la nyal yang dag par bcom pa la ni kun tu sbyor ba gsum spangs pa las / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#516684#516694#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8680# 'di ni bstan bcos bye brag tu bshad pa chen po las ji  skad du mdo sde dag las ni sdug bsngal gyi bden pa kho na yongs su shes par bya bar gsungs na ci'i phyir chos mngon pa las chos thams cad yongs su shes par bstan zhe na / /

column3: rgyun tu  zhugs pa yin no zhes 'byung ba lta bu'o // / +de bzhin du spangs par mthong ba dang  sdom pas spong ba dang  rjes su srung bas spong ba dang  bsgom pas spong ba ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#516695#516715#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8680;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8681;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8682;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8683;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8684# 'di ni bstan bcos bye brag tu bshad pa chen po las ji  skad du mdo sde dag las ni sdug bsngal gyi bden pa kho na yongs su shes par bya bar gsungs na ci'i phyir chos mngon pa las chos thams cad yongs su shes par bstan zhe na / /

column3: nyan thos la bshad pa'i mdo sde gnyis las rnam pa gnyis su rnam par phye'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#516707#516724#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8682;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8683;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8684;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8685# bcom ldan 'das kyis sdug bsngal kho na yongs su shes par bya bar  gsungs pa 'am / / +yang na sdug bsngal 'ba' zhig yongs su shes par bya ba yin pas / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#516735#516742#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8686;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8687# yang na kun 'byung ba 'ba' zhig yongs su spang bar bya ba yin pas de'i phyir chos mngon pa las zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams ni yongs su spang bar bya ba yin no zhes bstan to // /

column3: tshul gyi sgra ni bden pa dang / / +lam  dang 'brel 'byung rig pa dang / /
nges 'byed cha dang mya ngan 'da' // / +thabs dang rigs pa nyid la yod // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#516725#516733#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8685;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8686# bcom ldan 'das kyis kun 'byung kho na yongs su sdang bar gsungs pa'am / /

column3: sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa / / +bden dang yan lag brgyad dang 'byung // / +zhes bya ba 'di las / /
'phags pa'i tshul gyi sgra ni bden pa rnams dang  lam dang rten cing  'brel par 'byung ba la yang mthong ngo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#516740#516752#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8686;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8687;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8688;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8689# yang na kun 'byung ba 'ba' zhig yongs su spang bar bya ba yin pas de'i phyir chos mngon pa las zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams ni yongs su spang bar bya ba yin no zhes bstan to // /

column3: rig pa rnams la yang mthong ste / / +bram ze nga ni 'phags pa'i chos 'dul ba 'di la 'phags pa'i tshul gyis gsum rig pa yin par smra'o zhes 'byung ba lta bu ste 'di las so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#516751#516767#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8688;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8689;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8690;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8691# yang na 'gog pa 'ba' zhig mngon du bya ba yin pas / /

column3: nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa rnams la yang mthong     // / +gang su dag dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi rnams dang mi mthun par byed pa de dag ni 'phags pa'i tshul la de dag gis mi mthun par byas pa yin no zhes 'byung ba lta bu'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#516768#516783#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8690;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8691;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8692;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8693# bcom ldan 'das kyis lam kho na bsgom par gsungs pa'am / / +yang na     // / +lam 'ba' zhig bsgom par bya ba yin pas de'i phyir chos mngon pa las 'dus byas kyi chos dge ba thams cad ni bsgom PAR BYA BA YIN NO ZHES bstan te / /

column3: tshul gyi sgra ni mya ngan las 'das pa la yang mthong ste / / +khyim pa'am rab  tu byung ba'am / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#516784#516791#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8692;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8693;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8694# lam 'ba' zhig bsgom par bya ba yin pas de'i phyir chos mngon pa las 'dus byas kyi chos dge ba thams cad ni bsgom par bya ba yin no zhes bstan te / / +'dis ni mdo las gsungs pa ni nges pa'i don ma yin la / /

column3: gang zhig yang dag grub byed pa // / +des ni bla med tshul nyid kyi // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#516792#516807#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8694;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8695;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8696# chos mngon pa las bshad pa ni  nges pa'i don yin par bstan pa yin zhes 'byung ste / /
column5: 0.018#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2367671#2367672#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6723;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6724;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6725# chos kyi dbyings ni rnam grangs so // / +zhes 'byung ste / / +rgya cher de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // /

column3: chos ni kun tu thob par 'gyur // / +zhes 'byung ba lta bu'o // / +thabs la yang mthong ste / /
column4: 0.023#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#516409#516410#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8657# phung po lnga'i don rgya cher rnam par 'byed pa ni mtshan nyid bstan pa dag las 'byung ba bzhin du rig par bya'o // /
column5: 0.023#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2353393#2353393#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4942# rgya cher rnam par 'byed pa ni mtshan nyid bstan pa dag las 'byung ba bzhin du rig par bya'o // /
column6: 0.023#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2361652#2361652#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5940;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5941# zhib tu ni bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las bstan pa bzhin no / / +rgya cher rnam par 'byed pa ni mtshan nyid bstan pa dag las 'byung ba bzhin du rig par bya'o // /
column7: 0.023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#234920#234920#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2682;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2683# rgya cher rnam par 'byed pa ni / / +mtshan nyid bstan pa dag las 'byung ba bzhin du rig par bya'o // /

column3: tshul gyi brtson 'grus brtsams pa la // / +bya bar dka' ba ci yang med // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#516808#516817#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8696;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8697# bden pa bzhi'i don rgya cher rnam par 'byed pa ni mtshan nyid bstan pa 'byung ba bzhin du rig par bya'o // /

column3: ces 'byung ba lta bu'o // / +rigs pa la ni tshul bzhin byed do zhes 'byung ba lta bu'o // / +las mtha' zhes bya nor tshol dang / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#516816#516828#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8697# yang kha cig ni khams thob  pa dang  khams kyi mtshan ma thob pa dang  khams sna tshogs pa nyid thob pa nyid dang  khams gcig pa nyid ma yin pa thob pa dang  khams 'gog pa thob pa dang  khams 'gog ba mngon du bgyi ba thob pa'i slad du shes pa brda sprod par bgyid ces  bya ba ni lnga pa khams bco brgyad la brten nas shes pa brda sprod par byed pa bstan to // /

column3: gsum bdun spangs pa rnams la'ang yod // / +las kyi mtha' zhes bya ba nor tshol ba la ni des gal te zhing dang  gal te tshong gi las kyi mtha' de dang de byed do zhes  rgyas par 'byung ba lta bu'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#515397#515401#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8551# de na kha cig ni phung po thob pa dang  phung po'i mtshan ma thob pa dang  phung po'i skye ba thob pa dang  phung po'i zad pa thob pa dang  phung po'i  'gog pa thob pa dang  phung po'i 'gog pa mngon du bgyi ba thob pa'i slad du shes pa brda sprod par bgyid ces bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa brtags pa rnam par phye ste bstan pa'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#516829#516840#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8697# yang kha cig ni khams thob  pa dang  khams kyi mtshan ma thob pa dang  khams sna tshogs pa nyid thob pa nyid dang  khams gcig pa nyid ma yin pa thob pa dang  khams 'gog pa thob pa dang  khams 'gog ba mngon du bgyi ba thob pa'i slad du shes pa brda sprod par bgyid ces  bya ba ni lnga pa khams bco brgyad la brten nas shes pa brda sprod par byed pa bstan to // /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#516841#516849#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8697;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8698# yang kha cig ni khams thob  pa dang  khams kyi mtshan ma thob pa dang  khams sna tshogs pa nyid thob pa nyid dang  khams gcig pa nyid ma yin pa thob pa dang  khams 'gog pa thob pa dang  khams 'gog ba mngon du bgyi ba thob pa'i slad du shes pa brda sprod par bgyid ces  bya ba ni lnga pa khams bco brgyad la brten nas shes pa brda sprod par byed pa bstan to // /
column7: 2.384#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#516474#516476#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8663# yang kha cig ni zas thob pa dang  zas kyi mtshan ma thob pa dang  zas kyi skye ba thob pa dang  zas kyi zad pa thob pa dang  zas 'gog pa thob pa dang  zas 'gog pa mngon du bgyi ba thob pa'i slad du shes pa brda sprod par bgyid ces bya ba ni  gsum pa zas rnam pa bzhi'i sgo la brten nas shes pa brda sprod par byed pa bstan pa ste / /

column3: gsum pa spangs pa la yang yod de / / +'jig rten pa'i yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' gang zhe na zhes rgyas par 'byung ba nas / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#516848#516859#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8697;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8698;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8699# yang kha cig ni khams thob  pa dang  khams kyi mtshan ma thob pa dang  khams sna tshogs pa nyid thob pa nyid dang  khams gcig pa nyid ma yin pa thob pa dang  khams 'gog pa thob pa dang  khams 'gog ba mngon du bgyi ba thob pa'i slad du shes pa brda sprod par bgyid ces  bya ba ni lnga pa khams bco brgyad la brten nas shes pa brda sprod par byed pa bstan to // / +tshig drug po de dag las dang po gnyis dang  tha ma gnyis ni snga ma bzhin du rig par bya'o // /

column3: srog gcod pa'i bar du spangs nas srog gcod pa las phyir ldog pa yin / / +de bzhin du 'dod pa las log par gyem pa las  zhes bya ba'i bar du 'byung ba lta bu'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#516860#516875#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8699;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8700;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8701;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8702# tshig bya ba gnyis ni bye brag rnam par bshad pa'o // / +rnam pa shin tu mang bas sna  tshogs zhes bya'o // /

column3: bdun spangs pa la yang yod de / / +las kyi mtha' phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na / / +srog gcod pa spangs pa nas srog gcod pa las phyir log pa yin zhes bya ba'i bar dang  de bzhin du tshig 'khyal pa smra ba las zhes bya ba'i bar du 'byung  ba lta bu'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#516876#516900#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8701;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8702;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8703;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8704;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8705# grangs gcig las 'das pa'i phyir gcig pa nyid ma yin pa zhes bya ste / / +de'i phyir lung sna tshogs las bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa / /
column5: 0.0#TD4054E.TXT.r#992177#992180#TD4054E.TXT.r_85;TD4054E.TXT.r_86;TD4054E.TXT.r_87# gzugs kyi phung po dang  tshor ba'i phung po dang  'du  shes kyi phung po dang  'du byed kyi phung po dang  rnam par shes pa'i phung po'o // / +khams rnams ni bco brgyad de / / +mig gi khams dang  gzugs kyi khams dang  mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang  rna ba'i khams dang  sgra'i khams dang  rna ba'i rnam par shes     // /
column6: 0.0#TD4059E.TXT.r#414417#414420#TD4059E.TXT.r_313;TD4059E.TXT.r_314# rnam par shes pa skye ba'i sgo'i phyir ro // / +khams bco brgyad ni mig gi khams dang   gzugs kyi khams dang  mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang  rna ba'i khams dang  sgra'i khams dang  rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang  sna'i khams dang  dri'i khams dang  sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang  lce'i khams dang   ro'i khams dang  lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang  lus kyi khams dang  reg bya'i khams dang  lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang  yid kyi khams dang  chos kyi khams dang  yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams so // /
column7: 0.0#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#786660#786661#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_3302;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_3303# khams ni bco brgyad de / / +mig gi khams dang  gzugs kyi khams dang  mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang zhes bya ba rgya cher 'byung ste / /
column8: 0.0#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1758717#1758720#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_7460;TD4094.1E.TXT.r_7461# dge slong dag khams gang cung zad khams su gyur pa de  thams cad ni khams bco brgyad de / / +mig gi khams dang  gzugs kyi khams dang  mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang  rna ba'i khams dang  sgra'i khams dang  rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang  sna'i khams dang  dri'i khams dang  sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang  lce'i  khams dang  ri'i khams dang  lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang  lus kyi khams dang  reg bya'i khams dang  lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang  yid kyi khams dang  chos kyi khams dang  yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams so // /
column9: 1.192#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2703182#2703188#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_222# bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang kun gzhi rnam par shes pa sa bon thams cad pa 'di la dgongs nas mig gi khams dang  gzugs kyi khams dang  mig  gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang  yid kyi khams dang  chos kyi khams dang  yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du gsungs te / /
column10: 0.009#TD4059E.TXT.r#414447#414450#TD4059E.TXT.r_314;TD4059E.TXT.r_315# khams bco brgyad ni mig gi khams dang   gzugs kyi khams dang  mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang  rna ba'i khams dang  sgra'i khams dang  rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang  sna'i khams dang  dri'i khams dang  sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang  lce'i khams dang   ro'i khams dang  lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang  lus kyi khams dang  reg bya'i khams dang  lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang  yid kyi khams dang  chos kyi khams dang  yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams so // /
column11: 0.012#TD4067E.TXT.r#1096694#1096698#TD4067E.TXT.r_1733;TD4067E.TXT.r_1734# khams bco lnga ni mig gi khams dang  gzugs kyi khams dang  mig  gi rnam par shes pa'i khams nas / /
column12: 0.013#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#516968#516968#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8714;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8715;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8716# gzhan yang de nyid las khams sna TSHOGS NYID GANG ZHE NA / / +'di lta ste / / +khams bco brgyad po dag phan tshun mtshan nyid tha dad pa nyid gang yin pa'o // /
column13: 0.017#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1758747#1758749#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_7461# mig gi khams dang  gzugs kyi khams dang  mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang  rna ba'i khams dang  sgra'i khams dang  rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang  sna'i khams dang  dri'i khams dang  sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang  lce'i  khams dang  ri'i khams dang  lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang  lus kyi khams dang  reg bya'i khams dang  lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang  yid kyi khams dang  chos kyi khams dang  yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams so // /
column14: 0.020#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2726779#2726780#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_3686# lus kyi khams ni nges par 'byung ste lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams rnams dang yid kyi khams dang chos kyi khams dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya'i khams rnams kyang de bzhin no // /
column15: 0.021#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#1597364#1597365#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_468;TD4090.1E.TXT.r_469# rnam par shes pa drug dang yid // / +mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams nas yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang  yid kyi khams kyi bar ro // /
column16: 0.021#TD4095E.TXT.r#64483#64484#TD4095E.TXT.r_293;TD4095E.TXT.r_294;TD4095E.TXT.r_295# rnam par shes pa drug dang yid // / +mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams nas / / +yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang yid kyi khams kyi bar ro // /
column17: 0.022#TD4091E.TXT.r#696494#696495#TD4091E.TXT.r_267;TD4091E.TXT.r_268# rnam par shes pa drug dang yid // / +mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams nas  yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang yid kyi khams kyi bar du'o // /
column18: 0.023#TD4036E.TXT.r#29864#29865#TD4036E.TXT.r_4573# reg bya'i khams dang  lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang  yid kyi khams dang  chos kyi khams dang  yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams te / /
column19: 0.023#TD4054E.TXT.r#992209#992209#TD4054E.TXT.r_88# pa'i khams dang  sna'i khams dang  dri'i khams dang  sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang  lce'i khams dang  ro'i khams dang  lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang  lus kyi khams dang  reg bya'i khams dang  lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang   yid kyi khams dang  chos kyi khams dang  yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams so // /
column20: 0.023#TD4036E.TXT.r#29832#29835#TD4036E.TXT.r_4569;TD4036E.TXT.r_4571;TD4036E.TXT.r_4572;TD4036E.TXT.r_4570# khams la mkhas ba NI GANG ZHE NA / / +khams ni bco brgyad da / / +mig gi khams dang  gzugs kyi khams dang  mig gi rnam par shes pa'i  khams dang  rna ba'i khams dang  skra'i khams dang  rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang  sna'i khams dang  dri'i khams dang  sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang  lce'i khams dang  ro'i khams dang  lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang  lus kyi khams  dang ; /
column21: 0.026#TD4068E.TXT.r#606904#606904#TD4068E.TXT.r_4147# sems la yang mig  gi rnam par shes pa'i khams nas yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du drug dang  yid kyi khams kyis bsnan te sems kyi khams bdun du phye bas gzugs can du zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i rab tu dbye ba nas brtsams pa bde blag tu rtog par 'gyur bas na khams nyid las  brtsams te rab tu dbye ba bsam par bya'i / /
column22: 0.026#TD4068E.TXT.r#607206#607206#TD4068E.TXT.r_4181;TD4068E.TXT.r_4182# mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams nas yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi  bar du / / +drug dang yid kyi khams te bdun dang  chos kyi khams kyis bsnan nas brgyad de / /
column23: 0.026#TD4068E.TXT.r#607677#607677#TD4068E.TXT.r_4229;TD4068E.TXT.r_4230# gzugs la sogs pa dmigs pa drug gi tha ma ni chos kyi khams yin pa dang  brten pa mig gi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa rnam par shes pa drug gi tha ma ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams yin te / / +de bas na yid kyi khams dang chos kyi khams dang   yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams gsum la tha ma gsum zhes bya'o // /
column24: 0.026#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1417118#1417118#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_1945# kun dga' bo mig gi khams dang gzugs kyi khams dang mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams zhes bya BA NAS DE BZHIN DU  yid kyi khams dang chos kyi khams dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i KHAMS ZHES BYA BA'I BAR DU khams bco brgyad bo 'di dag yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes shing mthong na zhes bya ba dang khams drug kyang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin shes shing mthong ba yin te / /
column25: 0.027#TD4068E.TXT.r#608036#608036#TD4068E.TXT.r_4269# dbang po drug gi khams dang  gzugs dang  sgra dang  reg dang  chos te yul bzhi'i khams dang  mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang  rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang  lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang  yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams te bcu bzhi ni gzugs kyi khams dang yang  ldan te / /
column26: 0.029#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1708013#1708013#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_1364# sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang  lce'i khams dang  ro'i khams dang  lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang  lus kyi khams dang  reg bya'i khams dang  lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang  yid kyi khams dang  chos kyi  khams dang  yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams te / /

column3: las kyi mtha'i sgra ni mtshams med pa la yang yod de / / +log pa'i las kyi mtha' med pa nyid ces gsungs pa'i phyir te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#516898#516908#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8705;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8706# khams bco brgyad po mig gi  khams dang  gzugs kyi khams dang  mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams nas yid kyi khams dang  chos kyi khams dang  yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du gang yin pa de ni khams sna tshogs yin no zhes gsungs so // /
column5: 0.017#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1417118#1417118#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_1945# kun dga' bo mig gi khams dang gzugs kyi khams dang mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams zhes bya ba nas de bzhin du  yid kyi khams dang chos kyi khams dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams zhes bya ba'i bar du khams bco brgyad bo 'di dag yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes shing mthong na zhes bya ba dang khams drug kyang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin shes shing mthong ba yin te / /
column6: 0.028#TD4036E.TXT.r#29863#29865#TD4036E.TXT.r_4573# reg bya'i khams dang  lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang  yid kyi khams dang  chos kyi khams dang  yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams te / /
column7: 0.028#TD4054E.TXT.r#992208#992209#TD4054E.TXT.r_88# pa'i khams dang  sna'i khams dang  dri'i khams dang  sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang  lce'i khams dang  ro'i khams dang  lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang  lus kyi khams dang  reg bya'i khams dang  lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang   yid kyi khams dang  chos kyi khams dang  yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams so // /
column8: 0.028#TD4059E.TXT.r#414446#414447#TD4059E.TXT.r_314# khams bco brgyad ni mig gi khams dang   gzugs kyi khams dang  mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang  rna ba'i khams dang  sgra'i khams dang  rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang  sna'i khams dang  dri'i khams dang  sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang  lce'i khams dang   ro'i khams dang  lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang  lus kyi khams dang  reg bya'i khams dang  lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang  yid kyi khams dang  chos kyi khams dang  yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams so // /
column9: 0.028#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1758746#1758749#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_7461# mig gi khams dang  gzugs kyi khams dang  mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang  rna ba'i khams dang  sgra'i khams dang  rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang  sna'i khams dang  dri'i khams dang  sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang  lce'i  khams dang  ri'i khams dang  lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang  lus kyi khams dang  reg bya'i khams dang  lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang  yid kyi khams dang  chos kyi khams dang  yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams so // /
column10: 0.029#TD4049E.TXT.r#2287602#2287602#TD4049E.TXT.r_24# mig gi khams dang  gzugs kyi khams dang  mig gi rnams par shes pa'i khams dang  rna ba'i khams dang  sgra'i khams dang  rna ba'i rnams par shes pa'i khams dang  sna'i khams dang  dri'i khams dang  sna'i rnam par shes  pa'i khams dang  lce'i khams dang  ro'i khams dang  lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang  lus kyi khams dang  reg bya'i khams dang  lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang  yid kyi khams dang  chos kyi khams dang  yid kyi rnam par  shes pa'i khams so // /

column3: chos 'dul ba 'di las log cing drang du mi rung ba rnams ni gang zag lnga dag ste / / +ma gsod pa dang zhes mdo las rgyas par gsungs  pa las so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#516909#516927#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8705;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8706;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8707;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8708;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8709# khams bco brgyad po mig gi  khams dang  gzugs kyi khams dang  mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams nas yid kyi khams dang  chos kyi khams dang  yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du gang yin pa de ni khams sna tshogs yin no zhes gsungs so // / +bstan bcos rnal  'byor spyod pa'i sa dang sbyar na / /

column3: log pa de rnams kyi las kyi mtha' ni log pa'i las kyi mtha' ste / / +mtshams med pa lnga po dag go // / +'di la log pa'i las kyi mtha' med pas na log pa'i las kyi mtha' med pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#516922#516930#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8707;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8708;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8709;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8710# phung po lnga la brten nas sna tshogs dang gcig pa nyid ma yin pa'i don gyi bye brag ston to // / +de'i phyir de nyid las de las phung po rnams kyi bdag nyid tha dad pa gang zhe na / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#516930#516946#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8708;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8709;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8710;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8711;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8712;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8713# de'i phyir de nyid las de las phung po rnams kyi bdag nyid tha dad pa gang zhe na / / +'di lta ste / / +gzugs kyi phung po yang gzhan la de bzhin du rnam    par shes pa'i phung po'i bar yang gzhan pa'o // /

column3: de dngos po ni log pa'i las kyi mtha' med pa nyid do // / +phung po zhes bya ba    spungs pa dang / / +phrag pa sdong po cha nyid la'o // /
column4: 0.022#TD4036E.TXT.r#60505#60505#TD4036E.TXT.r_8932;TD4036E.TXT.r_8933# phung po de dag la ni gang skye bar 'gyur ba'am / / +rga bar 'gyur ba'am / /
column5: 0.026#TD4000E.TXT.r#2797170#2797170#TD4000E.TXT.r_373;TD4000E.TXT.r_374# gzung ba 'am 'dzin pa yang rung zhes gang gsungs pa'o // / +de la gzugs nye bar len pa'i phung po la ni gzung ba'i dngos por 'jug phung po lhag ma bzhi la ni 'dzin pa'i dngos por te / /
column6: 0.027#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2713101#2713102#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_1432# de las don gzhan pa'i bdag med par yongs su bstan pa'i phyir phung po rnam par gzhag par rig par bya'o // /
column7: 0.029#TD4062E.TXT.r#2963812#2963812#TD4062E.TXT.r_422;TD4062E.TXT.r_423# don gyis na rnam par shes pa'i nye bar len pa'i phung por ro // / +'o na rnam par shes pa'i nye bar len pa'i phung po gang zhe na / /

column3: phung po zhes bya ba spungs pa la ni de thams cad gcig tu bsdus nas gzugs kyi phung po zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o zhes bya ba dang  de bzhin du nor gyi phung po chen po bsgrubs nas gnas so zhes 'byung ba lta bu'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#516945#516963#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8711;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8712;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8713;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8714# de la phung po rnams kyi bdag nyid mang po gang zhe na / / +'di lta ste / / +gzugs kyi phung po yang gcig pa ma yin zhing rnam pa sna tshogs mang po 'byung ba dang  'byung ba las gyur pa'i bye brag gi phyir 'das pa dang  ma 'ongs  pa dang  da ltar byung ba la sogs pa'i rnam pa bye brag gi phyir ro zhes 'byung ngo // /

column3: phrag pa la ni dper na mi zhig  sa las khri'u'i steng du 'jog nas rta'i steng nas glang po che'i phrag pa la zhon no zhes bya ba'i bar du 'byung ba lta bu'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#516962#516981#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8713;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8714;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8715;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8716;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8717;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8718;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8719# gzugs kyi phung po yang gcig pa ma yin zhing rnam pa sna tshogs mang po 'byung ba dang  'byung ba las gyur pa'i bye brag gi phyir 'das pa dang  ma 'ongs  pa dang  da ltar byung ba la sogs pa'i rnam pa bye brag gi phyir ro zhes 'byung ngo // / +gzhan yang de nyid las khams sna tshogs nyid gang zhe na / /
column5: 0.013#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#516886#516886#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8703;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8704;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8705# khams sna tshogs ji lta bu zhe na / / +'di lta ste / / +khams bco brgyad po mig gi  khams dang  gzugs kyi khams dang  mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams nas yid kyi khams dang  chos kyi khams dang  yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du gang yin pa de ni khams sna tshogs yin no zhes gsungs so // /
column6: 0.015#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2725817#2725821#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_3536;TD4038.1E.TXT.r_3537# khams sna tshogs pa nyid gang  zhe na ; / +khams bco brgyad po dag phan tshun mtshan nyid tha dad pa nyid gang yin pa'o // /

column3: sdong po la ni shing ljon pa rtsa ba dang ldan pa dang  spom pa dang ldan pa chen po'o zhes 'byung ba lta bu'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#516980#516989#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8717;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8718;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8719;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8720# khams gcig pa nyid ma yin pa  gang zhe na / / +'di lta ste / /

column3: cha la ni sbyin par bya ba phung po gsum dag tu sbyin no zhes 'byung ba lta bu'o // / +bsdu ba zhes bya rang bzhin dang / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#516990#516999#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8719;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8720;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8721;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8722# khams de dag nyid sems sna tshogs dpag tu med pa'i rab tu dbye bas gnas pa nyid do // / +khams tshad med pa gang zhe na / /

column3: rjes su mthun dang dga' ba dang / / +nyams med khong su gtogs pa dang / / +'dzin par byed dang don drug go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#517000#517010#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8722;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8723;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8724# de gnyi ga gcig tu bsdus pa la khams tshad med pa zhes bya'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +gzhan yang de nyid las  khams bco brgyad khong du chud pa gang yin pa de ni khams du mar shes pa'o // /

column3: rang bzhin la ni gzugs kyi phung po ni skye mched bcu dang gcig gi phyogs kyis bsdus so zhes 'byung ba lta bu'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#517011#517019#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8723;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8724;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8725# gzhan yang de nyid las  khams bco brgyad khong du chud pa gang yin pa de ni khams du mar shes pa'o // / +de dag gi rnam pa sna tshogs shes pa ni khams sna tshogs shes pa'o // /
column5: 0.013#TD4041E.TXT.r#1270093#1270094#TD4041E.TXT.r_175;TD4041E.TXT.r_176# de dag gi rnam pa tshogs shes pa ni khams sna tshogs shes pa'o // / +yang de dag gi rab tu dbye ba ni khams dang  'gro  ba dang sa dang gang zag dang rnam pa'i dbye ba shes pa'o // /

column3: rang bzhin dang rjes su  mthun pa la ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad ni phung po gsum dag gis bsdus so zhes 'byung ba lta bu'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#517020#517030#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8724;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8725# de dag gi rnam pa sna tshogs shes pa ni khams sna tshogs shes pa'o // / +de dag gi rab tu dbye ba shes pa ni khams dang  'gro ba dang  sa dang  gang zag dang  rnam pa'i dbye ba shes pa'o zhes 'byung  khams bco brgyad kyi don ni mtshan nyid bstan pa dag las bshad pa bzhin no // /

column3: dga' bal ni bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po dag ces 'byung ba lta bu'o // / +yongs su nyams pa med pa la ni 'di ni dbang po lnga po de dag sdud par byed pa yin te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#517029#517041#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8725;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8726# de dag gi rab tu dbye ba shes pa ni khams dang  'gro ba dang  sa dang  gang zag dang  rnam pa'i dbye ba shes pa'o zhes 'byung  khams bco brgyad kyi don ni mtshan nyid bstan pa dag las bshad pa bzhin no // /

column3: 'di lta ste / / +shes  rab kyi dbang po zhes 'byung ba lta bu'o // / +khongs su gtogs pa la ni 'gro ba dud 'gro'i skyes gnas su song ba'i srog chags gang su yang rung ba de thams cad kyi rjes ni glang po che'i rjes su 'dus shing 'du ba yin no zhes 'byung ba lta bu'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#517038#517054#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8725;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8726# de dag gi rab tu dbye ba shes pa ni khams dang  'gro ba dang  sa dang  gang zag dang  rnam pa'i dbye ba shes pa'o zhes 'byung  khams bco brgyad kyi don ni mtshan nyid bstan pa dag las bshad pa bzhin no // / +yang kha cig ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa thob pa dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i mtshan ma thob pa dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i gnyen po dang  mi mthun pa'i phyogs bstan pa dang  dran pa nye bar  gzhag pa bsgom pa thob pa dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ma skyes pa skye ba thob pa dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa skyes pa gnas pa dang  mi bskyud pa dang  slar zhing 'byung ba dang  'phel zhing rgyas pa thob pa'i slad du shes pa brda sprod par bgyid ces bya ba 'di man chad  ni gnyis pa byang chub kyi phyogs sum cu rtsa bdun la brten nas shes pa brda sprod par byed pa ston to // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#517055#517063#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8726# yang kha cig ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa thob pa dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i mtshan ma thob pa dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i gnyen po dang  mi mthun pa'i phyogs bstan pa dang  dran pa nye bar  gzhag pa bsgom pa thob pa dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ma skyes pa skye ba thob pa dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa skyes pa gnas pa dang  mi bskyud pa dang  slar zhing 'byung ba dang  'phel zhing rgyas pa thob pa'i slad du shes pa brda sprod par bgyid ces bya ba 'di man chad  ni gnyis pa byang chub kyi phyogs sum cu rtsa bdun la brten nas shes pa brda sprod par byed pa ston to // /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#518135#518140#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8867;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8868# de dag thob bar bya ba'i phyir ro // / +dran pa nye bar gzhag pa skyes pa gnas pa dang  mi bskyud pa dang  slar zhing 'byung ba dang  'phel zhing rgyas pa thob pa'i slad du zhes bya ba 'di ni bsten pa'i bsgom pa ston  te / /
column7: 0.0#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3108745#3108752#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_2394# kha cig ni dran  ba nye bar gzhag pa dmigs pa dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i mtshan ma dmigs pa dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang gnyen po dmigs pa dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i bsgom pa dmigs pa dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ma skyes pa skye ba dmigs pa dang   dran pa nye bar gzhag pa skyes pa gnas pa dang  ma bskyud pa dang  slar zhing 'byung ba dang  'phel zhing rgyas pa dmigs pas shes pa brda sprod par bgyid / /

column3: 'dzin par byed pa la ni khang pa brtsegs pa'i  phyam dgu po gang dag yin pa de dag gi mchog ni spyi rten yin te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#517064#517073#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8726# yang kha cig ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa thob pa dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i mtshan ma thob pa dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i gnyen po dang  mi mthun pa'i phyogs bstan pa dang  dran pa nye bar  gzhag pa bsgom pa thob pa dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ma skyes pa skye ba thob pa dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa skyes pa gnas pa dang  mi bskyud pa dang  slar zhing 'byung ba dang  'phel zhing rgyas pa thob pa'i slad du shes pa brda sprod par bgyid ces bya ba 'di man chad  ni gnyis pa byang chub kyi phyogs sum cu rtsa bdun la brten nas shes pa brda sprod par byed pa ston to // /

column10: 0.022#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#526930#526930#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10097;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10098# 'gro ba lnga po sems can dmyal ba rnams  dang  dud 'gro rnams dang  yi dags rnams dang  lha rnams dang  mi rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes 'byung ngo // / +'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa dang sbyar na ni drug tu gzhag pa yang dag pa'i don yin par ston te / /
column11: 0.023#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2403941#2403941#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11056;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11057# bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las kyang byang chub kyi phyogs  kyi chos khyad par du 'phags pa gnas pas nyon mongs pa'i shing bsregs nas shes rab kyi 'od 'phel bar byed pa'i phyir 'od 'phro ba can zhes 'byung ngo // / +'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las ni 'od 'phel bar byed pa'i sa zhes 'byung ngo // /
column12: 0.025#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2365394#2365394#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6407;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6408# ma ta phrag bcu la au snu ta zhes 'byung ngo // / +'phags pa shes rab  kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las ni / /
column13: 0.026#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#518805#518805#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8958;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8959# choms par dka' ba'i phyir ni stobs zhes bya'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las / /

column3: de bzhin du rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba gang zhe na / / +'di lta ste / / +'di yod pas 'di 'byung 'di skyes pa'i phyir 'di skye zhes bya ba ni  bstan pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#517318#517336#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8750;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8751;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8752;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8753# 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las shes rab kyi rjes su 'brang zhing dmigs pa la yang dag par gnas pa ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa zhes bya'o zhes bshad do // /
column5: 0.009#TD4036E.TXT.r#36176#36183#TD4036E.TXT.r_5456;TD4036E.TXT.r_5457;TD4036E.TXT.r_5458;TD4036E.TXT.r_5459# chos rnams kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang bar 'gyur ro // / +de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa zhes bya ba'i DON GANG ZHE NA / /

column3: ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams zhes rgyas par 'byung ba ni bshad pa'o // / +de bzhin du tshe dang ldan pa dag bcu gnyis po 'di dag ni khom par gyur pa yin no zhes 'byung ba 'di las bdag dang gzhan phun sum tshogs pa zhes 'byung ba ni bstan pa yin la / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#517337#517346#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8752;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8753;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8754# smras  pa / / +gang la dran pa nye bar gzhag par byed pa dang  gang gis dran pa nye bar 'jog par byed pa de ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa zhes bya'o // /

column6: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#36184#36193#TD4036E.TXT.r_5458;TD4036E.TXT.r_5459;TD4036E.TXT.r_5460# smras pa / / +gang la dran pa nye bar 'jog par  byed pa dang  gang gis dran pa nye bar 'jog par byed pa de ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa zhes bya'o // /
column7: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#36193#36201#TD4036E.TXT.r_5459;TD4036E.TXT.r_5460;TD4036E.TXT.r_5461;TD4036E.TXT.r_5462# gang la dran pa nye bar 'jog par  byed pa dang  gang gis dran pa nye bar 'jog par byed pa de ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa zhes bya'o // / +de la gang la dran pa nye bar 'jog par byed ce na / /

column3: lhag ma ni bshad pa yin te / / +bstan pa dang bshad pa gnyis kyis bcu gnyis su 'gyur te / / +de lta bu la sogs pa bstan pa'i tshig rnams kyi dgos pa'i don yang brjod dgos so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#517357#517371#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8756;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8757;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8758# gang gis dran pa nye bar 'jog  par byed ce na / /
column5: 1.192#TD4036E.TXT.r#36214#36219#TD4036E.TXT.r_5463;TD4036E.TXT.r_5464;TD4036E.TXT.r_5465# de la shes rab dang ting nge 'dzin  yang dag par sdud par byed pa'i dran pa gang yin pa ste / / +de ni ngo bo nyid kyi dran pa nye bar gzhag PA YIN NO // / +de las gzhan pa de dag dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems dang  sems las byung ba'i chos rnams ni mtshungs par ldan pas dran pa nye bar gzhag PA YIN NO // /

column3: ji skad du phung po lnga rnams dang  nang gi skye mched drug rnams zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa  grangs gsungs pa lta bu dag kyang de dag gi brjod par bya ba'i don mi go ba ni ma yin na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#517372#517390#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8758;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8759;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8760;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8761# de las gzhan pa de dag dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams ni 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar  gzhag pa yin no zhes 'byung ngo // /

column3: ci'i phyir grangs gsungs pa'i dgos pa'i don yang brjod dgos so // / +de bzhin du tshig gzhan gang dag gi brjod par bya ba'i don ni grags na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#517391#517401#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8760;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8761;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8762# shes rab kyi ngo bo nyid do zhes bshad do // / +theg pa chen po'i bstan pa dang sbyar na ni dran pa dang shes rab kyi bdag nyid do zhes bshad de / /

column3: de'i don gyi nus pa nyid ma yin pas de dag  gi dgos pa'i don yang brjod dgos te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#517400#517410#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8762;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8763;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8764# de'i  phyir chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i ngo bo nyid ni 'di lta ste / /

column3: dper na mnyan yod ga la ba der rgyu zhing gshegs so zhes bya ba'i brjod par bya ba'i don ni 'jig rten na grags na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#517411#517422#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8763;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8764;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8765# shes rab dang dran pa'o // / +bcom ldan 'das kyi mdo dag las dman pa la sogs pa'i rjes su rtog pa zhes bya ba yod pa'i phyir dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa     // /
column5: 0.028#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2563700#2563700#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_3453;TD4092.2E.TXT.r_3454# 'chal ba'i tshul khrims kyi gnyen po la brten pa zhes bya ba bstan pa'i  phyir ; / +dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la brten pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba smos te / /
column6: 0.029#TD4029E.TXT.r#2156406#2156406#TD4029E.TXT.r_4729# de dag la de bstan pa'i phyir  de dang ldan pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bsgom pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' ni / /

column3: ci'i phyir sangs rgyas sam nyan thos ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang  de bzhin du ci'i phyir bcom ldan 'das zla ba  phyed dang gsum nang du yang dag par 'jog par mdzad pa dang  ci'i phyir tshe dang ldan pa gsus po che chen po tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu ga la ba der song ngo zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa'i dgos pa yang brjod dgos so zhe na // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#517423#517433#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8764;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8765;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8766# bcom ldan 'das kyi mdo dag las dman pa la sogs pa'i rjes su rtog pa zhes bya ba yod pa'i phyir dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa     // / +dang bcas pa zhes gsungs pa'i phyir dang  go rims bzhin no zhes bshad do // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#517433#517441#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8766;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8767;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8768# bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las ni shes rab dang  dran pas ting nge 'dzin yang dag par sdud pa ni ngo bo nyid kyi dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#517441#517449#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8766;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8767;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8768;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8769# bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las ni shes rab dang  dran pas ting nge 'dzin yang dag par sdud pa ni ngo bo nyid kyi dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +gzhan  yang de nyid las 'di yang rnam pa gsum te / / +thos pa las byung ba dang  bsam pa las byung ba dang  bsgom pa las byung ba'o // /
column7: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#517449#517457#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8768;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8769;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8770;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8771# thos pa las byung ba dang  bsam pa las byung ba dang  bsgom pa las byung ba'o // / +thos pa dang  bsam pa las byung ba ni zag pa dang bcas pa kho na yin no // /

column3: de la rnam grangs gsungs pa dag gi dgos pa'i don ni sngar  bshad par zad kyi lhag ma rnams brjod par bya ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#517456#517473#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8769;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8770;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8771;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8772;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8773# thos pa dang  bsam pa las byung ba ni zag pa dang bcas pa kho na yin no // / +bsgom pa las byung ba ni zag pa dang bcas pa yang yod / / +zag  pa med pa dang bcas pa yang yod do zhes bshad do // /

column3: re zhig bstan pa'i tshig ni mdos 'grel pa'i don 'dzin par byed pa bzhin du bstan pa tsam gyis de bshad pa'i don 'dzin par bya ba'i phyir dang  gdul bya mgo smos pas go ba rnams rjes su gzung ba'i phyir dang  de las gzhan pa rnams     // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#517474#517483#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8773;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8774;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8775# dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni tshig bdun 'byung ste / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#517483#517491#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8774;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8775# tshig drug pa las rnam pa gnyis su phye bas 'di lta ste / / +dran pa  nye bar gzhag pa skyes pa gnas pa dang bsgom pa'i mtshan nyid mi bskyud pa zhes 'byung ngo // /
column6: 0.021#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#544116#544116#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12298# dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni tshig lnga 'byung ste / /

column3: la phyi ma la mgo smos pas go ba nyid kyis bsags pa'i phyir dang  bsdu ba dang rgyas par bshad pa la mnga' ba dang ldan pa yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir dang  gzhan rnams de lta bu la goms ba las de'i sa bon bskyed pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#517492#517499#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8775;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8776# dran pa  nye bar gzhag pa skyes pa gnas pa dang bsgom pa'i mtshan nyid mi bskyud pa zhes 'byung ngo // / +tshig nges par 'grel ba'i mdo las ni slob dpon yang dag bden pas tshig rnam pa bcur phye nas ston te / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#517500#517511#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8776;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8777;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8778# tshig nges par 'grel ba'i mdo las ni slob dpon yang dag bden pas tshig rnam pa bcur phye nas ston te / /
column6: 0.020#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2329305#2329305#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_2198;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_2199;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_2200# dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni b'a r'a na s'i grong khyer drang srong 'dus pa ri dags rgyu ba'i gnas zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon yang dag bden pas / / +tshig nges par 'grel ba'i mdo brjed byang byas pa las /// /

column3: lung las bstan  pa tsam la ni rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi sems mnyam par gzhag pa yin na / / +ji ltar na de rgyas pa'i don thams cad la mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur zhig gu / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#517512#517531#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8777;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8778;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8779;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8780# de'i phyir slob dpon yang dag bden pa'i brjed byang las / / +mdo las dge slong  kha cig ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dmigs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig bcus ci zhig ston par mdzad ce na / /

column3: zhes de'i don du bstan pa dang bshad pa gnyis kyis bstan to zhes 'byung ngo // / +grangs gsungs pa ni / /
kha cig ni  bgrang bar bya ba nges par gzung ba'i phyir te / / +dper na phung po lnga rnams dang  nang gi skye mched drug rnams zhes 'byung ba lta bu'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#517532#517545#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8780;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8781;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8782# don rnam pa bcu bstan pa'i phyir tshig bcu po 'di dag gsungs pa yin te / / +tshig dang po dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rtogs shing dmigs pas zhes bya ba de ni  yul gyi dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o // /

column3: grangs smos pas mi brjed pa'i phyir kha cig ni bde blag tu bzung ba'i phyir te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#517543#517554#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8781;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8782;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8783# tshig dang po dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rtogs shing dmigs pas zhes bya ba de ni  yul gyi dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o // /

column3: dper na gang la la'i sems nye ba'i nyon mongs pa nyi shu rtsa gcig  gis nye bar nyon mongs pa can yin na zhes 'byung ba dang  bcur bskyed pa las kyang / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#517553#517568#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8782;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8783;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8784# gnyis pa dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya ba de ni ngo bo nyid kyi dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o // / +gsum pa dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i mi mthun pa'i zhes bya bas ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i lam mi mthun pa'i phyogs phyin ci log  bzhi bstan to // /

column3: chos gcig ni gces spras su byed pa yin te zhes bya ba nas sa bcu'i bar du 'byung ba lta bu'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#517569#517580#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8784;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8785;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8786# bzhi pa dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i gnyen po lam zhes bya ba ni gnyen por gyur pa'i lam bstan te / /

column3: kha cig ni gang dag rgyas par bshad par dgos pas nyan par mi byed pa mang du mnyan pa dang  gzung  bas 'jigs pa nyan du gzhug pa'i phyir te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#517578#517594#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8785;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8786;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8787# de ni 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa phyin ci log bzhi'i gnyen por gyur pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: dper na 'di dag ni dbang po gsum po dag ste / / +mo'i dbang po dang pho'i dbang po dang srog gi dbang po zhes 'byung ba lta bu'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#517593#517602#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8786;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8787;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8788;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8789# lnga pa dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i bsgom pa zhes bya ba de ni dran pa nye    bar gzhag pa'i sbyor ba'i lam mo // / +drug pa dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ma skyes pa skye ba rtogs shing dmigs pa zhes bya ba de ni bar chad med pa'i lam yin te / /

column3: kha cig ni bya ba mang pos 'jigs pa dag spro ba bskyed pa'i phyir te / / +dper na dge slong dag chos gcig spongs  shig dang khyed phyir mi 'ong bar 'gyur bar ngas khas len te zhes 'byung ba lta bu'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#517603#517613#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8787;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8788;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8789;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8790# drug pa dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ma skyes pa skye ba rtogs shing dmigs pa zhes bya ba de ni bar chad med pa'i lam yin te / / +'di lta ste / / +bzod pa brgyad po dag go // / +bdun pa dran pa nye bar gzhag pa skyes pa gnas pa rtogs shing dmigs pa zhes bya ba de ni rnam  par 'grel pa'i lam yin te / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#517613#517623#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8790;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8791;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8792;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8793# bdun pa dran pa nye bar gzhag pa skyes pa gnas pa rtogs shing dmigs pa zhes bya ba de ni rnam  par 'grel pa'i lam yin te / /

column3: kha cig ni gcig gis gcig bsdu ba bstan pa'i phyir te / / +dper na 'di dag ni lnga dag tu gyur na gsum dag tu 'gyur la gsum dag tu gyur na lnga dag tu 'gyur ro zhes 'byung ba lta bu'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#517624#517632#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8792;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8793;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8794;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8795;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8796# shes pa brgyad po de dag go // / +brgyad pa mi bskyud pa zhes bya ba ni bsgom pa'i lam yin te / / +rdo rje lta bu'i sems kyi bar dag go // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#517632#517640#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8794;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8795;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8796;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8797;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8798# rdo rje lta bu'i sems kyi bar dag go // / +dgu pa 'phel ba zhes bya ba ni / / +mi slob pa'i lam yin te / /

column3: kha cig ni tshad  shes par bya ba'i phyir te / / +dper na bzang po'i sde pa drug cu dag gi tshogs zhes 'byung ba lta bu'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#517641#517652#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8797;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8798;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8799;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8800# rdo rje lta bu'i 'og gi sems so // / +bcu pa yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya ba ni rdzu 'phrul gyi lam yin te / /

column3: kha cig ni dngos po gcig tu shes par bya ba'i phyir te / / +chos gnyis kyi bya ba dang zas dang gnyen po mtshungs pa'i phyir na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#517651#517663#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8799;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8800;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8801;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8802# 'khor lo rnam pa gsum gyis sems can la phan 'dogs pa 'di lta ste / / +rdzu 'phrul dang sems lung bstan pa dang yang dag par bstan pa rnams kyis so // /

column3: dper na sgrib pa lnga rnams 'byung ba lta bu'o // / +kha cig ni    nyid la lnga nas so so yang dag par rig par gyur pa'i don gsung ba nyid du yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#517664#517680#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8801;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8802;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8803;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8804# ji ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la tshig  bcu yod pa de bzhin du / / +yang dag pa'i spong ba bzhi nas 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar du sbyar bar bya'o zhes 'byung ste / /
column5: 0.025#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#265048#265048#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6459;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6460# chos rnams kyi rang gi mtshan nyid phan tshun 'gal ba'i rgyu la sogs pa'o zhes 'byung ste / / +zhib tu de nyid las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o // /
column6: 0.025#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2371107#2371109#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7158;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7159;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7160# ji skad bstan pa bzhin du bsgrubs pas zhes bya ba ni sems de las phung po lnga dag skye ba dang  'jig pa nyid du mthong ba'o zhes 'byung ste / / +zhib tu de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // /

column3: ji skad du bshad pa'am gzhan las kyang rung te gar rigs pa'o // / +de lta bu la sogs pa ni grangs gsungs pa'i dgos pa yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#517681#517691#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8804;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8805# 'dir rnam par bshad pa ni de lta ma yin te chos kyi sgo re re yang tshig drug yod par sbyar te / /

column3: sangs rgyas rnams rgyu zhing gshegs pa ni  rgyu bdun dag gis rig par bya ste / / +yul gzhan na 'khod pa rnams 'dul ba'i phyir dang  de na 'khod pa rnams skom par bya ba'i phyir dang  nyan thos rnams gcig na ha cang yun ring du gnas ba spang ba'i phyir dang  nyid de la chags pa mi mnga' bar yang dag par bstan  pa'i phyir dang  yul rnams mchod rten du 'gyur ba'i phyir dang  srog chags mang po rnams de'i drung du blta ba dang 'gro ba la sogs pas bsod nams bskyed pa'i phyir dang  yams kyi nad dang than pa la sogs pa'i skyon rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#517692#517702#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8805;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8806;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8807# dang po'i tshig gnyis ni phung po bzhin du rig par bya'o // / +tshig 'og ma bzhi ni phung po la sogs pa dang mi mthun te / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#517702#517712#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8806;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8807# tshig 'og ma bzhi ni phung po la sogs pa dang mi mthun te / / +de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i gnyen po dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs thob par zhes bya ba ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi po dag phyin ci log bzhi po dag gi gnyen  por gyur par bstan to // /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#517713#517729#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8807;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8808;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8809;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8810# de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i gnyen po dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs thob par zhes bya ba ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi po dag phyin ci log bzhi po dag gi gnyen  por gyur par bstan to // /
column7: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#517730#517741#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8809;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8810;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8811;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8812# lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pas lus la mi gtsang ba nyid du bsgom pas gtsang ba nyid du phyin ci log pa'i gnyen por gyur pa yin no // / +tshor ba dran pa nye bar gzhag pas tshor ba la bde ba med pa nyid du phyin ci log pa'i gnyen por gyur  pa yin no // /

column3: bsdus pa'i tshigs su bcad  pa ni / / +yul gzhan 'dul bar bya phyir dang / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#517740#517750#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8810;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8811;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8812;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8813# tshor ba dran pa nye bar gzhag pas tshor ba la bde ba med pa nyid du phyin ci log pa'i gnyen por gyur  pa yin no // / +sems dran pa nye bar gzhag pas / / +sems mi rtag pa nyid bsgom pas rtag pa nyid du phyin ci log pa'i gnyen por gyur pa yin no // /

column3: de na 'khod pa bsgom bya'i phyir // / +nyan thos du ma gnas bya'i phyir // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#517746#517758#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8812;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8813;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8814;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8815# sems mi rtag pa nyid bsgom pas rtag pa nyid du phyin ci log pa'i gnyen por gyur pa yin no // / +chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pas chos bdag med pa nyid du bsgom pas phyin ci log pa'i gnyen por gyur ba yin te / /
column5: 0.021#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2398202#2398202#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10351# rgya cher ni bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las bstan pa bzhin no // /
column6: 0.024#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2389039#2389042#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9263;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9264# gzhan yang de nyid las gzhan la phan 'dogs pa'i nang na gzhan la phan 'dogs pa'i spyod pa'o zhes 'byung ste / / +rgya cher ni bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o // /
column7: 0.025#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2398280#2398280#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10361;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10362# bcu gcig pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas pa ste / / +rgya cher ni bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las bstan pa bzhin no // /
column8: 0.029#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#259035#259035#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5616;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5617;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5618# shes bya'i sgrib pa de las rnam par grol ba'i shes pa'i spyod yul gang yin pa de ni shes bya'i sgrib pa rnam par dag pa'i shes pa'i yul gyi de kho na zhes 'byung ste / / +rgya cher de nyid las bstan pa bzhin te / / +bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las kyang de skad  du 'byung ngo // /

column3: chags pa mi mnga' bstan phyir dang / / +yul rnams mchog rten 'gyur phyir dang / /

column5: 0.021#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2398202#2398202#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10351# rgya cher ni bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las bstan pa bzhin no // /

column7: 0.025#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2398280#2398280#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10361;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10362# bcu gcig pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas pa ste / / +rgya cher ni bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las bstan pa bzhin no // /

column3: lus can rnams kyi bsod nams phyir // / +yams nad la sogs zhi bya'i  phyir // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#517767#517778#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8816# dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bsgom pa thob pas zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig gsum po de dag ni bsgom pa rnam pa bzhi'i dbang du mdzad nas dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi bshad pa yin  te / /

column3: sangs rgyas rgyu zhing gshegs par mdzad // / +nyan thos dag ni rgyu bco lnga dag gis rgyu bar rig par bya ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#517777#517786#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8816;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8817# dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bsgom pa thob pas zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig gsum po de dag ni bsgom pa rnam pa bzhi'i dbang du mdzad nas dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi bshad pa yin  te / /

column3: ji skad du bcom ldan 'das kyis nyes dmigs lnga dag ste / / +ha cang yun ring du gnas na bya ba mang zhing byed pa mang ba yin ba dang  snod spyad mang zhing 'tshog chas mang  ba yin pa dang  gnas la ser sna byed cing gnas la zhen pa yin pa dang  khyim la ser sna byed cing khyim la zhen pa yin pa dang  chags pa dang bcas pa bzhin du gnas de nas 'gro bar byed do zhes 'byung ba'i nyes dmigs lnga bstan pa'i phyir dang  de bzhin du chos gos la  sogs pa dang mi ldan pa'i phyir dang  mi dga' bas gnod pa'i phyir dang  nad kyis gzir ba'i phyir dang  'dod chags kyis gzir ba'i phyir dang  mi dang mi ma yin pas byas pas gzhan gyi lus dang sems la gnod pa byed pa'i phyir dang  rnyed pa la sogs pa 'dod     // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#517787#517802#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8817;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8818;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8819# bsgom pa bzhi po de yang thams cad yod par smra ba'i gzhung gis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa mngon sum du gyur pa ni mngon par 'du byed ba'i bsgom pa zhes kyang bya / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#517802#517820#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8819;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8820;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8821# ma 'ongs pa'i thob pa dang  'thob par 'gyur pa'i rnam pa  skyed par nus pa gang yin pa de ni thob pa'i bsgom pa zhes bya ste / /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#517820#517828#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8821# 'thob pa'i bsgom pa dang  bstan pa'i bsgom pa dang  gnyen po'i bsgom pa dang  thag bsring ba'i bsgom pa'o 'di ltar  bsgom pa bzhi po de dag kyang chos gang la brten nas rnam par gzhag ce na / /
column7: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#517829#517838#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8821;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8822;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8823;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8824# 'thob pa'i bsgom pa dang  bstan pa'i bsgom pa dang  gnyen po'i bsgom pa dang  thag bsring ba'i bsgom pa'o 'di ltar  bsgom pa bzhi po de dag kyang chos gang la brten nas rnam par gzhag ce na / /
column8: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#517838#517857#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8822;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8823;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8824;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8825;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8826;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8827;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8828# tshig le'ur byas pa las / / +rnyed dang bsten pa'i bsgom pa gnyis dag ni // / +dge ba 'dus byas chos rten rnam par gzhag / /
column9: 0.019#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2356398#2356401#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5307# 'dres par bsgom pa dang  mtshan ma med par bsgom pa dang  lhun gyis grub par bsgom pa dang  'bar bar bsgom pa dang  chog par mi  'dzin par bsgom pas so zhes 'byung ste / /
column10: 0.019#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#223585#223589#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1259# kun tu spyod pa las sbyor bas bsgom pa dang  mos pas bsgom pa dang  yid la byed pas bsgom pa dang  thabs la mkhas pas bsgom pa dang  bya ba bsgrub pas bsgom pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // /
column11: 0.021#TD4054E.TXT.r#1034194#1034194#TD4054E.TXT.r_7034# rnam pa 'di lta bu'i bsam pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i bsgom pa la / /
column12: 0.021#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#949666#949666#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_7634;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_7635# lhung bzed DANG CHOS GOS LA SOGS PA LUNG las ji skad 'byung ba las lhag par mi tshol zhing bsnyungs pa dang  gyo dang  sgyus mi 'tsho ba ni bsnyungs pa'i tshul du kun du spyod pa'i rnam pa la bsgom pa zhes bya ste / / +de yang  yang dag pa'i 'tshobs byed pas na 'dis ni yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba bstan to // /
column13: 0.024#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#223490#223490#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1245# 'di ni rgyun ring po dang  bar chad med pa dang  gus pa dang  lus med pa'i bsgom pa rnam pa bzhi las bar chad med pa'i bsgom pa nyid do // /
column14: 0.028#TD4049E.TXT.r#2303366#2303366#TD4049E.TXT.r_2747# thob par bya ba'i phyir bsgom pa dang  bsten pa'i bsgom pa dang   bsal ba'i phyir bsgom pa dang  gnyen po bsgom pa'o // /

column3: pa'i phyir dang  gzhan la dga' ba'i phyir dang  gzhan la snying brtse ba'i phyir dang  bla ma la zhes bya ba'i phyir dang  yul la sogs pa la ltad mo lta ba'i phyir dang  dge ba'i phyogs khyad par du bya ba'i phyir dang  ltung ba bshags pa'i phyir dang   dkon mchog gsum la bkur sti bya ba'i phyir dang  mchod rten la phyag bya ba'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#517857#517869#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8826;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8827;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8828;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8829;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8830# gnyen po thag  bsring bsgom pa gzhag pa yin zhes 'byung ste / / +'di nyid kyi 'grel pa las / / +thob pa dang bsten pa'i bsgom pa gnyis ni dge ba 'dus byas la brten pa yin te / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#517870#517878#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8829;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8830;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8831# ma 'ongs pa rnams kyis thob pa kho na'o // / +da ltar byung ba rnams kyis ni gnyi ga'o // / +gnyen po dang thag  bsring ba'i bsgom pa gnyis ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos la brten pa'i phyir / /
column6: 0.022#TD4095E.TXT.r#100549#100549#TD4095E.TXT.r_7291;TD4095E.TXT.r_7292;TD4095E.TXT.r_7293# ma 'ongs pa rnams kyi gcig go // / +da ltar byung ba rnams kyi gnyis ka'o // / +gnyen po dang thag bsring ba'i thob pa dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams kyi yin no // /

column3: bsdus pa'i tshigs su bcad pa ni // / +nyes dmigs lnga dang mi ldan dang / / +mi dga' nad chags gnod pa'i phyir // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#517879#517888#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8831;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8832;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8833# gnyen po dang thag  bsring ba'i bsgom pa gnyis ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos la brten pa'i phyir / / +zag pa dang dge ba ni dge ba bzhi char dang ldan no // /

column3: rnyed sogs sred dang dga' ba dang / / +snying brtse bla ma zhe sa dang  ltad  mo khyad par bya phyir dang / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#517889#517900#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8832;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8833;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8834# zag pa dang dge ba ni dge ba bzhi char dang ldan no // / +zag pa med pa'i 'dus byas dang  zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos gzhan dag ni go rims bzhin du so so nas snga ma dang  phyi ma  gnyis kyi bsgom pa dag dang ldan no zhes bshad de / /

column3: btung ba dkon mchog bkur sti'i phyir // / +mchod rten phyag ni bya ba'i phyir // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#517901#517915#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8833;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8834;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8835# zag pa med pa'i 'dus byas dang  zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos gzhan dag ni go rims bzhin du so so nas snga ma dang  phyi ma  gnyis kyi bsgom pa dag dang ldan no zhes bshad de / / +rgya cher rnam par 'byed pa ni bstan bcos yang dag pa'i rigs pa dang  rjes su mthun pa dang  bye brag tu bshad pa chen po las bstan pa bzhin no // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2352440#2352442#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4811;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4812# mdzod kyi bstan bcos dang yang dag pa'i rigs pa dang rjes su mthun pa las ni / / +bye brag tu bshad pa chen po las bstan pa'i rnam grangs bzhi pa dang mthun par 'byung ngo // /
column6: 0.021#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2361577#2361578#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5930;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5931# de yang mtshungs par ldan pa ma yin pa'i 'du byed kyi phung pos bsdus pa yin no zhes bshad de / / +rgya cher rnam par 'byed pa ni bstan bcos yang dag pa'i rigs pa dang rjes su mthun pa las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o // /
column7: 0.022#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#549114#549119#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12878;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12879# 'di ltar 'gro ba  lnga po dag gi nang na yid rab tu dben zhing zhi bar nus pa ni mi lta bu med pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ste / / +rgya cher bshad pa ni bstan bcos yang dag pa'i rigs pa dang rjes su mthun pa bye brag tu bshad pa chen po dang  mtshan nyid bstan pa dag las 'byung ba bzhin du rig par bya'o //// /
column8: 0.023#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#518351#518351#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8891# bstan bcos yang dag pa'i rigs pa dang bye brag tu bshad pa chen po las kyang  'di dang mthun par bshad do // /
column9: 0.023#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2347097#2347097#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4180# ji ltar gnas brtan pa'i sde pa dag dpe 'di nyid la brten nas srid pa bar ma rnam par mi gzhag pa lta bu dang  mdzod  kyi bstan bcos dang  yang dag pa'i rigs dang rjes su mthun pa dang  bye brag tu bshad pa chen po las bye brag tu smra ba dag srid pa bar ma rnam par mi gzhag pa lta bu ste / /
column10: 0.023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#258231#258234#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5516# rgya cher rnam par dbye ba ni bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa dang  'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa dang  sa bcu pa'i 'grel ba dang  mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mdo dang  mdzod kyi bstan bcos dang  yang dag pa'i rigs  pa dang rjes su mthun pa dang  bye brag tu bshad pa chen po las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o // /
column11: 0.024#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2371004#2371004#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7150# rgya cher rnam par 'byed pa ni bstan bcos sems sna tshogs bstan pa dang  yang dag pa'i rigs ba dang rjes su mthun pa dang  bye brag tu bshad pa chen po las 'byung ste mangs kyis  dogs nas 'dir ma brjod do // /
column12: 0.028#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#519013#519016#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8990;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8991;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8992# zhib tu de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // / +bstan bcos yang dag pa'i rigs pa las kyang / / +bye brag tu bshad pa  chen po las bstan pa dang don mthun par bshad do // /
column13: 0.028#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#527254#527254#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10145# rgya cher rnam par 'byed  pa ni bstan bcos gzhung bstan pa dang  mdzod kyi bstan bcos dang  yang dag pa'i rigs pa dang  bye brag tu bshad pa chen po las 'byung ba bzhin du rig par bya'o // /

column3: dge slong rgyu zhing 'gro bar byed // / +bcom ldan 'das zla ba phyed dang gsum nang du yang dag par 'jog par mdzad pa ni nyan thos rnams skom par bya ba'i phyir te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#513211#513215#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8310;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8311# yon tan ma yin pa dang ldan pa las bdag yon tan dang ldan no snyam du sems khengs pa gang yin pa'o zhes 'byung ba'o // / +bstan bcos mngon pa kun  las btus pa dang  chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa dang  rnam 'byor spyod pa'i sa las kyang 'di dang mthun par bshad do // /

column3: de ni de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa nyid kyis rnam pa gnyis ka yang yin par bstan to // / +gang gis gshegs pa zhes bya ba ni rig pa dang  zhabs su ldan pa nyid kyis te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#517061#517066#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8726# yang kha cig ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa thob pa dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i mtshan ma thob pa dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i gnyen po dang  mi mthun pa'i phyogs bstan pa dang  dran pa nye bar  gzhag pa bsgom pa thob pa dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ma skyes pa skye ba thob pa dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa skyes pa gnas pa dang  mi bskyud pa dang  slar zhing 'byung ba dang  'phel zhing rgyas pa thob pa'i slad du shes pa brda sprod par bgyid ces bya ba 'di man chad  ni gnyis pa byang chub kyi phyogs sum cu rtsa bdun la brten nas shes pa brda sprod par byed pa ston to // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#518134#518145#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8867;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8868# de dag thob bar bya ba'i phyir ro // / +dran pa nye bar gzhag pa skyes pa gnas pa dang  mi bskyud pa dang  slar zhing 'byung ba dang  'phel zhing rgyas pa thob pa'i slad DU ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI bsten pa'i bsgom pa ston  te / /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#519139#519141#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9005# yang kha cig ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa thob pa dang  'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i mtshan ma thob pa dang  'phags  pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i gnyen po dang  mi mthun pa'i phyogs thob pa dang  'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bsgom pa thob pa dang  'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ma skyes pa skye ba thob pa dang  'phags pa'i lam yan lag  brgyad pa'i skyes pa gnas pa dang  mi bskyud pa dang  slar zhing 'byung ba dang  'phel zhing rgyas pa thob pa'i slad du / /
column7: 0.0#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3108749#3108752#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_2394# kha cig ni dran  ba nye bar gzhag pa dmigs pa dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i mtshan ma dmigs pa dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang gnyen po dmigs pa dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i bsgom pa dmigs pa dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ma skyes pa skye ba dmigs pa dang   dran pa nye bar gzhag pa skyes pa gnas pa dang  ma bskyud pa dang  slar zhing 'byung ba dang  'phel zhing rgyas pa dmigs pas shes pa brda sprod par bgyid / /
column8: 1.788#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3108799#3108799#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_2396# kha cig ni yang dag par spong ba rnams dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa  rnams dang  dbang po rnams dang  stobs rnams dang  byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang  kha cig ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dmigs pa dang  'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i mtshan ma dmigs pa dang  'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i mi mthun  ba'i phyogs kyi gnyen po dmigs pa dang  'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom pa dmigs pa dang  'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma skyes pa skye ba dmigs pa dang  'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa skyes pa gnas pa dang  ma bskyud pa dang  slar zhing    'byung ba dang  'phel zhing rgyas pa dmigs pas shes pa brda sprod par rig pa dag mthong lags so // /

column3: de la rig pa ni yang dag pa'i lta ba ste / / +yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du lta ba'i phyir ro // / +zhabs ni lam gyi yan lag lhag ma dag ste / /

column5: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2393584#2393587#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9808# yon tan rnams rab tu 'dren par byed pa yang bstan pa rnams las so so nas bshad pa mi mthun pas bstan bcos rnam par bshad pa las ni rnam par thar pa brgyad las / /

column7: 0.018#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2367640#2367640#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6716# ming gi rnam grangs mang po de yang bstan pa rnams las so so nas bshad pa mi mthun pas / /

column9: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2338847#2338849#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3254# phan yon rnam pa  'di gnyis kyang bstan pa rnams las so so nas bshad pa mi mthun pas bstan bcos bye brag tu bshad pa chen po las / /

column3: de ltar na 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad kyis gshegs pa yin par bstan pa yin te / / +mi mthong ba'am / / +rkang pa med pa ni 'gro bar mi nus pas so // /

column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#518216#518229#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8880;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8881# phyir 'byung ba dang  'phel ba dang rgyas pa zhes bya ba ni go  rims bzhin du de dag kho na la chog shes pa mi skye ba'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ngo // /

column3: phyir rol pa'i 'dod chags dang bral ba dag dang  de las gzhan pa dgra bcom pa dag las khyad par du bya ba'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#518240#518248#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8882# kha cig ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa thob pa'i slad du ji lta ba de bzhin du yang kha cig ni yang    dag pa'i spong ba thob pa dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa thob pa dang  dbang po rnams thob pa dang  stobs rnams thob pa dang  byang chub kyi yan lag rnams thob pa yang de bzhin no zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa zlas sgo lnga rnam par bshad pa yin te / /

column3: des na 'jig rten mkhyen pa zhes bya'o // / +gdul ba 'dul ba yang yin te / / +des na skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa zhes bya ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#518258#518275#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8882;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8883# kha cig ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa thob pa'i slad du ji lta ba de bzhin du yang kha cig ni yang    dag pa'i spong ba thob pa dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa thob pa dang  dbang po rnams thob pa dang  stobs rnams thob pa dang  byang chub kyi yan lag rnams thob pa yang de bzhin no zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa zlas sgo lnga rnam par bshad pa yin te / /

column3: skyes bu 'dul ba chu klung 'od srungs dang  dga' bo dang  sor mo'i phreng ba  la sogs pa gdul dga' ba rnams kyang thabs sla ba dang kha na ma tho ba med pas 'dul ba'i phyir dang  gtan du don gyi mchog mya ngan las 'das par 'dul ba'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#518276#518290#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8883;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8884;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8885# ji ltar dran pa nye bar  gzhag pa la tshig drug yod pa de bzhin du yang dag pa'i spong ba dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang  dbang po dang  stobs dang  byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la yang tshig drug yod par yang gong ma bzhin du rig par bya'o // /

column3: gang dag gis yongs su bzung ba zhes bya ba ni lha dang mi rnams kyis bstan pa nyid yongs su bzung ba  bstan to // / +lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#518289#518302#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8884;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8885# de la sgo lnga zhes bya ba yang dang po ni  yang dag pa'i spong ba bzhi po 'di lta ste / / +sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams yongs su spangs pa'i phyir dang  sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi skyed pa'i phyir dang  dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams bskyed pa'i phyir dang  dge ba'i chos  skyes pa rnam gnas pa dang  mi brjed pa la SOGS PA'I PHYIR RO // /

column6: 0.022#TD4036E.TXT.r#34410#34410#TD4036E.TXT.r_5260# lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang  tshor ba dang  sems dang  chos dran  pa nye bar gzhag pa dang  yang dag pa'i sbong ba'i sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi skyed pa dang  sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams spang ba'i phyir 'dun pa skyed par byed / /
column7: 0.023#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2054472#2054476#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_11007# yang dag par spong ba BZHI ZHES BYA BA NI SDIG pa mi dge ba'i  chos skyes pa rnams spangs pa'i phyir zhes bya ba dang  ma skyes pa rnams mi skyed pa'i phyir zhes bya ba dang  dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams bskyed pa'i phyir zhes bya ba dang  dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams gnas pa dang zhes bya ba'o // /

column3: de ni zhes gsungs pa de gang yin zhe na / / +sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das so zhes bya ba gsungs te / / +gang zhig sangs rgyas so zhes de ltar grags pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#518299#518312#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8885;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8886# sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams yongs su spangs pa'i phyir dang  sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi skyed pa'i phyir dang  dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams bskyed pa'i phyir dang  dge ba'i chos  skyes pa rnam gnas pa dang  mi brjed pa la sogs pa'i phyir ro // /
column5: 0.029#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3105530#3105530#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_1962# ma skyes pa rnams mi bskyed pa'i phyir ji lta ba bzhin du skyes pa snang bar gyur pa rnams dang     nang du yang dag par skyes pa rnams spang bar bya ba'i phyir dang  de'i gnyen po dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams bskyed pa'i phyir dang  skyes pa rnams gnas par bya ba'i phyir 'dun ba skyed par byed do zhes rgyas par bya ba yang de bzhin du rig par bya'o // /

column3: grags pa dang bcom pa ni rnam grangs yin  pa'i phyir ro // / +'dir bshad pa / / +dbang phyug dang ni gzugs bzang dang / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#518313#518321#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8885;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8886;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8887# sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams yongs su spangs pa'i phyir dang  sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi skyed pa'i phyir dang  dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams bskyed pa'i phyir dang  dge ba'i chos  skyes pa rnam gnas pa dang  mi brjed pa la SOGS PA'I PHYIR RO // / +mdzod kyi bstan bcos las ci'i phyir brtson 'grus la yang dag pa'i spong ba zhes bya zhe na / /

column3: drug po dag la bcom zhes bshad // / +gzhan yang bsdus pa'i don ni de ni rgyas pa dang mdor bstan pa'i yon    tan bsngags pa yin te / /

column3: rgyas pa ni tshig dgu po dag gis ji skad gsungs pa lta bu'o // / +mdor ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das te / /

column5: 0.028#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#527254#527254#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10145# rgya cher rnam par 'byed  pa ni bstan bcos gzhung bstan pa dang  mdzod kyi bstan bcos dang  yang dag pa'i rigs pa dang  bye brag tu bshad pa chen po las 'byung ba bzhin du rig par bya'o // /

column6: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2372095#2372096#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7301;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7302# slob dpon yon tan byin gyis 'grel pa las kyang don phal cher 'di dang mthun par bshad do // / +'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las ni dper na gzhan dag  las klog pa dang kha ton slob pa dang rnam par 'byed cing dpyod ba lta bu gang yin pa de ni shes pa zhes bya'o // /
