column8: 0.016#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#519021#519024#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8992;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8993# bye brag tu bshad pa  chen po las bstan pa dang don mthun par bshad do // / +'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column9: 0.018#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#514954#514955#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8505;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8506# dge slong zhes bya ba ni slob dpon drang srong rdo rjes slong ba dang  sdig pa 'joms pa dang  bdud skrag par byed pa'o zhes bshad do // / +'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las     // /
column10: 0.019#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#523096#523096#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9576;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9577# bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las legs so zhes bya ba ni 'phags pa rnams kyi bsngags pa brjod pa'i  phyir ro zhes bshad do // / +'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column11: 0.021#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#519013#519014#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8990;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8991;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8992# zhib tu de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // / +bstan bcos yang dag pa'i rigs pa las kyang / / +bye brag tu bshad pa  chen po las bstan pa dang don mthun par bshad do // /
column12: 0.021#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2321351#2321351#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_1214;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_1215# mngon par zhen pa'i gang zag de yang bstan pa rnams las so so nas bshad pa mi mthun te / / +'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column13: 0.021#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#264275#264275#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6359;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6360# 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las kyang phal cher bye brag tu bshad pa chen po las 'byung ba dang mthun par bshad do // / +gzhan yang 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column14: 0.023#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#517907#517907#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8834# rgya cher rnam par 'byed pa ni bstan bcos yang dag pa'i rigs pa dang  rjes su mthun pa dang  bye brag tu bshad pa chen po las bstan pa bzhin no // /
column15: 0.023#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2352440#2352440#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4811;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4812# mdzod kyi bstan bcos dang yang dag pa'i rigs pa dang rjes su mthun pa las ni / / +bye brag tu bshad pa chen po las bstan pa'i rnam grangs bzhi pa dang mthun par 'byung ngo // /
column16: 0.023#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#495541#495541#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_6106;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_6107# de las gzhan pa slob pa yang ma yin mi slob pa yang ma yin pa'i chos rnams so zhes bstan pa lta bu'o // / +shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las kyang 'di dang mthun par bshad do // /
column17: 0.024#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#243996#243996#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3842;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3843# 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las ni grangs kyis bsgyur ba bcu gcig las grangs bcu gcig pa ni grangs med pa zhes bya'o zhes bshad do // / +gzhan yang 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column18: 0.024#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#519290#519290#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9028;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9029# byang chub ni ma yin pa bzhin no zhe'o // / +'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column19: 0.026#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#517281#517281#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8747# bstan bcos bye brag tu bshad pa chen po las 'di  ltar dran pa'i mthu stobs kyis rang gi bdag nyid yongs su sel ba'i phyir dran pa nye bar gzhag pa zhes bya'o // /
column20: 0.027#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2403661#2403661#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11030;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11031# ting nge 'dzin mchog dang  yon tan chen po'i gzungs yongs su grub nas shes rab dam pa'i 'od dpag tu med pa'i phyir yang 'od byed  pa'i sa zhes bya'o zhes bshad do // / +'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las ni 'od dang bcas pa'i sa zhes 'byung ngo // /
column21: 0.029#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#486064#486064#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_4794;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_4795# thad kar phrad par 'gyur bas tshe gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams rtag par  der skye'o zhes 'byung ste / / +bye brag tu bshad pa chen po las kyang 'di dang mthun par bshad do zhe na / /

column3: mdo sde'i dum bu gnyis  pa las mdor bstan pa dang bshad pa gnyis kyis nyid kyi nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang  shes bya'i sgrib pa las rnam par grol ba'i khyad par ston par mdzad de / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#518360#518381#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8891;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8892;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8893# bstan bcos yang dag pa'i rigs pa dang bye brag tu bshad pa chen po las kyang  'di dang mthun par bshad do // / +'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las log pa'i chos 'dzin cing yang dag pa'i lam du 'gro ba'i phyir yang dag pa'i spong ba zhes bya'o // /

column3: de la lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten zhes bya ba ni bstan pa yin no // / +de la rnam par grol ba'i khyad par ni lha dang mi'i gtso bo dang   gtso bo ma yin pa rnams la rnam par grol ba la sogs pas ston te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#518382#518390#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8893;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8894# gzhan yang de nyid las brtson 'grus kyi sems rnam pa bzhis  nan tan dang  'bad pa bskyed pa'i phyir yang dag pa'i spong ba zhes bya'o zhes 'byung ngo // /
column5: 0.022#TD4018E.TXT.r#3037589#3037589#TD4018E.TXT.r_4349# gnyis su med pa'i rnal 'byor la gnas pas mi gnyis pa'i sems kyi nan tan ni brtson 'grus so // /

column3: lha gtso bo rnams ni 'dod pa'i dbang phyug bdud rnams dang  rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug tshangs pa rnams so // / +mi'i gtso bo rnams ni dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#518391#518400#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8894;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8895;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8896# de la ngo bo nyid rnam par 'byed pa ni theg pa che chung gi bstan pa kun las brtson 'grus kyi bdag nyid do zhes bshad do // /
column5: 0.028#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#519096#519099#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9002;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9003;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9004# yang dag pa nyid du skyon med par zhugs pa'i gang  zag gis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa'i shes rab kyi yan lag 'byed pa'i phyir byang chub kyi yan lag ces bya'o zhes bstan to // / +de la ngo bo nyid rnam par 'byed pa ni theg pa che chung gi bstan pa rnams las / /

column3: rgyal pos kyang mchod pa'i phyir ro // / +lha dang  mi'i gtso bo ma yin pa rnams ni de las gzhan pa'i lha dang mi rnams dang bcas pa'i skye dgu ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#518401#518411#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8894;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8895;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8896;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8897;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8898# de la ngo bo nyid rnam par 'byed pa ni theg pa che chung gi bstan pa kun las brtson 'grus kyi bdag nyid do zhes bshad do // / +rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ni 'di lta ste / / +rdzu 'phrul     // / +gyi rkang pa bzhi po 'dun pa dang  brtson 'grus dang  sems dang  dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin to // /

column3: lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten de las so // / +so so'i skye bo 'dod chags dang ma bral ba rnams ni ma grol ba dag yin la / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#518412#518419#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8897;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8898;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8899;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8900# gyi rkang pa bzhi po 'dun pa dang  brtson 'grus dang  sems dang  dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin to // / +mdzod kyi bstan bcos las / / +ci'i phyir ting nge 'dzin la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa zhes rnam par gzhag ce na / /

column3: 'jig rten pa'i lam gyis 'dod chags dang bral ba mthong ba'i  chos las yongs su nyams pa'i chos can rnams ni grol ba ni yin na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#518420#518428#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8899;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8900;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8901;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8902# ci'i phyir ting nge 'dzin la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa zhes rnam par gzhag ce na / / +yon tan khyad par can rnams kyi gnas  su gyur pa'i phyir ro zhes bshad do // /

column3: nges par 'byung ba dag ni ma yin zhing yongs su mi nyams pa'i chos can rnams ni grol ba dang nges par 'byung ba dag ni yin na bral ba dag ni ma yin te / / +rus sbal gyi phru gu rnyis zin pa bzhin du bag la nyal rjes  su 'brang ba'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#518429#518445#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8901;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8902;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8903;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8904;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8905;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8906# slob dpon gzhan kha cig na re rdzu 'phrul ni ting nge 'dzin yin la / / +rkang pa ni 'di lta ste / /

column3: rab tu rnam par grol ba dag kyang ma yin te / / +slar 'ong ba'i phyir la slar 'ong ba dang bral bar 'gro ba ni rab tu rnam par grol ba dag yin pas so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#518446#518457#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8905;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8906;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8907# bye brag tu  smra ba dag na re / / +byang chub kyi yan lag bcu gcig gi steng du 'dun pa dang  sems kyis bsnan pa'i phyir dngos po bcu gsum du 'gyur ro zhe'o // /

column3: de dag dang chos mi mthun pas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi rnam par grol ba la sogs pa nyid ston par mdzad  do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#518458#518465#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8906;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8907;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8908# byang chub kyi yan lag bcu gcig gi steng du 'dun pa dang  sems kyis bsnan pa'i phyir dngos po bcu gsum du 'gyur ro zhe'o // / +gzhan yang mdo las ji skad du ngas khyed la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa la sogs pa bshad par bya ste / /

column3: rnam grangs gzhan yang 'di las phyi rol pa rnams ni tshangs pa dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis sa de'i nyon mongs pa kun nas dkris pa'i 'ching ba chad pa las grol ba yang yin / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#518466#518473#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8907;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8908;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8909# gzhan yang mdo las ji skad du ngas khyed la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa la sogs pa bshad par bya ste / / +rdzu 'phrul ni 'di  lta ste / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#518474#518481#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8909;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8910;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8911# rdzu 'phrul gyi yul rnam pa sna tshogs myong zhing gcig las mang por byed pa la sogs pa / /

column3: sa de'i btson ra nas nges par 'byung ba yang yin mod kyi / / +phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i mi lta bu'i     // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#518480#518489#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8909;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8910;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8911;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8912;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8913# rdzu 'phrul gyi yul rnam pa sna tshogs myong zhing gcig las mang por byed pa la sogs pa / / +rgya cher bshad pa'i bar du'o // / +rkang pa ni 'di lta ste / /

column3: kun tu sbyor ba gsum rnams kyis bral ba ma yin pa nyid do // / +des nas 'og ma pa'i nyon mongs pa kun nas dkris pa'i 'ching ba dang  skye bo'i btson ra nas rab tu rnam par ma grol ba yang yin te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#518490#518503#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8912;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8913;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8914;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8915# 'dun pa la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin bzhi po dag go zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o // / +de la 'dir bcom ldan  'das kyis ting nge 'dzin gyi 'bras bu la ni rdzu 'phrul zhes gsungs so // /

column3: yang slar ldog pa'i phyir ro // / +de dag las  khyad par du bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi rnam par grol ba rnam pa bzhi ston par mdzad do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#518502#518516#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8913;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8914;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8915;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8916# de la 'dir bcom ldan  'das kyis ting nge 'dzin gyi 'bras bu la ni rdzu 'phrul zhes gsungs so // / +'dun pa la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la ni rkang pa zhes gsungs te / /

column3: rnam grangs gzhan yang 'di las phyi rol pa rnams ni sa 'og ma pa'i nyon mongs pa'i 'ching ba las grol ba dag kyang yin / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#518515#518524#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8915;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8916;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8917# bstan bcos yang dag pa'i rigs pa las kyang phal cher 'di dang mthun par 'byung ngo // / +gzhan yang bstan  bcos bye brag tu bshad pa chen po las / /

column3: sdug bsngal gyi btson ra nas nges par 'byung ba  dag kyang yin mod kyi / / +sa gzhan pa'i nyon mongs pa dang yang ma bral ba yin la / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#518525#518533#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8917;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8918;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8919# rdzu 'phrul yon tan khyad par can gyi gnas su gyur pa'i phyir rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa zhes bya'o zhes 'byung ngo // /

column3: sdug bsngal las kyang rab tu rnam par ma grol ba dag yin te / / +de dag las kyang khyad par du bya ba'i phyir snga ma bzhin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#518534#518549#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8918;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8919;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8920# rgya cher ni de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // / +gzhan yang 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa  las / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2367367#2367369#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6678;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6679# 'di ni rnal 'byor pas 'du byed rnams la mi mthun par bsgom pa'o zhes bstan pa yin no // / +gzhan yang 'phags pa  shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column6: 0.009#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2367864#2367866#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6752;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6753# de la yang bcos ldan 'das kyis mdo'i sde la ni tshig 'bru rgyas pa yin la don bsdus pa yin pa dang  tshigs su bcad pa'i sde la ni don rgyas pa yin la tshig 'bru bsdus pa yin par yongs su bstan pa yin bar rig par bya'o zhes bstan to // / +gzhan yang 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i  'grel pa las / /
column7: 0.016#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222647#222647#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1124# spong pa'i lam du gyur pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o zhes gsungs pa dang  gzhan yang 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column8: 0.016#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222417#222419#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1086# brtson 'grus dang  bsam gtan dang  thos pa'i shes rab la sogs pa'o zhes 'byung ba dang  gzhan yang 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column9: 0.017#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#243996#243996#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3842;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3843# 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las ni grangs kyis bsgyur ba bcu gcig las grangs bcu gcig pa ni grangs med pa zhes bya'o zhes bshad do // / +gzhan yang 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column10: 0.018#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#216995#216995#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_374;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_375# snying rje chen po de yang thams cad yod par smra ba'i gzhung mdzod kyi bstan bcos las ni bstan bcos byang chub kyi phyogs bstan pa dang  'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa dang  mdo sde'i rgyan las bstan pa dag  dang mthun par byang chub sems dpa' la yang snying rje chen po yod par ston to // / +'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column11: 0.020#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#245133#245133#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3988;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3989# bdag gis lan cig tsam  sems bskyed pa yang theg pa gnyis las khyad par du 'phags par gyur na yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa lta ci smos zhes bdag nyid brtan par theg pa chen po'i chos la gnas par gyur to zhes 'byung ba lta bu'o // / +gzhan yang 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column12: 0.020#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#270688#270689#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7128;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7129# gnod pa med kyang langs pa gnod par 'gyur ba'i phyir rgyu dang rkyen des na gdon mi za bar ldang bar 'gyur ro zhes 'byung ba lta bu'o // / +gzhan yang 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column13: 0.022#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2380257#2380259#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8291;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8292# sngar gong du bstan pa bzhin du rab tu dbye bar bya'o // / +gzhan yang 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column14: 0.024#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2379457#2379457#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8194# zhes gsungs pa dang  gzhan yang 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las kyang / /
column15: 0.024#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#249190#249190#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4448;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4449;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4450# lha de las babs la gdon mi za bar yul gyi dbus su skye ba dang  nam gyi gung thun la  lhums su zhugs pa dang  nam gyi gung thun la rab tu 'byung ba dang  dbu ma'i lam la spyad de sangs rgyas kyi byang chub brnyes nas kyang dbu ma'i lam gyi chos ston pa dang  nam gyi gung thun la yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ba dang  chos dbu ma legs par rtogs  par 'gyur ba'i phyir lha'i gnas bar mar skye ba yin no zhes bstan pa lta bu ste / / +rgya cher de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // / +gzhan yang 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las / /
column16: 0.026#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#224165#224165#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1329# bla na med pa mi skye ba nyid kyi phyir ro zhes gsungs pa dang  gzhan yang 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column17: 0.026#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#519021#519022#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8992;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8993# bye brag tu bshad pa  chen po las bstan pa dang don mthun par bshad do // / +'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las / /

column3: 'di ltar yang yin te / / +'di las phyi rol pa dag ni 'di ltar nyon  mongs pa'i 'ching ba las grol zhing skye ba'i btson ra nas nges par 'byung ba yin la / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#518543#518557#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8919;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8920;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8921# gzhan yang 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa  las / / +sems rtse gcig tu bsdus nas dmigs pa la bde bar gnas pa'i phyir yid bzhin gyi rkang pa zhes bya'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#518568#518570#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8922# 'di ltar ting nge 'dzin gyis sems    sdud pa'i phyir yid bzhin gyi rkang pa zhes bya'o // /

column3: de las bral ba ni ma yin te / / +pad ma'i rtsa ba bcag pa rtsa rgyus kyis 'brel pa bzhin du bag la nyal dang 'brel pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#518558#518570#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8921;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8922# gzhan yang de nyid las yang dag par spong ba bzhi po dag gis dus su sems la sogs pa rnam par gyeng bas / /

column7: 0.017#TD4060E.TXT.r#681203#681204#TD4060E.TXT.r_112# chos nyid kyis zin cing zhi ba ma yin pa dang  gya nom pa ma yin pa dang  lam shin tu sbyangs pa thob pa ma yin pa dang  sems rgyud gcig tu gyur pa rtogs pa ma yin pa zhes bya ba dang  de de ltar sems mnyam par gzhag pa yongs  su dag pa dang  yongs su byang ba dang  nyon mongs pa med pa dang  nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bral ba dang  drang por gyur pa dang  las su rung ba dang  gnas pa dang  mi gyo ba thob na zhes bya ba dang  ting nge 'dzin dang gnas dang ldang / /
column8: 0.017#TD4069E.TXT.r#636284#636285#TD4069E.TXT.r_1902# de da ltar na sems mnyam par gzhag pa yongs su dag pa dang  yongs su byang ba dang  nyon mongs pa med pa dang  nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bral ba dang  drang por gyur pa dang  las su rung ba dang  gnas pa dang mi gyo ba thob na zhes bya ba ni mdo sde'i dum bu yin no // /

column5: 0.0#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1732350#1732352#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_4419# chos rab tu rnam par 'byed  pa dang  brtson 'grus dang  dga' ba dang  shin tu sbyangs pa dang  ting nge 'dzin dang  btang snyoms byang chub kyi yan lag dben pa la gnas pa 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa 'gog pa LA GNAS PA RNAM PAR SPONG BA YONGS SU bsgyur ba sgom par byed de / /
column6: 0.009#TD4094.2E.TXT.r#1897987#1897988#TD4094.2E.TXT.r_1763# dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan  lag dang  chos rab tu 'byed pa dang  brtson 'grus dang  dga' ba dang  shin tu sbyangs pa dang  ting nge 'dzin dang  btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go zhes gsungs so // /
column7: 0.018#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1805983#1805984#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_13294# chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa dang  brtson 'grus dang  dga' ba dang   shin tu sbyangs pa dang  ting nge 'dzin dang  btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gi gnas kyi chos rnams la tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa lan mang du byed na btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ma skyes pa mi skye zhing skyes pa nyams par  'gyur te / /
column8: 0.018#TD4036E.TXT.r#34490#34492#TD4036E.TXT.r_5269# spang pa'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang  dad pa dang  brtson 'grus dang  dran pa dang  ting nge 'dzin dang  shes rab kyi dbang po dang  dad pa dang  brtson 'grus dang  dran pa dang  ting nge 'dzin dang  shes rab kyi stobs dang   dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang  chos rnam par 'byed pa dang  brtson 'grus dang  dga' ba dang  shin tu sbyangs pa dang  ting nge 'dzin dang  btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang  yang dag pa'i lta ba dang  yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang  yang  dag pa'i dag dang  yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang  yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang  yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang  yang dag pa'i dran pa dang  yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin la goms pa dang  yongs su 'dris pa dang  kun du bsten pa dang  sgom pa dang  lan mang du  byed pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub kyi phyogs bsgom pa zhes bya'o // /
column9: 0.018#TD4036E.TXT.r#35334#35335#TD4036E.TXT.r_5373# mi brjed pa dang  bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang  phyir zhing 'byung ba dang  'phel ba dang rgyas par 'gyur ba de yang rab tu shas pa dang  dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ji lta ba bzhin du chos rnam par 'byed pa dang  brtson 'grus dang   dga' ba dang  shin tu sbyangs pa dang  ting nge 'dzin dang  btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag kyang de dang 'dra bar rig par bya ste / /

column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#518925#518934#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8973;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8974;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8975# byang chub kyi yan lag bdun po dran pa dang  chos rnam par 'byed  pa dang  brtson 'grus dang  dga' ba dang  shin tu sbyangs pa dang  ting nge 'dzin dang  btang snyoms byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so // / +bstan bcos bye brag bshad pa chen po las / /

column3: thugs su chud pa ni rnyed pa'i don yin pa'i phyir // / +lam ston pa ni de'i dus na 'gro ba rnams la'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#518935#518948#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8975;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8976;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8977;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8978# de kho na nyid kyi byang chub kyi grogs su gyur pa'i phyir byang  chub kyi yan lag ces bya'o // /
column5: 0.023#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#1608421#1608421#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_2388;TD4090.1E.TXT.r_2389;TD4090.1E.TXT.r_2390# 'o na der ni lus las su rung ba kho na la lus shin tu sbyangs pa yin par rig par bya'o // / +da ji ltar na byang chub kyi yan lag ces bya zhe na / / +byang chub kyi yan lag dag mthun pa'i phyir te / /

column3: lam gsung ba ni dus  gzhan na 'gro ba rnams la'o // / +lam yongs su 'dren pa ni de nas 'gro ba'i bar du gcod pa sel ba'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#518941#518956#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8975;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8976;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8977;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8978;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8979# de kho na nyid kyi byang chub kyi grogs su gyur pa'i phyir byang  chub kyi yan lag ces bya'o // / +byang chub kyi yan lag ces bya ba'i don ci yin zhe na / / +rtogs par byed pa'i phyir byang chub kyi yan lag ces bya ba'am / /
column5: 0.012#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#518978#518979#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8982;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8983;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8984;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8985# byang chub kyi rjes su gzhol bas gtso bo'i dbang du mdzad nas / / +byang chub kyi yan lag ces bya ba'am / / +yang kha cig  na re / / +byang chub kyi yan lag yin pa'i phyir byang chub kyi yan lag ces bya'o zhe'o // /
column6: 0.029#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#1608421#1608421#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_2388;TD4090.1E.TXT.r_2389;TD4090.1E.TXT.r_2390# 'o na der ni lus las su rung ba kho na la lus shin tu sbyangs pa yin par rig par bya'o // / +da ji ltar na byang chub kyi yan lag ces bya zhe na / / +byang chub kyi yan lag dag mthun pa'i phyir te / /

column3: chos kyi bsngags pa las brtsams na ni bcom ldan 'das kyi chos ni legs par gsungs pa yang dag par mthong ba zhes rgyas par 'byung ba dang  bcom ldan  'das kyis legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba ni legs par bstan pa zhes rgyas par 'byung ba dang  dge slong dag nga'i chos ni legs par gsungs pa gsal ba che ba zhes rgyas par 'byung ba mdo sde'i dum bu gsum pa dag ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#518957#518965#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8979;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8980;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8981# kha cig ni 'di skad du rtogs par nus pa'i  phyir byang chub kyi yan lag ces bya'o zhe'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#518965#518976#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8980;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8981;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8982;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8983;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8984# gal te de lta na gcig ni yin la drug ni ma yin zhe na smras pa / / +drug ni byang chub kyi yan lag yin te / /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#518976#518993#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8982;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8983;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8984;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8985;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8986;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8987;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8988# byang chub kyi rjes su gzhol bas gtso bo'i dbang du mdzad nas / / +byang chub kyi yan lag ces bya ba'am / / +yang kha cig  na re / /

column3: de la mdo sde'i dum bu dang po las 'byung ba'i bsdus    pa'i don gyi phyi rol pa dag gi chos las sangs rgyas pa'i chos khyad par yod pa yongs su bstan te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#518994#519006#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8987;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8988;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8989;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8990# smras pa chos rnam par 'byed pa ni byang chub kyang yin la byang chub kyi yan lag kyang yin no // / +gzhan drug po dag ni byang chub kyi  yan lag yin gyi byang chub ni ma yin te / /

column3: de la phyin ci ma log par yang dag par gsungs pa'i phyir legs par gsungs pa'o // / +don mthong pa'i phyir yang dag par mthong ba yin gyi dad ba tsam khong du chud par bya ba ni ma yin  te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#519004#519016#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8989;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8990;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8991;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8992# ji ltar yang dag pa'i lta ba lam yang yin la lam gyi yan lag kyang yin pa bzhin no zhes 'byung ste / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#519016#519025#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8991;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8992;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8993;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8994# bstan bcos yang dag pa'i rigs pa las kyang / / +bye brag tu bshad pa  chen po las bstan pa dang don mthun par bshad do // /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2351338#2351341#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4677;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4678;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4679# ji ltar bdag ma yin pa ni gnas dang dus gang du yang dngos po rjes su 'brel pa dang  gnas dang dus gang du yang bdag dang rjes su 'brel pa med pa lta bu yin  pa'i phyir 'di 'ba' zhig la ci yang med pa'i skye mched ces bya'o zhes zer te zhes 'byung ste / / +zhib tu de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // / +bstan bcos yang dag pa'i rigs pa dang rjes su mthun pa las ni / /
column7: 0.016#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#518359#518360#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8891;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8892# bstan bcos yang dag pa'i rigs pa dang bye brag tu bshad pa chen po las kyang  'di dang mthun par bshad do // / +'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las log pa'i chos 'dzin cing yang dag pa'i lam du 'gro BA'I PHYIR YANG DAG PA'I spong ba zhes bya'o // /
column8: 0.017#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#263782#263782#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6292;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6293# dus thams cad du rtag par chos thams cad thugs su chud pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ste / / +zhib tu de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // /
column9: 0.017#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#514955#514955#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8505;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8506# dge slong zhes bya ba ni slob dpon drang srong rdo rjes slong ba dang  sdig pa 'joms pa dang  bdud skrag par byed pa'o zhes bshad do // / +'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las     // /
column10: 0.018#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2375829#2375830#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7761;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7762# chos thams cad ni phung po lnga dang  skye mched bcu gnyis dang  khams bco brgyad la sogs pa'o zhes 'byung ste / / +zhib tu de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // /
column11: 0.018#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2329680#2329680#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_2237;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_2238# zhib tu de nyid las  bstan pa bzhin no // / +bstan bcos bye brag tu bshad pa chen po las / /
column12: 0.019#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#523096#523096#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9576;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9577# bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las legs so zhes bya ba ni 'phags pa rnams kyi bsngags pa brjod pa'i  phyir ro zhes bshad do // / +'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column13: 0.019#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2361286#2361287#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5888;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5889;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5890# tshig ces bya ba ni rnam par bshad pa yang bstan bcos rnams las mi mthun pas / / +bstan bcos bye brag tu bshad pa chen po las ni / /
column14: 0.021#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#518350#518351#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8890;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8891# yang dag pa'i lus dang  ngag dang yid kyi nan tan gyi nang na 'di mchog tu gyur pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ste / / +bstan bcos yang dag pa'i rigs pa dang bye brag tu bshad pa chen po las kyang  'di dang mthun par bshad do // /
column15: 0.021#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2330733#2330738#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_2366;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_2367# de bas na lan gsum bzlas pa dang  rnam pa bcu gnyis la yod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs de nyid la chos kyi 'khor lo zhes bshad pa ni yang dag pa'i rigs pa dang mthun pa yin no zhes bshad de zhib tu de nyid las  bstan pa bzhin no // / +bstan bcos yang dag pa'i rigs pa dang rjes su mthun pa las ni thams cad yod par smra ba'i bye brag tu smra ba dag gi bsam pa ni mdor bsdu na 'phags pa'i lam thams cad la chos kyi 'khor lo zhes bya'o zhes zer te / /
column16: 0.022#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2351024#2351024#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4648# mdzod kyi bstan bcos las ni don gyis bstan bcos bye brag tu bshad pa chen po las bstan pa'i rnam grangs dang po bstan  pa dang mthun par bshad do // /
column17: 0.022#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2406056#2406057#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11249;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11250;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11251# skad cig yud tsam thang cig tu phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten snga ma de dag rdul shin tu phra ba ji snyed pa de snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyang dge ba'i bdud rtsi'i rgyun gyi char chen po bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can rnams mi shes pa las langs pa'i  nyon mongs pa'i rdul gyi me lce thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa dang  gzhan yang mtshan nyid rnam pa brgyad kyis mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ston cing sems can rnams yongs su sgrol ba'i phyir chos kyi sprin zhes bya'o zhes gsungs te / / +zhib tu de nyid las bstan pa bzhin tu rig par bya'o // /
column18: 0.023#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#527254#527254#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10145# rgya cher rnam par 'byed  pa ni bstan bcos gzhung bstan pa dang  mdzod kyi bstan bcos dang  yang dag pa'i rigs pa dang  bye brag tu bshad pa chen po las 'byung ba bzhin du rig par bya'o // /
column19: 0.024#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#272850#272850#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7416;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7417# rgya cher de nyid las bstan pa bzhin du'o // / +bstan bcos yang dag pa'i rigs pa dang rjes su mthun pa las kyang mdzod kyi bstan bcos las  bshad pa dang mthun par 'byung ngo // /
column20: 0.025#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#499755#499755#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_6609# ji ltar thams cad yod par smra ba'i gzhung gi bstan bcos bye brag tu bshad pa chen po las gal te brjod pa yod pa yin no // /
column21: 0.025#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2331821#2331821#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_2483# de la bzhi pa rnam pa'i mtshan nyid rnam pa bcu gnyis rnam par bshad pa ni rnam pa bcu gnyis lan gsum du bskor ba yang so so'i gzhung gis mthun pas thams cad yod par smra ba'i gzhung ni bstan bcos bye brag tu bshad pa  chen po las slob dpon gsum gyis bshad pa las 'byung ba lta bu yin te / /
column22: 0.025#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2349862#2349862#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4504# de la spyi ni thams cad yod par smra ba'i gzhung bstan bcos bye brag tu bshad pa chen po las bshad pa rnam pa gcig yod de / /
column23: 0.025#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2352347#2352347#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4797# thams cad yod par smra ba'i gzhung gis ni bstan bcos bye brag tu bshad pa chen po  las bstan pa bzhin du rnam grangs rnam pa bzhis ston te / /
column24: 0.025#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2352665#2352665#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4846;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4847# de la ngo bo nyid bstan pa yang thams cad yod par smra ba'i  gzhung gis ni / / +bstan bcos bye brag tu bshad pa chen po las bstan pa bzhin du byams pa dang snying rje tshad med pa la bshad pa rnam pa gnyis su bstan te / /
column25: 0.025#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#271710#271711#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7270;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7271# rgyud kyi rab tu dbye bas ni tshad med par rig par bya'o zhes 'byung ste / / +zhib tu de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // /
column26: 0.025#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#243996#243996#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3842;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3843# 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las ni grangs kyis bsgyur ba bcu gcig las grangs bcu gcig pa ni grangs med pa zhes bya'o zhes bshad do // / +gzhan yang 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column27: 0.026#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#221706#221706#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_980;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_981# shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni lhag pa'i shes rab kyi bslab pa yongs su rdzogs par rig par bya'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +zhib tu de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // /
column28: 0.026#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#518536#518536#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8918;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8919# rgya cher ni de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // / +gzhan yang 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa  las / /
column29: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2367368#2367368#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6678;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6679# 'di ni rnal 'byor pas 'du byed rnams la mi mthun par bsgom pa'o zhes bstan pa yin no // / +gzhan yang 'phags pa  shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column30: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2403661#2403661#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11030;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11031# ting nge 'dzin mchog dang  yon tan chen po'i gzungs yongs su grub nas shes rab dam pa'i 'od dpag tu med pa'i phyir yang 'od byed  pa'i sa zhes bya'o zhes bshad do // / +'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las ni 'od dang bcas pa'i sa zhes 'byung ngo // /
column31: 0.027#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2371108#2371108#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7158;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7159# ji skad bstan pa bzhin du bsgrubs pas zhes bya ba ni sems de las phung po lnga dag skye ba dang  'jig pa nyid du mthong ba'o zhes 'byung ste / / +zhib tu de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // /
column32: 0.028#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#517907#517909#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8834# rgya cher rnam par 'byed pa ni bstan bcos yang dag pa'i rigs pa dang  rjes su mthun pa dang  bye brag tu bshad pa chen po las bstan pa bzhin no // /
column33: 0.028#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2352440#2352442#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4811;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4812# mdzod kyi bstan bcos dang yang dag pa'i rigs pa dang rjes su mthun pa las ni / / +bye brag tu bshad pa chen po las bstan pa'i rnam grangs bzhi pa dang mthun par 'byung ngo // /
column34: 0.028#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#263458#263458#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6237;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6238# lta ba'i rnam pa ma gtogs pa ni rgyu mtshan la dmigs pa ma yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa bstan pa rnams kyang brjod par bya'o // / +'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las ni  slob dpon gnyis kyis bshad pa 'byung ste / /
column35: 0.028#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2382424#2382424#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8553;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8554# ngo bo nyid kyi rnam par gyeng ba dang  phyi rol du rnam par gyeng ba dang  nang du rnam par gyeng ba dang  mtshan ma'i rnam par gyeng ba dang  gnas ngan len gyi rnam par gyeng ba dang  yid la byed ba'i rnam par gyeng ba'o zhes 'byung ste / / +zhib tu de nyid las bstan pa bzhin  no // /
column36: 0.028#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#260592#260592#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5825# de yang ci rigs par ro zhes 'byung ste zhib tu de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // /
column37: 0.029#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2321351#2321351#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_1214;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_1215# mngon par zhen pa'i gang zag de yang bstan pa rnams las so so nas bshad pa mi mthun te / / +'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column38: 0.029#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2351167#2351167#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4659;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4660# zhib tu de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // / +mdzod kyi bstan bcos las ni  bshad pa'i rnam grangs dang po dang mthun par bshad do // /
column39: 0.029#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#274191#274191#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7572;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7573;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7574# sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgyan pa'i phyir dang  sems can yongs su smin bar bya ba'i phyir dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams klu la sogs pa dag tu sprul nas mchod pa byed pa yin pa'i phyir dang  yang bdag nyid  de lta bur sprul nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i zham ring byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ste / / +zhib tu de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // / +bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa ngo bo nyid med kyis byas pa dang  lang gi che bsgyur ba las kyang de skad du ston to // /

column3: ji skad dus ri'i mdo las dge slong dag khyed kyis gang dang gang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis mthong ba ni zhes rgyas par gsungs pa lta bu'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#519025#519036#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8993;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8994# 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las / / +mi slob pa'i de kho na'i byang chub tu dngos po 'di bdun gyis phyin par nus pa'i phyir yan lag ces bya'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222419#222421#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1086;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1087# brtson 'grus dang  bsam gtan dang  thos pa'i shes rab la sogs pa'o zhes 'byung ba dang  gzhan yang 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column6: 0.016#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#518359#518360#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8891;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8892# bstan bcos yang dag pa'i rigs pa dang bye brag tu bshad pa chen po las kyang  'di dang mthun par bshad do // / +'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las log pa'i chos 'dzin cing yang dag pa'i lam du 'gro ba'i phyir yang dag pa'i spong ba zhes bya'o // /
column7: 0.017#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#514955#514955#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8505;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8506# dge slong zhes bya ba ni slob dpon drang srong rdo rjes slong ba dang  sdig pa 'joms pa dang  bdud skrag par byed pa'o zhes bshad do // / +'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las     // /
column8: 0.019#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#523096#523096#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9576;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9577# bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las legs so zhes bya ba ni 'phags pa rnams kyi bsngags pa brjod pa'i  phyir ro zhes bshad do // / +'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column9: 0.019#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2339333#2339333#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3317;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3318# rgya cher de nyid las bshad pa bzhin du rig par bya'o // / +'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column10: 0.022#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#253668#253668#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4964;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4965# 'dod pa'i khams kyi mthar gyur pa'i phyir dang  ngag gi 'du byed kyi mthar gyur pa'i phyir ni lhar gyur pa rnams kyi 'khor bzhir rnam par gzhag par rig par bya'o zhes 'byung ba yin no // / +'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column11: 0.023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#247000#247000#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4193;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4194# 'jig rten pa thams  cad kyis bsnyen bkur byed cing mchod pa dang kun gyis bsngags pa brjod pa'i phyir dpal gyi don dang ldan pa yin no zhes bshad do // / +'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa dang  dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi mdo las / /
column12: 0.024#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2379458#2379458#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8194;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8195# zhes gsungs pa dang  gzhan yang 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las kyang / / +chos rnams ni dmigs su med pa'o zhes bya bas na  chos kyi dbyings dang yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes gsungs pas de'i phyir yongs su grub pa'i ngo bo nyid kyang dmigs su med par shes par bya'o // /
column13: 0.024#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#492676#492677#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_5735;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_5736# don med pa la dmigs pa las kyang sems skye bar bshad pas / / +de'i phyir 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column14: 0.024#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2376476#2376477#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7849;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7850# phyi rol gyi skye mched drug po gang yin pa'o zhes gsungs pa'o // / +'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las phyi stong pa nyid ni 'di lta ste / /
column15: 0.025#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2403661#2403661#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11030;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11031# ting nge 'dzin mchog dang  yon tan chen po'i gzungs yongs su grub nas shes rab dam pa'i 'od dpag tu med pa'i phyir yang 'od byed  pa'i sa zhes bya'o zhes bshad do // / +'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las ni 'od dang bcas pa'i sa zhes 'byung ngo // /
column16: 0.025#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#243996#243996#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3842;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3843# 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las ni grangs kyis bsgyur ba bcu gcig las grangs bcu gcig pa ni grangs med pa zhes bya'o zhes bshad do // / +gzhan yang 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column17: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2319603#2319603#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_1029;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_1030# 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel  pa las kyang / / +sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi rgya mtshor ni dad pas 'jug par nus so zhes bstan pa'i phyir drang po zhes bya ba ni mngon par yid ches pa la bya bar mngon no // /
column18: 0.026#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#518536#518536#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8918;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8919# rgya cher ni de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // / +gzhan yang 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa  las / /
column19: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2367368#2367368#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6678;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6679# 'di ni rnal 'byor pas 'du byed rnams la mi mthun par bsgom pa'o zhes bstan pa yin no // / +gzhan yang 'phags pa  shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column20: 0.028#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#263458#263458#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6237;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6238# lta ba'i rnam pa ma gtogs pa ni rgyu mtshan la dmigs pa ma yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa bstan pa rnams kyang brjod par bya'o // / +'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las ni  slob dpon gnyis kyis bshad pa 'byung ste / /
column21: 0.029#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2321351#2321351#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_1214;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_1215# mngon par zhen pa'i gang zag de yang bstan pa rnams las so so nas bshad pa mi mthun te / / +'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column22: 0.029#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2315275#2315275#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_504;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_505# tshig de lta bu mi 'byung ba'i phyir de yang tshad mar mi rung ngo // / +'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las / /

column3: nyon mongs pa'i bag la nyal gyi gnyen por gyur pa'i phyir nad med pa'o // / +yongs su nyams pa med pas dus  chad pa med pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#519037#519046#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8994;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8995;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8996# mi slob pa'i de kho na'i byang chub tu dngos po 'di bdun gyis phyin par nus pa'i phyir yan lag ces bya'o // /

column3: dus nges pa med pa'i phyir ro // / +sdug bsngal ma lus pa las nges par 'byung ba la nye bar gtod pa'i phyir nye bar gtod pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#519047#519055#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8996;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8997;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8998# pa'i lam gyi nus pa'i yin pa'i phyir byang chub ces bya'o // / +mthong ba'i lam gyi nus pa yin pa'i phyir yan lag ces bya'o zhes bshad do // /

column3: thun mong ma yin pa'i phyir 'di mthong ba la yod pa ste / / +'di mthong ba rnams la yod pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#519056#519064#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8997;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8998;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8999# mthong ba'i lam gyi nus PA YIN PA'I PHYIR YAN lag ces bya'o zhes bshad do // / +gzhan yang bstan bcos dbus dang mtha' rnam par 'byed pa las / /

column3: brtag mi nus pa'i phyir mkhas  pa rnams kyi rang gis rig par bya ba'o // / +phyi rol pa rnams kyi chos ni de las bzlog pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#519065#519074#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8999;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9000;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9001# yan lag 'di byang chub kyi  grogs su gyur pa'i phyir byang chub kyi yan lag ces bya'o zhes bshad de / /

column3: gzhan yang dus thams cad du bya sla ba'i phyir dus chad pa med pa ste / / +ji skad du sangs rgyas kyi gsung ni 'gro ba na yang bya sla ba yin la zhes bya ba rgyas par gsungs pa lta bu'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#519075#519091#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9000;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9001;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9002# des ni byang chub kyi yan lag ni mthong ba'i lam gyi gnas skabs la gnas pa yin no // / +bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las kyang / /

column3: slob dpon  gyi dpe mkhyud dang bral ba'i phyir tshur shog ltos shig pa yang yin te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#519092#519100#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9002;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9003;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9004# yang dag pa nyid du skyon med par zhugs pa'i gang  zag gis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa'i shes rab kyi yan lag 'byed pa'i phyir byang chub kyi yan lag ces bya'o zhes bstan to // / +de la ngo bo nyid rnam par 'byed pa ni theg pa che chung gi bstan pa rnams las / /
column5: 0.028#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#518391#518393#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8894# de la ngo bo nyid rnam par 'byed pa ni theg pa che chung gi bstan pa kun las brtson 'grus kyi bdag nyid do zhes bshad do // /

column3: tshur shog ltos shig ces bya ba'i skabs dbye ba dang ldan pa'i phyir te // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#519101#519110#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9003;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9004;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9005# de la ngo bo nyid rnam par 'byed pa ni theg pa che chung gi bstan pa rnams las / / +shes rab dang  brtson 'grus dang  dran  pa dang  ting nge 'dzin dang  dga' ba dang  shin tu sbyangs pa dang  btang snyoms kyi bdag nyid do zhes bshad do // /
column5: 0.018#TD4049E.TXT.r#2304138#2304140#TD4049E.TXT.r_2893# dran  pa dang  chos rnam par 'byed pa dang  brtson 'grus dang  dga' ba dang  shin tu sbyangs pa dang  ting nge 'dzin dang  btang snyoms so // /
column6: 0.019#TD4032E.TXT.r#1934992#1934992#TD4032E.TXT.r_2458# de'i  dran pa dang  chos rnam par 'byed pa dang  brtson 'grus dang  dga' ba dang  shin du sbyangs pa dang  ting nge 'dzin dang  btang snyoms kyi bdag nyid byang chub kyi yan lag bdun po de dag ni mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa spong ba'i dus na 'byung bas yan lag rnams  zhes bya'o // /
column7: 0.021#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2615378#2615379#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_9812;TD4092.2E.TXT.r_9813# 'o na ci zhe na / / +shes rab dang     brtson 'grus dang  ting nge 'dzin dang  dga' ba dang  shin tu sbyangs pa dang  btang snyoms dang  yang dag pa'i rtog pa la sogs pa yang yin no // /
column8: 0.024#TD4054E.TXT.r#1027941#1027943#TD4054E.TXT.r_6109# dran pa dang  chos rnam par 'byed pa dang  brtson 'grus dang  dga' ba dang  shin tu sbyangs pa dang  ting nge 'dzin dang   btang snyoms so // /

column3: ji skad du nga'i nyan thos kyi dge slong tshur shog shig dang zhes bya ba rgyas par gsungs pa lta bu'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#519109#519122#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9004;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9005# shes rab dang  brtson 'grus dang  dran  pa dang  ting nge 'dzin dang  dga' ba dang  shin tu sbyangs pa dang  btang snyoms kyi bdag nyid do zhes bshad do // / +yang kha cig ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa thob pa dang  'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i mtshan ma thob pa dang  'phags  pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i gnyen po dang  mi mthun pa'i phyogs thob pa dang  'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bsgom pa thob pa dang  'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ma skyes pa skye ba thob pa dang  'phags pa'i lam yan lag  brgyad pa'i skyes pa gnas pa dang  mi bskyud pa dang  slar zhing 'byung ba dang  'phel zhing rgyas pa thob pa'i slad du / /

column3: lhag ma ni snga ma bzhin no // / +'dir  bshad pa / / +'phags pa'i lam gyi yan lag brgyad po ni / / +yang dag don dang don ni mthong ba dang / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#519118#519131#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9005# yang kha cig ni 'phags pa'i LAM YAN LAG BRGYAD PA thob pa dang  'phags pa'i LAM YAN LAG BRGYAD PA'i mtshan ma thob pa dang  'phags  pa'i LAM YAN LAG BRGYAD PA'i gnyen po dang  mi mthun pa'i phyogs thob pa dang  'phags pa'i LAM YAN LAG BRGYAD PA'i bsgom pa thob pa dang  'phags pa'i LAM YAN LAG BRGYAD PA'i ma skyes pa skye ba thob pa dang  'phags pa'i lam yan lag  brgyad pa'i skyes pa gnas pa dang  mi bskyud pa dang  slar zhing 'byung ba dang  'phel zhing rgyas pa thob pa'i slad du / /

column3: gnyen po dang ni gtan dang ma lus dang / / +thun mong min dang rtog ge'i yul min dang / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#517064#517066#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8726# yang kha cig ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa thob pa dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i mtshan ma thob pa dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i gnyen po dang  mi mthun pa'i phyogs bstan pa dang  dran pa nye bar  gzhag pa bsgom pa thob pa dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ma skyes pa skye ba thob pa dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa skyes pa gnas pa dang  mi bskyud pa dang  slar zhing 'byung ba dang  'phel zhing rgyas pa thob pa'i slad du shes pa brda sprod par bgyid ces bya ba 'di man chad  ni gnyis pa byang chub kyi phyogs sum cu rtsa bdun la brten nas shes pa brda sprod par byed pa ston to // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#518138#518140#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8868# dran pa nye bar gzhag pa skyes pa gnas pa dang  mi bskyud pa dang  slar zhing 'byung ba dang  'phel zhing rgyas pa thob pa'i slad du zhes bya ba 'di ni bsten pa'i bsgom pa ston  te / /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#519132#519141#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9005# yang kha cig ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa thob pa dang  'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i mtshan ma thob pa dang  'phags  pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i gnyen po dang  mi mthun pa'i phyogs thob pa dang  'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bsgom pa thob pa dang  'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ma skyes pa skye ba thob pa dang  'phags pa'i lam yan lag  brgyad pa'i skyes pa gnas pa dang  mi bskyud pa dang  slar zhing 'byung ba dang  'phel zhing rgyas pa thob pa'i slad du / /
column7: 1.788#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3108752#3108752#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_2394# kha cig ni dran  ba nye bar gzhag pa dmigs pa dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i mtshan ma dmigs pa dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang gnyen po dmigs pa dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i bsgom pa dmigs pa dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ma skyes pa skye ba dmigs pa dang   dran pa nye bar gzhag pa skyes pa gnas pa dang  ma bskyud pa dang  slar zhing 'byung ba dang  'phel zhing rgyas pa dmigs pas shes pa brda sprod par bgyid / /
column8: 1.788#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3108799#3108799#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_2396# kha cig ni yang dag par spong ba rnams dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa  rnams dang  dbang po rnams dang  stobs rnams dang  byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang  kha cig ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dmigs pa dang  'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i mtshan ma dmigs pa dang  'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i mi mthun  ba'i phyogs kyi gnyen po dmigs pa dang  'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom pa dmigs pa dang  'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma skyes pa skye ba dmigs pa dang  'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa skyes pa gnas pa dang  ma bskyud pa dang  slar zhing    'byung ba dang  'phel zhing rgyas pa dmigs pas shes pa brda sprod par rig pa dag mthong lags so // /

column3: gzhan yang de ni dus chad med pa'i phyir // / +bya sla ba dang tshur shog ltos shig ces // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#519142#519151#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9005;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9006# yang kha cig ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa thob pa dang  'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i mtshan ma thob pa dang  'phags  pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i gnyen po dang  mi mthun pa'i phyogs thob pa dang  'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bsgom pa thob pa dang  'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ma skyes pa skye ba thob pa dang  'phags pa'i lam yan lag  brgyad pa'i skyes pa gnas pa dang  mi bskyud pa dang  slar zhing 'byung ba dang  'phel zhing rgyas pa thob pa'i slad du / /

column3: slob dpon dpe mkhyud bral ba shes bya zhing // / +lhag ma snga ma bzhin du shes par bya // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#519152#519160#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9006;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9007# shes pa brda spros par bgyid do zhes bya ba 'di ni gsum pa 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la brten nas shes pa brda sprod par byed do // /

column3: lung las ni legs par gsungs pa zhes bya ba ni bstan pa yin la / / +lhag ma ni bshad pa yin no / / +de la gzhan gyi rkyen gyis kha na ma lus pa'i phyir yang yang dag par mthong ngo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#519161#519179#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9007;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9008;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9009;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9010;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9011# de la gnyen po ni yang dag pa'i lam brgyad do // / +mi mthun pa'i phyogs ni log pa brgyad de / /
column5: 1.192#TD4010E.TXT.r#2284019#2284020#TD4010E.TXT.r_6832# yang dag pa'i lta ba dang  yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang  yang dag pa'i ngag dang  yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang  yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang  yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang  yang dag pa'i dran pa dang  yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni lus kyi sdom  PA'O ZHES BYA BAS NI don dam pa'i lus kyi sdom pa bstan to // /
column6: 1.192#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#519425#519430#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9050;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9051;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9052# lam gyi yan lag gi ngo bo nyid ni 'di lta ste / / +yang dag pa'i lta ba dang  yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang  yang dag pa'i ngag dang  yang  dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang  yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang / /
column7: 1.192#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2910182#2910186#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_5909# de la  lam gyi yan lag brgyad ni yang dag pa'i lta ba dang  yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang  yang dag pa'i dag dang  yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang  yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang  yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang  yang dag pa'i dran pa dang  yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin to // /
column8: 1.192#TD4036E.TXT.r#34499#34503#TD4036E.TXT.r_5269# spang pa'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang  dad pa dang  brtson 'grus dang  dran pa dang  ting nge 'dzin dang  shes rab kyi dbang po dang  dad pa dang  brtson 'grus dang  dran pa dang  ting nge 'dzin dang  shes rab kyi stobs dang   dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang  chos rnam par 'byed pa dang  brtson 'grus dang  dga' ba dang  shin tu sbyangs pa dang  ting nge 'dzin dang  btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang  yang dag pa'i lta ba dang  yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang  yang  dag pa'i dag dang  yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang  yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang  yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang  yang dag pa'i dran pa dang  yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin la goms pa dang  yongs su 'dris pa dang  kun du bsten pa dang  sgom pa dang  lan mang du  byed pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub kyi phyogs bsgom pa zhes bya'o // /
column9: 1.192#TD4036E.TXT.r#62550#62555#TD4036E.TXT.r_9177# mi slob pa'i yang dag pa'i lta ba dang  yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang  yang dag pa'i ngag dang  yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang  yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang  yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang  yang dag pa'i dran pa dang  yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang  mi slob pa'i yang dag pa'i rnam par grol ba dang  yang dag pa'i ye shes dang  ldan pa dang  'di lta ste / /
column10: 1.192#TD4049E.TXT.r#2304242#2304244#TD4049E.TXT.r_2916# yang dag pa'i lta ba dang  yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang  yang dag pa'i ngag dang  yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang  yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang  yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang  yang dag pa'i dran pa dang  yang  dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin to // /
column11: 1.192#TD4067E.TXT.r#1090818#1090820#TD4067E.TXT.r_705# yang dag pa'i lta ba dang  yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang  yang dag pa'i ngag dang  yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang  yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang  yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang  yang dag pa'i dran pa dang  yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin to // /
column12: 1.192#TD4080E.TXT.r#463#468#TD4080E.TXT.r_47;TD4080E.TXT.r_49# 'gog pa ni mngon du bya ba'o // / +thob par byed pa'i rgyu ni yang dag pa'i lta ba dang  yang dag pa'i ngag dang  yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang  yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang  yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang  yang dag pa'i dran pa dang  yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin te / /

column24: 0.013#TD4094.2E.TXT.r#1900839#1900844#TD4094.2E.TXT.r_2118;TD4094.2E.TXT.r_2119# yang dag pa'i lta ba smad cing log pa'i lta ba rjes su bsngags la gang yang dge sbyong dang bram ze log par lta zhing log pa'i lam du zhugs pa de dag khyed kyis mchod cing khyed kyis    bsngags so zhes gzhan gyis chos smra zhing rjes su smra ba'i smad pa'i gnas kyi chos 'di lta bu dang po 'ong bar 'gyur ro // / +yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang  yang dag pa'i ngag dang  yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang  yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang  yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang  yang dag pa'i  dran pa dang  yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang  yang dag pa'i rnam par grol ba dang  yang dag pa'i shes pa smad cing log pa'i shes pa rjes su bsngags pa gang yang dge sbyong dang bram ze log par shes shing log par zhugs pa de dag khyed kyis mchod cing khyed kyis rab tu bsngags so zhes  gzhan gyis chos kyis smra zhing rjes su smra ba'i smad pa'i gnas kyi chos 'di lta bu bcu pa 'ong bar 'gyur te / /

column3: yongs su nyams pa mi srid pa'i phyir ro // / +mya ngan las 'das pa la nye bar gtod pa'i phyir nye bar gtod pa'o // / +thun mong ma yin pa'i phyir 'di mthong ba la don  yod pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#519188#519208#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9012;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9013;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9014# bstan bcos bye brag tu bshad pa chen po las lam gyi yan lag ces bya ba'i don ci zhe na / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#519220#519228#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9015;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9016# kha cig 'di skad du 'dis yongs su tshol zhing gzhol ba'i phyir lam gyi yan lag ces bya'o zhes zer te // /

column3: brjod par bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir mkhas pa rnams kyi rang gis rig par bya'o zhes 'byung ba'o // / +mdo sde'i dum bu gnyis pa las ni phyi rol pa dang chos mi mthun pas chos 'dul ba 'di'i yon tan yang dag par bstan pa yin te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#519206#519218#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9013;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9014;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9015# yongs su tshol zhing gzhol ba'i phyir lam gyi yan lag ces bya'o // / +lam gyi yan lag byed pa'i phyir lam gyi yan lag ces bya'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#519254#519259#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9020;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9019;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9021# yang kha cig na re lam gyi YAN LAG YIN PA'I PHYIR lam gyi yan lag ces  bshad do // /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#519269#519276#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9023;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9024;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9025# yang dag pa'i lta ba ni lam yang yin la lam gyi yan lag kyang yin no // / +gzhan ni lam gyi yan lag yin gyi lam ni ma yin te / /

column3: phyi rol pa dag gi chos 'dul ba  ni nye bar bstan pa nyid kyis nyes par bshad pa yin no // / +rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'gro bar mi 'gyur ba nyid kyis nges par mi 'byung ba yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#519199#519200#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9013# yongs su tshol zhing gzhol ba'i phyir lam gyi yan lag ces bya'o // /

column3: 'dus pa dang mi ldan pa nyid kyis mi mthun pa yin te / / +'dus pa dang ldan pa ni tshogs pa yin pa'i phyir ro // / +ston pa de bzhin  gshegs pa la sogs pa ma yin pa nyid kyis rten pa med pa yin / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#519229#519249#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9015;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9016;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9017;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9018;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9019;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9020# kha cig 'di skad du 'dis yongs su tshol zhing gzhol ba'i phyir lam gyi yan lag ces bya'o zhes zer te // / +gal te de lta na  gcig ni yin la bdun ni ma yin no zhe na / /

column3: mdor na skyon rnam pa 'di bzhi bstan pa yin te // / +bstan pa'i chos la don phyin ci log pa nyid kyi skyon dang  sgrub pa'i chos la mya ngan las 'das par mi 'gro ba nyid kyi skyon dang  nyan pa po rnams la blo du ma dang ldan  pa nyid kyi skyon dang  ston pa la the tshom thams cad gcod mi nus pa'i skyon no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#519260#519268#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9020;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9021;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9022;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9023;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9024# yang kha cig na re lam gyi yan lag yin pa'i phyir lam gyi yan lag ces  bshad do // / +gal te de lta na bdun ni yin la gcig ni ma yin no zhe na / /

column3: rnam grangs gzhan yang / / +tshig 'bru bzang min don bzang min // /
grol dang rigs pa'i thabs ma yin // / +snga ma phyi ma 'gal ba yin // / +de bzhin bsdu ba bzhin dang ni // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#519277#519285#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9024;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9025;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9026;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9027;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9028# gzhan ni lam gyi yan lag yin gyi lam ni ma yin te / / +ji ltar chos rnam par 'byed pa ni byang  chub kyang yin / /

column3: bstan pa bzhi dag spangs pa  dang / / +ston pa'ang ston pa'i mtshan nyid med // / +de ltar gzhan gyi bstan bcos dang / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#519286#519296#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9027;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9028;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9029;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9030# gzhan drug ni byang chub kyi yan lag yin gyi / / +byang chub ni ma yin pa bzhin no zhe'o // /
column5: 0.024#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#518360#518360#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8891;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8892# bstan bcos yang dag pa'i rigs pa dang bye brag tu bshad pa chen po las kyang  'di dang mthun par bshad do // / +'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las log pa'i chos 'dzin cing yang dag pa'i lam du 'gro ba'i phyir yang dag pa'i spong ba zhes bya'o // /

column3: slob ma bstan pa skyon can yin // / +chos 'dul ba 'di ni de las bzlog pas skyon med pa yin no // / +don phyin ci ma log pa nyid kyis rigs pa yin pa'i phyir chos so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#519297#519308#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9030;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9031# chos 'di ni bde ba dang  phun sum tshogs  pa yin pas / /

column3: nyon mongs pa 'dul ba'i  phyir 'dul ba'o // / +de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ni yang dag pa'i ye shes dang spangs pa 'dren pa nyid yin par bstan pa yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#519309#519321#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9031;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9032;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9033;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9034# mya ngan las 'das pa 'dus ma byas kyi grong khyer du 'jug par nus pa'i phyir chos 'di gang spyod pa de ni lam zhes bya'o zhes bshad do // /

column3: mdo sde'i dum bu gsum pa las 'byung ba ni rnam pa drug dag gis chos kyi yon tan yongs su bstan pa yin te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#519320#519329#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9032;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9033;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9034# bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las ci'i phyir 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zhes bya zhe na / / +smras pa / /

column3: don phyin ci ma log pa nyid dang     bde bar 'jug pa nyid dang  gong na med pa nyid dang  lha dang mis yang dag par bzung ba nyid dang  ji ltar 'os pa'i gdul ba la bstan pa nyid dang  slob dpon gyi dpe mkhyud med par rgyun du bstan pa nyid kyis so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#519330#519344#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9034;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9035;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9036;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9037# 'phags pa slob pa bzhi mthong ba rnams yan lag brgyad kyis yang dag par 'dus pa'i lam gyis nyon mongs pa / /

column3: de la bde bar 'jug pa nyid ni gsal ba nyid kyis te / / +tshig dang yig 'bru gsal ba'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#519345#519353#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9036;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9037;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9038# zhes bya'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +de la ngo bo nyid rnam par 'byed pa ni so so nas bshad pa mi mthun te / /
column5: 0.020#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#528620#528621#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10343# len pa zhes bya ba yang 'di yang bstan pa rnams las so so nas bshad pa mi mthun te mdzod kyi bstan bcos las ni / /
column6: 0.020#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2371634#2371635#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7236;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7237# shes pa dang mthong ba de yang bstan pa rnams las so so nas bshad pa mi mthun to / /
column7: 0.028#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#243714#243715#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3807# grangs med pa de yang bstan pa rnams las so so nas bshad pa mi mthun  pas mdzod kyi bstan bcos las grangs kyi 'gres drug cu las grangs med pa zhes bya ba ni gcig gi ming yin te / /

column3: phye ba nyid kyis kyang yin te / / +don shin tu rnam par phye ba'i phyir ro // / +gong na med pa nyid ni rgyu ba bcad pa nyid kyis te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#519354#519361#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9038;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9039# mdzod kyi bstan bcos las ni chos drug gis ngo bo nyid byed de / /

column3: ches shin tu mchog tu 'gro ba ni rgyu ba'o // / +de 'dir yang dag par chad pas na rgyu ba bcad pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#519362#519369#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9039;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9040;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9041# yang dag pa'i ngag dang  las kyi mtha' dang  'tsho ba ni tshul khrims  su mtshungs pa'i phyir ro zhes bshad do // /

column3: lhag ma  gsum ni go rims bzhin du lha dang mi'i bar dag la yang dag par shin tu bstan pa las reg par bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#519370#519381#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9040;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9041;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9042;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9043# bye brag tu smra ba dag ni chos bdun gyi bdag nyid de / / +lus dang ngag gi las gnyis ni mi 'bral ba'i phyir zhes zer te / /

column3: bsdus pa'i tshigs su bcad pa / / +de nyid don ni legs gsungs phyir // / +bde bar 'jug phyir bla med phyir // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#519380#519392#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9042;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9043;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9044;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9045# bstan bcos yang dag pa'i rigs pa las kyang de skad du ston to // / +bstan bcos bye brag tu  bshad pa chen po las ni bshad pa rnam pa gsum yod de / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#530735#530738#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10622;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10623# bstan bcos sems sna tshogs bstan pa  las kyang de skad du ston to // / +bstan bcos bye brag tu bshad pa chen po las na rnam pa gsum yod de / /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2350796#2350798#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4623;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4624# bstan  bcos gzhung rab tu bstan pa las kyang de skad du ston to // / +bstan bcos bye brag tu bshad pa chen po las ni ci'i phyir 'di bzhi la gzugs med pa zhes bya zhe na / /
column7: 0.023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#257117#257117#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5356# mdzod kyi bstan bcos dang  bye brag tu bshad pa chen po las kyang de skad du ston to // /
column8: 0.026#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#469567#469568#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_2651# mu bzhi po de dag kyang so so nas bshad pa mi mthun pas bstan bcos bye brag tu bshad pa chen po las bshad  pa rnam pa gnyis yod de // /
column9: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2352207#2352208#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4771;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4772# gzugs med pa la rjes su 'jug pa'i gzugs med pa'i phung po bzhi'i ngo bo nyid do zhes bshad do // / +bstan bcos bye brag tu bshad pa chen po las ni rnam pa gnyis yod do zhes bshad de / /

column3: rab tu gzung phyir ji ltar 'os // / +ma lus par ni bstan  phyir ro // /

column22: 1.192#TD4036E.TXT.r#34499#34502#TD4036E.TXT.r_5269# spang pa'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang  dad pa dang  brtson 'grus dang  dran pa dang  ting nge 'dzin dang  shes rab kyi dbang po dang  dad pa dang  brtson 'grus dang  dran pa dang  ting nge 'dzin dang  shes rab kyi stobs dang   dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang  chos rnam par 'byed pa dang  brtson 'grus dang  dga' ba dang  shin tu sbyangs pa dang  ting nge 'dzin dang  btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang  yang dag pa'i lta ba dang  yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang  yang  dag pa'i dag dang  yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang  yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang  yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang  yang dag pa'i dran pa dang  yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin la goms pa dang  yongs su 'dris pa dang  kun du bsten pa dang  sgom pa dang  lan mang du  byed pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub kyi phyogs bsgom pa zhes bya'o // /
column23: 1.192#TD4080E.TXT.r#466#468#TD4080E.TXT.r_49# thob par byed pa'i rgyu ni yang dag pa'i lta ba dang  yang dag pa'i ngag dang  yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang  yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang  yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang  yang dag pa'i dran pa dang  yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin te / /

column25: 1.192#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1763379#1763384#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_8039;TD4094.1E.TXT.r_8040# 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad po 'di lta ste / / +yang dag pa'i lta ba dang  yang  dag pa'i rtog pa dang  yang dag pa'i ngag dang  yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang  yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang  yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang  yang dag pa'i dran pa dang  yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin to zhes ngas bstan pa de rgyas par rab tu bshad do // /

column28: 0.004#TD4035E.TXT.r#171203#171204#TD4035E.TXT.r_8160;TD4035E.TXT.r_8161# yang dag pa'i lta ba dang  yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang  yang dag pa'i ngag dang  yang dag  pa'i las kyi mtha' dang  yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba'o // / +yang dag pa'i lta ba dang  yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang  yang dag pa'i dran pa gsum ni yo byad do // /
column29: 0.005#TD4094.2E.TXT.r#1900841#1900844#TD4094.2E.TXT.r_2119# yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang  yang dag pa'i ngag dang  yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang  yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang  yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang  yang dag pa'i  dran pa dang  yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang  yang dag pa'i rnam par grol ba dang  yang dag pa'i shes pa smad cing log pa'i shes pa rjes su bsngags pa gang yang dge sbyong dang bram ze log par shes shing log par zhugs pa de dag khyed kyis mchod cing khyed kyis rab tu bsngags so zhes  gzhan gyis chos kyis smra zhing rjes su smra ba'i smad pa'i gnas kyi chos 'di lta bu bcu pa 'ong bar 'gyur te / /
column30: 0.011#TD4054E.TXT.r#1028173#1028182#TD4054E.TXT.r_6148;TD4054E.TXT.r_6149;TD4054E.TXT.r_6150# lam gyi yan lag gi dmigs pa ni mthong ba'i lam gyi 'og tu de nyid kyi ji ltar mthong ba'i bden pa rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin lam gyi yan lag rnams kyi dmigs pa'o // / +ngo bo nyid gang / / +yang dag pa'i lta ba dang  yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang  yang dag pa'i ngag dang  yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang  yang  dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang  yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang  yang dag pa'i dran pa dang  yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin to // /
column31: 0.011#TD4094.2E.TXT.r#1900611#1900613#TD4094.2E.TXT.r_2099# slob pa yang dag pa'i lta pa dang ldan ba dang  slob pa'i yang dag pa'i rtog ba dang  yang dag pa'i ngag dang  yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang  yang  dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang  yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang  yang dag pa'i dran pa dang  yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang yang dag par ldan pa ste / /
column32: 0.021#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2383369#2383369#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8651;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8652# kha cig na re nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams kyi nang nas rnam par gyeng ba'i ngo bo nyid de yid la byed pa'i rkyen smos nas rnam  par gyeng ba de bstan pa yin no zhe'o // / +bstan bcos chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las / /
column33: 0.021#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2347967#2347967#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4261# 'di ni bstan bcos sa mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las / /
column34: 0.023#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#528036#528036#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10248# de'i phyir bstan bcos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las / /
column35: 0.023#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#543035#543035#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12175# de'i phyir bstan bcos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las rnam par rtog pa la  spyod pa ni dbugs rngub ba dang  'byung ba dran pa'i yul la dmigs so zhes bshad pa yin no // /
column36: 0.023#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2320969#2320970#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_1178# de'i phyir bstan bcos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las ci'i phyir shin tu rgyas pa la sems can kha cig mos kyang nges par 'byung bar    mi 'gyur zhe na / /
column37: 0.025#TD4097E.TXT.r#2222104#2222104#TD4097E.TXT.r_2531;TD4097E.TXT.r_2532# mi  slob pa'i chos bcu po 'di dag ces bya ba la mi slob pa'i chos bcu po gang zhe na / / +mi slob pa'i yang dag pa'i lta ba dang  yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang  yang dag pa'i ngag dang  yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' de la zhe sdang dang  gti mug las byung ba'i ngag dang  las kyi mtha'  spangs pa ni yang dag pa'i ngag dang  las kyi mtha'i sgrar bstan to // /
column38: 0.025#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#502831#502831#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_7039# bstan bcos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa la sogs pa las ni 'dod chags dang  zhe sdang dang gti mug gi rtsod pa'i ngo bo nyid do zhes bshad do // /
column39: 0.025#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#223930#223930#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1294# rgya cher ni bstan bcos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus  pa la sogs pa las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o // /
column40: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2317526#2317526#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_784;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_785# gnyis pa gzhan med do zhes gsungs pa yin no zhes bshad de / / +bstan bcos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las kyang de SKAD DU STON TO // /
column41: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2354317#2354317#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5056;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5057# gang zag gnyis po de  nyid la mtshan ma med par spyod pa can zhes kyang bya'o zhes bshad do // / +bstan bcos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las ni dad pa dang chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba gnyis ni tshogs kyi lam dang mthong ba'i lam la gnas pa / /
column42: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2361328#2361328#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5894# chos  mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las / /
column43: 0.026#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#520729#520729#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9241;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9242# bdag med pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya'o zhes 'byung ste / / +bstan bcos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las kyang de SKAD DU STON TO // /
column44: 0.027#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#536217#536217#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11297# bstan bcos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las mtshan nyid ji lta bu zhe na / /
column45: 0.028#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2358455#2358455#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5554;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5555# theg  pa chen po bsdus pa ni brag pa med pa'i dbang du mdzad pa'i phyir sa bcu dang sbyar te bstan to // / +bstan bcos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las ni rnam pa gsum du bsngags pa brjod nas 'bras bu lnga sdud par ston to // /

column3: dge spyong gi tshul gyi don ni mya ngan las 'das pa ste / / +der  zhugs pa ni rigs par zhugs pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#519442#519451#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9053;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9054;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9055;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9056# chos brgyad po 'di dag ni las kyi rang gi ngo bo nyid ces bya'o zhes bshad do // / +byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang  lam  gyi yan lag brgyad gnas skabs gang la brten nas bstan zhe na / /

column3: de'i rigs pa'i chos ni bla na med pa kun tu 'thob par 'gyur ba nyid yin la zhes bya ba gsungs pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#519452#519460#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9054;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9055;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9056;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9057;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9058# byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang  lam  gyi yan lag brgyad gnas skabs gang la brten nas bstan zhe na / / +smras pa / / +bstan bcos bye brag tu bshad pa chen po dang sbyar na / /

column3: nges pa'i tshig tu na gnas par bya ba ni gnas te / / +rtag tu gnas su gyur pas na rigs pa'o // / +dge spyong gi tshul ni 'phags pa'i  lam yan lag brgyad de / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#519461#519472#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9057;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9058;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9059# bshad pa rnam pa gnyis yod de / / +kha cig na re mthong ba'i lam gyi gnas skabs la ni yang dag pa'i lam brgyad rnam par gzhag go // /

column3: der zhugs pa ni drang por zhugs pa ste / / +bdud rtsi'i sgo ni phye mdzad cing // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#519473#519481#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9059;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9060;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9061;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9062# bsgom pa'i  gnas skabs la ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnam par gzhag go zhe'o // /

column3: drang po'i lam ni rab tu bstan // / +zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro // / +de bzhin du drang po ci zhe na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#519482#519498#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9061;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9062;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9063;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9064;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9065# mthong ba'i lam ni byang chub kyi yan lag ces bya'o // / +bsgom pa'i lam ni lam gyi yan lag brgyad pa zhes bya'o zhe'o // /

column3: 'phags pa'i lam mo // / +gya gyu ba ci zhe na / / +lta ba sdig ba can no zhes 'byung ba lta     // /

bu'o // / +dge sbyong rnams la yang dag pa'i rang bzhin du zhugs pa ni mthun par zhugs pa ste / / +yang dag pa'i rang bzhin yang byams pa'i lus la sogs pa'i las kyis mthun par gyur pa nyid dang  longs spyod dang  tshul khrims dang lta ba mthun pa nyid kyis  so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#519499#519508#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9064;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9065;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9066# mdzod kyi bstan bcos kyang bshad pa rnam pa gnyis yod de / / +bshad pa gcig ni bye brag tu bshad pa chen po las bstan pa dang mthun no // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#519509#519516#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9066;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9067# gcig ni 'di skad du byang chub kyi yan lag bdun ni mthong ba'i lam gyi gnas skabs su yod do // /
column6: 0.029#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2349866#2349866#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4504# de la spyi ni thams cad yod par smra ba'i gzhung bstan bcos bye brag tu bshad pa chen po las bshad pa rnam pa gcig yod de / /

column3: dge spyong gi tshul bstan pa ni chos yin te / / +de la ji skad bstan pa bzhin du spyod par byed pas na chos dang  rjes su mthun par spyod pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#519517#519527#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9067;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9068;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9069# 'phags  pa'i lam yan lag brgyad ni mthong ba dang  bsgom pa'i gnyi ga la yod do zhe'o // /

column3: rnam grangs gzhan yang don gyi mchog bsgrub pa dang  phyin ci ma log pa sgrub pa dang  tha mi dad pa sgrub pa dang  ji ltar  rjes su bstan pa bzhin du bsgrub pa la brtsams nas legs par zhugs pa nyid du ston to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#519526#519535#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9068;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9069;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9070# 'dir theg pa chen po'i bstan bcos dang sbyar na / / +'phags pa shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel ba las bshad pa rnam pa gnyis yod de / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#519535#519543#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9069;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9070;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9071# 'phags pa shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel ba las bshad pa rnam pa gnyis yod de / / +phal cher bstan bcos bye brag tu bshad pa chen  po las bstan pa dang mthun no // /
column6: 0.022#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2342219#2342220#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3633;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3634# de la bye brag gi ming yang bstan pa rnams las so so nas mi mthun te / / +bstan bcos chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las / /
column7: 0.028#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2342612#2342612#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3684;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3685# gong du bstan pa rnams las bstan bcos rnam par bshad pa las bstan pa rnams ni mdo'i tshig dang rjes su mthun gyi / / +bstan bcos chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa la  sogs pa ni ma yin te / /

column3: lung las ni mu stegs can gyi 'khor rnams la ni log par bsgrub pa rnam bzhi yod de / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#519544#519554#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9070;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9071;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9072;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9073# phal cher bstan bcos bye brag tu bshad pa chen  po las bstan pa dang mthun no // / +bstan bcos chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa dang  dbus mtha' rnam par 'byed pa las / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#519585#519594#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9079;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9080;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9081;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9078;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9082# bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las / / +byang chub kyi yan lag bdun ni mthong ba'i lam la'o // /
column6: 5.960#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2383412#2383412#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8656# kha cig na re bstan bcos dbus dang mtha' rnam par 'byed pa dang  chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las    btus pa dang  theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa las bstan pa bzhin du chos rnam pa gsum gyi ngo bo nyid de 'di ltar bying ba dang rgod pa dang ro myang ba'o // /
column7: 1.192#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#229898#229900#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2048# bstan bcos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa dang  dbus dang mtha' rnam par 'byed pa las ji skad bstan pa lta bu'o // /

column3: chos 'dul ba nyas par bshad pa la zhugs pa nyid do // / +tshul 'chos pa nyid dang   bdag gi lta ba mchog tu 'dzin pa nyid dang  rnyed pa dang bkur sti la lhag par chags pa nyid do // /

column3: de med pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun ni rigs par zhugs pa nas / / +chos dang rjes su mthun par spyod pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar du 'byung ngo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#519571#519578#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9076;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9077;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9078# 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad las / / +yang dag pa'i lta ba ni mthong ba dang bsgom pa gnyis kar gtogs so // /

column3: kun nas  nyon mongs pa'i phyogs las brtsams nas ni dge slong gang tshul khrims 'chal pa sdig pa'i chos can zhes bya ba ni mdo sde'i dum bu ste / /
column4: 0.017#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#519553#519554#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9071;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9072;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9073# bstan bcos chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa dang  dbus mtha' rnam par 'byed pa las / / +byang chub kyi yan lag bdun ni mthong ba'i lam la'o // /

column3: de la tshul khrims 'chal ba ni rtsa ba'i ltung ba lhag par spyod pa'i phyir ro // / +sdig pa'i chos can ni ngo tsha shes pa dang  khrel yod pa chud  gson pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#519593#519606#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9081;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9082;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9083;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9084# 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad las / / +yang dag pa'i ngag dang las kyi mtha' dang  'tsho ba ni bsgom pa'i lam kho nar rnam par  gzhag go zhes bshad de / /

column3: khong myags pa ni kha na ma tho ba de 'chab pa'i phyir ro // / +'dzag pa ni kun tu spyod pa mi spong pa nyid kyi phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#519605#519622#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9083;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9084;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9085;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9086# gzhan gyi bshad pa ni med do // / +'phags pa'i lam gyi don rgyar cher rnam par 'byed pa ni mtshan nyid bstan pa dag las 'byung ba bzhin du rig par bya'o // /
column5: 0.022#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#516411#516411#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8657# phung po lnga'i don rgya cher rnam par 'byed pa ni mtshan nyid bstan pa dag las 'byung ba bzhin du rig par bya'o // /

column3: shing rul pa lta bu ni dam pa'i chos mi skye ba'i phyir ro // / +bong bu ltar kun tu spyod pa ni lung bong ltar kun tu spyod pa'i phyir te / /

column3: ji skad du lung bong gi mdo  las gsungs pa lta bu ste / / +ji ltar / /
dung gi kha can skad po che // / +zhes tshigs su bcad pa lta bu'o // / +de yang rgyun rnam pa gnyis kyis te / /

column5: 0.0#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3108831#3108832#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_2399;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_2400# 'di ltar  don dam pa thams cad du ro gcig pa'i mtshan nyid ma 'tshal bas tshe dang ldan pa 'di dag thams cad ni mngon pa'i nga rgyal can / /

column3: sbyor ba log pa'i skyon dang  bsam pa log pa'i skyon dang  kha na ma tho ba de las mi ldong ba'i skyon dang  thal ba'i skyon dang  rtogs pa'i skal pa med pa nyid kyi skyon dang   log par 'tsho ba'i skyon no // /
