column3: de la rnyed pa dag ni ci dag yod ces bya ba ni dge ba'i chos dang mi ldan pa nyid du ston to // /
legs par rnyed pa dag ni ci yod ces bya ba ni de dang mi ldan pa nyid kyi phyir sngon gyi dge ba'i 'bras bu mi la  sogs pa rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa ma yin pa nyid du ston to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#519749#519764#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9103;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9104;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9105;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9106# thams cad ro gcig pa'i mtshan nyid do zhes gsungs pa ZHES BYA BA NI / / +gnyis pa bsngags par bya ba'i bstan  pa smos pa ste / /
column5: 0.021#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#532262#532262#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10792;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10793;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10794# mdo las rnam  par shes pa brgyad po dag ni chu dang chu bo'i rlabs lta bur tha dad pa med par gsungs pa'i phyir dang  nges par tha dad par gyur na rgyu dang 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid ma yin par 'gyur ba'i phyir dang  SGYU MA LA SOGS PA ltar nges pa'i dngos po med pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa     // / +lta bu'o // / +sngar gong du bshad pa ltar rnam par shes pa'i bye brag tu gyur pa'i mtshan nyid kyang kun rdzob la brten nas yid kyi de kho na'i don dam pa la ni ma yin te / /
column6: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2311383#2311383#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_75# dngos po lnga rnam par bshad pa ni sngar gong du bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o //// /
column7: 0.028#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#506537#506537#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_7494# tshig zlos bur de de bzhin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i bshad pa ni sngar gong du bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o // /

column3: nyon mongs pa la sogs pa can nyid kyis ni sdug bsngal gyi rgyu dang  sdug bsngal rnam pa mang po la skye dgu gnas par ston to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#519763#519773#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9105;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9106;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9107# phra ba la sogs pa'i tshig gi don ni sngar gong du bshad pa bzhin no // / +bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i bstan pa nyid la zhugs pa'i dge slong gis kyang don dam pa'i bden pa thams cad du ro gcig pa'i mtshan nyid shin tu rtogs par dka' ba lags na / /

column3: de la nyon mongs pa mang ba nyid kyi phyir nyon mongs pa can te / / +ji ltar phal cher thams  cad chom rkun du gyur to zhes bya ba lta bu'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#519774#519786#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9106;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9107;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9108;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9109;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9110# bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i bstan pa nyid la zhugs pa'i dge slong gis kyang don dam pa'i bden pa thams cad du ro gcig pa'i mtshan nyid shin tu rtogs par dka' ba lags na / / +'di las slad rol pa'i mu stegs can rnams kyis lta smos kyang ci 'tshal zhes bya ba ni / /
column5: 0.012#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3108887#3108888#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_2409;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_2410# bcom  ldan 'das don dam pa thams cad du ro gcig pa'i mtshan nyid ni bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa 'di nyid la zhugs pa dang  dge slong du gyur pa'i sems can rnams kyis kyang de ltar rtogs par dka' ba lags na / / +'di las slad rol pa'i mu stegs can rnams kyis lta smos kyang  ci 'tshal / /

column3: skye ba dang  rga ba dang  na ba dang  'chi ba dang  mi sdug pa dang phrad pa'i sdug bsngal phal che ba nyid kyi phyir sdug bsngal can no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#519785#519796#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9108;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9109;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9110# gsum pa gzhan dag gi spyod yul ma yin par bstan pa'o // / +'di lta ste / / +theg pa gnyis dang  mu stegs rnams kyis ro gcig pa'i mtshan nyid khong du ma chud pa gang yin pa de    dag thams cad ni 'dir mngon pa'i nga rgyal bskyed pa zhes bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //// /

column3: sdug pa dang bral bas mya ngan mang ba nyid kyi phyir mya ngan can no // / +yongs su tshor ba na 'dod pa mi rnyed pa  mang ba nyid kyi phyir 'khrug pa can no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#519797#519811#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9110;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9111;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9112;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9113# theg pa gnyis dang  mu stegs rnams kyis ro gcig pa'i mtshan nyid khong du ma chud pa gang yin pa de    dag thams cad ni 'dir mngon pa'i nga rgyal bskyed pa zhes bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //// /
column5: 0.029#TD4035E.TXT.r#184169#184169#TD4035E.TXT.r_10227;TD4035E.TXT.r_10228# 'di ni mngon sum gyi tshad ma zhes bya'o //// / +bam po bco brgyad pa / /

column3: de ni dus gsum dag tu sdug bsngal la sogs pa can yin te / / +mi sdug pa'i dngos po dang phrad pa dang  sdug pa'i dngos po dang bral ba dang  sdug pa'i dngos po dang mi ldan pas tshol ba na'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#519810#519825#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9112;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9113;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9114;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9115# de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa / /

column3: nyon mongs pa can de dag gsum char la khong khro     // / +ba dang  sdug pa'i dngos po dang phrad pa la 'dod chags pas so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#519826#519836#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9115;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9116# sngar bshad pa rnams bden pa nyid du bstan pa dang  de ci'i phyir zhe na zhes bya ba man chad kyis shin tu phra ba las brtsams nas rgya cher rnam par bshad pa'o // /

column3: gzhan yang dbul ba dang  phyug pa dang  'bring ni sdug bsngal la sogs pa can dang go rims bzhin du rig par bya ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#519837#519846#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9115;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9116;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9117# sngar bshad pa rnams bden pa nyid du bstan pa dang  de ci'i phyir zhe na zhes bya ba man chad kyis shin tu phra ba las brtsams nas rgya cher rnam par bshad pa'o // / +dang po yang rnam pa gnyis su dbye ste / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#519861#519871#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9118;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9117;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9119# 'di ni dang po gang bsams pa'i dngos po de dag bden pa nyid du bstan pa ste / /

column3: 'tsho bas phongs pa dang  rgud pa dang  des dgos pa dang   tshegs chen pos 'tsho ba 'byor pas go rims bzhin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#519844#519857#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9117;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9118# gang bsams pa'i dngos po de dag bden pa nyid du bstan pa dang   gang bsngags par bya ba de bden pa nyid du gyur bar bstan pa'o // /

column3: dge sbyong ngam bram ze gang la la mig gi ro myong bar byed pa ni zhes bya ba ni mdo sde'i dum bu'o // /
column4: 0.026#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#519844#519844#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9117# gang bsams pa'i dngos po de dag bden pa nyid du bstan pa dang   gang bsngags par bya ba de bden pa nyid du gyur bar bstan pa'o // /

column3: de la nyon mongs pa kun tu spyod pa'i phyir ni bdud kyi dbang du shas kyis song ba yin par rig par bya ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#519866#519875#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9118;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9119;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9120;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9121# 'di ni dang po gang bsams pa'i dngos po de dag bden pa nyid du bstan pa ste / / +mngon par rtogs pa gcig kho na ma yin pas de'i phyir tshig zlos bur de de bzhin no // /
column5: 0.029#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#498363#498363#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_6450# yang na gnyi ga yang bdag dang gzhan la phan 'dogs pa dang  rjes su mthun par gyur pa de'i phyir tshig zlos bur  de de bzhin no // /
column6: 0.029#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#519956#519956#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9132# bdag dang gzhan sad par mdzad pa'i bsngags pa brjod pa'i phyir tshig zlos bur de de bzhin no // /

column3: shas zhes bya ba ni cung  zad kyi don yin pa'i phyir shas kyis ser skya zhes bya ba bzhin no // /
column4: 1.192#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#519737#519741#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9101;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9102;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9103# don dam pa'i mtshan nyid ni phra ba mchog tu phra ba / / +zab pa mchog tu zab pa rtogs par dka' ba mchog tu rtogs par dka' ba / /

column6: 1.192#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3108905#3108907#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_2414;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_2415;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_2416;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_2417;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_2418;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_2419# des ni don dam pa thams cad du ro gcig pa'i mtshan nyid phra ba / / +mchog tu phra ba / / +zab pa / / +mchog tu zab pa / /

column3: de dang du len pa'i phyir ni dbang du song ba'o // / +de'i dbang gis las kun nas slong bar byed pa'i phyir ni lag tu song ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#519886#519895#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9121;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9122# rab 'byor ngas ni phra ba mchog tu phra ba zab pa mchog tu zab pa / / +rtogs par dka' ba mchog tu rtogs par dka' ba thams cad du ro gcig pa'i mtshan nyid kyi don dam pa'i bden pa mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te mngon par rdzogs par sangs  rgyas nas kyang / /
column5: 0.015#TD4039E.TXT.r#1832239#1832239#TD4039E.TXT.r_2145# des ni 'jig rten 'di dang 'jig rten pha rol yang nyid kyi mngon par shes pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs  rgyas so zhes bya ba nas rgyas par sbyar ro // /
column6: 0.024#TD4039E.TXT.r#1828597#1828597#TD4039E.TXT.r_1691# de la  de bzhin gshegs pa ni slob dpon med par byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa ba bdun bsgoms nas nyid kyis mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas la de ltar mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang gzhan gyi don ma lus pa las brtsams te tshe 'di nyid la skal pa yod pa gang yin pa rnams dang   skal pa med pa gang yin pa rnams dang  chos mthong ba gang yin pa rnams dang  chos ma mthong ba gang yin pa rnams de dag gi rnam pa thams cad mngon par mkhyen to // /
column7: 0.024#TD4054E.TXT.r#1018763#1018763#TD4054E.TXT.r_4653# rgyu'i nges pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'bras bu'i rgyun 'gyur ba'i phyir de mi bya bar bzlog par ni sangs  rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis kyang mdzad par mi byed do // /
column8: 0.024#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2334248#2334248#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_2744;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_2745# rtsod pa dang bcas pa'o // / +gnyis pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par rdzogs par sangs  rgyas nas lo bdun lon pa dang mnyan du yod pa rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs nas dus gnyis par theg pa chen po spyod pa'i gang zag rnams kyi ched du chos thams cad ngo bo nyid med pa dang  skye ba med pa dang  'gag pa med pa dang  gzod ma  nas zhi ba dang  rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'o zhes mtshan nyid rab tu bstan pa ni chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba zhes bya ste / /
column9: 0.026#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#511151#511151#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8065;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8066# rtogs par dka' ba mchog tu rtogs par dka' ba gcig pa dang tha dad pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid las yang dag par 'das pa'i don dam pa'i bden pa'i mtshan nyid mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te / / +mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang gzhan dag la bsnyad cing rab tu bstan / /

column3: des mi 'dzem pa'i phyir ni ci 'dod dgur bya ba'o // / +bdud kyi bcing ba dag gis ni gnas  skabs de thams cad du bcing ba'o // /

column3: bdud kyi zhags pa dag las ni mngon sum du ma gyur pa yin yang ma spangs pa dag yin pas rab tu ma grol ba'o // /

column3: thams cad la rnam pa thams cad du 'byung ba ma yin gyi / / +ro myong bar byed pa dag la de 'byung ba'i phyir gang la la zhes bya ba  gsungs so // /

column3: dge sbyong dang bram ze smos pa'i thar pa ni de dag gi dbang du byas pa yin pas bcings pa nyid kyis skyo bar bya ba'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#519927#519938#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9128;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9129;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9130# shin tu phra ba la sogs pa ro gcig pa'i don dam pa'i bdag nyid kyang thugs su chud par gyur pa yin la / / +gzhan dag la yang go bar mdzad par gyur to zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /

column6: 0.023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#245122#245122#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3988# bdag gis lan cig tsam  sems bskyed pa yang theg pa gnyis las khyad par du 'phags par gyur na yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa lta ci smos zhes bdag nyid brtan par theg pa chen po'i chos la gnas par gyur to zhes 'byung ba lta bu'o // /
column7: 0.029#TD4053E.TXT.r#2994322#2994322#TD4053E.TXT.r_3965# 'di ltar de la mos pa dang dad pa thob pas bden pa de dag la chos mngon par rtogs pas mngon par rtogs par gyur zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /

column3: mdor na 'dir nyon mongs pa'i rten dang  dmigs pa dang  rang bzhin dang  gnas skabs kyi dbye ba las nyes dmigs bstan pa  yin te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#519936#519947#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9129;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9130;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9131# gzhan dag la yang go bar mdzad par gyur to zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // / +bshad pa'i rnam grangs gzhan du na snga ma ni bdag dang gzhan sad par mdzad pa spyir  bsngags pa'o // /

column3: dge sbyong dang bram ze ni rten yin no // / +dmigs pa la sogs pa ni dmigs pa yin no // / +ro myong bar byed pa ni rang bzhin yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#519948#519956#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9131;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9132# phyi ma ni bdag dang gzhan sad par mdzad pa rnam par phye ste bsngags pa ste / / +bdag dang gzhan sad par mdzad pa'i bsngags pa brjod pa'i phyir tshig zlos bur de de bzhin no // /

column3: de yang sred pa yin par rig par bya'o // / +gnas skabs kyi dbye bas ni rnam pa drug ste / / +kun tu spyod pa dang  dang du len pa  dang  zil gyis gnon pa dang  yon tan du blta ba dang  mngon du gyur pa dang  ma spangs pa'i gnas skabs kyi dbye ba las so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#519955#519973#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9132;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9133;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9134;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9135;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9136# bdag dang gzhan sad par mdzad pa'i bsngags pa brjod pa'i phyir tshig zlos bur de de bzhin no // /
column5: 0.029#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#498411#498411#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_6456# brgya byin lha'i dbang pos 'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa ma yin no zhes the tshom za ba dang  nor bar 'dzin du dogs pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig  zlos bur de de bzhin no // /

column3: mi dge ba'i chos rnams yang dag par blangs pa'i rgyus mthong ba'i chos nyid la sdug bsngal bar gnas pa dang zhes bya ba ni mdo sde'i dum    bu'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#519972#519982#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9135;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9136;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9137;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9138# pas ni gnyis pa shin tu phra ba las brtsams nas rgya cher rnam par bshad pa ston to // / +'di yang brtag pa dang  rgya cher rnam par bshad pa dang gnyis bstan te / /

column3: de la sdug bsngal ba zhes bya ba ni bstan pa'o // / +lhag ma ni bshad pa'o // / +de la sdug bsngal dang bcas pa ni yongs su tshol ba'i tshe grang ba na lhags pas sbrebs pa dang zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung bas so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#519983#519998#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9136;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9137;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9138# 'di yang brtag pa dang  rgya cher rnam par bshad pa dang gnyis bstan te / / +'di ni dang PO BRTAG PA'O // / +rab 'byor ngas ni phung po thams cad la rnam par dag  pa'i dmigs pa gang yin pa'i don dam pa'i bden pa yin par yongs su bstan zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa rgya cher rnam par bshad pa bstan to // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#520228#520241#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9174;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9173;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9175# rnam par dag pa'i dmigs pa gang  yin pa de ni don dam pa'i bden pa yin par yongs su bstan TO ZHES BYA BA NI gnyis pa zlas skye mched la sogs pa'i rnam par dag pa dmigs pa don dam pa'i bden pa yin par rnam par bshad pa ste / /

column3: phongs pa dang bcas pas ni 'dod pas phongs pa dang ldan pa'i  phyir 'byor pa med pa'i tshe na'o // /

column5: 0.018#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#530053#530054#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10531;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10532# 'di yang rnam pa gsum gyis bstan te / / +don dang dpe dang  dpe dang don du sbyar ba'o // /

column3: brjod par bya ba rnam pa du ma yin kyang rjod  pa ni gcig yin no zhes bya ba de ni bsgrubs zin to // / +sgrib pa lnga po zhes bya ba ni mdo sde'i dum bu'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#520197#520220#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9171;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9172;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9173# ci'i phyir yongs su bstan zhes gsungs / / +mdo sde shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang  mdo sde tshad med pa rnams las de bzhin nyid gsungs so // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#520394#520398#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9191;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9190# yang de nyid las gzhan pa'i phung po dang  skye mched dang  rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang  zas dang bden pa dang  khams dang  dran pa  nye bar gzhag pa dang  yang dag pa'i spong pa dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang  dbang po dang  stobs dang  byang chub kyi yan lag dang  lam gyi yan lag rnams kyis so so la de bzhin nyid dang  don dam pa dang  chos bdag med pa nyid yongs su tshol bar    mi byed kyi ZHES BYA BA 'DI MAN chad ni gsum pa kun du khyab pa'i don rnam pa gsum las brtsams nas / /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#521326#521338#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9331# rab 'byor ji ltar phung po de dag phan tshun tha dad pa'i mtshan nyid du gyur pa dang  ji ltar skye mched dang  rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang  zas dang  bden pa dang  khams dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang  yang dag pa'i spong ba dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang  dbang po dang  stobs dang  byang chub kyi yan lag dang  lam gyi yan lag de dag phan tshun tha dad pa'i mtshan nyid du gyur pa de bzhin DU ZHES BYA BA 'DI MAN chad ni  gsum pa skyon rnam pa gsum dang bral bas ro gcig pa'i mtshan nyid rnam par bshad pa ston to // /
column7: 0.0#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3108945#3108953#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_2426;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_2427# rab 'byor phung po rnams la rnam par dag pa'i dmigs pa gang yin pa de ni ngas don dam  pa yin par yongs su bstan cing rab 'byor skye mched rnams dang  rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang  zas rnams dang  bden pa rnams dang  khams rnams dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang  yang dag pa'i spong ba rnams dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang      // /
column8: 0.0#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3109019#3109026#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_2437;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_2436# yang de las gzhan pa'i phung po rnams dang  khams rnams dang  skye mched rnams dang  rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnams dang  zas rnams dang  bden pa rnams dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang  yang dag pa'i  spong ba rnams dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang  dbang po rnams dang  stobs rnams dang  byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so so dang  'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa so so la de bzhin nyid don dam pa chos bdag med pa yongs su tshol bar mi byed kyi / /
column9: 0.0#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3109074#3109078#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_2441# rab 'byor gzhan yang ji ltar phung po dang  skye mched dang  rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang  zas dang  bden pa dang  khams dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang  yang dag pa'i spong ba dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi    rkang pa dang  dbang po dang  stobs dang  byang chub kyi yan lag 'di dag phan tshun mtshan nyid tha dad pa dang  ji ltar 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa phan tshun mtshan nyid tha dad pa yin pa de bzhin du / /

column3: de la lnga kho na'i dgos pa ni ting nge 'dzin la sbyor ba la sgrib pa ni sgrib pa gnyis yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#520210#520219#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9173# ngas skye mched dang  rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang   zas dang  bden pa dang  khams dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang  yang dag pa'i spong ba dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang  dbang po dang  stobs dang  byang chub kyi yan lag dang  lam gyi yan lag thams cad la / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#520395#520409#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9191# yang de nyid las gzhan pa'i phung po dang  skye mched dang  rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang  zas dang bden pa dang  khams dang  dran pa  nye bar gzhag pa dang  yang dag pa'i spong pa dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang  dbang po dang  stobs dang  byang chub kyi yan lag dang  lam gyi yan lag rnams kyis so so la de bzhin nyid dang  don dam pa dang  chos bdag med pa nyid yongs su tshol bar    mi byed kyi zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gsum pa kun du khyab pa'i don rnam pa gsum las brtsams nas / /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#521328#521338#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9331# rab 'byor ji ltar phung po de dag phan tshun tha dad pa'i mtshan nyid du gyur pa dang  ji ltar skye mched dang  rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang  zas dang  bden pa dang  khams dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang  yang dag pa'i spong ba dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang  dbang po dang  stobs dang  byang chub kyi yan lag dang  lam gyi yan lag de dag phan tshun tha dad pa'i mtshan nyid du gyur pa de bzhin du zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni  gsum pa skyon rnam pa gsum dang bral bas ro gcig pa'i mtshan nyid rnam par bshad pa ston to // /
column7: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2328111#2328115#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_2079# 'phags pa'i bden pa la ji lta ba bzhin du dran ba nye bar gzhag pa dang  yang dag pa'i spong ba dang     rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang  dbang po dang  stobs dang  byang chub kyi yan lag dang  lam gyi yan lag rnams la yang de bzhin du rgya cher bshad par bgyi lags so zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa byang chub kyi phyogs las brtsams nas ngo bo nyid med par gsungs pas khong  du chud par bstan pa'o // /
column8: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#175292#175296#TD4035E.TXT.r_8903;TD4035E.TXT.r_8904# 'du shes dang tshor  ba 'gog pa'i bar dang  byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun te / / +dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang  yang dag pa'i spong ba dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang  dbang po dang  stobs dang  byang chub kyi yan lag dang  lam gyi yan lag rnams dang  dge sbyong  gi 'bras bu bzhi ste / /
column9: 0.0#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2790234#2790240#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_12376# mngon par rtogs pa'i shes pa bden pa mngon par rtogs pa ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang  yang dag pa'i spong ba dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang  dbang po dang  stobs dang  byang chub kyi yan lag dang  lam gyi yan lag byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i chos kyi rab tu dbye bas rnam pa du ma yod do // /
column10: 0.0#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3093599#3093602#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_104# gzugs rgyu mtshan dang  sems rgyu mtshan dang  sems las byung ba rgyu  mtshan dang  sems dang ldan pa ma yin pa rgyu mtshan dang  'dus ma byas rgyu mtshan dang  'dus byas rgyu mtshan dang  phung po rgyu mtshan dang  skye mched rgyu mtshan dang  khams rgyu mtshan dang  rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rgyu mtshan dang  gnas dang gnas ma yin pa rgyu  mtshan dang  dbang po rgyu mtshan dang  bden pa rgyu mtshan dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rgyu mtshan dang  yang dag pa'i spong ba dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang  dbang po dang  stobs dang  byang chub kyi yan lag dang  lam gyi yan lag rgyu mtshan dang  lam rgyu    mtshan dang  chos kyi gzhi rgyu mtshan dang  zhi gnas rgyu mtshan dang  lhag mthong rgyu mtshan dang  rab tu 'dzin pa rgyu mtshan dang  btang snyoms rgyu mtshan dang  rkyen rgyu mtshan dang  ston pa rgyu mtshan dang  sa rgyu mtshan dang  chu rgyu mtshan dang  me rgyu mtshan dang  rlung  rgyu mtshan dang  nam mkha' rgyu mtshan dang  rnam par shes pa rgyu mtshan dang  'jig rten 'di rgyu mtshan dang  'jig rten pha rol rgyu mtshan dang  nyi ma rgyu mtshan dang  zla ba rgyu mtshan dang  sems can dmyal ba rgyu mtshan dang  dud 'gro dang  yi dvags dang  lha dang   mi rgyu mtshan dang  rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i rgyu mtshan dang  sum cu rtsa gsum dang  'thab bral dang  dga' ldan dang  'phrul dga' dang  gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rgyu mtshan dang  bsam gtan dang po rgyu mtshan dang  bsam gtan gnyis pa dang  gsum pa dang  bzhi pa rgyu mtshan dang  nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched rgyu mtshan dang  rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang  ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang  'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched rgyu mtshan dang  'byung ba rgyu mtshan dang  'jig pa rgyu  mtshan dang  dngos po rgyu mtshan dang  dngos po med pa rgyu mtshan dang  kun nas nyon mongs pa rgyu mtshan dang  rnam par byang ba rgyu mtshan dang  mthong ba dang  thos pa dang  bye brag phyed pa dang  rnam par shes pa dang  thos pa dang  yongs su btsal ba rgyu mtshan  dang ; /
column11: 0.0#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3108946#3108953#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_2426;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_2427# rab 'byor phung po rnams la rnam par dag pa'i dmigs pa gang yin pa de ni ngas don dam  pa yin par yongs su bstan cing rab 'byor skye mched rnams dang  rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang  zas rnams dang  bden pa rnams dang  khams rnams dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang  yang dag pa'i spong ba rnams dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang      // /
column12: 0.0#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3109021#3109027#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_2437# yang de las gzhan pa'i phung po rnams dang  khams rnams dang  skye mched rnams dang  rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnams dang  zas rnams dang  bden pa rnams dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang  yang dag pa'i  spong ba rnams dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang  dbang po rnams dang  stobs rnams dang  byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so so dang  'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa so so la de bzhin nyid don dam pa chos bdag med pa yongs su tshol bar mi byed kyi / /
column13: 0.0#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3113022#3113027#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_3055# bden pa rnams la ji lta ba de bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa    rnams dang  yang dag pa'i spong ba rnams dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang  dbang po rnams dang  stobs rnams dang  byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang  lam gyi yan lag rnams kyi yan lag re re la yang de bzhin du sbyar bar bgyi lags so // /
column14: 0.014#TD4035E.TXT.r#187286#187290#TD4035E.TXT.r_10654# mi dge ba'i chos rnams kyang mi sdug pa'i 'bras bu mngon par 'grub pa la de de dang 'dra ba dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang  yang dag par spong ba  rnams dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang  dbang po rnams dang  stobs rnams dang  byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang  lam gyi yan lag byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams ni byang chub thob par bya ba la bya ba bsgrub pa'i spyi'i mtshan nyid kyis spyi'i mtshan nyid rnams  so // /
column15: 0.014#TD4036E.TXT.r#18377#18381#TD4036E.TXT.r_2669;TD4036E.TXT.r_2670# bcom ldan 'das kyis de dang de dag tu gdul ba de dang de dag dang gdul ba'i spyod pa rnams las brtsams  nas phung po dang ldan pa'i gtam dang  skye mched dang ldan pa dang  rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang ldan pa dang  zas dang  bden pa dang  khams dang ldan pa dang  nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang de bzhin gshegs pa dang ldan pa dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang      // / +yang dag par spong ba dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang  dbang po dang  stobs dang  byang chub kyi yan lag dang  lam gyi yan lag dang ldan pa dang  mi sdug pa dang  dbugs rngub pa dang  dbugs 'byung ba dang  bslab pa dang / /
column16: 0.014#TD4039E.TXT.r#1815504#1815507#TD4039E.TXT.r_20# de dang der 'dul ba la gzigs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa dang  de'i 'og tu yang dag par sdud par byed pa rnams kyis bstan pa yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa sbyar bar ci rigs par go  rims su phab ste gtam du sbyar ba dang  de bzhin du zas dang bden pa dang  khams dang tshor ba dang ldan pa dang  nyan thos dang  de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa dang ldan pa dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang  yang dag par spong ba dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa  dang  dbang po dang  stobs dang  byang chub kyi yan lag dang  lam gyi yan lag dang  dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba dran pa dang  bslab pa rnams dang  shes nas dad pa dang ldan pa dang  'khor brgyad kyi dbang du byas nas 'khor dang ldan pa'o // /
column17: 0.014#TD4039E.TXT.r#1880486#1880490#TD4039E.TXT.r_7676;TD4039E.TXT.r_7677# byed pas sgo drug nas dge ba la brten te / / +dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang  yang dag par spong ba dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang  dbang po dang  stobs dang  byang chub kyi yan lag dang  lam gyi yan lag rnams so // /
column18: 0.020#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3110725#3110726#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_2685# dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag pa'i spong ba rnams dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang  dbang po rnams dang  stobs rnams dang  byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi yang bka' stsal / /
column19: 0.021#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#543707#543707#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12245# dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par spong ba dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang  dbang po dang  stobs dang  byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi yang de bzhin du bka'  stsal zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa zlas sgo gzhan lnga po dag bstan pa'o // /
column20: 0.027#TD4031E.TXT.r#2960322#2960322#TD4031E.TXT.r_229# ngo tsha'i rnam par dbye ba dang  brtan pa dang  mi skyo ba dang  bstan bcos shes pa dang  'jig rten shes pa dang  rton pa dang  so  so yang dag par rig pa dang  tshogs gnyis dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang  yang dag par spong ba dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang  dbang po dang  stobs dang  byang chub kyi yan lag dang  'phags pa'i lam dang  zhi gnas dang  lhag mthong dang  thabs la  mkhas pa dang  gzungs dang  smon lam dang  ting nge 'dzin dang  chos kyi sdom dang  de'i skad cig ma dang  bdag med pa dang  ngo tsha la sogs pa'i las mdor bsdus pa bstan pa'o // /

column3: ting nge 'dzin du zhugs pa'i sgrib pa ni gsum yin te / / +sems nang du sdud pa'i phyir dang   phyi rol du rnam par gyeng ba'i phyir dang  yang dag par sbyor ba la nges pa ni mi rnyed ba'i phyir ro // /
column4: 1.788#TD4035E.TXT.r#175295#175296#TD4035E.TXT.r_8904# dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang  yang dag pa'i spong ba dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang  dbang po dang  stobs dang  byang chub kyi yan lag dang  lam gyi yan lag rnams dang  dge sbyong  gi 'bras bu bzhi ste / /
column5: 0.026#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#519992#519992#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9138# rab 'byor ngas ni phung po thams cad la rnam par dag  pa'i dmigs pa gang yin pa'i don dam pa'i bden pa yin par yongs su bstan zhes bya BA LA SOGS PAS NI gnyis pa rgya cher rnam par bshad pa bstan to // /

column3: gzhan yang zhi gnas dang lhag mthong la sbyor ba'i sgrib pa ni sgrib pa gnyis yin la / / +zhi gnas la zhugs pa'i ni zhum pa'i skyon yod pa'i phyir zhi gnas kyi sgrib pa ni gcig  yin zhing / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#520242#520250#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9174;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9175;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9176;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9177;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9178# rnam par dag pa'i dmigs pa gang  yin pa de ni don dam pa'i bden pa yin par yongs su bstan to zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa zlas skye mched la sogs pa'i rnam par dag pa dmigs pa don dam pa'i bden pa yin par rnam par bshad pa ste / / +de ci'i phyir zhe na / / +don dam pa'i bden pa'i don gyis chos  rnams la khyab pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: lhag mthong la zhugs pa yin na ni rnam par ma zhi ba dang  ma nges pa'i skyon yod pa'i phyir lhag mthong gi sgrib pa ni gnyis so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#520249#520258#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9176;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9177;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9178# don dam pa'i bden pa'i don gyis chos  rnams la khyab pa'i phyir ro // / +rnam par dag pa'i dmigs pa de yang / /

column3: gzhan yang tshul khrims kyi sgrib pa ni gnyis te / / +'dod chags dang  zhe sdang gnyis kyis 'chal ba'i tshul khrims kun nas  slong bar byed pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.024#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2355381#2355381#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5194# 'dres pa tshad med pa'i chos la dmigs pa'i zhi gnas dang lhag mthong zhes kyang gsungs na zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gsum pa 'dres pa'i chos la dmigs pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to // /
column5: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2397588#2397588#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10267# rigs kyi bu sa de dag ni rnam par dag pa bzhi dang yan lag bcu gcig gis bsdus par rig par bya'o zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to // /
column6: 0.028#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#509348#509348#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_7831# 'du byed rnams kyi bdag med pa tsam dang  ngo bo nyid med pa tsam gyis rab tu phye ba gang yin pa de don dam pa'i bden pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin par gyur na zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni / /
column7: 0.028#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#548500#548500#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12783# ji lta ji ltar mngon  par zhen pa de lta de ltar gzhan gyi dbang gi ngo bo nyid dang yongs su grub pa'i ngo bo nyid la kun brtags pa'i ngo bo nyid du mngon par zhen pa zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa mngon par zhen pa'i dbang gis 'khor ba'i chos can du gyur bar bstan to // /
column8: 0.029#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2311921#2311921#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_129# gzhan gyi dbang gi ngo bo nyid la kun brtags pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid du mngon par zhen par mi byed de zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa sa la gnas pa'i gnas skabs rnam pa gnyis kyi phan yon zhes bya  ba ston to // /
column9: 0.029#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#230991#230991#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2175# bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'dres pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa'i chos gang lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gsum pa zhus pa dang  lan dag gis pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'dres pa'i chos rnam par 'byed pa ston to // /

column3: ting nge 'dzin gyi sgrib pa yang gnyis te / / +sems nang du sdud pa'i phyir dang  phyi rol du rnam par gyeng ba'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#520272#520284#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9180;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9181;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9182# pa'i mtshan nyid ston to // / +'di yang rnam pa gnyis su dbye ste / / +phung po rnams las brtsams nas ro gcig pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa dang  zlas skye mched la sogs pa'i ro gcig ba'i mtshan nyid rnam bar bshad pa'o // /

column3: shes rab kyi sgrib pa ni gcig ste / / +yang dag par nges pa mi rnyed pa'i phyir ro // / +lung las tshul khrims kyi sgrib pa ni gcig ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#520283#520295#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9182;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9183;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9184# phung po rnams las brtsams nas ro gcig pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa dang  zlas skye mched la sogs pa'i ro gcig ba'i mtshan nyid rnam bar bshad pa'o // /
column5: 1.192#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#520017#520018#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9142# rnam par dag pa'i dmigs pa las brtsams nas ro gcig gi mtshan nyid bstan pa dang  rab 'byor dge slong rnal 'byor spyod pa zhes bya ba man chad kyis khyab pa'i don rnam pa gsum las brtsams nas ro gcig pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa dang  rab 'byor ji  ltar phung po de dag gis zhes bya ba man chad kyis skyon rnam pa gsum dang bral bar ro gcig pa'i mtshan nyid rnam par bshad pa'o // /

column3: tshangs par spyod pa las nyams par byed pa'i phyir ro // / +gdams ngag gi sgrib pa yang gcig ste / / +des tshig mi bzod pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#520296#520307#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9183;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9184;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9185# 'di ni dang po phung  po rnams kyi rnam par dag pa'i dmigs pa las brtsams nas / / +ro gcig pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa ste / /

column3: zhi gnas dang rab tu 'dzin pa dang btang snyoms kyi dus dag tu ste 'grub pa'i sgrib pa gsum mo zhes 'byung ngo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#520306#520315#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9185;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9186# phung po rnams kyi rnam par dag ba'i dmigs pa tha dad pa med pa'i mtshan nyid dang  tha dad pa med pa'i don gang yin pa de nyid ro gcig pa'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i  phyir ro // /

column3: sgyu rtsal shes dag gsum  po 'di dag ni sems can rnams kyi las kyi gzhi dang kun 'byung ba dag ces bya ba ni mdo sde'i dum bu'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#520314#520326#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9185;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9186;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9187# phung po rnams kyi rnam par dag ba'i dmigs pa tha dad pa med pa'i mtshan nyid dang  tha dad pa med pa'i don gang yin pa de nyid ro gcig pa'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i  phyir ro // / +phung po la ji lta ba de bzhin du skye mched thams cad nas / /

column3: de la las kyi gzhi dang kun 'byung ba dag ces bya ba ni rab tu 'jug par byed pa dang  rjes su 'jug par byed pa'i rgyu ston pa yin te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#520327#520336#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9187;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9188# lam gyi yan lag gi bar thams cad la yang ro gcig pa'i mtshan nyid dang  tha dad pa med pa'i mtshan nyid yin no zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa zlas skye mched la sogs pa'i ro gcig pa'i mtshan nyid rnam par  bshad pa'o // /

column3: chags pa la sogs pa gang dang du  len pa na nyes par spyod pa kun nas slong bar byed pa dang  gang gis mi 'dzem pa na nyes par spyod pa las mi ldog pa yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#520337#520349#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9187;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9188# lam gyi yan lag gi bar thams cad la yang ro gcig pa'i mtshan nyid dang  tha dad pa med pa'i mtshan nyid yin no zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa zlas skye mched la sogs pa'i ro gcig pa'i mtshan nyid rnam par  bshad pa'o // / +de'i phyir rab 'byor rigs pa des na don dam pa'i bden pa ni thams cad ro gcig pa'i mtshan nyid yin par rig par bya'o zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa don dam pa'i bden pa ro gcig pa yin par bshad pa'i mjug bsdu ba ste / /
column5: 0.015#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#521305#521305#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9329# de'i phyir rab 'byor rigs pa nges kyang don dam pa'i bden pa ni thams cad du ro gcig pa'i  mtshan nyid yin par rig par bya'o zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa mjug bsdu ba ste / /
column6: 0.015#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#521986#521991#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9417;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9418# de'i phyir rab 'byor rigs pa des kyang / / +don dam pa'i bden pa ni thams cad du ro gcig pa'i mtshan nyid yin par rig par bya'o zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa mjug bsdu ba ste // /

column3: de ltar na de byas pa dang bsags pa'i yin no // / +gzhan yang chags pa la sogs pa ni kun tu spyod pa'i gnas skabs dang zil gyis gnon pa'i gnas  skabs kyang yin par ston to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#520348#520361#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9188;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9189# de'i phyir rab 'byor rigs pa des na don dam pa'i bden pa ni thams cad ro gcig pa'i mtshan nyid yin par rig par bya'o zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa don dam pa'i bden pa ro gcig pa yin par bshad pa'i mjug bsdu ba ste / /

column3: de nyid kyi phyir chags pa dang chags pas zil gyis gnon pa zhes bya ba gsungs te / / +zil gyis ma non na ni des de las skyes pa'i las slong bar mi byed do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#520362#520376#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9189;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9190# 'di ltar sngar gong du phung  po la sogs pa'i chos kyi rnam par dag pa'i dmigs pa gang yin pa de dang  don dam pa'i bden pa'i mtshan nyid tha dad pa med pa'i rigs pa des na don dam pa'i bden pa'i mtshan nyid ni thams cad du khyab pa yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /

column3: gzhan yang sbyor ba'i gnas skabs dang mthar thug pa'i gnas skabs kyang yin no // / +yid kyis nyes par spyod pa la sbyor ba'i gnas skabs gang yin zhe na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#520377#520387#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9189;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9190;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9191# 'di ltar sngar gong du phung  po la sogs pa'i chos kyi rnam par dag pa'i dmigs pa gang yin pa de dang  don dam pa'i bden pa'i mtshan nyid tha dad pa med pa'i rigs pa des na don dam pa'i bden pa'i mtshan nyid ni thams cad du khyab pa yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // / +rab 'byor dge  slong rnal 'byor pa ni phung po gcig gi de bzhin nyid dang  don dam pa dang  chos bdag med pa nyid rab tu rtogs nas / /

column3: chags pa la sogs pa gang gis gzhan gyi rdzas bdag gir bya ba la sogs pa phyis nges pa rnyed pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#1598984#1598984#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_757# phung po dang  skye mched dang  khams dang  rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang  bden pa dang  zas dang  bsam gtan dang  tshad med pa dang  gzugs med pa dang  rnam  par thar pa dang  zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched dang  zad par gyi skye mched dang  byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa dang  mngon par shes pa dang  so so yang dag par rig pa dang  smon nas shes pa dang  nyon mongs pa med pa la sogs pa'i gtam rgyud re re ni chos kyi  phung po'o zhes zer ro // /
column5: 0.0#TD4091E.TXT.r#697577#697577#TD4091E.TXT.r_472# phung po dang  khams dang  skye mched dang  rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang  bden pa dang  zas dang  bsam gtan  dang  tshad med pa dang  gzugs med pa dang  rnam par thar pa dang  zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched dang  zad par gyi skye mched dang  byang chub kyi phyogs dang  mngon par shes pa dang  so so yang dag par rig pa dang  smon nas shes pa dang  nyon mongs pa med pa rnams kyi bshad pa  re re ni chos kyi phung po'o zhes zer ro // /
column6: 0.020#TD4050E.TXT.r#1097877#1097877#TD4050E.TXT.r_96# chos ni phung po dang  skye mched dang  khams dang  rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang  zas dang  bsam gtan  dang ; /
column7: 0.029#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3110666#3110666#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_2678# phung po rnams kyi ji lta ba de  bzhin du skye mched rnams dang  rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang  zas rnams kyi yang bka' stsal / /

column3: gzhan yang chags pa la sogs pa ni lus dang ngag dang yid la byed pa dang smra ba dang rtog pa'i gzhi sems kyi  kun 'byung ba dag go // /
column4: 0.009#TD4035E.TXT.r#175293#175296#TD4035E.TXT.r_8904# dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang  yang dag pa'i spong ba dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang  dbang po dang  stobs dang  byang chub kyi yan lag dang  lam gyi yan lag rnams dang  dge sbyong  gi 'bras bu bzhi ste / /
column5: 0.029#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#543707#543707#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12245# dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par spong ba dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang  dbang po dang  stobs dang  byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi yang de bzhin du bka'  stsal zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa zlas sgo gzhan lnga po dag bstan pa'o // /

column3: de lta na ni dkar po'i phyogs la yang kun 'byung ba smos par 'gyur ro // / +rnam grangs dang po dag tu ni gzhi zad pa zhes 'byung ba nyid kyis kun 'byung ba zad pa yang rab tu grub pa'i phyir na mi 'gyur la / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#520032#520034#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9142# rnam par dag pa'i dmigs pa las brtsams nas ro gcig gi mtshan nyid bstan pa dang  rab 'byor dge slong rnal 'byor spyod pa zhes bya ba man chad kyis khyab pa'i don rnam pa gsum las brtsams nas ro gcig pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa dang  rab 'byor ji  ltar phung po de dag gis zhes bya ba man chad kyis skyon rnam pa gsum dang bral bar ro gcig pa'i mtshan nyid rnam par bshad pa'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#520410#520425#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9191;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9192# yang de nyid las gzhan pa'i phung po dang  skye mched dang  rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang  zas dang bden pa dang  khams dang  dran pa  nye bar gzhag pa dang  yang dag pa'i spong pa dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang  dbang po dang  stobs dang  byang chub kyi yan lag dang  lam gyi yan lag rnams kyis so so la de bzhin nyid dang  don dam pa dang  chos bdag med pa nyid yongs su tshol bar    mi byed kyi zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gsum pa kun du khyab pa'i don rnam pa gsum las brtsams nas / /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#520512#520513#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9206# 'dir re zhig don rnam pa gsum las brtsams nas ro gcig pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa yin te / /
