column5: 0.012#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#490008#490010#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_5386;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_5387# 'di ni dang po'o // / +'di la bshad pa rnam pa gsum yod pa ni gong ma bzhin du rig par bya'o // /
column6: 0.025#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2363417#2363417#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6156;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6157# ngas 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bstan pa gang yin pa'o zhes bya ba ni drug pa 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa'i de bzhin nyid rnam par bshad pa ste / / +'di  la yang bshad pa rnam pa gnyis yod pa ni gong ma bzhin du rig par bya'o // /

column3: lung las ni rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid gnyis kyis rang bzhin gyis sdug bsngal nyid kyi dbang du mdzad de / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#521216#521223#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9316;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9317# de ltar bshad pa yod kyang tshig bden pa ma yin pas bshad  pa'i don mdor bsdu na / /

column3: sdug bsngal dang 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal nyid gnyis gsungs la / / +'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal nyid kyi dbang du    mdzad nas ni / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#521224#521233#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9317;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9318# mdo'i tshig snga ma ni chos gzhan la don dam pa yin par yongs su tshol ba'i phyir mi mthun pa'i rnam par bshad pa zhes bya'o // /

column3: 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal nyid gsungs so zhes 'byung ngo // / +srog gcod pa dang drag shul can dang lag pa khrag dmar ba dang zhes bya ba ni mdo sde'i dum bu'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#521230#521244#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9317;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9318;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9319;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9320;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9321# mdo'i tshig snga ma ni chos gzhan la don dam pa yin par yongs su tshol ba'i phyir mi mthun pa'i rnam par bshad pa zhes bya'o // / +mdo'i tshig 'di ni phung po gcig kho na yongs su tshol bar sgrub pas / /

column3: de la bsad pa'i bsam pa nyid dang  bsad par sbyor ba nyid dang  de gnyis ka la mngon par dga' ba nyid  dang  de'i gzhi nyid dang  de dang rjes su 'brel pa nyid kyis srog gcod pa yongs su bstan to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#521245#521259#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9320;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9321;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9322;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9323# bshad pa zhes bya'o zhes ston to // / +slob dpon yang dag bden pas mdo'i tshig 'di gnyis kyi bshad pa byas pa las / /

column3: de'i gzhi yang kha na ma tho ba de la ngo tsha ba med pa dang  snying mi brtse ba yang yin te / / +srog chags phra mo sdug bsngal ba mi mkho ba rnams la yang ngo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#521257#521270#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9322;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9323;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9324# mdo'i tshig snga ma ni yul rnam pa gsum pa rtogs par bshad pa'o // / +mdo'i tshig phyi ma ni nges par rtogs pas mngon par  rtogs par byed par bshad pa yin no zhes 'byung ngo // /
column5: 0.022#TD4061E.TXT.r#1514588#1514588#TD4061E.TXT.r_81;TD4061E.TXT.r_82# lung las ni bstan par 'dzin pa dang  klog pa dang     'don pa dang  sems dang ba dang ldan pa dang  gtsug la gnyid du dmigs kyis phyed pa'i sgo nas thob pa nas mthong bas shin tu rtogs pa'i bar yin no zhes 'byung ngo // / +bshad pa 'di ni gang las ji ltar na mang du thos pa la sogs pa yin pa de yongs su ston pa  yin par rigs par bya'o // /

column3: de dang rjes su 'brel pa nyid ni ji srid  du mi spong ba'o // / +gsod pa ni gsod par byed pa ste 'chi bar byed pa zhes bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#521271#521282#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9324;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9325;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9326# 'di gsum tha dad pa yang theg pa chung ngu'i bstan pa dang sbyar na / / +zag pa med pa'i dbang po gsum la bye brag yod pa'i phyir te / /

column3: rab tu gsod pa ni rnam pa nas gsod pa ste / / +rnam pa re re nas 'chi bar byed pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#521278#521297#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9325;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9326;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9327;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9328;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9329# zag pa med pa'i dbang po gsum la bye brag yod pa'i phyir te / / +'di ni mthong ba dang  bsgom pa dang  mi slob pa'i gnas skabs kyi bye brag gi  phyir ro // /

column3: rnam grangs gzhan yang drag shul can nyid kyis ni shan pa la sogs pa'i srog gcod pa nyid khyad par du byed pa yin no // /
drag shul can nyid kyang lus drag shul can nyid dang  sems drag shul can nyid dang  der gcig tu nges pa nyid dang  der gtan du ba nyid kyis ston par byed do // /

column6: 1.192#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#499209#499212#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_6545# de'i phyir chos 'phags rigs pa des na don dam pa ni rtog  pa dang  dpyod pa thams cad kyi spyod yul gyi mtshan nyid thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa yin par rig par bya'o zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa mjug bsdu ba ste brda phrad par zad do // /

column12: 0.027#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2402881#2402883#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10941# rigs kyi bu de ltar yan lag bcu gcig po de dag gis sa rnams ma lus par bsdus par rig par bya'o zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa  spyi'i mjug bsdu ba yin par rig par bya'o //// /
column13: 0.029#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2368944#2368944#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6891# rigs kyi bu don rnam pa bzhi po de dag gis kyang don thams cad bsdus par rig par bya'o zhes bya ba ni gsum pa mjug bsdu ba yin par rig par bya'o // /

column3: de la ngo tsha ba med pa nyid dang  snying mi brtse ba dang ldan pa nyid kyis ni der gcig tu nges pa nyid yin  la / / +mi spong ba nyid kyis ni der bstan du ba nyid yin par rig par bya'o // /

column3: dge slong dag gson pa rnams las gnyid log pa ni stong pa dang zhes bya ba ni mdo sde'i dum bu'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#520208#520220#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9173# ngas skye mched dang  rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang   zas dang  bden pa dang  khams dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang  yang dag pa'i spong ba dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang  dbang po dang  stobs dang  byang chub kyi yan lag dang  lam gyi yan lag thams cad la / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#520393#520405#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9191# yang de nyid las gzhan pa'i phung po dang  skye mched dang  rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang  zas dang bden pa dang  khams dang  dran pa  nye bar gzhag pa dang  yang dag pa'i spong pa dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang  dbang po dang  stobs dang  byang chub kyi yan lag dang  lam gyi yan lag rnams kyis so so la de bzhin nyid dang  don dam pa dang  chos bdag med pa nyid yongs su tshol bar    mi byed kyi ZHES BYA BA 'DI MAN chad ni gsum pa kun du khyab pa'i don rnam pa gsum las brtsams nas / /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#521325#521333#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9331# rab 'byor ji ltar phung po de dag phan tshun tha dad pa'i mtshan nyid du gyur pa dang  ji ltar skye mched dang  rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang  zas dang  bden pa dang  khams dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang  yang dag pa'i spong ba dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang  dbang po dang  stobs dang  byang chub kyi yan lag dang  lam gyi yan lag de dag phan tshun tha dad pa'i mtshan nyid du gyur pa de bzhin du ZHES BYA BA 'DI MAN chad ni  gsum pa skyon rnam pa gsum dang bral bas ro gcig pa'i mtshan nyid rnam par bshad pa ston to // /
column7: 0.0#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2790234#2790240#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_12376# mngon par rtogs pa'i shes pa bden pa mngon par rtogs pa ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang  yang dag pa'i spong ba dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang  dbang po dang  stobs dang  byang chub kyi yan lag dang  lam gyi yan lag byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i chos kyi rab tu dbye bas rnam pa du ma yod do // /
column8: 0.0#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3108944#3108953#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_2426;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_2427# rab 'byor phung po rnams la rnam par dag pa'i dmigs pa gang yin pa de ni ngas don dam  pa yin par yongs su bstan cing rab 'byor skye mched rnams dang  rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang  zas rnams dang  bden pa rnams dang  khams rnams dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang  yang dag pa'i spong ba rnams dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang      // /
column9: 0.0#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3109018#3109027#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_2437# yang de las gzhan pa'i phung po rnams dang  khams rnams dang  skye mched rnams dang  rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnams dang  zas rnams dang  bden pa rnams dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang  yang dag pa'i  spong ba rnams dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang  dbang po rnams dang  stobs rnams dang  byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so so dang  'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa so so la de bzhin nyid don dam pa chos bdag med pa yongs su tshol bar mi byed kyi / /
column10: 0.0#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3109072#3109078#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_2441# rab 'byor gzhan yang ji ltar phung po dang  skye mched dang  rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang  zas dang  bden pa dang  khams dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang  yang dag pa'i spong ba dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi    rkang pa dang  dbang po dang  stobs dang  byang chub kyi yan lag 'di dag phan tshun mtshan nyid tha dad pa dang  ji ltar 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa phan tshun mtshan nyid tha dad pa yin pa de bzhin du / /
column11: 0.0#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3113022#3113027#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_3055# bden pa rnams la ji lta ba de bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa    rnams dang  yang dag pa'i spong ba rnams dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang  dbang po rnams dang  stobs rnams dang  byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang  lam gyi yan lag rnams kyi yan lag re re la yang de bzhin du sbyar bar bgyi lags so // /
column12: 0.020#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3110725#3110726#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_2685# dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag pa'i spong ba rnams dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang  dbang po rnams dang  stobs rnams dang  byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi yang bka' stsal / /
column13: 0.024#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#1598984#1598985#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_757# phung po dang  skye mched dang  khams dang  rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang  bden pa dang  zas dang  bsam gtan dang  tshad med pa dang  gzugs med pa dang  rnam  par thar pa dang  zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched dang  zad par gyi skye mched dang  byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa dang  mngon par shes pa dang  so so yang dag par rig pa dang  smon nas shes pa dang  nyon mongs pa med pa la sogs pa'i gtam rgyud re re ni chos kyi  phung po'o zhes zer ro // /
column14: 0.024#TD4091E.TXT.r#697577#697578#TD4091E.TXT.r_472# phung po dang  khams dang  skye mched dang  rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang  bden pa dang  zas dang  bsam gtan  dang  tshad med pa dang  gzugs med pa dang  rnam par thar pa dang  zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched dang  zad par gyi skye mched dang  byang chub kyi phyogs dang  mngon par shes pa dang  so so yang dag par rig pa dang  smon nas shes pa dang  nyon mongs pa med pa rnams kyi bshad pa  re re ni chos kyi phung po'o zhes zer ro // /

column3: gson pa rnams las gnyid log par stong pa zhes bya ba ni bstan pa yin la / / +ltag ma rnams ni bshad pa  yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#521334#521341#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9331# rab 'byor ji ltar phung po de dag phan tshun tha dad pa'i mtshan nyid du gyur pa dang  ji ltar skye mched dang  rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang  zas dang  bden pa dang  khams dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang  yang dag pa'i spong ba dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang  dbang po dang  stobs dang  byang chub kyi yan lag dang  lam gyi yan lag de dag phan tshun tha dad pa'i mtshan nyid du gyur pa de bzhin DU ZHES BYA BA 'DI man chad ni  gsum pa skyon rnam pa gsum dang bral bas ro gcig pa'i mtshan nyid rnam par BSHAD PA STON TO // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2328111#2328115#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_2079# 'phags pa'i bden pa la ji lta ba bzhin du dran ba nye bar gzhag pa dang  yang dag pa'i spong ba dang     rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang  dbang po dang  stobs dang  byang chub kyi yan lag dang  lam gyi yan lag rnams la yang de bzhin du rgya cher bshad par bgyi lags SO ZHES BYA BA LA sogs pas ni gnyis pa byang chub kyi phyogs las brtsams nas ngo bo nyid med par gsungs pas khong  du chud par bstan pa'o // /
column6: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#175292#175297#TD4035E.TXT.r_8903;TD4035E.TXT.r_8904# 'du shes dang tshor  ba 'gog pa'i bar dang  byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun te / / +dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang  yang dag pa'i spong ba dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang  dbang po dang  stobs dang  byang chub kyi yan lag dang  lam gyi yan lag rnams dang  dge sbyong  gi 'bras bu bzhi ste / /
column7: 0.0#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3093599#3093602#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_104# gzugs rgyu mtshan dang  sems rgyu mtshan dang  sems las byung ba rgyu  mtshan dang  sems dang ldan pa ma yin pa rgyu mtshan dang  'dus ma byas rgyu mtshan dang  'dus byas rgyu mtshan dang  phung po rgyu mtshan dang  skye mched rgyu mtshan dang  khams rgyu mtshan dang  rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rgyu mtshan dang  gnas dang gnas ma yin pa rgyu  mtshan dang  dbang po rgyu mtshan dang  bden pa rgyu mtshan dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rgyu mtshan dang  yang dag pa'i spong ba dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang  dbang po dang  stobs dang  byang chub kyi yan lag dang  lam gyi yan lag rgyu mtshan dang  lam rgyu    mtshan dang  chos kyi gzhi rgyu mtshan dang  zhi gnas rgyu mtshan dang  lhag mthong rgyu mtshan dang  rab tu 'dzin pa rgyu mtshan dang  btang snyoms rgyu mtshan dang  rkyen rgyu mtshan dang  ston pa rgyu mtshan dang  sa rgyu mtshan dang  chu rgyu mtshan dang  me rgyu mtshan dang  rlung  rgyu mtshan dang  nam mkha' rgyu mtshan dang  rnam par shes pa rgyu mtshan dang  'jig rten 'di rgyu mtshan dang  'jig rten pha rol rgyu mtshan dang  nyi ma rgyu mtshan dang  zla ba rgyu mtshan dang  sems can dmyal ba rgyu mtshan dang  dud 'gro dang  yi dvags dang  lha dang   mi rgyu mtshan dang  rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i rgyu mtshan dang  sum cu rtsa gsum dang  'thab bral dang  dga' ldan dang  'phrul dga' dang  gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rgyu mtshan dang  bsam gtan dang po rgyu mtshan dang  bsam gtan gnyis pa dang  gsum pa dang  bzhi pa rgyu mtshan dang  nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched rgyu mtshan dang  rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang  ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang  'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched rgyu mtshan dang  'byung ba rgyu mtshan dang  'jig pa rgyu  mtshan dang  dngos po rgyu mtshan dang  dngos po med pa rgyu mtshan dang  kun nas nyon mongs pa rgyu mtshan dang  rnam par byang ba rgyu mtshan dang  mthong ba dang  thos pa dang  bye brag phyed pa dang  rnam par shes pa dang  thos pa dang  yongs su btsal ba rgyu mtshan  dang ; /
column8: 0.012#TD4039E.TXT.r#1880486#1880490#TD4039E.TXT.r_7676;TD4039E.TXT.r_7677# byed pas sgo drug nas dge ba la brten te / / +dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang  yang dag par spong ba dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang  dbang po dang  stobs dang  byang chub kyi yan lag dang  lam gyi yan lag rnams so // /
column9: 0.013#TD4036E.TXT.r#18377#18381#TD4036E.TXT.r_2669;TD4036E.TXT.r_2670# bcom ldan 'das kyis de dang de dag tu gdul ba de dang de dag dang gdul ba'i spyod pa rnams las brtsams  nas phung po dang ldan pa'i gtam dang  skye mched dang ldan pa dang  rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang ldan pa dang  zas dang  bden pa dang  khams dang ldan pa dang  nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang de bzhin gshegs pa dang ldan pa dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang      // / +yang dag par spong ba dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang  dbang po dang  stobs dang  byang chub kyi yan lag dang  lam gyi yan lag dang ldan pa dang  mi sdug pa dang  dbugs rngub pa dang  dbugs 'byung ba dang  bslab pa dang / /
column10: 0.014#TD4035E.TXT.r#187286#187290#TD4035E.TXT.r_10654# mi dge ba'i chos rnams kyang mi sdug pa'i 'bras bu mngon par 'grub pa la de de dang 'dra ba dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang  yang dag par spong ba  rnams dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang  dbang po rnams dang  stobs rnams dang  byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang  lam gyi yan lag byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams ni byang chub thob par bya ba la bya ba bsgrub pa'i spyi'i mtshan nyid kyis spyi'i mtshan nyid rnams  so // /
column11: 0.014#TD4039E.TXT.r#1815504#1815508#TD4039E.TXT.r_20# de dang der 'dul ba la gzigs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa dang  de'i 'og tu yang dag par sdud par byed pa rnams kyis bstan pa yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa sbyar bar ci rigs par go  rims su phab ste gtam du sbyar ba dang  de bzhin du zas dang bden pa dang  khams dang tshor ba dang ldan pa dang  nyan thos dang  de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa dang ldan pa dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang  yang dag par spong ba dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa  dang  dbang po dang  stobs dang  byang chub kyi yan lag dang  lam gyi yan lag dang  dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba dran pa dang  bslab pa rnams dang  shes nas dad pa dang ldan pa dang  'khor brgyad kyi dbang du byas nas 'khor dang ldan pa'o // /
column12: 0.021#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#543707#543707#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12245# dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par spong ba dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang  dbang po dang  stobs dang  byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi yang de bzhin du bka'  STSAL ZHES BYA BA NI gnyis pa zlas sgo gzhan lnga po dag bstan pa'o // /
column13: 0.027#TD4031E.TXT.r#2960322#2960322#TD4031E.TXT.r_229# ngo tsha'i rnam par dbye ba dang  brtan pa dang  mi skyo ba dang  bstan bcos shes pa dang  'jig rten shes pa dang  rton pa dang  so  so yang dag par rig pa dang  tshogs gnyis dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang  yang dag par spong ba dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang  dbang po dang  stobs dang  byang chub kyi yan lag dang  'phags pa'i lam dang  zhi gnas dang  lhag mthong dang  thabs la  mkhas pa dang  gzungs dang  smon lam dang  ting nge 'dzin dang  chos kyi sdom dang  de'i skad cig ma dang  bdag med pa dang  ngo tsha la sogs pa'i las mdor bsdus pa bstan pa'o // /

column3: de la gang dag la gnyid mi 'byung ba gson pa'i bya ba dag ni rnam pa bzhi ste / / +gson pa dag ni brtson 'grus rtsom // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#521342#521353#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9331# rab 'byor ji ltar phung po de dag phan tshun tha dad pa'i mtshan nyid du gyur pa dang  ji ltar skye mched dang  rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang  zas dang  bden pa dang  khams dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang  yang dag pa'i spong ba dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang  dbang po dang  stobs dang  byang chub kyi yan lag dang  lam gyi yan lag de dag phan tshun tha dad pa'i mtshan nyid du gyur pa de bzhin du zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni  gsum pa skyon rnam pa gsum dang bral bas ro gcig pa'i mtshan nyid rnam par bshad pa ston to // /

column3: de las phyi mar 'bras bu dang / / +dge sbyong tshul don rnams gzhan yang // / +'di yi longs spyod bde ba 'byung // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#521352#521364#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9331;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9332# rab 'byor ji ltar phung po de dag phan tshun tha dad pa'i mtshan nyid du gyur pa dang  ji ltar skye mched dang  rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang  zas dang  bden pa dang  khams dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang  yang dag pa'i spong ba dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang  dbang po dang  stobs dang  byang chub kyi yan lag dang  lam gyi yan lag de dag phan tshun tha dad pa'i mtshan nyid du gyur pa de bzhin du zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni  gsum pa skyon rnam pa gsum dang bral bas ro gcig pa'i mtshan nyid rnam par bshad pa ston to // /

column3: de dag phyir gnyid log pa yi // / +srog  ni gsog dang 'bras med dang / / +don med pa dang de bzhin du // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#521363#521372#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9332;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9333# 'di ltar de bzhin nyid la sogs pa rgyu la sogs pa'i skyon rnam pa gsum dang bral ba'i phyir ro gcig pa nyid du 'grub pa yin no // /

column5: 5.960#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3109104#3109112#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_2442# gal te chos de dag gi de bzhin nyid don dam pa chos bdag med pa yang  mtshan nyid tha dad pa yin par gyur na ni des na de bzhin nyid don dam pa chos bdag med pa yang rgyu dang bcas pa yin zhing mtshan nyid rgyu las byung ba yin par 'gyur ro // /

column5: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#521679#521690#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9372;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9373;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9374;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9375# 'di yang don dam pa ro gcig pa'i de bzhin nyid de rtag pa dang  ther zug gi dus su / / +de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten du byung yang rung / /
column6: 0.009#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#539661#539663#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11751;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11752# ji ltar shel yongs su dag pa de nyid la yod pa'i aanda rnyil dang  mthon ka chen po dang  padma r'a ga dang  ma rgad dang gser yang dag pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid rtag pa rtag pa'i dus     // / +dang  ther zug ther zug gi dus su yongs su ma grub cing yang dag par rang gi ngo bo nyid med pa lta bur zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bzhi ba yongs su grub pa dang sbyar ba'o // /
column7: 0.012#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#546666#546668#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12612# 'di ltar chos bdag med pa don dam pa'i bden pa'i tshul ni rtag pa rtag pa'i dus dang ther zug ther zug gi dus su chos rnams kyi chos nyid du rnam par gnas pa'i phyir ni 'dus ma byas nyid du mngon par grub la / /
column8: 0.013#TD4036E.TXT.r#53537#53539#TD4036E.TXT.r_7992# 'das pa dang  ma 'ongs pa dang  da ltar byung ba'i dus rnams su yang rtag pa rtag pa'i dus dang ther zug ther zug gi dus su de ltar gnod pa mang ba dang  'og ba'i nad lta bu'i bar mang ba dang  nyes dmigs mang ba yin no zhes de ltar dus yongs su tshol  bar byed do // /
column9: 0.015#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3111208#3111210#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_2768# 'di ltar don dam pa ngo bo nyid med pa nyid chos bdag med pas rab tu phye ba ni rtag pa rtag pa'i dus dang  ther zug ther zug gi dus su rnam par gnas pa kho na yin la / /
column10: 0.015#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#537564#537566#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11495# rnam par rtog pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ces bya ba 'di dag ni rtag pa rtag pa'i dus dang  ther zug ther zug gi DUS SU ZHES BYA BA NAS / /
column11: 0.018#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#539766#539766#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11763;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11764# yang na gzhan gyi dbang la btags pa med kyang yang dag par rang gi ngo bo nyid med pa ni ma yin no zhes bstan pa'o // / +rtag pa rtag pa'i dus dang  ther zug ther zug gi DUS ZHES BYA BA NI / /
column12: 0.021#TD4036E.TXT.r#54417#54419#TD4036E.TXT.r_8115# de la gnas pa la rtag pa rtag pa'i dus dang  ther zug ther zug gi dus su sems kyi spyod pa RTOG PA DANG BCAS PA DANG  dpyod pa dang bcas pa 'byung bar 'gyur bas zhi ba bas rab tu zhi ba lta bu ma yin te / /
column13: 0.022#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3111222#3111224#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_2770;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_2771# thams cad dang bral ba yin te / / +rtag pa rtag pa'i dus dang  ther zug ther zug gi dus su chos nyid de nyid kyis rnam par gnas pa / /
column14: 0.022#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#537534#537537#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11490;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11491# chos nyid rnam par gzhag chos kyi dbyings rnam par gzhag nas kun du brtags pa des gzugs  su btags pa'i phyir rnam par rtog pa'i gzugs 'di dag ni // / +rtag pa rtag pa'i dus dang  ther zug ther zug gi dus su 'di ni de bzhin nyid do // /
column15: 0.023#TD4035E.TXT.r#143505#143506#TD4035E.TXT.r_3210;TD4035E.TXT.r_3211# 'di ltar 'di na  dge spyod ngam bram ze kha cig / / +rtag pa rtag pa'i dus dang  ther zug ther zug gi dus su / /
column16: 0.024#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#539725#539727#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11761# gzhan gyi dbang gi mtshan nyid la kun brtags pa'i mtshan nyid rtag pa rtag pa'i dus dang  ther  zug ther zug gi dus su ma grub cing yang dag par rang gi ngo bo nyid kyis yongs su grub pa'i mtshan nyid du rig par BYA'O ZHES BYA BA NI gnyis pa dpe don dang sbyar ba ste / /
column17: 0.025#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3110357#3110359#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_2637# kun brtags pa'i mtshan nyid der rtag pa rtag pa'i dus dang  ther zug ther zug gi dus su yongs su ma grub cing / /
column18: 0.025#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3110340#3110340#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_2635# shel shin tu gsal ba de nyid nor bu rin po che aan da rnyil dang  mthon ka chen po dang  padma r'a ga dang  markat dang  gser gyi mtshan nyid der rtag pa rtag pa'i dus dang  ther zug ther zug gi dus yongs su ma grub cing / /
column19: 0.025#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#546608#546609#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12607;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12608# kun nas nyon mongs pa thams cad dang mtshungs par mi ldan pa'i phyir zhes bya bas ni rgyu gsum pa las brtsams nas mdo sde rnams las gsungs pa'i gzod ma nas zhi ba dang  rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i don gnyis rnam par gzhag pa yin  par bstan to // / +rtag pa rtag pa'i dus dang  ther zug ther zug gi dus su chos rnams kyi chos nyid du rnam par gnas pa'i phyir 'dus ma byas pa'o // /
column20: 0.027#TD4043E.TXT.r#378498#378498#TD4043E.TXT.r_3017# 'di lar 'di na dge sbyong ngam bram ze kha cig rtag pa'i dus dang ther zug ther zug gi dus su rgyu la 'bras bu yod pa kho na zhes de ltar lta zhing de skad smra ba dag yod DE ZHES BYA BA LA / /

column3: de la rtag pa ni mi rtag pa nyid med pa'i  phyir ro // / +brtan pa ni skad cig mar 'jig pa med pa'i phyir te dus gzhan du gnas pa nyid kyis so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#521656#521668#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9370;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9371# rtag pa rtag pa'i dus dang  ther zug ther zug gi dus su de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten du byung yang rung 'jig rten du ma byung yang rung / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#267214#267217#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6694;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6695;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6696# de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'jig rten du byung yang rung / / +'jig rten du ma byung yang rung ste / /
column6: 0.015#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#267162#267165#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6687;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6688;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6689# de bzhin gshegs pa lnga 'jig rten du byung yang rung / / +'jig rten du ma byung yang rung ste / /

column3: ther zug ni rgyud 'jig pa med pa'i phyir ro // / +mi 'gyur ba'i chos can ni 'gyur ba med pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#521669#521678#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9371;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9372;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9373# chos rnams kyi chos nyid dang  chos kyi dbyings rnam par gzhag pa rnam par gnas pa ni yod pa kho na'o zhes bya ba ni  gnyis pa yang rigs pas bsgrub pa yin te / /

column3: yang dag par de bzhin du gnas par 'gyur ba zhes bya ba ni ji ltar 'dod  pa ste / / +rnam pa snga ma mi srid na phyi ma 'dri ba yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#267214#267217#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6694;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6695;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6696# de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'jig rten du byung yang rung / / +'jig rten du ma byung yang rung ste / /

column3: rnam grangs gzhan yang skad cig mar 'jig pa la sogs pa med pa'i phyir yang brtan pa la sogs par rtag pa nyid 'dri bar byed pa yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#521689#521702#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9374;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9375;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9376;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9377# 'jig rten du ma byung yang rung / / +chos thams cad kyi chos nyid ni chos kyi dbyings la rnam par gnas  shing / /
column5: 0.024#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#497997#497997#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_6407;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_6408# rnam pa sna tshogs kyi mos pa can dang  tha dad pa'i mos pa can rnam par  'gyur ba'i mos pa can du gyur pa'o // / +tshig nges par 'grel pa'i mdo las ni 'dzin pa sna tshogs bskyed ces 'byung ngo // /

column3: rnam grangs gzhan yang rtag pa ni ther zug gi don gyis yin la / / +brtan     // / +pa ni mi 'gyur ba'i don gyis yin te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#521701#521710#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9377;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9378# tshig nges par 'grel pa'i mdo las ni ther zug dang  rtag pa zhes bya ba nas / /

column3: tshig gnyis ni tshig gnyis kyis rnam par bshad pa yin par yang 'og nas bstan par bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#521711#521722#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9378;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9379;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9380;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9381# chos kyi dbyings dang  chos gnas pa nyid ces bya ba'i bar du 'byung ste / / +slob dpon yang dag    bden pa'i 'grel pa las / /

column3: 'phags pa nyan thos shes nas dad pa gzhi dag dang ldan pa ni 'tsho ba dag gis dbul pa ma yin zhes bya ba ni mdo sde'i dum  bu'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#521721#521732#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9380;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9381# lam gyi mdun rol gyi gnas skabs na yang / / +snga nas rang bzhin gyis yod pa'i phyir ther zug ces bya ste sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byung nas gdod yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: de la 'phags pa'i nor bdun dang ldan pa'i phyir 'tsho ba dag gis dbul ba ma yin no // / +'tsho ba med pa'i 'jigs pa spangs pa'i phyir bkren pa ma yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#521733#521744#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9381;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9382# snga nas rang bzhin gyis yod pa'i phyir ther zug ces bya ste sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byung nas gdod yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: log pa'i 'tsho ba spangs pa'i phyir phongs pa ma yin no // / +nor dang sems dang 'tsho ba ngan pa dang ldan  pa'i phyir ni dbul ba dang  bkren pa dang  phongs pa nyid du rig par bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#521745#521760#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9382;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9383;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9384# lam gyi bar dang  tha ma'i gnas skabs na yang don gyi tshul  'di 'gag pa med pa'i phyir rtag pa zhes brjod de / /

column3: gal te ting nge 'dzin 'du byed pas zin zhing zhes bya ba ni mdo sde'i dum bu'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#521759#521768#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9383;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9384;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9385# sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byung ba'i 'og tu yang don gyi tshul la zad pa med pa'i phyir ro // / +chos nyid ces bya ba ni rang bzhin gyis sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid la gnas pa ste / /

column3: 'du byed pas zin pa ni yun ring po nas mngon sum 'gyur ba'i phyir ro // / +chu bzhin du 'tshor ba ni myur bar 'bral  ba'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#521769#521781#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9384;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9385;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9386;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9387# chos nyid ces bya ba ni rang bzhin gyis sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid la gnas pa ste / / +lam gyi mdun rol gyi gnas skabs na  byang chub kyi sems kyi gzhi byed pas / /

column3: chos nyid kyis zin pa ni rtag tu bag yod pas bsrung bar bya ba nyid kyi phyir ro // / +zhi ba ma yin pa ni de'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs sa 'og ma pa'i nyon mongs pa shin tu ma thul ba'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#521782#521797#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9386;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9387;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9388;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9389# sems can rnams 'di'i dbang gis sems bskyed PA THOB PA'I PHYIR RO // / +chos kyi dbyings zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid 'dren cing 'byung bar byed pa ste / /

column3: gya nom pa ma yin pa ni rang gi sa pa'i nyon mongs pa dang 'dres pa nyid kyi  phyir ro // / +lam bag yangs su gyur pa thob pa ma yin pa ni shin tu ma goms pa nyid kyi rgyus rang gi ngang gis mi 'byung ba'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#521798#521805#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9388;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9389;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9390# lam gyi gnas skabs bar ma rnams su dbyings ni spyod pa rnams kyi  gzhi byed de / / +spyod pa tshad med pa rnams 'dren cing 'byung bar byed pa'i phyir ro // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#521806#521815#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9390;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9391# chos gnas pa nyid ces bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyi sa'i gnas skabs SU PHYIN PA THOB PA ste / /

column3: sems rgyud gcig tu gyur pa rtogs pa ma yin pa ni gyo ba dang bcas pa nyid kyi phyir ro // / +de la rtag tu bag yod pas bsrung bar bya ba nyid ni ma  zhi ba la sogs pa'i rgyus rig par bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#521816#521831#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9391;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9392# lam gyi tha ma'i gnas skabs mya ngan las 'das par phyin nas chos kyi ngo bo nyid rtag par gnas  pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ngo // /

column3: dkar po'i phyogs ni de las bzlog par rig par bya'o // / +'dir smras pa / / +myur du mngon du 'gyur ba dang / / +myur du 'bral bar mi 'gyur dang / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#521832#521843#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9392;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9393;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9394;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9395# mdo 'di las rtag pa rtag pa'i dus dang  ther zug gi dus su zhes gsungs pa ni ro gcig pa'i de bzhin nyid gzod ma nas sngar yang gcig pa nyid ma yin pas / /

column3: rtag tu bag yod bsrung bya min // / +de yi mi mthun phyogs bcom phyir // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#521840#521852#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9394;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9395;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9396;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9397# phyis kyang gcig pa nyid ma yin  pas / / +ther zug ther zug gi dus zhes bya ste / /
column5: 0.026#TD4036E.TXT.r#53538#53538#TD4036E.TXT.r_7992# 'das pa dang  ma 'ongs pa dang  da ltar byung ba'i dus rnams su yang rtag pa rtag pa'i dus dang ther zug ther zug gi dus su de ltar gnod pa mang ba dang  'og ba'i nad lta bu'i bar mang ba dang  nyes dmigs mang ba yin no zhes de ltar dus yongs su tshol  bar byed do // /

column3: rang gi nyon  mongs ma 'dres phyir // / +shin tu goms 'bad med 'byung phyir // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#521850#521862#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9396;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9397;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9398# dus 'di lta bu rnams su chos rnams kyi chos nyid chos kyi dbyings la rnam par gnas pa'o // / +chos kyi chos nyid chos kyi dbyings la rnam par gnas pa 'di yang don rnam pa gnyis yod de // /

column3: 'du byed zin la sogs pa min // / +rgyud gcig yin te mi gyo'i phyir // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#521863#521871#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9398;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9399;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9400# dpe gzhan gnyis dang sbyar na rnam pa  gsum du dbye ste / /

column3: lung las ni / / +myur bar mngon gyur nyid kyi phyir // / +mi nyams phyir dang rtag bsrung phyir // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#521870#521882#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9399;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9400;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9401# chos rnams kyi chos nyid dang  chos kyi dbyings rnam par gzhag pa dang  gnas pa nyid rnam par gzhag pa'o // /
column5: 2.980#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#451980#451981#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_235;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_236# zhes smra ba'i mi rigs so zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon ngo bo nyid med  kyis byas pa'i theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa las ni mdo sde rnams kyi tshig dag gis ngo bo nyid byed do zhes zer ba 'di yang rigs pa ma yin no zhes sun 'byin te / /
column6: 2.980#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#523258#523260#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9598# gzhan yang slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis byas pa'i theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa las rnam pa lngar bstan pa  yin te de'i phyir 'grel pa de nyid las 'di lta ste / /
column7: 2.980#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2323865#2323866#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_1580# sems can dmyal bar ltung bar mi 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa dang  gzhan yang slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis  byas pa'i theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column8: 2.980#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2396710#2396712#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10167;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10168# gnas bcu pa'i bshad pa las dge ba'i rtsa ba rim par gnas pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni sa zhes bya'o zhes  bshad do // / +slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis byas pa'i theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column9: 0.020#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#514824#514826#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8491;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8492# rgya cher rnam par 'byed pa ni bstan bcos bye brag tu bshad pa chen po las bshad pa bzhin no // / +slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis theg pa chen po  bsdus pa'i 'grel pa byas pa las / /
column10: 0.021#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227736#227737#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1766;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1767# rgya cher bshad pa'i bar du bstan pa'o // / +theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis  byas pa dang  lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las kyang / /
column11: 0.023#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2344365#2344365#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3894;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3895# sems shin tu sbyangs pa ni bcu gcig dge ba las shin tu sbyangs pa'i grangs su gtogs pa'o // / +bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa ngo bo nyid med kyis byas pa las lus yang zhing zo mdog bde ba'i ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de ni shin tu  sbyangs pa'i mtshan nyid do zhes bshad de / /
column12: 0.024#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2372839#2372840#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7388# de'i phyir slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column13: 0.024#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#453094#453094#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_394# slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa byas pa las / /
column14: 0.024#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#533710#533710#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10965# theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis byas pa las / /
column15: 0.024#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2340795#2340795#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3484# gzhan yang bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa  slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis byas pa las zhi gnas ni 'di lta ste / /
column16: 0.024#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2341360#2341360#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3537# slob dpon ngo bo nyid med  kyis byas pa theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa las ni don rnam pa bdun gyis theg pa chen po zhes ston to // /
column17: 0.024#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2346013#2346013#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4070# slob dpon ngo bo nyid med    kyis theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa byas pa las / /
column18: 0.024#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2347820#2347820#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4243# gzhan yang slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis byas pa theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column19: 0.024#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2366105#2366105#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6500# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis byas pa las / /
column20: 0.024#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2397774#2397774#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10296# theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis byas pa las ni / /
column21: 0.024#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222271#222271#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1062# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis byas pa las ni bsags pa'i don gyi phyir tshogs zhes bya'o zhes bshad de / /
column22: 0.024#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222388#222388#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1082# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis byas pa las ji skad du / /
column23: 0.024#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222721#222721#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1137# de'i phyir theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis byas pa las / /
column24: 0.024#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#247528#247528#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4267# 'dir theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i  'grel pa slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis byas pa las / /
column25: 0.024#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#263325#263325#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6217# yang so so nas bshad pa mi mthun pas bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis byas pa las / /
column26: 0.024#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#269929#269929#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7051# gzhan yang bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i  'grel pa slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis byas pa las / /

column3: nyon mongs min phyir dge nyid phyir // / +ngang gis    'byung phyir yongs rdzogs phyir // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#521881#521893#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9400;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9401;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9402;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9403# slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis byas pa'i theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa las ni gnyis su phye nas bstan te / /

column3: go rims bzhin du 'du byed bas ma zin pa nas rgyud gcig tu gyur pa rtogs pa'i bar du yin no zhes 'byung ngo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#521894#521903#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9403;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9404;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9405;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9406# de la rnam pa lngar gzhag pa zhes bya ba ni ming gi rnam grangs rnam par gzhag pa'o // /

column3: de de ltar sems mnyam par gzhan pa yongs su dag pa dang zhes bya ba ni mdo sde'i dum bu'o // / +de la sems yongs su dag pa  ni yongs su byang ba'i don gyis te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#521904#521915#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9404;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9405;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9406;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9407;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9408# bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las ni rnam pa gsum du phye nas bstan te / / +'di lta ste / / +chos nyid dang  chos kyi dbyings dang  chos gnas pa'o // /

column3: de'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs sa 'og ma pa'i dri ma spangs pa'i phyir ro // / +nyon mongs pa med pa ni nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bral ba'i don gyis te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#521914#521924#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9408# de'i phyir rnam 'byor spyod pa'i sa las rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba de dag thog ma med pa'i dus nas grags pa'i rigs pa gang yin pa  de ni chos nyid do // /
column5: 0.028#TD4041E.TXT.r#1277081#1277081#TD4041E.TXT.r_1253# gnag cing rnam par smin pa gnag pa rnams dang dkar zhing rnam par smin pa dkar ba rnams so sor dbye ba dang bcas pa  rnams ni dkar ba dang  gnag pa gang dag rnam par smin pa dkar ba dang gnag pa de dag thams cad ni rgyu dang rkyen las byung ba'i phyir na rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zhes bya bar de dag mi shes pa'o // /
column6: 0.029#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#267236#267236#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6700# thog ma med pa'i dus nas grags pa gang yin pa de ni chos nyid ces bya'o // /

column3: rang gi sa pa'i nyon mongs pas nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i phyir ro // / +drang por gyur pa  ni las su rung ba'i don gyis te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#521925#521933#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9408;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9409;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9410# de'i phyir rnam 'byor spyod pa'i sa las rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba de dag thog ma med pa'i dus nas grags pa'i rigs pa gang yin pa  de ni chos nyid do // / +ji ltar grags pa de phyin ci ma log pa'i rigs pa'i tshig dang yi ge rnams kyi rnam par gzhag pa de ni chos gnas pa'o // /
column5: 0.017#TD4035E.TXT.r#161856#161857#TD4035E.TXT.r_6468;TD4035E.TXT.r_6469# thog ma med pa'i dus nas grags pa gang  yin pa de ni chos nyid do / / +ji ltar grags pa de rigs pa'i tshig dang yi ge rnams kyis rnam par gzhag pa ni chos gnas pa'o // /

column3: 'bad pa med par 'byung ba nyid kyi phyir ro // / +gnas pa ni mi gyo ba thob pa'i don gyis te / / +bsam gtan bzhi pa na gyo ba med pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#521932#521944#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9409;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9410;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9411;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9412# ji ltar grags pa de phyin ci ma log pa'i rigs pa'i tshig dang yi ge rnams kyi rnam par gzhag pa de ni chos gnas pa'o // / +chos gnas ba de'i rgyu chos nyid de yin pas na // /

column3: de ltar ting nge 'dzin de ni dge ba nyid dang  ji ltar na de dag dge ba nyid dang dbang du bya ba nyid dang   yongs su grub pa nyid rnam grangs kyi mtshan nyid dang bcas pa yongs su bstan pa yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#521943#521964#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9411;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9412;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9413;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9414# de'i phyir de la dbyings zhes bya ba 'byung ste / / +bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod  pa'i sa las ni rten cang 'brel bar 'byung ba de smos pas / /

column3: res 'ga' tshig gnyis ni gzhan gnyis kyi rnam par 'chad de / / +dper na sems mgu ba dang sems nyams bde ba zhes bya ba ni sems dga' ba dang  sems sgrib pa med pa zhes bya ba  'dis so zhes 'byung ba lta bu'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#521964#521975#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9414;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9415;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9416# yang na bstan bcos de las rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba de dag la tshig 'di gsum yod par bstan pa yin gyi / /

column3: res 'ga' tshig gcig gzhan gcig gis yin te / / +dper na yang dag phul gyi chos bstan pa kun tu shes par skal ba yod cing nus pa yin zhes 'byung ba lta bu ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#521976#521990#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9415;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9416;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9417;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9418# don gyi ngo bo nyid bstan pa ni MA YIN TE / / +'on kyang  tshig gsum bshad pa'i don la bye brag tu gyur pa ni med do // /
column5: 0.015#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#520340#520348#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9188# de'i phyir rab 'byor rigs pa des na don dam pa'i bden pa ni thams cad ro gcig pa'i mtshan nyid yin par rig par bya'o zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa don dam pa'i bden pa ro gcig pa yin par bshad pa'i mjug bsdu ba ste / /

column11: 0.027#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2402881#2402883#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10941# rigs kyi bu de ltar yan lag bcu gcig po de dag gis sa rnams ma lus par bsdus par rig par bya'o zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa  spyi'i mjug bsdu ba yin par rig par bya'o //// /
column12: 0.029#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2368944#2368944#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6891# rigs kyi bu don rnam pa bzhi po de dag gis kyang don thams cad bsdus par rig par bya'o zhes bya ba ni gsum pa mjug bsdu ba yin par rig par bya'o // /

column3: nyon mongs med sgrib med 'byung phyir // / +gyo ba med phyir gnyis pos ni // /

column3: yongs dag la sogs rig par bya'o // / +gnyis dang gnyis kyi ting 'dzin gyis // /

column3: dge ba nyid dang de ji lta // / +dbang bya nyid dang grub pa nyid // / +mtshan  nyid bcas par rab tu bstan // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#522023#522038#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9422;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9423;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9424;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9425# thams cad du ro gcig pa'i mtshan  nyid do zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa dpes bstan pa'o // / +rnam pa sna tshogs rnam pa gcig pa ma yin zhes bya ba ni gzugs kyi phung po zhes bya ba yang rnam pa gsum ste / /

column3: rnam grangs gzhan yang yongs su dag pa ni nyon mongs pa med pa dang  nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bral ba nyid kyis te / / +go rims bzhin du rnyed pa dang bkur sti dang tshigs su bcad pa dang ldan pa'i 'dod pa rgyu bdag dang  sred pa dang  lta ba     // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#522039#522046#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9425# gnyis pa ni bstan bcos yod pa la thogs pa dang bcas pa dang  bstan du med pa la thogs pa dang bcas pa dang  bstan du yang med la thogs pa dang bcas pa lta ba gsum bye brag tu gyur pa'i mtshan nyid dang  gsum pa ni rnam par 'gyur zhang 'jig pa 'di lta  ste / /

column3: dang  nga rgyal dang  the tshom gyi nye pa'i nyon mongs pa dag dang bral ba'i phyir ro // / +yongs su byang ba ni drang por gyur pa la sogs pa nyid kyis te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#522047#522064#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9425;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9426# gnyis pa ni bstan bcos yod pa la thogs pa dang bcas pa dang  bstan du med pa la thogs pa dang bcas pa dang  bstan du yang med la thogs pa dang bcas pa lta ba gsum bye brag tu gyur pa'i mtshan nyid dang  gsum pa ni rnam par 'gyur zhang 'jig pa 'di lta  ste / /

column3: de la drang por gyur pa ni 'bad pa med par 'byung ba nyid kyis shin tu thul pa'i phyir ro // / +las su rung ba  ni mngon par shes pa bsgrub par rung ba nyid kyi phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#522055#522069#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9425;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9426;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9427# gnyis pa ni bstan bcos yod pa la thogs pa dang bcas pa dang  bstan du med pa la thogs pa dang bcas pa dang  bstan du yang med la thogs pa dang bcas pa lta ba gsum bye brag tu gyur pa'i mtshan nyid dang  gsum pa ni rnam par 'gyur zhang 'jig pa 'di lta  ste / / +snga ma'i rnam pa gnyis po de dag rnam par 'gyur zhing 'jig pa dang bcas pas rnam par 'gyur zhing 'jig pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya ste / /
column5: 0.026#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#522116#522116#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9432# tshig nges par 'grel pa'i mdo las ni bye brag med pa'i phyir rnam par 'gyur zhing 'jig pa yang med pas 'gyur ba med pa zhes bya ste / /

column3: gnas pa ni yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ba nyid kyi phyir ro // / +mi gyo ba thob pa ni bsam gtan bzhi pa ni gyo ba thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#522068#522080#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9426;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9427;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9428# snga ma'i rnam pa gnyis po de dag rnam par 'gyur zhing 'jig pa dang bcas pas rnam par 'gyur zhing 'jig pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya ste / / +rnam pa 'di gsum dang ldan pa'i phyir rnam pa sna tshogs rnam pa gcig ma yin pa zhes gsungs so // /

column3: 'dri yang smras pa / / +gnyis kyis yang dag yin la tshig / / +gzhan dag gis ni yongs byang nyid // / +rnyed 'dod la sogs sred la sogs // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#522079#522091#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9427;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9428;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9429;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9430# rnam pa 'di gsum dang ldan pa'i phyir rnam pa sna tshogs rnam pa gcig ma yin pa zhes gsungs so // / +yang na tha dad pa'i  mtshan nyid ces kyang bya'o // /

column3: bral phyir shin tu thul ba'i phyir // / +mngon shes yon tan rang nyid phyir // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#522092#522102#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9429;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9430;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9431# nam mkha' la rgyur byas pa'i mtshan ma gzhan med pa'i phyir mtshan ma med pa zhes bya'o // / +bstan du yod la thogs pa dang bcas pa'i gzugs la sogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi bye brag med pa'i phyir rnam par rtog pa med pa zhes bya ste / /

column3: nyams med phyir gyo zad pa'i phyir // / +don grub dag gis go rims bzhin // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#522101#522111#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9430;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9431;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9432# bstan du yod la thogs pa dang bcas pa'i gzugs la sogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi bye brag med pa'i phyir rnam par rtog pa med pa zhes bya ste / / +rnam par  rtog pa ni bye brag gi ming gi rnam grangs so // /
column5: 0.024#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#487621#487621#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_5026;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_5027# bla na med pa'i chos kyi rgyal po la brnyas pa dang  mkhyen  pa bzlog tu mi rung ba'i phyir ro // / +tshig nges par 'grel pa'i mdo las ni chos thams cad gnyis su med pa zhes bya na chos thams cad gnyis su med pa zhes bya ba'i don ji lta bu zhe na zhes 'byung ste / /
column6: 0.028#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#467451#467451#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_2373;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_2374# byang chub sems dpa' yang dag 'phags la bshad pa 'byung ba'i phyir ro // / +gzhan yang tshig nges par 'grel pa'i mdo las ni gleng gzhi dang yang dag pa'i gzhung nyid dang  bstan pa gnas pa'i phyogs rdzogs par 'byung la / /

column3: nyon mongs med sogs nyid  shes bya / / +rnam grangs gzhan yang yongs su dag pa ni de'i mi mthun ba'i phyogs su 'og ma pa spangs pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#522112#522125#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9432;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9433# tshig nges par 'grel pa'i mdo las ni bye brag med pa'i phyir rnam par 'gyur zhing 'jig pa yang med pas 'gyur ba med pa zhes bya ste / /

column3: yongs su byang ba ni de thag ring du byas pa'i phyir ro // / +nyon mongs pa med pa ni rang gis pa'i phyogs nyon mongs pa dang ma 'dres pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: nye ba'i nyon  mongs pa dang bral ba ni de kun tu rgyu ba thag ring du byas pa'i phyir ro // / +drang por gyur pa ni 'bad pa med pa dang ji ltar 'dod par 'byung ba'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#522135#522146#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9434;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9435# de bzhin du ngo bo nyid tha dad pa dang  mtshan nyid tha dad pa'i chos thams cad la don dam pa'i bden pa thams cad du ro gcig pa'i mtshan nyid du gyur pa yang de bzhin du rig par bya'o zhes bya ba ni gsum pa dpe dang don du sbyar ba'o // /

column3: las su rung ba ni mngon par shes pa rung pa nyid kyi phyir ro // / +gnas pa ni mi nyams pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#522147#522164#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9434;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9435;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9436;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9437# de bzhin du ngo bo nyid tha dad pa dang  mtshan nyid tha dad pa'i chos thams cad la don dam pa'i bden pa thams cad du ro gcig pa'i mtshan nyid du gyur pa yang de bzhin du rig par bya'o zhes bya ba ni gsum pa dpe dang don du sbyar ba'o // / +de la ngo bo nyid dang  mtshan nyid  tha dad pa zhes bya ba ni rang gi mtshan nyid bye brag tu GYUR PA'I PHYIR RO // /

column3: mi gyo ba thob  pa ni snga ma bzhin no // / +ting nge 'dzin dang gnas dang ldan // / +zhes bya ba ni sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa ste / /
column4: 0.021#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2387683#2387683#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9106;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9107# tha dad pa med pa'i phyir ro // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las rnam pa thams cad du chos bstan pa la dbang du ma gyur pa zhes gsungs pa dang  mdo 'di nyid las rnam pa thams cad du tshig la mkhas pa la dbang du ma gyur pa'i sgrib pa zhes  gsungs pa la yang bshad pa rnam pa gnyis yod de / /
column5: 0.024#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#548087#548088#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12745;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12746# mdo sde'i tshig dang rjes su mthun pa'i phyir ro // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las kyang 'di dang mthun par 'byung ngo // /

column8: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2373966#2373966#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7506;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7507# 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis chu rnyog ma'i snod kyi dpe dang  me long yongs su ma dag pa'i dpe dang  mtshe'u 'khrugs pa'i dpe rnam pa gsum po de dag gis rang gi bzhin gyi gzugs brnyan gyi  mtshan ma so sor brtag par mi nus par gsungs pa'i phyir ro // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni / /
column9: 0.026#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#510350#510350#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_7951;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_7952# tha dad pa'i bdag nyid med pa'i phyir ro // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las pi pi ling dang tshab nyid ces 'byung ngo // /

column13: 0.020#TD4019E.TXT.r#2471112#2471113#TD4019E.TXT.r_8364;TD4019E.TXT.r_8365# de bzhin du tshor ba ni nyams su myong ba'i mtshan  nyid dang  'du shes ni mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i mtshan nyid dang  'du byed ni sems mngon par 'du byed pa'i mtshan nyid dang  rnam par shes pa ni dmigs pa rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid de / / +de ni mtshan nyid med par de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas  so zhes pa'i bar du gsungs pa lta bu'o // /
column14: 0.024#TD4047E.TXT.r#1181471#1181471#TD4047E.TXT.r_8687# sa bcu la legs par zhugs par gyur pa'i rtogs pa'i khyad par thob par gyur pa'i chos bdag med pa'i mtshan nyid  can shin tu rnam par dag pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur ro // /
column15: 0.025#TD4013E.TXT.r#613425#613425#TD4013E.TXT.r_417# de ltar na bsod nams kyi tshogs yongs su gzung ba'i phyir thabs kyi khyad par pha rol mi dpogs pa byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun du bzang po'i spyod pas  'thob par byed pa'i mtshan nyid kyi 'di ni dad pas bskyed pa'i sems kyis thos pa'i tshe yang sems kyi rgyun rnam par dag par byed na rtag tu byed pas nyin gcig bzhin du dus gsum du bsgrub pas lta smos kyang ci dgos / /

column17: 0.026#TD4053E.TXT.r#2970760#2970760#TD4053E.TXT.r_858# rgyu mthun pa'i rgyu las byung ba'i chos ni sangs rgyas la sogs pas thugs su chud pa'i rgyu las byung ba'i brtan par rig par bya'o // /
