column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#526555#526564#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10049;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10050# de la lus dang  lus can dang  za ba po'i rnam par rig pa gang yin pa dang  des nye bar spyad par bya ba'i rnam par rig pa gang yin pa dang  de la nye bar spyad par bya ba'i rnam par rig pa gang yin pa dang  dus kyi  rnam par rig pa dang  grangs kyi rnam par rig pa dang  yul gyi rnam par rig pa gang yin pa dang  tha snyad kyi rnam par rig pa gang yin pa de ni mngon par brjod pa'i bag chags kyi sa bon las byung ba'i phyir ro // / +bdag dang gzhan gyi rnam par rig pa'i bye  brag gang yin pa de ni bdag tu lta ba'i bag chags kyi sa bon las byung ba'i phyir ro // /
column5: 1.788#TD4051E.TXT.r#1242842#1242845#TD4051E.TXT.r_1447# de la lus dang lus can dang  zhes bya ba nas tha snyad kyi rnam par rig pa gang yin pa de ni mngon par brjod pa'i bag chags kyi sa bon las  byung ba'i phyir ro // /
column6: 2.384#TD4048E.TXT.r#1687705#1687706#TD4048E.TXT.r_545# bdag dang gzhan gyi bye brag gi rnam par rig pa gang yin pa de ni bdag tu lta ba'i bag chags kyi sa bon las byung ba'i phyir ro // /
column7: 0.029#TD4048E.TXT.r#1687697#1687697#TD4048E.TXT.r_544# de la lus dang lus can dang zab po'i rnam par rig pa  gang yin pa dang  des nye bar spyad par bya ba'i rnam par rig pa gang yin pa dang  de la nye bar spyod pa'i rnam par rig pa gang yin pa dang  dus dang  grangs dang  yul dang  tha snyad kyi rnam par rig pa gang yin pa de ni mngon pa brjod pa'i bag chags kyi sa bon las byung  ba'i phyir ro // /

column3: de la dge slong gis ni phyir rgol ba'i sbyor ba byung na / / +de pham par 'dun pa spangs shing phyir rgol ba de nyid la yang zhe sdang spangs la gtam bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#526565#526581#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10050;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10051;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10052# bdag dang gzhan gyi rnam par rig pa'i bye  brag gang yin pa de ni bdag tu lta ba'i bag chags kyi sa bon las byung ba'i phyir ro // /
column5: 0.0#TD4048E.TXT.r#1687707#1687718#TD4048E.TXT.r_545;TD4048E.TXT.r_546;TD4048E.TXT.r_547# bdag dang gzhan gyi bye brag gi rnam par rig pa gang yin pa de ni bdag tu lta ba'i bag chags kyi sa bon las byung ba'i phyir ro // /
column6: 0.009#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#252599#252602#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4806;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4807;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4808# tshul khrims yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa 'ang de bzhin du mya ngan las     // / +'das par 'gro ba'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ste / / +rgya cher de nyid las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o // /
column7: 0.016#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#536649#536654#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11358;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11359# bdag dang gzhan gyi bye brag gi  rnam par rig pa gang yin pa de ni bdag tu lta ba'i bag chags kyis bon las byung ba'o // / +bde 'gro dang  ngan 'gro dang  'chi 'pho dang skye ba'i rnam par rig pa gang yin pa de dag ni srid pa'i yan lag gi bag chags kyi sa bon las byung ba'o zhes bya ba  nas / /
column8: 0.020#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#260431#260434#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5813;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5814;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5815# gong ma las bzlog pa las rig par bya'o zhes 'byung ste / / +rgya cher de  nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // /

column3: ma byung ba dang byung ba'i skur    pa gnyis kyis bkur sti ma yin pa'i sbyor ba byung na nga rgyal dang 'chab ba spangs nas so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#526580#526600#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10051;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10052;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10053;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10054# bde 'gro dang ngan 'gro dang 'chi 'pho dang skye ba'i rnam par rig pa gang yin pa de ni srid pa'i yan lag gi bag chags kyi sa bon las byung ba'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ste / / +rgya cher de  nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // /
column5: 0.017#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#252599#252599#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4806;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4807;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4808# tshul khrims yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa 'ang de bzhin du mya ngan las     // / +'das par 'gro ba'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ste / / +rgya cher de nyid las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o // /

column3: tshig rtsub po'i sbyor ba byung na kun nas mnar sems te sems 'khrugs pa dang  mi bzod pa ste slar gshe ba dang  khro ba la sogs pa 'dod pa nyid dang  yid mi ches pa ste  rang gi sems kyi yang dag bar sdom pa ma nges pa yang spangs pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#526600#526610#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10054;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10055# de'i phyir bstan bcos rnam par rig pa gang yin pa dang  dus kyi  rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las / /

column3: bar na gnas pa dang lhan gcig gtam la 'jug pa na sems kyi tha ba dang 'chab pa'i gzhi ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#526611#526620#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10055# mngon par brjod pa gnyis kyis yongs su bsgos pa las grub pa'i sa bon gang yin pa de ni 'dus byas kyi chos rnams kyi so so'i rgyu rkyen byed do zhes bya ba dang  gzhan yang de nyid las / /

column3: 'di lta ste / / +slob dpon gyi dpe mkhyud las byung ba bar chad dang bcas par bstan pa'i bsam pa dang   dad pa nas bkur sti byed 'dod pa la yang bor te'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#526621#526633#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10055;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10056;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10057# mngon par brjod pa gnyis kyis yongs su bsgos pa las grub pa'i sa bon gang yin pa de ni 'dus byas kyi chos rnams kyi so so'i rgyu rkyen byed do zhes bya ba dang  gzhan yang de nyid las / / +bdag tu 'dzin pa  dang srid pa'i yan lag gi bag chags ni 'bras bu bye brag tha dad pa rnams la bdag po'i rkyen byed par rig par bya'o zhes 'byung ste / /

column3: lta ba'i yongs su gdung ba ste rang gi lta ba mchog tu 'dzin pa yang bsal nas so // / +'di ni de'i sems yongs su dag pa yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#526634#526642#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10056;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10057;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10058# bdag tu 'dzin pa  dang srid pa'i yan lag gi bag chags ni 'bras bu bye brag tha dad pa rnams la bdag po'i rkyen byed par rig par bya'o zhes 'byung ste / / +rgya cher rnam par 'byed pa ni rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa'i bstan bcos bam po brgyad pa'i 'grel pa las bstan pa     // /

column3: ha cang brjod pa yang mi bya zhing 'gal bar yang mi bya la / / +tshig rtsub po smra bar yang mi  bya ste zhes bya ba ni phyir rgol ba dang lhan cig gtam la zhugs pa na nyes rtsom gyi tshig dang  mi rigs pa dang ldan pa'i tshig dang  kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa'i tshig las zlog par byed pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#526643#526651#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10057;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10058;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10059;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10060# rgya cher rnam par 'byed pa ni rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa'i bstan bcos bam po brgyad pa'i 'grel pa las bstan pa     // / +bzhin no // / +sa bon pa'i rnam par shes pa de nyid bstan pa la rnam pa gnyis su dbye ste / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#526651#526669#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10059;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10060# sa bon pa'i rnam par shes pa de nyid bstan pa la rnam pa gnyis su dbye ste / / +sems can gyi phung po las brtsams nas lus kyi yan lag 'byung ba bstan pa dang  der zhes bya ba man chad kyis sa bon pa'i rnam par shes pa las brtsams  nas skye ba lan pa'i bye brag rgya cher rnam par 'byed pa'o // /
column6: 0.028#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#527504#527504#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10179;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10180# der dang po kho na sa bon thams cad pa'i sems dang  rnam par shes pa rnam par smin cing phan tshun 'dus pa rgyas shing 'phel ba dang     yangs par gyur nas zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni / / +gnyis pa sa bon rnam par shes pa las brtsams nas skye ba len pa'i bye brag rgya cher rnam par 'byed do // /

column3: bar na gnas pa dang lhan cig gtam la 'jug pa na the tshom can dang   bye brag mi phyed pa las brtsams nas don dang chos bstan par bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#526670#526684#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10060;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10061;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10062;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10063# sems can gyi PHUNG PO LAS BRTSAMS NAS LUS kyi yan lag 'byung ba bstan pa dang  der zhes bya ba man chad kyis sa bon pa'i rnam par shes pa las brtsams  nas skye ba lan pa'i bye brag rgya cher rnam par 'byed pa'o // /

column3: bye brag phyed pa la ni kun du shes par bya ba nas yongs su mgu bar bya ba'i bar du drug bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#526683#526695#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10062;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10063;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10064# de la 'gro ba drug ces bya ba ni 'og nas mdo las ji skad du / / +sems can dmyal ba dang  dud 'gro dang  yi dags dang  lha dang  lha ma yin dang  mi zhes gsungs  pa lta bu'o // /

column3: 'di ni de'i dag yongs su dag pa yin no // / +de la bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gnas la sems pa la ni  kun du shes bar bya / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#526693#526704#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10063;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10064;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10065# sems can dmyal ba dang  dud 'gro dang  yi dags dang  lha dang  lha ma yin dang  mi zhes gsungs  pa lta bu'o // / +'gro ba drug po 'di yang so so'i gzhung gis bshad pa mi mthun pas thams cad yod par smra ba dag ni 'gro ba lnga kho na'o zhes rnam par 'jog ste / /

column3: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gnas la the tshom zos pa la ni yang dag par shes par bya / / +rtogs par bya ba'i phyir bsgom pa la ni nges par sems su gzhug par bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#526705#526719#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10064;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10065;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10066;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10067# 'gro ba drug po 'di yang so so'i gzhung gis bshad pa mi mthun pas thams cad yod par smra ba dag ni 'gro ba lnga kho na'o zhes rnam par 'jog ste / / +de'i phyir bstan bcos bye brag tu bshad pa chen po las / /
column5: 0.029#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2338854#2338854#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3254;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3255# phan yon rnam pa  'di gnyis kyang bstan pa rnams las so so nas bshad pa mi mthun pas bstan bcos bye brag tu bshad pa chen po las / / +mdo las ji skad du bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na tshe dang ldan pa kun shes koondi nya dang  lha'i bu brgyad khri rdul rnams spangs shing dri ma dang  bral nas chos rnams la chos kyi mig rnam par dag pa skyes so zhes gsungs pa lta bu ste / /
column6: 0.029#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#250974#250974#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4629;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4630# de la yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba ni bstan bcos bye brag tu bshad pa chen po las / / +mdo las ji skad du / /

column3: de dag kho nas mchog tu dga' ba rnam pa gsum bskyed pa'i phyir na mgu bar bya / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#526718#526727#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10066;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10067;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10068# mdo sde las ji skad du 'gro ba lnga  zhes gsungs pa ni 'di lta ste / / +sems can dmyal ba dang  dud 'gro dang  yi dags dang  lha dang mi'o zhes bstan pa bzhin no // /

column3: yang  dag par mgu bar bya / / +yongs su mgu bar bya ba yin no // / +mchog tu dga' ba rnam pa gsum ni sems gyengs pa spong ba'i mchog tu dga' ba dang  the tshom gcod pa'i mchog tu dga' ba dang  'bras bu yongs su 'dzin pa'i mchog tu dga' ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#526725#526745#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10067;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10068;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10069;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10070;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10071# sems can dmyal ba dang  dud 'gro dang  yi dags dang  lha dang mi'o zhes bstan PA BZHIN NO // / +gzhan yang de nyid las sde pa gzhan kha cig lha ma yin ni 'gro ba drug pa'o zhes rnam par 'jog ste / /

column3: chos mthun pa     // / +dang lhan cig gtam la 'jug pa na dad par bya ba ni sems yongs su dag ba ste legs par yongs su 'dri ba'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#526744#526754#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10070;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10071;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10072# mdo sde las ni 'gro ba ni lnga kho na'o zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ste / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#526829#526837#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10081;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10082;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10083# la lar ni lnga kho na'o zhes gsungs te 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi sa'i mdo dang dri ma med par grags pas bstan pa'i mdo la sogs pa las bstan pa lta bu'o // / +gal te de lta na lha ma yin 'gro ba gang gis  bsdus she na smras pa / /
column6: 0.015#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#528587#528588#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10339;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10340# phan tshun ltos nas skye ba'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ste / / +rgya cher de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // /
column7: 0.021#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2321960#2321960#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_1304;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_1305# 'di ltar chos thams cad bdag nyid med pa'i phyir ni stong pa nyid ni yang dag par yod pa'i chos ma yin pas mngon par  zhen par mi bya'o zhes 'byung ste / / +rgya cher de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // /
column8: 0.021#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#258503#258504#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5553;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5554# de dag dang chos 'dra ba'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ste / / +rgya cher de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // /
column9: 0.024#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#249408#249409#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4475;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4476# de nas byang chub sems dpa' mi rnams kyi nang nas mngon par rdzogs par    sangs rgyas pa yin no zhes 'byung ste / / +rgya cher de nyid las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o // /
column10: 0.025#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2373768#2373769#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7483;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7484# nam zhig byang chub sems dpa' dmigs par bya ba'i yul dag la rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes kyis cig car yang mi dmigs pa na spros pa'i mtshan ma rnam pa sna tshogs mi len pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ste / / +rgya cher  de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // /
column11: 0.026#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#257288#257288#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5378;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5379# sdar blangs pa ni yongs su mi gtong bar rig par bya'o zhes 'byung ste / / +rgya cher ni de nyid las bstan pa  bzhin no ; / /

column3: dad pa bskyed par bya ba ni ngag yongs su dag pa yin te / / +legs par lung ston pa'i phyir ro / / +dge sbyong dag bdag nyid gling du  gyur pa dang zhes bya ba ni mdo sde'i dum bu'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#526755#526768#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10072;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10073;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10074;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10075# gal te de lta na lha ma yin 'gro ba gang gis bsdus she na smras pa / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#527051#527060#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10114;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10115;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10116;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10117# gshin  rje 'gro ba gang gis bsdus she na / / +smras pa bstan bcos bye brag tu bshad pa chen po las / /

column3: ji ltar na bdag nyid gling du 'gyur ba dang  bdag nyid skyabs su 'gyur bar gnas she na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#526769#526778#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10074;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10075;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10076# kha cig ni lha'i 'gro bas bsdus so zhes bshad de / / +dpyad pa dag gi yang dag pa'i don las ni yi dags kyi 'gro bas bsdus so zhes bshad do // /

column3: nang gi sems kyi zhi gnas la brtson pa'i phyir ro // / +ji ltar na chos gling dang chos skyabs su 'gyur ba yin zhe na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#526777#526788#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10075;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10076# dpyad pa dag gi yang dag pa'i don las ni yi dags kyi 'gro bas bsdus so zhes bshad do // / +bstan bcos yang dag pa'i rigs pa dang mdzod kyi bstan bcos las kyang phal cher bye brag tu  bshad pa chen po las bstan pa dang mthun par 'byung ngo // /
column5: 0.023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#264268#264269#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6359# 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las kyang phal cher bye brag tu bshad pa chen po las 'byung ba dang mthun par bshad do // /
column6: 0.025#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2364464#2364464#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6292# bstan bcos yang dag pa'i rigs pa dang rjes su mthun pa las kyang phal cher mdzod kyi bstan bcos las    'byung ba dang mthun par bshad do // /

column3: lhag pa'i  shes rab chos kyi lhag mthong la brtson ba'i phyir ro // / +ji ltar na gling gzhan ma yin pa dang  skyabs gzhan ma yin pa yin zhe na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#526789#526804#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10076;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10077;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10078;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10079# bstan bcos yang dag pa'i rigs pa dang mdzod kyi bstan bcos las kyang phal cher bye brag tu  bshad pa chen po las bstan pa dang mthun par 'byung ngo // /
column5: 0.022#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2354197#2354198#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5042;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5043# mthong ba'i lam la gnas pa gang yin pa de ni mtshan ma med par spyod pa can zhes zer te / / +de'i phyir bstan bcos de kho na nyid grub pa las / /

column3: de'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs 'dod pa'i bsod snyoms dang bdag nyid dub par gnas pa la brtson pa gnyis yongs su spangs pa'i phyir  ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#526802#526822#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10078;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10079;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10080;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10081# de'i phyir bstan bcos de kho na nyid grub pa las las ni rnam pa drug go 'di lta ste / / +'gro ba lnga po dag gi las dang ma nges ba'i las so zhes 'byung    pa yin no // /

column3: de ltar na sred pa dang ma rig pa'i gnyen po zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gnyis so sor bsten pa'i phyir dang  de'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs mtha' gnyis yongs su spangs pa'i phyir bdag nyid la sogs pa gling dang skyabs su gyur pa nyid du yongs su ston pa yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#526751#526759#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10071;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10072;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10073# rgya cher de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // / +gal te de lta na lha ma yin 'gro ba gang gis bsdus she na smras pa / /
column5: 0.018#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#251717#251720#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4701# rgya cher rnam par dbye ba ni 'phags pa rgya cher rnam par rol ba'i mdo dang  kun tu  gsal ba'i mdo dang  rgyu dang 'bras bu bstan pa'i mdo dang  sangs rgyas phal po che'i mdo dang  bkod pa chen po'i mdo la sogs pa las bstan pa bzhin rig par bya'o zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa'i sku ston pa'i thabs la mkhas pa    bshad pa'am mjug bsdu ba'i phyir gsungs pa'o //// /
column6: 0.023#TD4019E.TXT.r#2519395#2519395#TD4019E.TXT.r_14826# ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi spyod yul nyams su myong bar byed pa'o zhes pa la sogs pa shes rab kyi    pha rol tu phyin pa'i mdo las rgyas par gsungs pa rnams so // /
column7: 0.023#TD4019E.TXT.r#2455450#2455450#TD4019E.TXT.r_6361# de'i don ni bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po bstan pa dang  mya ngan las 'das pa'i mdo la sogs pa  las de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po spros ba dang bral zhing rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba blo bur gyi dri ma rnam par dag pa dang  thog ma nas rnam par dag pa ste rang bzhin gyis kyang dag pa gdul bya la mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis la sogs par ston par nus pa / /
column8: 0.026#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#223381#223381#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1235# dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi bsngags pa rgya cher brjod pa ni 'phags pa'i chos kyi tshig gi mdo dang sangs rgyas phal po che'i mdo las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o // /
column9: 0.027#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#505596#505596#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_7376;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_7377# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa mi mthun pa rnam pa gcig dang  tshig nges par 'grel ba'i mdo las bshad pa lta bu'o // / +gnyis pa ni dad pas spyod pa'i sa zhes bya ste / /
column10: 0.028#TD4079E.TXT.r#758263#758263#TD4079E.TXT.r_256;TD4079E.TXT.r_257# sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du'o zhes bya ba'o // / +de dag gi mtshan nyid la sogs pa mdo  rnams las rgyas par nges par bstan pa de rnams 'dir mdor bsdus nas brjod par bya ste / /
column11: 0.028#TD4047E.TXT.r#1225631#1225631#TD4047E.TXT.r_14788;TD4047E.TXT.r_14789# stobs bcu po dag gang zhe na zhes bya ba la sogs pa la / / +stobs bcu'i mdo las rgyas par ji skad bstan pa bzhin    du rig par bya'o zhes bya ba la / /
column12: 0.028#TD4050E.TXT.r#1109905#1109905#TD4050E.TXT.r_1753;TD4050E.TXT.r_1754# spyod lam thams cad du byang chub kyi sems yongs su sbyong bar byed pa dang zhes bya ba'i tshig gi don ni spyod lam yongs su dag pa'i mdo bzhin no // / +khyad par du 'gro ba'i las zhes bya ba la / /
column13: 0.029#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#244063#244063#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3851# 'phags pa don tshad med pa'i mdo dang  sangs rgyas phal po che'i mdo la sogs pa las ni bskal pa grangs med pa gsum ma tshang  bar yang sangs rgyas su 'grub pa zhes gsungs so // /

column3: gzhan  yang rang gi skyes bu'i rtsa ba dpung gnyen nyid yin pa'i phyir ni bdag nyid gling du 'gyur ba yin te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#526836#526846#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10082;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10083;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10084# gal te de lta na lha ma yin 'gro ba gang gis  bsdus she na smras pa / / +'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi sa'i 'grel pa las lha ma yin rnams kyi ris kyi rnam pa ni nges pa med de / /

column3: 'dis ni brtson 'grus brtsams pa nyid la sbyor bar mdzad pa yin no // / +lung dang rtogs pa'i chos dbung gnyen nyid yin pa'i phyir ni chos gling du 'gyur ba yin te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#526847#526862#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10083;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10084;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10085;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10086# 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi sa'i 'grel pa las lha ma yin rnams kyi ris kyi rnam pa ni nges pa med de / / +res 'ga' ni lha dang  res 'ga' ni yi dags dang  res 'ga' ni dud 'gro'i 'gro bas bsdus par gsungs pa'i phyir / /
column5: 0.026#TD4001E.TXT.r#1974841#1974841#TD4001E.TXT.r_323;TD4001E.TXT.r_324# 'dis ni de phyin ci ma log par grub par bstan to // / +'di    skyes pa'i phyir ji ltar ma skyes pa'i tshul du rtag pa dang ldan snyam pa la ma skyes pa zhes bya ba gsungs te / /

column3: 'dis ni  thabs shes par bya ba la sbyor bar mdzad pa yin no // / +de dag la gcig tu nges pa nyid kyi phyir ni gling gzhan ma yin pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#526861#526872#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10085;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10086;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10087;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10088;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10089# 'dir  nges par ma bstan to zhes 'byung ngo // / +la lar ni drug go zhes gsungs te / /

column3: 'dis ni gnyis la skyon mi 'byung ba nyid du sbyor bar mdzad pa yin no // / +dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bsgoms pas de ltar gnas par 'gyur ro zhes  yang dag par ston pa yin te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#526873#526886#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10087;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10088;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10089;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10090;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10091# mdo sde 'di nyid dang sangs rgyas phal po che la sogs pa las / / +ji skad bstan pa lta bu'o // / +bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa dang sbyar na sngar gzhag pa ni yang dag pa'i don  yin te / /
column5: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#139067#139070#TD4035E.TXT.r_2424;TD4035E.TXT.r_2425;TD4035E.TXT.r_2426# lha ma yin rnams ni bdud rtsi rnam pa bzhi'i phyir lha rnams dang 'gras par 'gyur ro // / +lha ma yin  rnams kyang lha'i 'gro bas bsdus pa kho nar blta bar bya'o // /

column3: 'di la dge slong nang gi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing zhes rgyas par gsungs pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#471380#471387#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_2881;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_2882;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_2883# de'i phyir rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las lha ma yin rnams kyang lha'i 'gro bas bsdus par blta bar bya'o // / +'on kyang de dag ni sgyu can 'drid pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pa sgyu dang gyo'i spyod pa shas che ba yin te / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#526885#526896#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10090;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10091;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10092;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10093# de'i phyir de las lha ma yin rnams kyang lha'i 'gro bas bsdus pa kho nar blta bar bya'o // / +'on kyang de dag ni sgyu can 'drid pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pa sgyu gyo'i shas che ba yin te / /
column6: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#139069#139080#TD4035E.TXT.r_2425;TD4035E.TXT.r_2426;TD4035E.TXT.r_2427;TD4035E.TXT.r_2428# lha ma yin  rnams kyang lha'i 'gro bas bsdus pa kho nar blta bar bya'o // / +'on kyang de dag ni sgyu can 'drid pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pa sgyu dang gyo'i shas che ba yin te / /

column3: sdud pa'i tshigs su bcad pa ni / / +brtson 'grus ldan dang thabs shes dang / / +rtag tu de la dga' ba gang // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#526897#526907#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10091;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10092;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10093;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10094# 'on kyang de dag ni sgyu can 'drid pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pa sgyu gyo'i shas che ba yin te / / +de bas na 'di lta ste / / +lha rnams bzhin du dkar po'i chos rnams kyi snod du ma  gyur pa yin te / /
column5: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#139087#139091#TD4035E.TXT.r_2428;TD4035E.TXT.r_2429# lha rnams bzhin du dkar po'i chos rnams kyi snod du gyur pa ma yin te / / +de'i phyir ched 'ga' mdo gzhan  dag las 'gro ba tha dad pa'i bstan pas bstan to // /

column3: de ni bdag la sogs    pa gsum // / +gling 'gyur go rims bzhin shes bya / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#526908#526915#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10094;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10095# de'i phyir ched 'ga' mdo gzhan dag las 'gro ba tha dad pa'i bstan pas bstan to zhes 'byung bas yang dag par na lha'i 'gro ba yin no // /

column3: rnam grangs gzhan yang / / +rang gi tshul bzhin yid byed dang / / +gzhan gyi sgra la brtan pa dang / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#526916#526926#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10094;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10095;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10096;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10097# de'i phyir ched 'ga' mdo gzhan dag las 'gro ba tha dad pa'i bstan pas bstan to zhes 'byung bas yang dag par na lha'i 'gro ba yin no // / +gzhan yang de nyid las / / +de ltar 'jig rten gnas pa chags na / /
column5: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#131625#131628#TD4035E.TXT.r_1141# de ltar 'jig rten gnas pa chags nas 'gro ba lnga po sems can dmyal ba pa rnams dang  dud 'gro rnams dang  yi dags rnams dang   lha rnams dang  mi rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro // /

column3: bsgom la gcig tu nges pa 'di // / +bdag sogs gling 'gyur shes par bya // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#526925#526934#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10097;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10098# 'gro ba lnga po sems can dmyal ba rnams  dang  dud 'gro rnams dang  yi dags rnams dang  lha rnams dang  mi rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes 'byung ngo // /
column5: 0.020#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2404550#2404551#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11106;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11107# bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las kyang theg pa chen po bsdus pa las bstan pa dang mthun bar byung ngo // / +'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las ni mngon du gyur pa'i sa zhes 'byung ngo // /
column6: 0.020#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#243978#243978#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3841;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3842# brgya rtsa gsum pa ni grangs med pa zhes bya ba'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las ni grangs kyis bsgyur ba bcu gcig las grangs bcu gcig pa ni grangs med pa zhes bya'o zhes bshad do // /
column7: 0.020#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#267590#267590#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6752;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6753# gzhan yang bstan bcos chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las spyi dang bye brag gi sgo ni sngar tshig gcig mdor bstan nas tshig phyi ma gzhan gyis rnam par phye ste bshad pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i  'grel pa las / /
column8: 0.022#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#517309#517309#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8749;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8750# dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i dbang gis de rab tu sel ba'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ngo // / +'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las shes rab kyi rjes su 'brang zhing dmigs pa la yang dag par gnas pa ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa zhes bya'o zhes bshad do // /
column9: 0.022#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2405515#2405515#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11195;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11196# so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su grub pas phyogs bcu kun du legs par chos ston pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ngo // / +'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las ni mtshan nyid la mkhas pa'i shes pa zhes 'byung ngo // /
column10: 0.022#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#216914#216914#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_367;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_368# mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba ni mi skye ba'i bzod pa thob pa na chos rnams mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ngo // / +'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las  kyang don rnam pa drug gis de nyid kyi bye brag ston pa yang / /

column3: 'di gsum don gang gis na  gling du 'gyur / / +don gang gis na skyabs su 'gyur zhe na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#526935#526946#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10098;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10099;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10100# 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa dang sbyar na ni drug tu gzhag pa yang dag pa'i don yin par ston te / /
column5: 0.026#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#933342#933344#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_5574;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_5575# 'phags pa gzungs kyi dbang phyug chen po'i rgyal po dang / / +dam pa'i chos punda r'i ka la sogs pa'i mdo sde las 'byung ba bzhin du blta'o // /

column3: chu bo bzhis ded pa las yongs su skyob pa'i don gyis na gling du 'gyur ba yin la / / +skye ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal las yongs su skyob pa'i don gyis na skyabs su 'gyur ba yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#526945#526960#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10099;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10100;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10101# de'i phyir de nyid las / / +theg pa chen po'i mdo sde dam pa'i chos punda r'i ka las 'gro ba drug gi sems can yod par gsungs pas don gyis dgongs pa rnams brtags na 'gro ba drug yod do // /

column3: gzhan yang go  rims bzhin du nyon mongs pa skyes pa dang  ma skyes pa'i gnyen po nyid yin pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#526961#526968#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10100;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10101;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10102;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10103# theg pa chen po'i mdo sde dam pa'i chos punda r'i ka las 'gro ba drug gi sems can yod par gsungs pas don gyis dgongs pa rnams brtags na 'gro ba drug yod do // / +gzhan yang dge ba dang mi dge ba rnam par dbye bas kyang 'gro ba drug yod de / /

column3: bsdus pa'i tshigs su bcad pa ni / / +de dag chu dang thang 'dra ba'i // / +nyon mongs sdug bsngal skyob phyir dang / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#526969#526979#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10101;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10103;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10102;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10104;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10105# gzhan yang dge ba dang mi dge ba rnam par dbye bas kyang 'gro ba drug yod de / / +rab dang  'bring dang tha ma yod pa'i phyir / /

column3: nyon mongs skyes dang ma skyes dang / / +'di yi gnyen  po yin phyir ro // / +yang gzhan dag na re / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#526980#526987#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10104;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10105# bde 'gro gsum po lha dang mi dang lha ma yin yod / / +mi dge ba yang rab dang 'bring dang tha ma yod par sems can dmyal ba dang  yi dags dang  dud 'gro'i 'gro ba yod do zhes 'byung ste / /

column3: bdag nyid skyabs min 'dod pa rnams la brten // / +chos skyabs 'gyur min sdug bsngal rnams la ste // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#526988#526997#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10105;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10106;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10107# mi dge ba yang rab dang 'bring dang tha ma yod par sems can dmyal ba dang  yi dags dang  dud 'gro'i 'gro ba yod do zhes 'byung ste / / +rgya cher de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // /
column5: 0.023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#263619#263619#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6268;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6269;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6270# skye mched bcu gnyis so zhes 'byung ste / / +rgya cher de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // / +gzhan yang de  nyid las bcom ldan 'das kyis lam brnyes pa na / /
column6: 0.023#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2371753#2371753#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7253;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7254;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7255# rnam par shes pa lnga dang  mtshungs par ldan pa'i shes rab dang  zag pa med pa'i bzod pa ma gtogs pa gzhan yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i bzod pa rnams so zhes 'byung ste / / +rgya cher de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // / +gzhan yang de nyid las  ci mthong ba rnams shes pa yin zhe na / /
column7: 0.025#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#221786#221786#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_989;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_990# pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad la sbyor ba ni 'di dag thams cad kyi spyod pa la 'gro ba la dgongs pa'o zhes 'byung ste / / +rgya cher de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // /
column8: 0.028#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#249335#249335#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4465;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4466;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4467# gal te lha'i gnas 'og ma dag tu skye bar gyur na tshe'i tshad ni zad la dge ba'i rtsa ba da dung yongs su smin par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir der mi skye'o  zhes 'byung ste / / +rgya cher de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // / +gzhan yang de nyid las ci'i phyir lha'i gnas de nyid du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya bar mi'i nang du gshegs she na / /

column3: bdag la rag las mkhas dang de gnyi ga / / +skyabs su 'gyur byed pa ni zhi bar 'gyur // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#526998#527005#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10107;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10108# gzhan yang de nyid las bcom ldan 'das kyis 'gro ba lnga kho na'o zhes gsal bar gsungs pa med de / /

column3: zhes 'chad de / / +de  dag ni mtha' gnyis kyi gnyen po la brten pa'i phyir dang  srid pa gzhan nye bar mi len pa'i phyir bdag nyid la sogs pa gling du 'gyur ba nyid du yongs su ston pa yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#527006#527022#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10108;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10109;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10110;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10111# 'gro ba lnga yod par bshad pa ni thams cad yod par smra ba dag 'gro ba lnga yod do zhes bstan pa bzhin no // /

column3: lung las ni grogs la sred pa dang  rnyed pa la sred pa dang  yang srid pa la srid pa'i gnyen  por go rims bzhin du bdag nyid dang chos dang gling gzhan ma yin pa nyid du bstan to / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#527021#527039#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10110;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10111;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10112;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10113# de ci'i  phyir zhe na / / +ngan song gsum ni gcig tu sdig pa byas pa'i gnas yin pas gang gis dge ba ni cher byas la / /

column3: dge slong dag log par lta ba spongs shig ces bya ba ni mdo sde'i dum bu'o / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#527040#527048#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10112;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10113;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10114# sdig pa chung du byas pa gang yin pa de ni lha ma yin zhes bya bas skye gnas tha dad pa'i rigs te / / +de'i phyir 'gro ba drug ces brjod par bya'o zhes 'byung ngo // /

column3: de la log par lta ba spongs shig ces bya ba ni bka' yin no / / +lhag mas ni bka' bzhin du bsgrub pa'i  rgyu rnam pa gsum ston pa yin te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#527049#527063#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10114;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10115;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10116;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10117# gshin  rje 'gro ba gang gis bsdus she na / /
column5: 0.020#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#526774#526775#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10075;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10076# dpyad pa dag gi yang dag pa'i don las ni yi dags kyi 'gro bas bsdus so zhes bshad do // /

column3: nus pa nyid dang  skyon med pa nyid dang  yon tan mang ba nyid do // / +skyon med pa nyid ni don med pa la sogs pa mi 'grub pa yin ba'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#527062#527071#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10116;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10117;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10118# yi dags kyi 'gro bas bsdus so zhes bshad de / / +de'i phyir de nyid las bstan bcos gdags pa byas pa las / /

column3: yon tan mang ba nyid ni don la sogs pa 'grub pa'i phyir ro // / +mi sgrub na yang skyon mang     // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#527072#527080#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10118# ji ltar da ltar gyi yi dags kyi 'jig rten 'di'i rgyal  po'i ming gshin rje zhes bya ba bzhin no zhes bshad do zhes bya ba dang  gzhan yang de nyid las / /

column3: ba nyid kyi rgyu rnam pa bzhi pa glengs pa yin te / / +ma spangs na don med pa la sogs pa 'grub par glengs pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#527081#527089#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10118;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10119# ji ltar da ltar gyi yi dags kyi 'jig rten 'di'i rgyal  po'i ming gshin rje zhes bya ba bzhin no zhes bshad do zhes bya ba dang  gzhan yang de nyid las / / +'dzam bu'i gling 'di'i 'og dpag tshad lnga brgya 'das pa na gshin rje'i khams yod de de ni yi dags thams cad kyi gnas kyi rtsa ba yin te / /

column3: de la don ni dge ba'i chos 'byung ba ste / / +ji ltar yang dag par spang ba phyi ma gnyis lta bu ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#527088#527106#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10119;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10120;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10121# 'dzam bu'i gling 'di'i 'og dpag tshad lnga brgya 'das pa na gshin rje'i khams yod de de ni yi dags thams cad kyi gnas kyi rtsa ba yin te / /

column3: rgyan can gyi bu'i mdo sde las  gsungs pa lta bu'o // /
column4: 0.022#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#533046#533046#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10885;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10886# mdo sde las brtsams  nas chos kyi sgo mo rnam par gzhag pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las kyang 'di dang don mthun par 'byung ste / /

column3: phan pa ni mi dge ba'i chos dang 'bral ba ste / / +ji ltar yang dag par spong ba snga ma gnyis lta bus so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#527107#527114#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10120;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10121;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10122# de las gyes nas gzhan na  gnas pa yang yod do zhes 'byung ngo // / +bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las ni sems can dmyal ba'i 'gro bas bsdus par bshad de / /

column3: bde ba ni mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas pa yin te / / +lus dang sems shin tu sbyang ba'i khyad par dang ldan pa'i phyir ram / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#527115#527126#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10122# de'i phyir de las sems can gang yang rung ba zhig bdag por 'gyur ba'i las kun nas nyon mongs ba can gyis sems can dmyal ba  rnams na gshin rje'i rgyal por skye bar 'gyur ro zhes 'byung ngo // /
column5: 0.013#TD4019E.TXT.r#2456824#2456824#TD4019E.TXT.r_6551# 'dis kyang da ltar gyi nyon mongs pa'i kun nas nyon  mongs pa dang  des kun nas bslang ba'i las kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa la brten nas ma 'ongs pa'i skye ba mngon par 'grub cing de dag tu yang snga ma bzhin du nyon mongs pas kun nas bslang zhing / /
column6: 0.014#TD4091E.TXT.r#754431#754431#TD4091E.TXT.r_10777;TD4091E.TXT.r_10778# 'chi 'pho can las nyon mongs kun // / +'chi 'pho ba'i tshe skye bas thob pa'i dag pa'i mjug thogs su sa thams cad pa'i nyon mongs pa can skye'o // /
column7: 0.020#TD4039E.TXT.r#1841951#1841951#TD4039E.TXT.r_3272;TD4039E.TXT.r_3273# sems gnas pa rnam pa dgus ni gcig tu nges par zhi gnas la brtson pa'i lus shin tu sbyangs par 'gyur la / / +ro myong ba med pas ni kun nas nyon  mongs pa can ma yin no // /
column8: 0.020#TD4047E.TXT.r#1217317#1217317#TD4047E.TXT.r_13627# gnas pa rnam par dag pa'i  sngon du 'gro ba'i phyir ni kun nas nyon mongs can yang ma yin la zhes bya ba ni gnas pa rnam par dag pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa zhes bstan to // /
column9: 0.020#TD4054E.TXT.r#1045093#1045093#TD4054E.TXT.r_8546;TD4054E.TXT.r_8547# gus par nyan pa la sogs pa la rjes su chags pa la sogs pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i phyir / / +kun nas nyon mongs la can ma yin pas tshogs yongs su sdud do // /
column10: 0.026#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3103400#3103400#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_1698# de la bzhi pas ni ci nas kyang slong mo pa la yang kun nas nyon mongs par mi 'gyur ba dang  bdag nyid kyang kun nas nyon mongs  ba can ma yin pa'i sems kyis sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa dang  rab tu phye zhing don du gnyer ba rnams dang  phongs pa rnams dang  ston pa med pa rnams dang  nyes par spyad pa spyod pa rnams dang  legs par spyad pa spyod pa rnams dang  rang gi tshal za rnams la 'di lta ste / /
column11: 0.028#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#217758#217758#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_468# ba blas byug pa dang  mar khus bkru ba dang  gu gul gyis bdug pa dang  aarka'i me tog la sogs pa dang  gzhan yang yo byad du rung ba ma yin pa dag gis mi byed pa de ni byang chub sems  dpa'i mchod pa rnam pa drug kun nas nyon mongs can ma yin par rig par bya'o // /

column3: rnam par grol  ba'i dga' ba dang bde ba myong ba'i phyir ro // / +don ni dge sbyong gi don ni tshul gyi don te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#527127#527138#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10122;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10123# de'i phyir de las sems can gang yang rung ba zhig bdag por 'gyur ba'i las kun nas nyon mongs ba can gyis sems can dmyal ba  rnams na gshin rje'i rgyal por skye bar 'gyur ro zhes 'byung ngo // /
column5: 0.026#TD4035E.TXT.r#130730#130730#TD4035E.TXT.r_1003# klu'i rigs ni rnam pa bzhi yod de klu sgo nga las skye ba dang  mngal nas skye ba dang  drod gsher las skye ba dang  rdzus te skye pa'o // /
column6: 0.026#TD4035E.TXT.r#131637#131637#TD4035E.TXT.r_1142# skye gnas bzhi po sgo nga las skye ba dang  mngal nas skye ba dang  drod gsher las skye ba dang  rdzus te skye ba dang  gzhi drug dang  dus rnam pa bcu ste / /
column7: 0.026#TD4052E.TXT.r#2852172#2852172#TD4052E.TXT.r_1311# yang na mngal nas skye ba dang sgo nga las skye ba dang drod gsher las skye ba dang  rdzus te skye ba'i skye gnas kyi dbang du mdzad nas tshig bzhi go rims bzhin no // /
column8: 0.026#TD4086E.TXT.r#1281244#1281244#TD4086E.TXT.r_227# nam mkha' lding rdzus te skye ba ni bza' ba'i phyir klu sgo nga las skye ba dang  mngal nas skye ba dang  drod gsher las skye ba dang  rdzus te skye ba 'byin par byed do // /

column3: gang gi don du rab tu byung ba rnams yin no // / +phan pa ni de 'dren par byed pa dge sbyong gi tshul yin no // / +bde ba ni snga ma bzhin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#527137#527153#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10123;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10124;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10125;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10126;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10127# de la sgo nga dang  mngal dang drod gsher dang  rdzus te skye ba zhes bya ba ni skye ba rnam pa bzhi ste / /

column3: gzhan yang don ni bstan pa yin la / / +phan pa dang bde ba zhes bya ba ni bshad pa yin te de la dge ba'i don gyis de la phan pa yin la / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#131756#131765#TD4035E.TXT.r_1153;TD4035E.TXT.r_1154;TD4035E.TXT.r_1155# sgo nga  las skye ba'i skye gnas gang zhe na / /
column5: 0.016#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#1625491#1625493#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_5118;TD4090.1E.TXT.r_5119# sgo nga las skyes pa'i skye gnas gang zhe na / /
column6: 0.023#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#1625532#1625532#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_5126;TD4090.1E.TXT.r_5127# drod gsher las skyes pa'i skye gnas gang zhe na / / +sems can gang dag 'byung ba'i drod gsher las skye ba rnams te / /

column3: rjes su 'dzin pa'i don gyis na bde ba yin te / / +de dag la ni sems can thams cad kyi don du gnyer bar byed pa yin pas de'i phyir 'di gnyis kho na don yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#527159#527171#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10127;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10128;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10129;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10130;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10131;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10132# sems can gang dag sgo nga'i sbubs mngon par brtol nas 'byung ba RNAMS YIN TE / / +de dag kyang gang zhe na / / +'di lta ste / / +ngang pa dang  khrung khrung dang  rma bya dang  ne tso dang  ri skegs la sogs pa'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#131766#131776#TD4035E.TXT.r_1154;TD4035E.TXT.r_1155;TD4035E.TXT.r_1156;TD4035E.TXT.r_1157;TD4035E.TXT.r_1158# sems can gang dag sgo nga'i sbubs mngon par brtol nas 'byung ba RNAMS YIN TE / / +de dag kyang gang zhe na / / +'di lta ste / /
column6: 0.012#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#1625500#1625504#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_5119;TD4090.1E.TXT.r_5120;TD4090.1E.TXT.r_5121# sems can gang dag sgo nga las skyes pa rnams te / / +'di lta ste / / +ngang pa dang  khrung khrung dang  rma bya dang  ne tso dang  ri skegs la sogs pa lta bu'o // /
column7: 0.020#TD4087E.TXT.r#1582672#1582674#TD4087E.TXT.r_3697;TD4087E.TXT.r_3698;TD4087E.TXT.r_3699;TD4087E.TXT.r_3700# de dag kyang gang  zhe na / / +smras pa / / +'di lta ste / / +dang pa dang  khrung khrung dang  rma bya dang  ne tso dang  ri skegs dang  khu byug dang  shang shang te'u la sogs pa dang  klu kha cig dang  nam mkha' lding kha cig dang  mi kha cig dang  gzhan yang sems can gang dag sgo nga las skyes pa rnams  dang  sgo nga na 'dug pa rnams dang  sgo nga'i sbubs kyi spris gyogs pa rnams dang  sgo nga'i sbubs brtol te skye zhing kun du skye la / /
column8: 0.020#TD4091E.TXT.r#708676#708679#TD4091E.TXT.r_2615;TD4091E.TXT.r_2616;TD4091E.TXT.r_2617# 'di lta ste / / +dang ba dang  khrung khrung dang  rma bya dang  ne tso dang  ri skegs la sogs pa'o // /

column3: rnam grangs  gnyis ka yang lung yin no // / +dge slong dag gang zag gis gang zag la tshod ma bzung shig ces bya ba ni mdo sde'i dum bu'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#527172#527189#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10131;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10132;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10133;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10134# mngal las skye ba'i skye gnas gang zhe na / / +sems  can gang dag sha mos kun nas gyogs shing sha mo brtol nas 'byung ba rnams te / /

column3: de la yon tan yod pa dang  med pa nyid kyi gang zag la tshod 'dzin pa yin la / / +yon tan gyi tshad 'dzin pas ni gang zag la tshad 'dzin pa yin  no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#527190#527197#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10133;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10134;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10135;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10136# de dag kyang gang zhe na 'di lta ste / / +glang po che dang  rta dang  ba lang dang  bong bu la sogs pa'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#131792#131801#TD4035E.TXT.r_1159;TD4035E.TXT.r_1160;TD4035E.TXT.r_1161;TD4035E.TXT.r_1162;TD4035E.TXT.r_1163;TD4035E.TXT.r_1164# sems can gang dag shams kun nas yogs shing sha ma brtol nas 'byung ba rnams te / / +de dag kyang gang zhe na / / +'di lta ste / / +glang po che dang  rta dang  ba lang dang  bong bu la sogs pa'o // /
column6: 0.019#TD4087E.TXT.r#1582748#1582749#TD4087E.TXT.r_3708;TD4087E.TXT.r_3709;TD4087E.TXT.r_3710# de dag kyang gang zhe na / / +'di lta ste / / +glang po che dang  rta dang  rnga mo dang  ba lang dang  bong bu dang  ma he dang  ri dags dang  phag la sogs pa dang  klu kha cig dang  nam mkha' lding kha cig dang  yi dags kha cig dang  mi kha cig dang  gzhan  yang sems can gang dag mngal nas skye ba rnams dang  mngal na 'dug pa rnams dang  mngal gyi sbubs kyis gyogs pa rnams dang  mngal gyi sbubs brtol te skye zhing kun du skye la 'grub cing mngon par 'grub pa dang  yang dag par 'grub cing 'byung ba rnams te / /
column7: 0.025#TD4087E.TXT.r#1576326#1576326#TD4087E.TXT.r_2576;TD4087E.TXT.r_2577;TD4087E.TXT.r_2578# de dag kyang gang zhe na / / +'di lta ste / / +glang po che dang  rta dang  rnga mo dang  bong bu dang   ra dang  ma he dang  ri dags dang  phag la stsogs pa ste / /
column8: 0.028#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#1625531#1625531#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_5126;TD4090.1E.TXT.r_5127# drod gsher las skyes pa'i skye gnas gang zhe na / / +sems can gang dag 'byung ba'i drod gsher las skye ba rnams te / /

column3: gzhan yang 'di ni 'di ji lta ba de lta bu yin no zhes gzhan la brten nas gang zag la tshod 'dzin pa yin la / /

column3: gzhan la mi brten par 'di la yon tan 'di snyed cig yod do zhes gang zag la tshod 'dzin pa'o // /

column9: 0.029#TD4091E.TXT.r#708665#708665#TD4091E.TXT.r_2613# sgo nga'i skye gnas las skye ba gang zhe na / /

column3: de la sdig pa ni tha chad kyi don gyis na nyes par spyad pa yin te / / +ji skad du / / +lus kyis nyes bar spyad pa'i rnam par smin pa sdig pa zhes bya ba dang  che ge mo nga ni khyed la mi 'jigs kyi gnyis na khyod dang reg    sdig par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa lta bu yin pas tha chad yin par mngon no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#527232#527239#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10142;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10143;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10144# skye mched drug las gang yang rung ba ma tshang ba rnams te / / +de dag kyang gang zhe na 'di lta ste / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#527240#527259#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10144;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10145;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10146# sems can dmyal ba pa rnams dang  lha rnams dang  dud 'gro dang  yi dags dang  mi rnams las kha cig go zhes 'byung ste / /
column6: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#131837#131840#TD4035E.TXT.r_1171;TD4035E.TXT.r_1172;TD4035E.TXT.r_1173# de dag gang zhe na / / +'di lta ste / / +sems can dmyal ba pa rnams dang  lha rnams dang  dud 'gro dang  yi dags dang  mi rnams las kha cig go // /
column7: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#132142#132143#TD4035E.TXT.r_1216;TD4035E.TXT.r_1217;TD4035E.TXT.r_1218# sems can gyi ris drug cu rtsa bzhi gang zhe na / / +'di lta ste / / +sems can dmyal ba pa rnams dang  dud 'gro rnams dang  yi dags rnams dang  lha rnams dang  mi rnams dang  rgyal rigs rnams dang      // /
column8: 0.008#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#518349#518351#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8890;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8891# yang dag pa'i lus dang  ngag dang yid kyi nan tan gyi nang na 'di mchog tu gyur pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ste / / +bstan bcos yang dag pa'i rigs pa dang bye brag tu bshad pa chen po las kyang  'di dang mthun par bshad do // /
column9: 0.023#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#519013#519014#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8990;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8991;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8992# zhib tu de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // / +bstan bcos yang dag pa'i rigs pa las kyang / / +bye brag tu bshad pa  chen po las bstan pa dang don mthun par bshad do // /
column10: 0.025#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2329502#2329502#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_2222# rgya cher ni ri dags kyi rgyal pos sha ba sbrum ma'i phyir  srog btang bar byas pa bstan pa dang  bstan bcos bye brag tu bshad pa chen po las 'byung ba bzhin du rig par bya'o // /
column11: 0.025#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2330031#2330032#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_2269# bstan bcos bye brag tu bshad pa chen po dang  mdzod kyi bstan bcos dang  yang dag pa'i rigs pa dang rjes su mthun pa dang  chos kyi 'khor lo  bstan pa dag las ni dge slong lnga po dag gi ched du gsungs pa yin no zhes ston te // /
column12: 0.025#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2341863#2341864#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3596# dbugs 'byung ba dang rngub pa ni bstan bcos sems sna tshogs bstan pa dang  mdzod kyi bstan bcos dang  yang dag pa'i rigs pa dang rjes su mthun pa dang  bye brag tu bshad pa chen po dang  rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las rgya cher ston to // /
column13: 0.025#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2366038#2366038#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6492# mdzod kyi bstan bcos dang yang dag pa'i rigs pa dang rjes su mthun pa dang  bye brag tu bshad pa  chen po dang  phyin ci log bzhi bstan pa dag las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o // /
column14: 0.025#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2368115#2368115#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6780# rgya cher rnam par 'byed pa  ni mdzod kyi bstan bcos dang yang dag pa'i rigs pa dang rjes su mthun pa dang  bye brag tu bshad pa chen po dang  'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa dang  'phags pa mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mdo dang  rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o // /
column15: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2365503#2365503#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6427;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6428# de grangs med pa dang  de grangs med pa phrag brgya dang  de grangs med pa phrag  stong dang  de grangs med pa phrag brgya stong zhes bya ba ni gsum pa grangs med ba'i tshad bstan pa'o // / +bstan bcos bye brag tu bshad pa chen po dang  mdzod kyi bstan bcos las grangs kyi ming drug cu yod pa las / /
column16: 0.026#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#513552#513552#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8339# tha ma gsum ni go rims bzhin du nga rgyal dang  che ba'i nga rgyal dang cung zad snyam pa'i nga rgyal de dag go zhes bshad do rgya cher ni bstan bcos bye brag tu bshad pa chen po las 'byung ba bzhin  no // /
column17: 0.028#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#257114#257114#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5355;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5356# phyug po kho na zhes brjod pa bzhin no zhes 'byung ste / / +mdzod kyi bstan bcos dang  bye brag tu bshad pa chen po las kyang de skad du ston to // /
column18: 0.028#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#517907#517907#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8834# rgya cher rnam par 'byed pa ni bstan bcos yang dag pa'i rigs pa dang  rjes su mthun pa dang  bye brag tu bshad pa chen po las bstan pa bzhin no // /
column19: 0.028#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2352439#2352440#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4811;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4812# mdzod kyi bstan bcos dang yang dag pa'i rigs pa dang rjes su mthun pa las ni / /

column3: nyes par spyad pa de nyid drag shul yin te / / +gzhan la gnod pa byed pa'i don gyis so // / +de nyid gdug pa yin te / / +tshe phyi ma la rang gi lus la gnod ba byed pa'i don gyis so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#527260#527270#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10145;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10146;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10147;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10148;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10149# rgya cher rnam par 'byed  pa ni bstan bcos gzhung bstan pa dang  mdzod kyi bstan bcos dang  yang dag pa'i rigs pa dang  bye brag tu bshad pa chen po las 'byung ba bzhin du rig par bya'o // / +sngar 'gro ba drug bshad zin na / /

column3: bsod nams  ni bkra shis pa'i don gyis na legs par spyad pa yin te / / +ji skad du dri ni bsod pa yin no zhes bya ba lta bu'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#527271#527281#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10147;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10148;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10149;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10150;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10151# ci'i phyir yang skye ba rnam pa bzhi bstan zhe na / / +smras pa / / +mdzod kyi bstan bcos las / /

column3: de nyid ni dge ba yin te / / +tshe phyi ma la 'bras bu yid du 'ong ba'i don gyis so // / +de nyid 'jigs pas bag tsha ba rnams las skyob pa yin te ngan 'gro 'jigs  pas bag tsha ba las yongs su skyob pa'i don gyis so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#527280#527296#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10150;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10151;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10152;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10153;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10154;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10155# bstan bcos gdags pa byas pa las 'di skad du / / +skye ba rnam pa bzhis ni 'di skad du 'gro ba lnga bsdus kyi / /

column3: 'di ni don tha dad pas de skad gsungs pa yin gyi / / +gzhi tha dad pas ni ma yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#527297#527305#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10155# srid pa bar ma  dag go zhes bstan to zhes 'byung bas rigs pa des na lha la sogs pa'i 'gro ba drug gi skye ba ril ma bsdus pas de'i phyir sgo nga la sogs pa'i skye ba bzhi po dag yang dag par bstan pa yin no // /

column3: 'di ji ltar shes she na / / +kye ma bdag gis 'di lta ste / / +lus dang  ngag dang  yid kyis sdig pa byas shing / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#527304#527317#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10155;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10156;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10157# srid pa bar ma  dag go zhes bstan to zhes 'byung bas rigs pa des na lha la sogs pa'i 'gro ba drug gi skye ba ril ma bsdus pas de'i phyir sgo nga la sogs pa'i skye ba bzhi po dag yang dag par bstan pa yin no // /

column3: kye ma bdag  gi 'di lta ste / / +lus dang ngag dang yid kyis bsod nams ma byas pas zhes thog mar sdig pa dang bsod nams gnyis kho na smos pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#527318#527326#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10156;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10157;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10158# gal te de lta na ci'i phyir yang 'gro ba drug bstan zhe na / / +smras pa /// / +dge ba dang sdig pa skyes pa len pa'i bye brag rab tu bstan pa'i phyir 'gro ba drug tu bstan pa'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#527327#527335#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10158;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10159;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10160# dge ba dang sdig pa skyes pa len pa'i bye brag rab tu bstan pa'i phyir 'gro ba drug tu bstan pa'o // /
column6: 0.028#TD4019E.TXT.r#2483875#2483875#TD4019E.TXT.r_9972;TD4019E.TXT.r_9973# kho bo cag ni de 'dra ba ston pa ma  yin pas de ltar mi 'gyur ba'o // / +'gro ba dang zhes pa la sogs pas 'gro ba lnga'am drug gi bye brag la sogs pa dngos po'i chos thams cad du 'du ba dang zad pas bsdus pa ston par byed pa ni rgyang pan pa nyid do // /

column3: 'thab mo dang mtshang 'dru ba dang rtsod pa dang 'gyed pa zhes bya ba ni mdo sde'i dum bu'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#527334#527356#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10159;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10160;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10161;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10162# gal te de lta na ni ci'i phyir khams ma bstan zhe na smras pa / /

column3: de la nyes par rtsom pa rnams kyis  smra ba dang  slar smra ba tsam ni 'thab mo yin no // /
gcig la gcig skyon smra ba ni mtshang 'dru ba yin no // / +de mi bzod pa ni rtsod pa yin no // / +rtsod pa rnams phal cher grar phan tshun mi mthun par smra ba ni 'gyed pa yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#527357#527365#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10162;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10163# 'gro ba drug dang  skye ba rnam pa bzhi'i don ni mtshan nyid bstan pa gzhan dag las bshad pa bzhin du rig par bya'o // /

column3: gshe yang slar mi gshe zhes bya ba ni mdo sde'i  dum bu'o // / +de la khros bas tshogs par mi dbyung ba'i skur pa gleng ba ni 'dir gshe ba yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#527364#527379#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10162;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10163;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10164;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10165# 'gro ba drug dang  skye ba rnam pa bzhi'i don ni mtshan nyid bstan pa gzhan dag las bshad pa bzhin du rig par bya'o // / +mdo'i tshig 'di rnam par bshad pa yang rnam pa  gnyis yod de / /

column3: khro ba bskyed pa'i bsam pas ngag dang byed pa yin du mi 'ong ba ni khro ba yin no // / +sdug bsngal bar bya ba'i bsam pas snur bar byed pa ni rdeg pa yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#527380#527391#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10165;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10166;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10167# 'gro ba drug gi 'khor ba 'di nas sems can gang dang gang dag ces bya bas ni lus spangs pa rnams bstan to // /

column3: ma tshang  'dru ba ni snga ma bzhin no // / +tshul khrims 'di dag ni ma nyams pa skyon med pa zhes bya ba ni mdo sde'i dum bu'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#527392#527405#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10166;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10167;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10168;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10169# sems can gyi ris de dang de dag tu gtogs PA ZHES BYA BAS NI LUS len pa rnam par 'byed PA YIN NO // / +lus len pa  de yang ris rnam pa gnyis te / /

column3: de la ma nyams pa ni bslab pa las mi 'da' ba'i phyir ro // / +skyon med pa ni bar bar du yang yongs su mi gtang ba'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#527402#527413#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10168;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10169# 'gro ba drug gi lus dang  skye ba rnam pa bzhi'i lus so zhes zer te / / +bshad pa 'di dang sbyar na lus kyi yan lag skye zhing 'byung bar ni bshad ma thag pa'i ris rnam pa gnyis kyang gtogs bar bstan to // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#527464#527470#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10175;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10176;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10177# gzugs can zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rags pa dang phra ba'i bye brag go zhes 'byung ngo zhes zer te / / +bshad pa 'di dang sbyar na lus kyi yan lag skye zhing  'byung ba zhes gsungs pa ni / /

column3: 'dren mar ma gyur pa ni 'chab     // / +pa'i tshul khrims dang ma 'dres pa nyid kyi phyir ro // / +thun tshags ma yin pa ni de'i rgyu rnam par rtog pa dang ma 'dres pa nyid kyi phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#527414#527427#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10169;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10170;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10171# bshad pa 'di dang sbyar na lus kyi yan lag skye zhing 'byung bar ni bshad ma thag pa'i ris rnam pa gnyis kyang gtogs bar bstan to // /

column3: rang dbang can ni de'i gnyen po yongs su bzung bas bdag gis dbang nyid du gyur pa'i phyir te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#527428#527438#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10171;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10172;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10173# sems can gyi ris de dang de dag tu gtogs pa zhes bya ba ni mdor bstan pa'o // / +sgo nga las skyes pa'i skye gnas zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni skye ba rnam pa bzhi rnam par phye nas bstan pa ste / /
column5: 0.023#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2769960#2769960#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_9658# rgyu dang bcas pa dang  sgo nga las skye ba'i skye gnas su skye ba gang yin pa 'dren pa'i rgyu sgo nga'i  sbubs chags pas / /

column3: rkyen gyis mi 'phrogs pa nyid  kyi rgyus so // / +nog nog por ma gyur pa ni lta ba ngan pa dang smon lam gnyis kyis te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#527439#527449#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10172;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10173;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10174# sgo nga las skyes pa'i skye gnas zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni skye ba rnam pa bzhi rnam par phye nas bstan pa ste / / +de'i phyir slob dpon  rdo rje drang srong gi 'grel ba las / /

column3: nges par 'byin pa nyid kyi rgyus so // / +'dis ni tshul khrims yon tan bzhi dang ldan par ston te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#527450#527457#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10174;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10175# sgo nga'i skye ba'i skye gnas la sogs pa ni skye ba len pa'i bye brag go // /

column3: tshul khrims de'i rgyus mi thub dang  de'i gnyen po la brten pa ste / / +tshig gsum  dag gis dang lhag ma rnams kyis ni re re dang go rims bzhin du sbyar ro // /
rnam pa dang po gsum po dag gis ni legs par chub pa yin te / / +yongs su rdzogs pa nyid kyi phyir ro // / +gsum po gzhan dag gis ni legs par brtsams pa yin te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#527471#527482#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10176;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10177;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10178;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10179# bshad pa 'di dang sbyar na lus kyi yan lag skye zhing  'byung ba zhes gsungs pa ni / / +skye ba rnam pa bzhi las brtsams nas bstan pa yin no //// /

column3: legs par  yongs su dag pa nyid kyi phyir ro // / +mkhas pa rnams kyis bsngags pa ni 'phags pa rnams kyis bsngags pa nyid kyi phyir te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#527480#527490#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10177;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10178;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10179# skye ba rnam pa bzhi las brtsams nas bstan pa yin no //// / +bam po nyi shu pa / / +der dang po kho na sa bon thams cad pa'i sems dang  rnam par shes pa rnam par smin cing phan tshun 'dus pa rgyas shing 'phel ba dang     yangs par gyur nas zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni / /

column3: dge ba nyid kyi rgyus so // / +mkhas pa rnams kyis ma smad pa ni rnam grangs kyis kyang ma smad pa nyid kyi phyir te / / +zag pa med pa nyid kyi rgyus so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#527489#527498#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10179# der dang po kho na sa bon thams cad pa'i sems dang  rnam par shes pa rnam par smin cing phan tshun 'dus pa rgyas shing 'phel ba dang     yangs par gyur nas zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni / /
column5: 0.015#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#527924#527925#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10232# de la rgyas shing 'phel ba dang yangs par gyur nas zhes bya ba ni 'di la yang bshad pa rnam pa gnyis yod de / /

column3: gang zag bden pa mthong ba 'bras bu thob pa mngon par rtogs pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni mdo sde'i dum bu ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#527499#527515#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10179;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10180;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10181;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10182# der dang po kho na sa bon thams cad pa'i sems dang  rnam par shes pa rnam par smin cing phan tshun 'dus pa rgyas shing 'phel ba dang     yangs par gyur NAS ZHES BYA BA 'DI MAN chad ni / /
column5: 0.028#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#526664#526664#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10060# sems can gyi phung po las brtsams nas lus kyi yan lag 'byung ba bstan pa dang  der zhes bya ba man chad kyis sa bon pa'i rnam par shes pa las brtsams  nas skye ba lan pa'i bye brag rgya cher rnam par 'byed pa'o // /

column3: 'di las ni dmigs pa dang  las dang rang bzhin gyis lta ba phun sum tshogs par yongs su brtan pa yin te / /
bden pa la dmigs pa dang  'bras bu  thob par byed pa dang mngon par rtogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi lta ba phun sum tshogs pa ni lta ba phun sum tshogs pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#527516#527524#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10180;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10181;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10182# gnyis pa sa bon rnam par shes pa las brtsams nas skye ba len pa'i bye brag rgya cher rnam par 'byed do // / +'di yang rnam pa gnyis te / / +skye ba len pa'i gnas skabs kyi bye brag bstan pa dang  sa bon rnam par shes  pa len pa gnyis la brten par bstan pa'o // /

column3: de la mngon par rtogs pa ni bdag nyid kyis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa yin par rig par bya'o / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#527525#527532#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10182;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10183;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10184;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10185;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10186# skye ba len pa'i gnas skabs kyi bye brag bstan pa dang  sa bon rnam par shes  pa len pa gnyis la brten par bstan pa'o // /

column3: yid ches pa las ni / / +mngon sum nyid  kyis don gyis su // / +shes bya shes par byed pa ste // / +des na mngon par rtogs par 'dod // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#527533#527541#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10184;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10185;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10186# 'di yang rnam pa gsum du bstan to // / +'di lta ste / / +sa bon pa'i rnam par shes pa'i yongs su smin pa bstan pa dang  phan tshun 'dus pa bstan pa dang  rgyas shing 'phel ba dang  yangs  bar gyur pa bstan pa'o // /

column3: ces 'byung ste / / +de yang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab yin no // / +dge slong dag gsum po 'di dag ni nang gi dri ma yin / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#527542#527559#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10186;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10187;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10188# sa bon pa'i rnam par shes pa'i yongs su smin pa bstan pa dang  phan tshun 'dus pa bstan pa dang  rgyas shing 'phel ba dang  yangs  bar gyur pa bstan pa'o // /

column3: nang gi 'gran zla dang bcas pa    yin zhes bya ba ni mdo sde'i dum bu'o // / +'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug rnams ni nang gi sems skye ba na skyon rnam pa bzhi dag byed de / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#527560#527572#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10187;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10188;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10189;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10190# der dang po kho nar sa bon thams cad pa'i sems dang  rnam par shes pa rnam PAR SMIN ZHES BYA BAS NI SA bon pa'i rnam par shes pa'i yongs su smin pa bstan te / / +'gro ba de dag tu skye ba len pa'i gnas skabs su dang po kho nar skyes  pa'i nying mtshams sbyor ba na / /

column3: sems dri ma can du byed pa ste kun nas nyon mongs par byed pa'i phyir dang  dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams skye ba'i  gegs byed pa dang  dge ba'i chos skyed pa rnams las yongs su nyams par byed pa dang  gang gis ngan song rnams su yun ring por 'gro bar gyur pa de 'dra ba'i mi dge ba'i las kun nas slong bar byed pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#527573#527580#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10189;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10190# sa bon thams cad pa'i rnam par shes pa'i sems yongs su smin par 'gyur ba'o // / +dang po nying mtshams sbyor ba na sa bon pa'i rnam par shes pa yongs su smin pa las mer mer bo mngon par 'grub pa ni nying mtshams sbyor ba zhes  bya ste / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#527581#527590#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10190;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10191;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10192# dang po nying mtshams sbyor ba na sa bon pa'i rnam par shes pa yongs su smin pa las mer mer bo mngon par 'grub pa ni nying mtshams sbyor ba zhes  bya ste / /

column3: de'i phyir nang gi dri ma yin / / +nang gi 'gran zla dang  bcas pa yin / / +nang gi phyir rgol ba yin / /

column6: 1.192#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2390581#2390583#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9460;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9461# der mngon sum du 'gyur zhing khong du chud par 'gyur ba'i phyir skyes pa zhes bshad do // / +slob dpon dbyig  gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column7: 1.192#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2397793#2397793#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10299;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10300# dad pa dang 'dun pa'i ngo bo nyid do zhes bshad do // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las kyang de skad du bstan te / /
column8: 1.192#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2403882#2403883#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11053;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11054# bstan bcos theg pa chen po  bsdus pa las ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyis sgrib pa thams cad bsreg pa'i phyir 'od 'phro ba can zhes bya'o zhes bshad do // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las ni sa 'dir byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos khyad par du 'phags pa gnas bas gnas 'di'i dbang gis rtsa  ba'i nyon mongs pa dang  nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad bsregs nas thal bar brlags pas shes rab 'od 'phro ba can gyi sa zhes bshad de / /
column9: 1.192#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2404472#2404473#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11100;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11101# bstan bcos  theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa las ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung pa'i shes pa'i gnas yin pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa mngon du byed pa'i phyir ro zhes bshad do // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las ni 'di lta ste / /
column10: 1.192#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226752#226753#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1646;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1647# byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa rnam pa dgu po  de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus pa ni zang zing dang  chos dang  mi 'jigs pa'i sbyin pa zhes bya'o zhes bshad do // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las ni chos dang  zang zing dang  mi 'jigs pa gsum ni go rims bzhin du gzhan gyi dge ba'i rtsa  ba dang  lus dang  sems la phan 'dogs pas rgyu dang rkyen de'i phyir rnam pa gsum du bstan to zhes 'byung ngo // /
column11: 1.192#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#238145#238145#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3090# sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos bskyed pa ni mi rung ngo snyam mo zhes bshad de  slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las kyang de skad du bstan to // /
column12: 0.010#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2357771#2357771#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5466;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5467# pa'i dngos po yongs su grub pa zhes bya ba de 'grel pa'i tshig tu bstan nas bstan bcos de rnam par bshad pa yin no // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las mdo'i tshig 'di bshad pa dang sbyar na / /
column13: 0.010#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2403967#2403967#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11058# bstan bcos mdo sde'i rgyan la sogs  pa las sgrib pa gnyis kyi shing bsregs pas shes rab 'od 'phro ba can gyi sa zhes bshad pa dang  slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las rtsa ba'i nyon mongs pa dang  nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad thal bar brlags nas zhes bstan pa 'di ni shes bya'i sgrib pa gtan du spangs shing / /
column14: 0.010#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227064#227065#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1687;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1688# tshul khrims phyi ma gnyis kyi bshad pa ni / / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las bstan pa dang mthun no // /
column15: 0.013#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2403352#2403356#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10996# slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las kyang don gyis  slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa dang mthun par bshad do // /

column18: 0.016#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2385429#2385429#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8880# bstan pa rnams brda sprod pa yang 'phags pa sa bcu pa'i 'grel pa las so so'i skye bo dag gi mtshan nyid kyi sgrib pa zhes bstan pa dang  slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column19: 0.016#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2386565#2386565#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8998# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ni theg pa dman pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i ma rig pa zhes  bstan pa dang  slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las theg pa 'og ma'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgrib pa zhes 'byung ba yang kun du rmongs pa gcig bsdus pa yin yang don gyis ni kun du rmongs pa gnyi ga bstan to // /

column30: 0.020#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#475085#475085#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3301;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3302# 'di ni yod pa dang med pa gnyis su med pa'i mtshan nyid de bzhin nyid mchog  tu rnam par dag par 'jug par mdzad pa'i yon tan zhes bya ba nyid do // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las yongs su dag pa'i de bzhin nyid ni mtshan nyid med pa'i chos zhes bya'o // /

column5: 0.015#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#527496#527496#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10179# der dang po kho na sa bon thams cad pa'i sems dang  rnam par shes pa rnam par smin cing phan tshun 'dus pa rgyas shing 'phel ba dang     yangs par gyur nas zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni / /

column6: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2320968#2320970#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_1177;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_1178# rang gi lta ba mchog tu 'dzin pa la gnas pas zhes bya  ba ni gang du nges pa'i don theg pa chen po yongs su mi tshol bar rtag par sgra ji bzhin du mngon par zhen nas khong du ma chud pa'i phyir zhes bstan pa ste / / +de'i phyir bstan bcos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las ci'i phyir shin tu rgyas pa la sems can kha cig mos kyang nges par 'byung bar    mi 'gyur zhe na / /

column14: 0.020#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2392454#2392454#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9673# de'i phyir bstan bcos chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang  byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen po thob pa ni ji ltar bzhed cing 'dod pa bzhin du skad cig skad cig la ting nge 'dzin tshad med pa dag la snyoms  par 'jug pas rab tu dbye ba'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no // /
column15: 0.020#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2394211#2394211#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9882# de'i phyir bstan bcos chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las kyang mig la sogs pa'i dbang pa dag yongs su longs spyod pa'i mthu'i phyir dbang po drug  skyes par gyur te zhes bshad pas tshor ba gnyis po 'di ni nang gi dbang po drug la brten nas phyi rol gyi yul drug po dag la dmigs par byed pas yul las ming thob pa yin pa'i phyir de'i 'bras bu yul rig pa zhes gsungs te // /
column16: 0.022#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#536217#536217#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11297# bstan bcos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las mtshan nyid ji lta bu zhe na / /
column17: 0.022#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#502831#502831#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_7039# bstan bcos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa la sogs pa las ni 'dod chags dang  zhe sdang dang gti mug gi rtsod pa'i ngo bo nyid do zhes bshad do // /
column18: 0.022#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#223930#223930#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1294# rgya cher ni bstan bcos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus  pa la sogs pa las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o // /
column19: 0.023#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#519413#519413#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9048;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9049# yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba ni yang dag  pa'i ngag dang  las kyi mtha' ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhe'o // / +bstan bcos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las / /
column20: 0.024#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#547902#547903#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12726;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12727# ngo bo nyid med pa rnam pa gsum la brten nas skye ba med pa la sogs pa bstan  pa gang yin pa de la mtshan nyid la ldem por dgongs pa zhes ston pas / / +bstan bcos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa dang  mdo sde'i rgyan de nyid mdo'i tshig dang mthun no // /
column21: 0.025#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2364570#2364572#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6302# so so nas bshad pa mi mthun pas bstan bcos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las / /
column22: 0.025#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#224603#224604#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1393;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1394# rim gyis sgrib pa rab tu sel ba dang  sangs rgyas kyi chos sgrub pa dang  sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'o // / +bstan bcos mngon pa sna tshogs kun    las btus pa las ni / /

column3: phyir ro // / +de ltar na ser sna sngar dang phyi nas smos pa ni khyad par du bya ba'i phyir dang  ldog pa'i go rims yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir ro // /

column6: 0.029#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#543035#543035#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12175# de'i phyir bstan bcos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las rnam par rtog pa la  spyod pa ni dbugs rngub ba dang  'byung ba dran pa'i yul la dmigs so zhes bshad pa yin no // /
column7: 0.029#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2320969#2320969#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_1178# de'i phyir bstan bcos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las ci'i phyir shin tu rgyas pa la sems can kha cig mos kyang nges par 'byung bar    mi 'gyur zhe na / /

column3: lhug par gtong ba dang  lag pa brkyang ba dang  rnam par gtong ba la dga' ba dang  sbyin pa rgyun mi 'chad  pa dang  gtong ba phun sum tshogs pa dang  sbyin pa la 'ged par dga' ba dang zhes bya ba 'dis ni mi gnas par sbyin pa byed pa nyid dang  rgya cher sbyin pa byed pa nyid dang  dga' bas sbyin pa byed pa nyid dang  yang dang yang du sbyin pa byed pa nyid dang  log par  'tsho ba med par sbyin pa byed pa nyid dang  phyogs med par sbyin pa byed pa nyid ston to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#528049#528062#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10250;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10251;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10252;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10253;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10254# rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba las ji skad du / / +thog ma nyid du mer mer 'gyur // /

column3: mi gnas par sbyin pa nyid ni lan dang rnam par smin pa mi 'dod pa nyid yin par rig par bya'o // / +phyogs med par byed pa nyid ni dge sbyong rnams las slong mo pa rnams kyi bar dag la kun  tu 'ged pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: de la rigs kyi bu dga' bo'i zas la tshod zin pa ni 'di yin te zhes bya ba ni mdo sde'i dum bu'o // /

column3: so sor brtags nas zas za'o zhes bya ba ni bstan pa yin la / / +lhag ma ni bshad pa yin no // / +de la kha cig na re da ni longs pa'i phyir ma yin pa ni  gzhon nu rnams lta bu ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#528114#528122#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10262;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10263# mer mer po'i dus dang  nur nur po'i dus dang  ltar ltar po'i dus dang  mkhrang gyur  pa'i dus dang  rkang lag 'gyu ba'i dus dang  skra dang  ba sbu dang  sen mo 'byung ba'i dus dang  dbang po dod pa'i dus dang  mtshan dod pa'i dus so // /

column3: de rnams ni dgod pa dang rtsed mo'i bsam pa nyid kyis longs pa'i phyir za'o // / +rgyags pa'i phyir ma yin pa ni gyad rnams lta bu ste / /

column5: 2.384#TD4035E.TXT.r#128834#128835#TD4035E.TXT.r_684;TD4035E.TXT.r_685# mar 'dug pa na ni mer mer po zhes bya'o // / +phyi nang bcas par spris ma lta bur gyur te / /

column3: de rnams ni lus kyi stobs brtas par bya ba dang  yeng yeng por bya ba'i bsam pa nyid kyis rgyags pa'i phyir  za'o // /

column3: cha ba'i phyir ma yin / / +brgyan pa'i phyir ma yin pa ni 'dod pa la longs spyod pa rnams lta bu ste / /

column3: de rnams ni mdzes par bya ba'i bsam pa nyid kyis cha ba'i phyir dang  brgyan pa'i phyir za'o // /

column3: de la khrus dang byi dor byed pa dang nyug pa ni cha ba'o // / +gos dang phred ba dang  rin po ches klubs pa ni brgyan pa'o zhes kyang zer te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#528163#528175#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10270;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10271;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10272# yan    lag dang nying lag gi mtshan ma byung ba ni rkang lag 'gyus pa zhes bya'o // / +de skra dang ba sbu dang  sen mo byung ba ni de nyid kyi dus yin no // /

column3: 'di thams cad ni 'dod pa la longs spyod pa kho na dag la 'byung bas de lta bu'i bsam pas zas kyi bya ba 'gog par byed do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#528176#528187#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10272;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10273;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10274# de nas mig la sogs pa'i dbang po rnams mngon par 'grub pa ni dbang po dod pa'i dus zhes bya'o // /

column3: lus 'di kho na gnas par bya ba'i phyir dang  gso ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni 'ba' zhig srog yod    par bya ba'i phyir dang  stobs yod par bya ba'i phyir te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#528188#528206#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10273;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10274;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10275;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10276;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10277# de nas de'i gnas  gsal bar gyur pa ni mtshan dod pa'i dus zhes bya'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +mer mer po la sogs pa dus de dag ji srid kyis yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhe na / /
column5: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#128730#128732#TD4035E.TXT.r_670# mngal na gnas pa de yang zhag bdun phrag sum cu rtsa brgyad kyis mngal du yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur ro // /

column3: shing rta'i srog shing bsku ba bzhin no // / +bkres pa dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni za 'dod pa'i sdug bsngal bzlog pa'i phyir te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#528205#528215#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10277;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10278# zhag bdun phrag sum cu  rtsa brgyad kyis mngal du yan lag dang  nyid lag thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur ro // /

column3: rma bsku ba bzhin no // / +tshangs par spyod pa rjes su gzung ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni  lus gnas pa dang  lus kyi stobs dang lus kyi nyon mongs pa med pa de dag la brten nas 'phags pa'i lam bsgrub pa'i phyir te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#528214#528224#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10277;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10278;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10279;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10280;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10281# zhag bdun phrag sum cu  rtsa brgyad kyis mngal du yan lag dang  nyid lag thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur ro // / +de nas zhag bzhi lon na btsa' bar 'gyur te / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#528225#528234#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10279;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10280;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10281;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10282;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10283# bcom ldan 'das kyis mngal du 'jug pa'i mdo las / / +de ni zla ba dgu'am / / +de las 'das na shin tu rdzogs par 'gyur  ro // /

column3: tshangs par spyod pa gang zhe na / / +'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o zhes mdo sde gzhan dag las 'byung ba'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#528235#528244#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10282;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10283;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10284# zla ba brgyad kyis ni rdzogs pa yin mod kyi shin tu rdzogs pa ni ma yin no // / +zla ba drug gam bdun gyis ni rdzogs par mi 'gyur te / /

column3: de lta bu'i tshor ba  rnying ni gzhil bar bya la zhes bya ba ni bkres pas kun nas bslang ba gang yin pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#528245#528254#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10284;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10285# yan lag ma tshang bar yang 'gyur ro zhes ji skad gsungs pa lta bu'o zhes 'byung ste / / +rgya cher rnam par 'byed pa ni  bstan bcos rnam par dgrol ba'i lam bstan pa dang  mngal du 'jug pa'i mdo las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o // /

column3: tshor ba gsar ni mi skye bar byas nas zhes bya ba ni ha cang bza' drags pa las skye ba gang yin pa'o // /

column5: 0.021#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2352167#2352167#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4767;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4768# rgya cher rnam par 'byed pa ni  bstan bcos rnam par bshad pa las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o // / +de la ngo bo nyid bstan pa yang thams cad yod par smra ba'i gzhung gis ni / /
column6: 0.024#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#988618#988618#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_12691;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_12692# de bas na mngon pa'i chos bsdus pa'i bstan bcos las kyang / / +'gog pa'i bden pa'i mtshan nyid ji ltar shes par bya zhe na / /
column7: 0.029#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#536367#536367#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11312# rgya cher rnam par 'byed pa ni 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' byams pas zhus pa'i bstan bcos las 'byung ba bzhin du rig par bya'o // /
