column5: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#474727#474728#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3260;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3261# chos kyi sku mnyam pa la pha rol tu phyin pa rnams yongs su grub pa'i yon tan dang  mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa ston pa'i yon tan dang  sangs rgyas kyi sku gsum gyi yul yongs su mchad pa'i yon tan dang  'khor ba'i mtha' ji snyam par sems  can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba nye bar gnas pa'i yon tan dang  mi zad pa'i yon tan la sogs pa'o zhes bstan pa'o // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#475085#475087#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3301;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3302# 'di ni yod pa dang med pa gnyis su med pa'i mtshan nyid de bzhin nyid mchog  tu rnam par dag par 'jug par mdzad pa'i yon tan zhes bya ba nyid do // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las yongs su dag pa'i de bzhin nyid ni mtshan nyid med pa'i chos zhes bya'o // /
column7: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#477882#477883#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3626;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3627# 'di nyid dang sbyar te yon tan gyi ming bshad na de bzhin gshegs pa'i mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can dang  sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad par bstan pa rnams yongs su ma 'dres par gyur pa'o // / +slob dpon  dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column8: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#478758#478759#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3746;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3748;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3747# 'di ni mthar byon pa'i yon tan zhes bya ba nyid do // / +dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column9: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#529705#529706#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10481;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10482# gnas kyi khyad par gyi khyad par du 'phags pa'i gsung zhes bstan pa lta bu'o // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column10: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#533776#533788#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10974;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10975;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10976# bdag tu rnam par rtog pa de dag gis de la 'khor ba'i mtha' ji srid pa  de srid du rnam pa gcig pa 'gyur ba med pa bdag tu 'dzin pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ngo // /
column11: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#535458#535458#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11199# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column12: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#536669#536672#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11360;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11361# 'di ni gzhan gyi dbang gi mtshan nyid do zhes bya ba'i bar du 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column13: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2357137#2357139#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5395;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5396# slob dpon thogs med kyis mdzad pa'i bstan bcos las kyang sna tshogs kyi 'du shes dang bral zhing chos kyi kun dpa' la dga' ba thob pa zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa  las ni / /
column14: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2357533#2357535#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5440;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5441# chos kyi snang ba chen po thams cad du tshad med cing rnam pa yongs su ma chad pa'i mtshan nyid yang dag par shes pa zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las ni phyogs bcu mtha' med pa rnam pa yongs su ma chad pa'i mtshan  nyid yang dag par shes pa dag ni / /
column15: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2357965#2357966#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5490;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5491# gong ma bas ches gong ma'i rgyu yongs su 'dzin par byed do zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column16: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2385163#2385164#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8851;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8852# 'phags pa sa bcu pa'i 'grel pa las ni so so'i skye bo'i bdag  nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyi sgrib pa zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las ni so so'i skye bo nyid kyi sgrib pa'o zhes bshad do // /
column17: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2385917#2385918#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8930;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8931# bsags pa sa bcu pa'i 'grel pa las ni thos pa dang bsams pa dang bsgoms pa la sogs pa la kun du rmongs shing chos rnams brjed par gyur pa'i sgrib pa zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las  ni thos pa dang  bsams pa dang bsgoms pa dag la rmongs rtul zhing brjed ngas pa dang bcas pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // /
column18: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2386197#2386199#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8960;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8961# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ni nyon mongs pa phra mo kun du 'byung ba 'jig tshogs la lta ba la sogs pa'i ma rig pa zhas 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las kyang  bzhi pa ni nyon mongs pa phra mo kun du 'byung ba lhan cig skyes pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba la sogs pas bsdus pa zhes 'byung ste / /
column19: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2386810#2386811#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9022;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9023# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ni mtshan ma phra mo kun du 'byung ba'i ma rig pa zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel  pa las ni rnam par rig pa tsam gyi mtshan ma rags pa kun du 'byung ba dag ni mtshan ma'i rnam pa'o // /
column20: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2387048#2387049#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9043;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9044# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ni mtshan ma phra mo kun du 'byung ba'i ma rig pa zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las ni mtshan ma phra mo kun du 'byung ba zhes bshad  do // /
column21: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2403320#2403323#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10992;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10993# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa las ni 'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyi dri ma thag bsrings pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las ni / /
column22: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2404779#2404781#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11127;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11128# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa las ni sbyor ba las byung ba'i spyod pa'i mtha' yin pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las ni 'di ltar sa 'di la sbyor ba'i spyod pa'i  mthar phyin cing mtshan ma thams cad dang bral bas mi gyo ba yin yang mtshan ma med pa la da dung rtsol ba dang bcas pa zhes bya'o zhes bshad de / /
column23: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2405035#2405036#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11155;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11156# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa las ni mtshan ma dang rtsol ba'i mngon par 'du byed pa thams cad kyis mi gyo ba'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen  gyis mdzad ba'i 'grel ba las ni sa 'dir mtshan ma ji snyed yod pa rnams dang  mngon par 'du byed pa thams cad kyis mi gyos shing rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes rang gi dang gis 'jug pas so zhes bshad do // /
column24: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2405364#2405368#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11181;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11182# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa las ni so so yang dag par rig pa'i shes pa khyad par du 'phags pa thob pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel ba las ni sa 'di'i so so yang dag par rig pa'i shes pa gang yin pa de la blo gros zhes bya ste / /
column25: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2406122#2406126#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11252;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11253# chos kyi sku yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i phyir ro zhes  'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las ni sa 'di la 'dres ba'i chos thams cad la dmigs pa'i shes pa ni sprin chen po lta bu'o // /
column26: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#220614#220615#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_823;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_824# 'jig rten pa dang  nyan thos dang  rang sangs rgyas kyi sbyin pa la sogs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad las phul du byung bar pha rol  'gro bas de'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa zhes brjod do zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las ni 'jig rten pa dang  nyan thos dang  rang sangs rgyas kyi sbyin pa la sogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i las yang dag par 'das pas na de'i phyir spyod pa pha rol tu phyin pa zhes brjod  do zhes bshad do // /
column27: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#226115#226117#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1562;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1563# rnam pa drug po dag go rims de ltar bstan to zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column28: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#235701#235701#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2789;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2790# 'di ltar bsgom pa'i shes rab kyi dbang gis sems kyi kun tu spyod pa la dbang thob par byed cing de kho na nyid kyi don rtogs pas nyon mongs pa spangs nas 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba'o // / +slob dpon dbyig  gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column29: 0.015#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2385673#2385675#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8906;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8907# 'phags pa sa bcu pa'i 'grel pa las ni sems can gyi lus la sogs pa'i las  la spyod pa'i sgrib pa zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel ba las ni sems can gyi dngos po rnams la log par sgrub pa zhes 'byung ngo // /
column30: 0.015#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2398087#2398087#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10339;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10340# zhib tu de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel ba las ni mtshan nyid rnam pa bdun gyis ston te gnyen por gyur ba bkod pa'i phyir ro // /
column31: 0.015#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#238344#238344#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3123;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3124# 'di ni slob dpon thogs med kyis mdzad pa'i spyi mjug bsdu ba'o // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel ba las / /
column32: 0.016#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#473462#473463#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3136;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3137# go rims bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhing yongs su dag pa rnam pa gnyis su skye bar 'gyur ba'i phyir rnam par rgyu ba'i lam zhes bya'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel ba las ni thos  pa dang bsams pa dang  bsgoms pa'i shes rab ni go rims bzhin du dran pa dang blo gros dang spyod pa chen pos bgrod pa'i lam byed do zhes bshad do // /
column33: 0.016#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2357708#2357710#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5460;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5461# slob dpon thogs med kyis mdzad pa'i bstan bcos las ni rnam par dag pa'i cha mthun pa  rnam par ma brtags pa'i mtshan ma med pa kun du 'byung ba zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel ba las 'di lta ste / /
column34: 0.016#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#220982#220984#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_870;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_871# lta bar gyur ba dang   'chal ba'i shes rab thams cad sel ba dang  yang dag par rnam pa thams cad du chos rnams tha dad pa rab tu shes pa'i phyir shes rab ces bya'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel ba las ni 'di ltar rgyu'i dus su ser sna bcom nas sbyin pa btang bas 'bras bu'i  dus su dbul ba thams cad 'joms pa dang  longs spyod chen po dang  bsod nams kyi tshogs rgya cher sogs pa'i phyir sbyin pa zhes bya'o // /
column35: 0.016#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#237855#237858#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3050;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3051# zhes bstan pa lta bu'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel ba las ni 'di ltar sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul la sgrib par byed pa'i las ngan pa yod    pas ; /
column36: 0.016#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#238006#238007#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3071;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3072# de dag la zang zing gi sbyin pa mi byed do zhes  'byung ngo ; / / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel ba las ni / /
column37: 0.019#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2390583#2390583#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9461# slob dpon dbyig  gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column38: 0.019#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#244504#244504#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3913;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3914# ces bshad pa lta bu'o zhes 'byung ste / / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel    pa las kyang phal cher de skad du bstan to // /
column39: 0.019#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#474855#474855#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3273;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3274# 'di ni shes bya la shin tu sgrib pa med par 'jug pa'i yon tan zhes bya ba nyid do // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las ni nyan thos dang  rang sangs rgyas kyi shes pa ltar kha cig tu ni thogs pa dang    bcas la / /
column40: 0.019#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#475263#475264#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3329;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3330# 'dis ni sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa lhun gyis grub pa rgyun mi 'chad par gnas pa'i yon tan zhes bya ba nyid do // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen  gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column41: 0.019#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#475956#475956#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3415;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3416# 'di ni chos yang dag par rnam par gzhag pa'i yon tan zhes bya ba nyid do // / +slob dpon dbyig  gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column42: 0.019#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#476539#476539#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3482;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3483# 'di ni phyi ma la chos 'byung ba rab tu mkhyen pa zhes bya ba nyid do // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column43: 0.019#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#477177#477177#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3541;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3542# 'di ni rten tshad med pas  sems can gdul bar sbyor ba'i yon tan zhes bya ba nyid do // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column44: 0.019#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#477548#477550#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3585;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3586# 'di ni chos kyi sku mnyam pa la pha rol tu phyin pa rnams yongs  su grub pa'i yon tan zhes bya ba nyid do // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column45: 0.019#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#478129#478129#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3660;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_3661# 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi sku gsum gyi yul yongs su ma chad pa yon tan zhes bya ba nyid do // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column46: 0.020#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2316432#2316432#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_650# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column47: 0.020#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2403883#2403883#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11054# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las ni sa 'dir byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos khyad par du 'phags pa gnas bas gnas 'di'i dbang gis rtsa  ba'i nyon mongs pa dang  nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad bsregs nas thal bar brlags pas shes rab 'od 'phro ba can gyi sa zhes bshad de / /
column48: 0.020#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2387661#2387661#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9103# bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur  ba las sems can la phan 'dogs pa'i bya ba rtsol ba la mi ltos pa'i ma rig pa zhes 'byung ba dang  slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /
column49: 0.021#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227748#227748#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1767;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1768# theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis  byas pa dang  lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las kyang / / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las bstan pa dang mthun par bshad de mangs kyis dogs nas 'dir ma brjod do // /
column50: 0.026#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#536820#536820#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11387;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11388# slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis 'grel pa las ni grong dang kun dga' rab la sogs pa lta bur snang ba'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis tha snyad kyi rnam par rig pa ni 'di lta ste / /
column51: 0.029#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2314671#2314671#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_429# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / /

column3: de  rnams ni gcig la gcig ltos pa'i phyir de la rang dbang yod pa nyid dag la yod de / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#533789#533796#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10975;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10976;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10977;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10978# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las / / +len pa'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba ni ming gi rnam grangs bstan pa'o // /

column3: de'i phyir rnam par shes pa ni gang gi bya ba yang ma yin no // / +rkyen gsum las rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba'i rdzas skye la / /
bya ba med par yang yul gang la skye ba de'i rnam par skyes pas na de rnam par  shes par byed do zhes bya ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#533808#533819#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10979;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10980# ces bya ba ni go rims bzhin du 'jug pa'i phyir dang  sa bon thams cad skad cig gcig nas gcig tu chu bo'i klung ltar rgyun mi 'chad par 'jug pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: dper na grib ma 'gro bar byed do // / +me 'bar zhing 'gro bar byed do zhes bya ba bzhin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#525237#525238#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9887;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9888# nang gi len pa rnam par rig pa'i phyir dang  phyi rol gyi snod kyi rnam pa yongs su ma chad pa rnam  par rig pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ngo // / +rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa'i bstan bcos las ni yul rnam pa gsum la dmigs so zhes bshad de / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#533820#533830#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10979;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10980;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10981;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10982# ces bya ba ni go rims bzhin du 'jug pa'i phyir dang  sa bon thams cad skad cig gcig nas gcig tu chu bo'i klung ltar rgyun mi 'chad par 'jug pa'i phyir ro // / +bdag tu rtog par gyur na mi rung zhes // /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#240520#240522#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3411;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3412# mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni shes bya'i sgrib pa cung zad tsam la gnas pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ngo // / +bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa'i nang nas mdo sde khungs su bstan pa las ni gnas par bya ba shes bya'i sgrib pa yod pas zhes 'byung ngo // /
column7: 0.025#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#230940#230941#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2165;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2166# longs spyod chen po dang  bde 'gror 'gro ba dang  khon med pa dang  dbyen med pa dang  bde ba dang  yid bde ba mang ba dang  sems can la dbang ba dang  lus la gnod pa med pa dang  dbang che bar grags pa ni go rims bzhin du sbyin pa la sogs pa pha rol  tu phyin pa'i rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bur rig par bya'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +gzhan yang bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las / /
column8: 0.027#TD4050E.TXT.r#1099486#1099488#TD4050E.TXT.r_357# bdag tu  rtog par gyur na mi rung zhes bya ba ni rnam pa gcig tu zhugs pa nyid la bdag tu rtog par ma byed cig pa'o // /

column3: gal te de gnyis la bya ba med kyang bya ba ni yul re re de skye bar khong du chud pa rnams kyis bsams nas grib ma 'gro bar byed do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#533829#533843#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10981;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10982# zhes bya ba ni rnam pa gcig tu rgyun mi 'chad pa'i phyir rnam par rtog pas 'dzin par 'gyur ba'o zhes 'byung ngo // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#545545#545549#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12479;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12480# bstan bcos rnams snga ma ma bstan pa ni / / +bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa'i nang nas slob dpon chos skyong gis bshad pa las / /
column6: 0.028#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#528537#528537#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10332;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10333# phyi rol du ni 'od 'byung bar byed pa bzhin du kun gzhi rnam par shes pa nang gi len pa dmigs pa dang  phyi rol gyi snod kyi mtshan nyid la dmigs nas 'byung ba'i  tshul yang de dang 'dra bar blta bar bya'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +gzhan yang bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las / /

column3: me 'bar zhing 'gro bar byed do  zhes rjod par byed kyi // / +rnam par shes pa la ni bsam pa'i bya ba 'ga' yang med do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#533844#533855#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10982# bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa'i nang nas slob dpon chos skyong gis bshad pa las ni chos rnams kyi sa bon yongs su 'dzin pa dang  dbang po  gzugs can len cing gnas byed pa dang  nying mtshams sbyor ba dang  yongs su 'dzin pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa 'di len pa zhes bya ba'o // /

column3: de bas na 'di ni mi 'dra'o zhe na / / +khong du chud pa rnams kyis kyang de 'gro bar byed do zhes zer bas / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#533856#533870#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10982;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10983;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10984# bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa'i nang nas slob dpon chos skyong gis bshad pa las ni chos rnams kyi sa bon yongs su 'dzin pa dang  dbang po  gzugs can len cing gnas byed pa dang  nying mtshams sbyor ba dang  yongs su 'dzin pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa 'di len pa zhes bya ba'o // / +rigs med pa'i sems can dag gi gting dpag par mi nus pa'i phyir zab pa zhes gsungs so // /
column5: 0.024#TD4010E.TXT.r#2246454#2246454#TD4010E.TXT.r_2000# de lta bas na thams cad du dman pa la mos pa rnams kyis gting dpag par dka' ba'i phyir dang  shin tu zab pa'i yon tan rnams kyi rten du gyur pa'i phyir / /

column3: de bas na bsam pa'i bya ba med par yang dper na grib ma dang me 'bar zhing 'gro bar byed do zhes  bya ba de bzhin du rnam par shes pas rnam par shes par byed do zhes bshad pa 'di yang mi rigs pa ma yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#533870#533883#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10984;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10985# zhi ba la phyogs  pa'i rags can dag gis khong du chud par mi nus pa'i phyir shin tu phra ba zhes bya ste / /

column3: gal te de lta yin du zin nas kyang smra ba'i tshul de ni mtshan nyid med pa yin no zhes na / / +mtshan nyid ji lta bur by'a ka ra na las 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid bzhin te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#533882#533895#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10985;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10986;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10987;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10988# chos thams cad kyi yang dag pa'i sa bon yin pas rkyen gyis bskyod na rnam par shes pa'i rlabs rnams 'byung ste / /

column3: dngos po     // / +dang byed pa dang gzhi la rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di 'byung ngo zhes na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#533896#533903#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10987;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10988# byis pa dag  ni zhi ba la phyogs pa ste / / +de dag gi 'di la rnam par rtog pas bdag tu 'dzin par gyur na ngan 'gro rnams su lhung zhing 'phags pa'i lam la sgrib par 'gyur bar dgongs pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam par phye ste ma bstan to zhes 'byung ngo // /

column3: by'a kar na'i nang du brjod pa dang  brjod par bya ba ril gyis ma shes par sgra rnams kyi mtshan nyid byas pa 'byung ba gang yin pa de sus nyes / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#533904#533918#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10988;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10989;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10990# de dag gi 'di la rnam par rtog pas bdag tu 'dzin par gyur na ngan 'gro rnams su lhung zhing 'phags pa'i lam la sgrib par 'gyur bar dgongs pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam par phye ste ma bstan to zhes 'byung ngo // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#266095#266096#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6577;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6578# dbyings dang  rang bzhin dang  las dang  chos dang  rgyu dang  'bras bur rnam par smin pa zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni / /
column6: 1.192#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#242248#242248#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3608;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3609# nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs PA GANG YIN PA DE NI sangs rgyas kyi sa kho na la bskal pa gsum du  bstan to zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni rkang la yod pa lta bu rnam pa du zhig spangs pas nyon mongs pa spangs pa zhes bgyi lags / /
column7: 0.016#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#256224#256224#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5241;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5242# yang dag par blang ba'i spyod lam bstan pa zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs  pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni yang dag par blang ba'i chos bstan pa zhes 'byung ngo // /
column8: 0.018#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#248951#248952#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4430;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4431# bdud btul ba dang  mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa dang  chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang  yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las mtshan nyid rnam pa bcu gnyis su ston pa yang / /
column9: 0.020#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#258661#258662#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5573;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5574# de kho na'i don rtogs pa dang  thob pa'i rtogs pa bshad pa'i gos pa dang  mtha' gnyis par bral  ba'i rtogs pa dang  bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rtogs pa dang  dgongs pa'i rtogs pa zhes 'byung ngo / / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni / /
column10: 0.020#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228651#228651#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1877;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1878# mtshams rnam par grol ba'i mdo las ni rnam pa lnga zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni don rnam pa lnga zhes 'byung ngo // /
column11: 0.023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228866#228867#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1903;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1904# pha rol tu phyin pa dang mi mthun pa'i dngos po la mngon par zhen pa gang yin pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo  rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las kyang chags pa med pa nyid ni 'di lta ste / /
column12: 0.024#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2405615#2405616#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11202;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11203# mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni nam mkha' lta bu'i nyes pa dag la ni sprin chen po lta bu'i chos kyi skus  kun du khyab pas zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni sems can nyon mongs pa'i nyes pa las byung ba'i LUS GANG YIN PA DE NI nam mkha' dang mtshungs la / /
column13: 0.025#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#270215#270215#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7085;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7086# sngon shes rab  bsgoms pa las byung ba'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni / /
column14: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2384463#2384464#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8775;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8776# ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs kyi nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i  phyir sems rnam par gyeng bar gyur pa gang yin pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni gal te byang chub sems dpa' gnyid kyis non pa dang  sems kyis ting nge 'dzin la mngon par zhen pa dang  ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa gzhan gyi  nyon mongs par gyur PA GANG YIN PA DE NI nang du sems rnam par gyeng ba zhes bya'o zhes gsungs te / /
column15: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2384830#2384831#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8820;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8821# phyi rol gyi mtshan ma la brten nas nang gi yul gyi mtshan ma yid la byed pa gang yin pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni / /
column16: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2385684#2385684#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8907;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8908# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel ba las ni sems can gyi dngos po rnams la log par sgrub pa zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las kyang ltung ba phra mo'i 'khrul ba zhes 'byung ngo // /
column17: 0.026#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#246630#246630#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4164;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4165# de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa  dang rjes su mthun pa'i gnas nges pa'i don bstan pa'i le'u zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni / /
column18: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2334726#2334726#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_2787;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_2788# mdo las 'byung ba bzhin du rig par bya'o zhes 'byung ngo / / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las / /
column19: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2386840#2386840#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9024;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9025# ming rnam par gzhag cing ngo bo nyid brjod pa yang spyir rmongs pa gnyis bsdus par bshad na yang don du 'gal ba med pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las  mtshan ma rnams kun du 'byung ba zhes gsungs pa dang  mdo 'di nyid las mtshan ma mang po kun du 'byung ba zhes gsungs pa dang  don gyis bstan bcos rnams las 'byung ba dang mthun te / /
column20: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2403468#2403471#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11008;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11009# mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni snang ba'i sa zhes 'byung ngo // /
column21: 0.026#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227468#227468#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1740;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1741# ba'i thabs kyi brtson 'grus dang  sems can la phan 'dogs pa'i brtson 'grus zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni sems bskyed pa'i brtson 'grus dang  dge ba'i chos bsgom pa'i brtson 'grus dang  sems  can la phan 'dogs pa'i brtson 'grus so zhes 'byung ngo // /
column22: 0.026#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228689#228689#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1880;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1881# mtshams rnam par grol ba'i mdo las ni thog ma med pa dang  nyes pa med pa dang  rnam par  rtog pa med pa dang  yongs su bsngo ba'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni ma chags pa dang re ba med pa dang  nyes pa med pa dang  rnam par rtog pa med pa dang  yongs su bsngo ba'o zhes 'byung ngo // /
column23: 0.026#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228981#228981#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1919;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1920# pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa dang  da ltar gyi rnyed pa la sems 'brel pa med ba gang yin pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las / /
column24: 0.026#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#229505#229505#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1987;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1988# pha rol tu phyin pa rnams byas nas 'phel bar 'gyur ba dag byang chub chen po'i 'bras bu gnyer ba gang yin pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las kyang yongs su bsngo ba ni 'di lta ste / /
column25: 0.026#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#230802#230802#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2154;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2155# drug pa ni rang gi lus la gnod pa byed pa med cing las su rung ba chen po dang ldan pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni bsod nams can  gyi longs spyod thob pa'i phyir dang  bde 'gror 'gro ba'i phyir dang  khon med pa'i phyir dang  dbyen med cing bde ba med pa'i phyir dang  rtag par sems can gyi bdag po byed pa'i phyir bdag nyid kyi lus la gnod pa med pa'i phyir dang  mthu chen po'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ste /// /
column26: 0.026#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#247471#247472#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4259;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4260# mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni yang dag pa ma yin pa dang bral ba dang  mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni / /
column27: 0.026#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#260979#260979#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5878;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5879# yod par gyur pa'i grub pa dang  bya ba'i dngos po grub pa dang  grogs byas te grub pa dang  chos kyis grub pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las / /
column28: 0.026#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#273162#273162#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7444;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7445# mtshams  rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni rnam par grol ba'i lus las dngos po 'di lta bu yod pa ma yin no zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni / /
column29: 0.027#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#233239#233239#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2452;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2453# mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni 'jig rten med pa dang  tshol ba med pas bzod par byed pa zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni / /
column30: 0.028#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#534137#534138#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11022;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11023# le'u 'di las chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid kyi rigs  pa rgya cher ston par mdzad pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid kyi le'u zhes bya'o // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' yon tan gyi tshal gyis zhus pa'i le'u zhes 'byung ste / /
column31: 0.029#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#214636#214636#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_74;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_75# mtshams  rnam par grol ba'i mdo las ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs bcu gcig gi nyes pa zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par grol ba'i mdo las ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs bcu gcig ces 'byung ngo // /

column3: by'a ka ra na zhes bya ba yang rig byed kyi yan  lag yin la / / +rig byed nyid kyang nyes par bshad pa yin na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#533919#533927#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10990;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10991;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10992# zab mo nges par 'grel ba'i mdo las chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o //// /
column5: 0.018#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#542647#542649#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12124;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12125;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12126# rang gi ngo bo nyid med  pa'i mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste lnga pa'o //// / +bam po nyi shu bzhi pa / / +le'u 'di'i rnam PAR BSHAD PA YANG RNAM pa gnyis te / /

column3: by'a ka ra na lta ci smos / / +de las sgra rnams kyi skad kyi mtshan nyid smras pa de la 'phags pa'am / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#533928#533936#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10991;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10992;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10993# bam po nyi shu gnyis pa / / +le'u 'di rnam par bshad pa yang rnam pa gnyis su dbye ste / /

column3: 'jig rten gyis kyang rjes su bsnyag par ci ga nus re skan / / +'jig rten ni yang tshig gi tshul de yod do //// /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#533937#533949#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10993;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10994;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10995# le'u nyid kyi ming rnam par bshad pa dang  mdo nyid kyi  tshig gi don rnam par bshad pa'o // /

column3: bam po drug pa / / +gang gi yon tan dang ni skyon dag rtogs par mi byed pa de blo zhes ji skad bya / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#533948#533958#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10994;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10995;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10996;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10997# chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid kyi le'u zhes bya ba la yang bshad pa rnam pa gnyis yod de / / +kha cig na re ngo bo nyid ni rnam pa gsum ste / /

column3: rmongs pa med par gang gi yid la bde bar mi byed pa de bde zhes ji skad bya // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#533959#533966#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10996;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10997# gcig kho na ma yin pa'i phyir thams cad ces bya ba gsungs so // / +thams cad kyang rang gi  ngo bo mtshan nyid 'dzin cing dpe lugs kyis sems can gyi shes pa bskyed pa'i chos zhes bya'o // /

column3: gang gi de nyid shes pa'i shes rab kyis ni 'gro ba'i skye dang 'jig thob nyung thos kyang // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#533967#533984#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10997;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10998;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10999;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11000;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11001;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11002# thams cad kyang rang gi  ngo bo mtshan nyid 'dzin cing dpe lugs kyis sems can gyi shes pa bskyed pa'i chos zhes bya'o // /
column5: 0.025#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#522652#522652#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9517;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9518# de la mtshan nyid ces bya ba ni / / +ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam yang na dbyibs kyi mtshan nyid do // /
column6: 0.025#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#542698#542698#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12132;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12133# de la mtshan nyid ces bya ba ni ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam / / +yang na mtshan nyid kyi dbyibs so // /

column3: yul mi nyung la  'jug pa'i blo can de ni 'jig rten dag na shes rab can du 'dod // /
column4: 0.025#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#522652#522652#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9517;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9518# de la mtshan nyid ces bya ba ni / / +ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam yang na dbyibs kyi mtshan nyid do // /
column5: 0.025#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#542698#542698#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12132;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12133# de la mtshan nyid ces bya ba ni ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam / / +yang na mtshan nyid kyi dbyibs so // /

column3: gang gi blo ni mang du thos kyang skye ba shes par mi byed 'jig pa mi byed de // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#533982#533993#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11000;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11001;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11002# yang na mtshan nyid ni dbyibs kyi mtshan nyid de / / +'di lta ste / / +kun brtags la sogs pa ni chos thams  cad kyi dbyibs kyi mtshan nyid yin pas mdor bsdu na ngo bo nyid rnam pa gsum la thams cad ces bya ste / /

column3: sna tshogs gtam dag byas kyang 'khor ba 'jigs pa mang po dag las grol bar mi 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#533992#534002#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11002;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11003;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11004# kun brtags la sogs pa ni chos thams  cad kyi dbyibs kyi mtshan nyid yin pas mdor bsdu na ngo bo nyid rnam pa gsum la thams cad ces bya ste / /

column3: gang gis tshig gi snying ni sdud nus  dang ; / / +blos phra'i don mthong spyod pa thabs ldan pa // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#534003#534015#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11003;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11004;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11005;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11006# 'di ni bdag po'i dbang du mdzad nas rnam par bshad pa yin te / / +'di ltar ngo bo nyid re rer gyur cing / /

column3: de ni skyes bu'o de las gzhan pa phyugs // / +by'a ka ra na las kyang 'di ma nges par smras pa yin te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#534014#534023#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11006;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11007;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11008# yang na kha cig na  re de la chos thams cad ces bya ba ni mdor bsdu na rnam pa gnyis te / /
column5: 0.020#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#487739#487739#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_5041;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_5042;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_5043# rigs kyi bu chos thams cad ces bya ba ni mdor bsdu na rnam pa gnyis te / / +'di lta ste / / +'dus  byas dang 'dus ma byas so zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa dris pa bzhin du lan yang dag par btab pa zhes bya ba ston to // /

column3: mang du 'dren pa yin no zhes bshad pa'i phyir de ni mtshan nyid med pa yang ma yin no // / +gzhan yang by'a ka ra na las byed pa po ni rang  dbang yod pa'o zhes gang smras pa'i rang dbang yod pa zhes bya ba de ci zhig yin / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#534022#534031#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11007;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11008;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11009;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11010# 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas la sogs pa'o // / +bsdus pa dang rgyas PA YANG MA YIN PAR ni lnga ste / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#534031#534040#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11009;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11010;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11011;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11012# sems dang sems las 'byung ba'i chos la sogs pa'o // / +rgyas par bya na chos brgyad de // /
column6: 0.028#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#499143#499143#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_6537# gnyis pa ni kha cig na re 'dir rtog dpyod ces gsungs pa ni khams gsum pa'i zag pa dang bcas pa'i sems dang sems  las byung ba'i chos la rtog dpyod ces bya ste / /

column3: ci re zhig rang dgar 'jug pa yin nam / / +'on te gzhan la mi ltos par 'jug pa zhig yin / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#534041#534049#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11011;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11012;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11013# rnam  par shes pa brgyad la sogs pa'o // / +ngo bo nyid gsum po 'di chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir / /

column3: des cir 'gyur zhe na / / +rang dgar 'jug pa rang dbang yod yin na // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#534050#534059#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11012;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11013;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11014# ngo bo nyid gsum po 'di chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir / / +chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid ces bya'o zhe'o // / +bshad pa 'di dang sbyar na ngo bo nyid rnam pa gsum las ngo bo nyid rnam pa snga ma gnyis  ni thams cad kyi mtshan nyid ces bya ba las yongs su 'dzin pa'i rnam par bshad pa yin te / /

column3: sems pa med pa byed por mi 'gyur  ro ; / / +de'i phyir mes sreg par byed do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#534058#534068#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11014;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11015# bshad pa 'di dang sbyar na ngo bo nyid rnam pa gsum las ngo bo nyid rnam pa snga ma gnyis  ni thams cad kyi mtshan nyid ces bya ba las yongs su 'dzin pa'i rnam par bshad pa yin te / /

column3: shing gis 'tshed par byed do zhes byed pa por tha snyad gdags par mi rung ste / / +de gnyis la 'dod pa med pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#534067#534079#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11014;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11015;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11016# bshad pa 'di dang sbyar na ngo bo nyid rnam pa gsum las ngo bo nyid rnam pa snga ma gnyis  ni thams cad kyi mtshan nyid ces bya ba las yongs su 'dzin pa'i rnam par bshad pa yin te / / +ngo bo nyid gnyi ga yang chos thams cad dang LDAN PA'I PHYIR RO // /
column5: 0.028#TD4054E.TXT.r#1036329#1036329#TD4054E.TXT.r_7316;TD4054E.TXT.r_7317# bden pa ma mthong ba rnams kyis chos kyi ngo bo nyid de mtshan nyid mngon par brjod pa spros pa'i bag chags kyi sgo nas ji ltar bzung ba bzhin du byis pas bzung ba dang mthun pa'i ngo bo nyid de dang bral ba'i phyir ngo bo nyid med pa'o // / +yang kun  du brtags pa'i ngo bo nyid la mtshan nyid ngo bo nyid med pa dang  gzhan gyi dbang la skye ba'i ngo bo nyid med pa dang  yongs su grub pa la don dam pa'i ngo bo NYID MED PA'I PHYIR RO // /

column3: gang zhig gnyid log dbugs ni 'byin pa dang / / +mi 'dod bzhin du sdug bsngal myong byed pa // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#534078#534088#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11016;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11017;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11018# phyi ma yongs su grub pa'i ngo bo nyid ni chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid ces bya bas bdag po'i dbang du mdzad    nas bshad pa yin te / /

column3: de yang byed pa por    mi 'gyur te / / +'dod pa med par dbugs dbyung ba'i phyir dang  mi 'dod bzhin du sdug bsngal myong ba'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#534089#534099#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11017;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11018;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11019;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11020# 'di ltar chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid YIN PA'I PHYIR RO // / +de ltar bshad pa rnam pa gnyis yod mod kyi / /

column3: gal te gzhan la mi ltos 'jug yin na // / +gru 'gro ba dang ljon shing 'gul ba dang / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#534100#534108#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11020;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11021# 'og nas mdo las gsungs pa dag dang rjes su mthun zhing 'gal ba med pa'i phyir / /

column3: mi 'byung ba dang bum pa dag dang ni // / +chu gnas zhes bya rigs pa ma yin  no ; / / +'di ltar 'phul bar byed pa la ma ltos par ni gru 'gro ba yang med la ljon shing 'gul ba yang med do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#534109#534126#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11020;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11021;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11022# 'og nas mdo las gsungs pa dag dang rjes su mthun zhing 'gal ba med pa'i phyir / / +'og nas  mdo las kyang kun brtags dang  gzhan gyi dbang la thams cad ces gsungs shing yongs su grub pa'i ngo bo nyid la ni chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ces gsungs pa yin no // /
column5: 0.029#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2379486#2379486#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8197;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8198;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8199# mdo las ni / / +kun brtags dag ni yod ma yin // / +gzhan     // /

column3: skye ba'i rgyu la ma ltos par me 'byung ba yang med la / / +gzhi la mi ltos par chu gnas pa yang med do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#534127#534136#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11021;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11022;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11023# 'og nas  mdo las kyang kun brtags dang  gzhan gyi dbang la thams cad ces gsungs shing yongs su grub pa'i ngo bo nyid la ni chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ces gsungs pa yin no // / +le'u 'di las chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid kyi rigs  pa rgya cher ston par mdzad pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid kyi le'u zhes bya'o // /

column3: gal te de lta yin du zin kyang gru ni rten du gyur pa nyid kyis rang gi bya  ba dag la ltos pa med par 'jug go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#534135#534145#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11022;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11023# le'u 'di las chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid kyi rigs  pa rgya cher ston par mdzad pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid kyi le'u zhes bya'o // /
column5: 0.028#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#533916#533916#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10989;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10990# dgongs pa     // / +zab mo nges par 'grel ba'i mdo las chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o //// /

column3: de lta bas na de ni de la rang dbang yod pa yin no // / +lhag ma rnams la yang de bzhin du sbyar ro zhe na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#534146#534155#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11023;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11024# dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' yon tan gyi tshal gyis zhus pa'i le'u zhes 'byung ste / /

column3: de la byung ba'i phyir na rten gyur pa'i // / +de yang de dang gzhan du 'brel phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#534154#534163#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11023;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11024;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11025# dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' yon tan gyi tshal gyis zhus pa'i le'u zhes 'byung ste / / +rgya gar gyi dpe las tha  dad pa 'di lta bu dag yod pa'i phyir ro // /
column5: 1.192#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#534471#534474#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11067;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11068# phyi ma ni rjod par byed pa'i bstan pa zhus pa'o // / +de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' yon tan 'byung gnas la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to zhes bya ba 'di  man chad ni / /

column3: 'di ltar de la 'byung ba gang yin pa'i gru de bya ba dag la  rten du gyur par brtags grang na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#534164#534172#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11024;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11025;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11026;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11027# rgya gar gyi dpe las tha  dad pa 'di lta bu dag yod pa'i phyir ro // / +de nas byang chub sems dpa' yon tan 'byung gnas kyis / /
column5: 1.192#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3109942#3109943#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_2581# de skad ces gsol pa dang  bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' yon tan 'byung gnas la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to // /
column6: 0.027#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2353495#2353496#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4958;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4959# byang chub sems dpa' byams pas yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad du chos la gnas pa'i zhi gnas dang lhag mthong zhes kyang gsungs /// /
column7: 0.027#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#246686#246686#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4171;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4172# de  nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // / +bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku zhes gsungs na / /

column3: de yang de dang rgyu gzhan dang 'brel pa las 'byung ba'i phyir ji ltar de la rang dbang yod pa nyid du 'gyur / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#534173#534183#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11026;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11027;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11028# bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad du chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid la mkhas pa'i ba'i byang chub sems dpa' zhes  gsungs na zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa mdo'i tshig gi don yang dag par bshad pa yin no // /

column3: bya ba gang byung ba ni de la gnas pa'i phyir de la gnas pa na gru dang rang dbang yod pa nyid yin no zhe na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#534184#534197#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11027;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11028;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11029;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11030# bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad du chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid la mkhas pa'i ba'i byang chub sems dpa' zhes  gsungs na zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa mdo'i tshig gi don yang dag par bshad pa yin no // / +yongs su brtag par bya ba'i yul la rnam pa gnyis te / /
column5: 0.013#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#492549#492549#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_5717;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_5718# nor dang 'bru sna tshogs dang  bang ba dang  mdzod la  sogs pa'i bar gyi 'du shes dang  de dag gi rnam pa'i bye brag gi 'du shes 'byung ba 'di ni yod do snyam du sems shing zhes bya bas ni gnyis pa btags pa'i yul med pa ma yin par bstan pa'o // / +mdo'i tshig 'di yang rnam pa gnyis kyis bstan te / /

column3: gang la de rang dbang yod pas de'i tshe de la ci  zhig byar yod / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#534196#534206#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11029;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11030;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11031# don dam pa dang kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i yul dang  yod pa dang med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi yul zhes  bstan pa la / / +de yan chad du don dam pa dang  kun rdzob kyi yul rnam pa gnyis bstan nas / /

column3: skye ba yang skye ba po'i bdag nyid du gyur pa yin na de de'i rten du ji ltar rigs / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#534207#534214#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11031;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11032# 'di man chad ni yod pa dang med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi yul ston par mdzad de / /

column3: bdag nyid du ma gyur ba yang de la 'byung re skan / / +skye ba la yang skye ba thug pa med par gyur pas ha cang thal ches par yang 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#534215#534227#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11032;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11033;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11034;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11035;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11036# de yang sngar ni yod pa ni ngo bo nyid ston par mdzad de / /

column3: 'o na brjod par 'dod pa las byed pa po rnams kyi  sbyor bar 'gyur te / / +gang gi tshe gru 'gro ba la rang dbang yod pa nyid du brjod par 'dod pa de'i tshe gru 'gro'o zhes bya ba'i sbyor bar 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#534228#534247#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11035;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11036;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11037;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11038;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11039# de ni ngo bo nyid med pa rnam pa gsum po dag nyid do // / +le'u gnyis po dag las kyang yod pa la brten nas med pa 'jog par mdzad de / /

column3: gang gi tshe bdag nyid thob pa la rang dbang yod pa nyid du brjod par 'dod pa de'i tshe 'byung ngo zhes bya ba'i sbyor bar 'gyur ro zhe na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#534248#534263#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11039;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11040;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11041# pa'i ngo bo nyid ni yan lag yin pa'i phyir phyis ston par mdzad de / / +rigs pa de'i phyir slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i tshig le 'ur byas pa sum cu pa las / /
column5: 0.017#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#545700#545702#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12497;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12498;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12499# slob dpon dbyig gnyen  gyis mdzad pa'i tshig le'ur byas pa sum cu pa las / / +ngo bo nyid ni rnam gsum gyi // /
column6: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2391274#2391274#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9540;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9541# kun nas nyon mongs pa'i sa bon ni khyi gu sbom po lta bu'o zhes bshad de / / +de'i phyir slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad  pa'i 'grel pa las / /

column3: gal te brjod par  'dod pa las yin na gru 'dren pa na 'gro'o zhes zer ba ni gzhan gyi dbang nyid dam / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#534264#534275#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11040;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11041;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11042;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11043;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11044;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11045# rigs pa de'i phyir slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i tshig le 'ur byas pa sum cu pa las / / +ngo bo nyid ni rnam gsum gyis // / +ngo bo nyid med rnam gsum la / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#544637#544637#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12346;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12347# dgongs nas chos rnams thams cad ni // / +ngo bo nyid med bstan pa yin // /
column6: 0.0#TD4055E.TXT.r#2794286#2794294#TD4055E.TXT.r_94;TD4055E.TXT.r_95;TD4055E.TXT.r_96;TD4055E.TXT.r_97;TD4055E.TXT.r_98# de ma mthong bar de mi mthong // / +ngo bo nyid ni rnam gsum gyis // / +ngo bo nyid med rnam gsum la // /

column9: 0.026#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#545711#545711#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12500;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12501# dgongs nas chos rnams thams cad ni // / +ngo bo nyid med bstan pa yin // /

column3: rang dbang yod pa nyid dam / / +ci zhig tu brjod par 'dod / / +de bzhin du 'byin par byed pa na me 'byung ngo zhes bya ba yang ci zhig brjod par 'dod pa yin / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#534276#534291#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11043;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11044;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11045;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11046;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11047;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11048# dgongs  nas chos rnams thams cad ni // / +ngo bo nyid med bstan pa yin // / +zhes 'byung ba yin no // / +le'u 'di gcig kyang rnam pa gnyis su dbye ste / /
column5: 0.013#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2338313#2338314#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3193# byang chub sems dpas zhu ba gsol ba dang  de bzhin  gshegs pas lan yang dag par gsungs pa'o // /
column6: 0.020#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2329179#2329179#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_2181;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_2182# 'di yang rnam pa gnyis su dbye ste / / +byang chub sems dpas zhu ba gsol ba dang  de NAS ZHES BYA BA MAN chad bcom ldan 'das  kyis yang dag par bshad pa'o // /
column7: 0.024#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#522770#522770#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9534;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9535# zhu ba gsol ba dang  zhus pa bzhin du lan yang dag par gsungs pa'o // / +zhu ba gsol ba yang rnam pa gnyis te // /
column8: 0.029#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2336698#2336700#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3020;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3021# 'di yang rnam pa gnyis te / / +byang chub sems dpas zhu ba gsol ba dang  de bzhin gshegs pas lan yang dag par gsungs pa'o // /

column3: smras pa / / +gnyi ga yin no zhe na / / +mtshan nyid     // / +med bzhin du yang mkhas pas ci dgar byed pa po rnams sbyar bar rung ngam / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#534290#534302#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11047;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11048;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11049;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11050# byang chub sems dpas zhu ba gsol ba dang  de bzhin gshegs pas lan yang dag par gsungs pa'o // / +zhu ba gsol ba la yang rnam pa gnyis su dbye ste / /

column3: smras pa rung ste / / +'di ltar nges pa'i tshig gi chos nyid kyis rang gi mtshan nyid 'dzin pas na chos zhes bya'o zhes bya ba de la byed pa po dang las dang bya ba'i dbye ba yang med la / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#534301#534318#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11049;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11050;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11051;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11052;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11053# gang zhu ba bstan pa nyid smos pa dang  bstan pa ji lta ba bzhin du zhu ba gsol ba ste / / +'di ni dang po'o // /
column5: 1.192#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2370118#2370119#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7046;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7047;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7048# 'di ni dang po'o // / +mdo'i tshig 'di yang rnam pa gnyis kyis bstan to // /
column6: 0.015#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2382771#2382772#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8592;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8593;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8594# 'di la don rnam pa gnyis yod de / / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni / /
column7: 0.016#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#498011#498011#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_6410# dgongs pa zab mo rnam par 'grel ba'i mdo las ni tha dad pa'i lta ba dang  tha dad pa'i mngon par zhen pa  bskyed nas tha dad pa'i sder gyur ces 'byung ngo // /
column8: 0.017#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222939#222940#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1171;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1172# 'di ni dang po'o // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni bsgom pa'i chos rnam pa lnga ste zhes 'byung ngo // /
column9: 0.018#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#522459#522460#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9479;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9480# mdo sde'i mjug gi tshig mngon par bstod do zhes bya ba ni 'phags pa 'jam dpal tha mar 'byung ba'i phyir ro // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni / /
column10: 0.018#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2373966#2373966#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7506;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7507# 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis chu rnyog ma'i snod kyi dpe dang  me long yongs su ma dag pa'i dpe dang  mtshe'u 'khrugs pa'i dpe rnam pa gsum po de dag gis rang gi bzhin gyi gzugs brnyan gyi  mtshan ma so sor brtag par mi nus par gsungs pa'i phyir ro // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni / /
column11: 0.018#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#542985#542987#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12165;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12166;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12167# rtog pa 'di lta bu skyes bcom ldan 'das kyis ci'i phyir sngar  ni ngo bo nyid yod pa gsungs la phyis ni ngo bo nyid med par gsungs snyam du gyur to zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las / /
column12: 0.018#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#229386#229387#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1972;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1973# pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la sgra ji bzhin DU RANG GI MTSHAN NYID DU mngon par zhen pa med pa'o zhes gang yin pa'o // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las kyang rnam par mi rtog pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa las sgra ji bzhin  DU RANG GI MTSHAN NYID DU mngon bar zhen ba med ba'o zhes 'byung ngo // /
column13: 0.025#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2399142#2399144#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10457;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10458# rgya cher rnam par 'byed pa ni gong du rnal 'byor rnam par 'byed pa'i le'u las bshad pa'i skabs su bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni mos pas spyod pa'i sa de las yang dag  par 'das nas ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po rgyud la yod pa'i 'jug go zhes gsungs so // /
column14: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2392834#2392834#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9713;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9714# sems can dmyal ba ril dang  yi dags dang dud 'gro las kha cig ni gcig tu sdug bsngal myong ba gang yin pa'o // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las / /
column15: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2384117#2384117#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8737;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8738# 'du 'dzi'i mtshan ma'o zhes  bshad do // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni nyams par 'gyur ba rnam pa gsum dang ldan par bshad de / /
column16: 0.028#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2333291#2333291#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_2651;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_2652# theg pa chen po la yang dag par gzhol ba'i ched du gsungs pa'o // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las     // /
column17: 0.029#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2320094#2320094#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_1081;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_1082# dper na ba lang gi rmig rjes kyi chus rgya mtsho chen po'i chu dang bsgrun pa bzhin no snyam du sems pa'o // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni / /
column18: 0.029#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2392879#2392880#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9718;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9719# 'di ltar mi dang 'dod pa'i khams kyi lha ril dang  yi dags dang dud 'gro  las kha cig ni 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa dang mtshan mtshungs par ldan pa sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba dang  bde ba'i tshor ba dang  sdug bsngal yang ma yin bde ba yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba dang 'dren mar 'jug pas so // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las / /
column19: 0.029#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2315938#2315938#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_580;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_581# 'di nyid dang  dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las kyang / / +phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su tshor ba thams cad ma lus par rgyun chad par gsungs pas rgya cher ni mdo de las gsungs pa bzhin te / /

column3: brjod par  'dod pa las ni de'i sbyor bar 'gyur ro zhe na / / +gal te rung na byed pa po dang bya ba'i dbye ba med kyang rnam par shes par byed pas na rnam par shes pa'o zhes bya ba 'di yang ci'i phyir mi rung / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#534317#534326#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11052;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11053# dus la brten nas zhu ba po dang lan  gsungs pa'i rnam par 'byed pa'o // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba bstan pa'i mdo las yon tan gyi tshal zhes bya ba ni 'di ltar yon tan gyis gang zag yongs su smin par byed pa ji ltar shing mang po las tshal du gyur pa bzhin pas na dpe dang don gnyi  ga smos pa'i phyir yon tan gyi tshal zhes bya'o zhes 'byung ngo // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#534327#534338#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11053# dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba bstan pa'i mdo las yon tan gyi tshal zhes bya ba ni 'di ltar yon tan gyis gang zag yongs su smin par byed pa ji ltar shing mang po las tshal du gyur pa bzhin pas na dpe dang don gnyi  ga smos pa'i phyir yon tan gyi tshal zhes bya'o zhes 'byung ngo // /

column3: ci'i phyir na 'di la byed pa po med bzhin du brjod par 'dod ce na / / +rnam par shes pa tsam la byed pa  po nyid du tha snyad 'dogs kyi bdag tu lta bas kun tu brtags pa'i byed pa po ni 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#534337#534358#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11053;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11054# dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba bstan pa'i mdo las yon tan gyi tshal zhes bya ba ni 'di ltar yon tan gyis gang zag yongs su smin par byed pa ji ltar shing mang po las tshal du gyur pa bzhin pas na dpe dang don gnyi  ga smos pa'i phyir yon tan gyi tshal zhes bya'o zhes 'byung ngo // /

column3: ji ltar rnam par shes par byed pas na rnam par shes pa'o zhes bya ba de bzhin du rab tu shes par byed pas na shes rab po zhes bya ba yang rigs par  bshad pa yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#534359#534370#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11054;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11055# 'dir yon tan 'byung gnas zhes bya ba ni bskal ba dpag tu med pa nas yon tan gyi rgyu bsags pas 'di ni rgyu las ming du btags pa ste / /

column3: 'jig rten na khyim gyi grva zhum mo // / +grva rlos so // / +sgo 'di yul bcom brlag tu 'byung ngo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#534371#534385#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11055;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11056;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11057# bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yon tan rnams  kyi gzhi rnam pa gnyis bsags pa'i phyir yon tan 'byung gnas zhes bya'o // /

column3: lam 'di yul bcom brlag tu 'gro'o zhes gang ji skad du zer ba yang de dag la brjod par 'dod pa byed pa po 'ga' yang ci zhig yod de / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#534384#534401#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11056;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11057;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11058;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11059# chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid la mkhas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba ni gang zhus ba'i bstan pa nyid smos pa ste / /

column3: de lta bas na brjod par 'dod  pa byed pa po med par yang byed pa po nyid du bshad pa ni legs pa yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#534400#534420#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11058;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11059;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11060# mkhas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba ni brtags pa'i gang zag bstan pa'o // / +chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid la mkhas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba ji tsam gyis na chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid la mkhas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi lags / /

column3: mig dang gzugs la brten nas mig gi rnam par shes pa skye'o zhes bya ba de lta bu'i sbyor ba ni byed pa po gcig la bya ba gnyis yod pa'i dus snga ma shos kyi bya ba la 'byung ba yin no zhes gang smras pa de ci khyod  'dod pa yin nam / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#522914#522916#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9554;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9555# de dag sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa'i gsang ba la  mkhas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' zhes 'dogs lags / / +de skad ces gsol ba dang zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa bstan pa las brtsams nas zhu ba gsol ba'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#522926#522932#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9555;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9556;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9557# de skad ces gsol ba dang zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa bstan pa las brtsams nas zhu ba gsol ba'o // / +mdo'i tshig 'di yang rnam pa gnyis su dbye ste / /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#534420#534433#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11060;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11061;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11062# de bzhin gshegs pa yang ji tsam gyis na de dag la chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid la mkhas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' zhes 'dogs lags / /
column7: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#542134#542135#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12055# de bzhin gshegs pa yang de tsam gyis na de dag la chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid la mkhas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' zhes 'dogs so zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa rnal 'byor gyi sgo la brten nas zhus pa  snga ma gnyis kyis lan yang dag par bstan pa ste / /
column8: 0.019#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3109931#3109931#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_2580# de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa' chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid la  mkhas par 'dogs na yang ji tsam gyis 'dogs lags / /
column9: 0.021#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3110559#3110559#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_2660# de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa' chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid la mkhas par 'dogs par mdzad pa na yang de tsam gyis 'dogs par mdzad do // /
column10: 0.021#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#522903#522904#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9553# ji tsam gyis na sems dang  yid dang  rnam par shes pa'i gsang ba la mkhas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi lags de bzhin gshegs pas ji tsam gyis na / /

column3: 'on te 'jig rten na de ltar mthong ba yin / / +smras pa / / +'jig rten na de ltar mthong ba yin no zhe na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#534434#534442#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11061;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11062;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11063# de skad ces gsol ba dang zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa bstan pa ji lta ba bzhin du zhu ba la gsol ba'o // / +mdo'i tshig 'di yang rnam pa gnyis  su dbye ste / / +gang zhu ba bstan pa nyid smos pa dang  ci tsam gyis na zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni zhu ba nyid kyi tshig yang dag par bstan pa'o // /

column3: 'jig rten na ni gzhan du yang mthong ste / / +'di ltar de lta bu'i sbyor ba ni byed pa po tha dad pa la yang mthong ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#534443#534451#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11063;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11064;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11065# gang zhu ba bstan pa nyid smos pa dang  ci tsam gyis na zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni zhu ba nyid kyi tshig yang dag par bstan pa'o // /

column3: dper na mar 'thungs nas stobs 'byung ngo // / +seng ge mthong nas 'jigs pa 'byung ngo zhes bya ba lta bu yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#534452#534466#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11064;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11065;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11066;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11067# zhu ba gsol ba yang rnam pa gnyis yod de / / +byang chub sems dpa'i gnas skabs gang gdags pa zhu ba dang  gang la  mkhas pa'i ming 'dogs pa zhu ba'o // /
column5: 0.021#TD4037E.TXT.r#1367521#1367521#TD4037E.TXT.r_6986;TD4037E.TXT.r_6987# snga ma ni smon par bya ba'i don la smon pa'o // / +phyi ma ni smon lam nyid la smon par rig par  bya ste ; /
column6: 0.021#TD4047E.TXT.r#1201465#1201465#TD4047E.TXT.r_11362;TD4047E.TXT.r_11363;TD4047E.TXT.r_11364# sman snga ma dang phyi ma de dag bsten NAS ZHES BYA BA LA SNA ma'i gnyen po ni snga ma nyid do // / +phyi ma'i gnyen po ni phyi ma nyid do // / +yid ches par mi byed pa'i don  bstan pa'i phyir de'i tshig la mngon bar dad par mi 'gyur BA ZHES BYA BA LA sogs pa'o // /

column3: de bzhin du skar rgyal skyes sam / / +rgyal la skyes gang yin pa de'i mig de la brten nas rnam par shes pa skye'o zhes bya bar 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#534465#534485#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11066;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11067;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11068;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11069# yang na snga ma ni rjod par byed pa'i don zhus pa'o // / +phyi ma ni rjod par byed pa'i bstan pa zhus pa'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#544192#544194#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12304# de nas bcom ldan 'das  kyis byang chub sems dpa' don dam yang dag 'phags la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par bshad pa'i phyogs zhes bya ba ston to // /
column6: 0.0#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3109942#3109948#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_2581;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_2582# de skad ces gsol pa dang  bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' yon tan 'byung gnas la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to // /
column7: 1.192#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#534163#534166#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11024;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11025;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11026# rgya gar gyi dpe las tha  dad pa 'di lta bu dag yod pa'i phyir ro // / +de nas byang chub sems dpa' yon tan 'byung gnas kyis / /
column8: 0.024#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#245717#245717#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4046# de nas bcom ldan  'das kyis don de nyid yang bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa tshigs su bcad pas mdor bstan pa zhes bya ba ston to // /
column9: 0.024#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#269184#269184#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6944# de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa tshigs su bcad pas bzlas  te bshad pa zhes bya ba ston to // /

column3: dus snga ma shos ma yin pa la yang mthong ste / / +dper na kha gdangs nas nyal    zhes bya ba'am / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#534482#534492#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11068;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11069;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11070;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11071# de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' yon tan 'byung gnas la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to zhes bya ba 'di  man chad ni / / +gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas lan yang dag par gsungs pa'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#534604#534609#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11085;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11083;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11084;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11086# chos rnams kyi  mtshan nyid ni mdor bsdu na rnam pa gsum mo zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa bzhin du lan yang dag par gsungs pa'o // /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2370161#2370164#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7054;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7055# da dung rnam par thar pa mngon par grub pa'i don so so yang dag par rig par mi nus pa'o zhes     // / +bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas lan du yang dag par gsungs pa'o // /
column7: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#273635#273637#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7490# dngos po gnyis ni dkon no zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa'o // /
column8: 1.788#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2374408#2374410#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7553# stong pa nyid kyi rnam par sel to zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa'o // /
column9: 1.788#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2397590#2397590#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10267# rigs kyi bu sa de dag ni rnam par dag pa bzhi dang yan lag bcu gcig gis bsdus par rig par bya'o zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to // /
column10: 0.011#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2396299#2396300#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10124;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10125# rnal 'byor nges pa'i don bstan pa 'di la khyod kyis bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa zhus pa'i lan du yang dag par gsungs pa'o // /

column12: 0.023#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#506494#506494#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_7490# rigs kyi bu de dag thams cad ni byis pa rmongs pa mi gsal ba mi mkhas pa tshul bzhin ma yin par spyod pa sha stag yin pas don dam pa'i  bden pa shin tu phra ba shin tu zab pa 'du byed rnams dang gcig pa tha dad pa nyid las yang dag par 'das pa'i mtshan nyid rtogs par khong du mi chud do zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas lan yang dag par gsungs pa zhes bya bar ston to // /
column13: 0.024#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#261653#261653#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5979# mngon sum dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid dang  rang gi rigs kyi dpe nye bar sgrub pa'i mtshan nyid dang  yongs su grags pa'i mtshan nyid dang  shin tu rnam par dag pa'i lung gi mtshan nyid do zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni gnyis pa de bzhin  gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa'o // /

column7: 0.029#TD4037E.TXT.r#1338103#1338103#TD4037E.TXT.r_3070# byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi ngo bo nyid yon tan bzhi dang ldan pa de ni yang dag par blangs pa dang   rjes su slob pas bdag la phan pa dang  gzhan la phan pa dang  skye bo mang po la phan pa dang  skye bo mang po la bde ba dang  'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang  lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang  phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur ba'i phyir dge ba yin par rig par bya'o // /
column8: 0.029#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2741999#2741999#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_5820# de dag las kha cig ni gzhan la phan pa dang  skye bo mang po la phan pa dang  skye bo mang po la bde ba dang  'jig rten la  snying brtse ba dang lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir zhugs pa yang yin te de ltar de lta bu dang mthun pa dag ni nyon mongs pa rnams spangs pa'i phan yon mang po dag yin par rig par bya'o // /

column3: 'di ltar kha gdangs nas phyis nyal bar byed pa gal te kha ma gdangs na kha gdangs nas nyal bar byed ces bya bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir  ro ; / /

column5: 0.006#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#544255#544260#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12310;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12311# 'chad pa po rnam par 'byed pa dang  zhu ba gsol ba'i rigs pa dang mthun par bsngags pa dang  don zab mo zhus pa'i  bsngags pa brjod pa dang  zhu ba gsol ba'i phan yon bsngags pa ste / /

column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#534674#534689#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11097;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11098;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11099;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11100;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11101# rgyas pa ni chos yod mod kyi de yang mdor bsdu na ngo bo nyid rnam pa gsum mo // /

column3: mar 'thungs pa'i rgyu las stobs dang ldan pa nyid 'byung bar shes par bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#534688#534697#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11099;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11100;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11101;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11102;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11103;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11104;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11105# de'i phyir mdor bsdu na zhes bya ba gsungs so // / +gnyis pa ni / / +dgongs pa bsdus pas sdud pa  zhes bya ste / /

column3: de bzhin du mig dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis mig gi rnam par shes pa skye ba na mig dang gzugs la brten     // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#534696#534707#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11102;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11103;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11104;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11105;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11106;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11107# de'i phyir / / +bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa las / / +'di lta ste / /

column3: nas skye'o zhes bya'o // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid gsal bar mdzad ba ni 'di skad ces bka' stsal te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#534708#534718#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11106;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11107;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11108;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11109# slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis 'grel pa las / / +mdor bsdu na rnam pa gsum  mo zhes bya ba ni / /

column3: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba gang zhe na / / +'di lta ste / / +'di yod pas 'di 'byung / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#534719#534728#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11109;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11110# chos thams cad ni mdor bsdu na yongs su shes par bya ba dang  yongs su spang bar bya ba dang  mngon sum du bya ba'i bye brag gi phyir ro zhes bshad do // /

column3: 'di skyes pa'i phyir 'di skye ste / / +'di lta ste / / +ma  rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa bka' stsal pa / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#534729#534742#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11110;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11111;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11112;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11113# gsum gang zhe na zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa grangs zhu zhing ming bkod pa    ste / /

column3: sbyor ba 'di ci nas kyang rgyu'i don kho na yin par shes par bya'i / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#534743#534751#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11112;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11113# 'di ni grangs zhus pa'o // / +kun brtags pa'i mtshan nyid dang  gzhan gyi dbang gi mtshan nyid dang  yongs su grub pa'i mtshan nyid do zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa ming bkod pa'o // /
column5: 0.008#TD4029E.TXT.r#2137971#2137971#TD4029E.TXT.r_2264;TD4029E.TXT.r_2265# gzugs dang  sems dang  sems las byung ba dang  sems dang ldan pa ma yin pa'i  'du byed dag dang  'dus ma byas zhes bya ba rnam pa lngas bshad pa gang yin pa'o // / +mtshan nyid ni kun brtags pa dang  gzhan gyi dbang du yongs su grub pa'i mtshan nyid rnams so // /
column6: 0.012#TD4068E.TXT.r#604962#604964#TD4068E.TXT.r_3963# kun tu brtags pa'i mtshan nyid dang  gzhan gyi dbang gi mtshan nyid dang  yongs su grub pa'i mtshan nyid do // /
column7: 0.014#TD4048E.TXT.r#1687615#1687619#TD4048E.TXT.r_539;TD4048E.TXT.r_540# gzhan gyi dbang gi mtshan nyid dang  kun brtags pa'i mtshan nyid dang  yongs su grub pa'i mtshan nyid do // /
column8: 0.020#TD4035E.TXT.r#149451#149453#TD4035E.TXT.r_4304;TD4035E.TXT.r_4305# de la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste / / +ci yongs su grub pa'i mtshan nyid dang  gzhan gyi dbang gi mtshan nyid dang  kun brtags pa'i mtshan nyid kyi chos de yod pa'am / /
column9: 0.022#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3110304#3110305#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_2630;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_2631# 'di lta ste dper na shel shin tu gsal ba la nor bu rin po che aan da rnyil dang  mthon ka chen po dang  padma r'a ga dang  markat dang   gser du log par 'dzin pa de lta bur ni gzhan gyi dbang gi mtshan nyid la / / +kun brtags pa'i mtshan nyid du 'dzin par blta bar bya'o // /
column10: 0.022#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#539578#539579#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11745# ji ltar shel yongs su dag pa de la aanda rnyil dang  mthon ka chen po dang  padma r'a ga dang  margad dang  gser la sogs pa'i log par 'dzin pa yod pa lta bur gzhan gyi dbang gi mtshan nyid la kun brtags pa'i mtshan nyid kyang  de bzhin du rig par bya'o zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa mtshungs pa'i mtshan nyid de / /
column11: 0.023#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3112234#3112235#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_2932# de la gang dag gzhan gyi dbang gi mtshan nyid dang  yongs su grub pa'i mtshan nyid la mtshan nyid med par mthong ba de dag gis ni kun brtags pa'i mtshan nyid la yang skur ba btab pa yin pa'i phyir te / /
column12: 0.025#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2379566#2379566#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8213# de'i phyir mdo de nyid las gzhan gyi dbang gi mtshan nyid dang  yongs su grub pa'i mtshan nyid rnam pa thams cad du kun nas nyon mongs pa dang  rnam par byang ba'i kun du brtags pa'i  mtshan nyid shin tu rnam par bral ba nyid ces gsungs pa 'di ni ngo bo nyid rnam pa gnyis kun brtags yongs su spang bar bstan pas de'i phyir kun brtags pa yongs su bsal ba nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bstan pa yin par rig par bya'o // /
column13: 0.026#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3110001#3110001#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_2588# kun brtags pa'i mtshan nyid dang  gzhan gyi dbang gi mtshan nyid dang  yongs su grub pa'i mtshan nyid do // /
column14: 0.026#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#538687#538687#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11654# yang na sngon po dang  ser po dang  dmar po dang  dkar po la sogs pa mtshan  ma bye brag tu gyur ba snang ba lta bur ni gzhan gyi dbang gi mtshan nyid kyang de bzhin du rig par bya'o zhes bya ba gnyis pa rab rib kyi mtshan ma sna tshogs kyi dpe bstan pa'o // /
column15: 0.027#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#541972#541973#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12039# 'di ltar yon tan 'byung gnas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kun brtags pa'i mtshan nyid dang  gzhan gyi dbang gi mtshan nyid dang  yongs su grub pa'i mtshan nyid yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du  rab tu shes pa'i phyir mtshan nyid med pa'i chos dang  kun nas nyon mongs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi chos dang  rnam par byang ba'i mtshan nyid kyi chos rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes la zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa snga ma'i rnal 'byor bsgom  pa'i sgo bzlas nas / /
column16: 0.029#TD4051E.TXT.r#1247699#1247700#TD4051E.TXT.r_2124# de dag kyang gnas kyi mtshan nyid dang zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi dbang gi mtshan nyid dag ste / /
column17: 0.029#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3110509#3110510#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_2653# chos rnams kyi kun brtags pa'i mtshan nyid dang  gzhan gyi dbang gi mtshan nyid dang  yongs su grub pa'i mtshan nyid yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes shing / /
column18: 0.029#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2321705#2321705#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_1263# chos rnams kyi kun brtags pa'i mtshan nyid dang  gzhan gyi dbang gi mtshan nyid dang  yongs su grub pa'i mtshan nyid la yang skur ba 'debs so zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa nyes dmigs rnam pa gnyis kyi mtshan nyid bstan pa'o // /
column19: 0.029#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#509422#509422#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_7842# kun nas nyon mongs pa'i mtshan nyid dang   rnam par byang ba'i mtshan nyid do zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa bye brag gi mtshan nyid grub pa ma yin pas tha dad pa'i 'dod pa'i rnam par gzhig pa'o // /

column3: dus snga ma shos kyi bya ba'i don du ni ma yin no // / +re zhig 'di yang dpyad par bya ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#534752#534761#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11113;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11114;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11115# kun brtags pa'i mtshan nyid dang  gzhan gyi dbang gi mtshan nyid dang  yongs su grub pa'i mtshan nyid do zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa ming bkod pa'o // / +mtshan nyid gsum po de  dag gi ming yang spyi dang bye brag yong de / /

column3: gang gi tshe rnam par shes pa skye ba de'i tshe ci rnam  par shes pa yod dam 'on te med / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#534759#534772#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11114;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11115;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11116;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11117;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11118# mtshan nyid gsum po de  dag gi ming yang spyi dang bye brag yong de / / +de la mtshan nyid rnam pa gsum zhes bya ba ni spyi'i ming ste / /

column3: des cir 'gyur zhe na / / +gal te yod na de'i tshe de skyes pa nyid yin pas yang ji ltar skye / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#534773#534784#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11117;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11118;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11119;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11120# mtshan nyid ni bdag nyid kyi ngo bo nyid do // / +yang mtshan nyid ni dbyings kyi mtshan nyid do // / +rnam par bshad pa rnam pa drug las  grangs dang bcas pa'i dbang du mdzad nas rnam par bshad pa'o // /

column3: byung ba ni skyes pa yin gyis yod pa ma yin no zhe na / / +gang gi tshe de zhig pa'i tshe skyes pa yin par 'gyur ro // /
