column3: dge sbyong drug cu kha nas khrag dron mo byung ste / / +gnod pa de nyid kyis dus byas so zhes 'byung ba ljon shing gi phung po lta bu dang  gang las de na bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong  rnams la dge slong dag mi sdug pa sgoms shig / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#542345#542355#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12081;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12082# yang dag pa'i don du ni tshig rkyang pa dang tshigs su bcad pa gnyi ga la yang rjes su mthun pa dang mi mthun pa'i rnam par bshad pa yod mod kyis mdor bstan pa gzhag pa'i phyir / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#542356#542368#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12082;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12083;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12084# phyogs re re  smos nas phan tshun gcig gis gcig bstan pa yin no // /

column3: mi sdug pa bsten cing zhes bya ba nas phan yon che'o zhes bya ba'i bar du mi sdug pa bsten cing / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#542369#542379#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12084;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12085;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12086# tshigs su bcad pa dang tshig rkyang pa gnyi ga las rjes su mthun pa'i bshad pas bstan pa ni / /

column3: mi sdug pa bsgom pa'i bsngags pa bshad pa dang  de'i tshe dge slong dag mi sdug pa bsgoms shing / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#542380#542393#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12086;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12087;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12088# 'dir tshigs su bcad pa gnyis yod pa nyid kyis rnam pa gnyis su dbye ste / / +tshigs su bcad pa dang pos ni mtshan nyid med pa khong du ma chud pa'i nyes dmigs yang dag par bstan to // /

column3: mi sdug pa bsgoms pa na / / +rnag gi lus 'dis 'dzem zhing zhes bya ba nas mtshon 'debs par byed cing / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#542393#542401#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12087;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12088;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12089;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12090# tshigs su bcad pa dang pos ni mtshan nyid med pa khong du ma chud pa'i nyes dmigs yang dag par bstan to // / +tshigs su bcad pa phyi mas ni 'du byed rnams kyi skyon la mi rtog pa'i    nyes dmigs rab tu bstan to // /

column3: dge slong gis dge slong gsod pa'i bar 'byung ba ri dags bzlog gi mdo yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#542402#542411#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12089;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12090# dang po yang rnam pa gnyis te / / +de la tshigs su bcad pa phyed dang pos ni khong du ma chud pa smos nas kun nas nyon mongs pa mi spong ba'i nyes dmigs bstan to // /

column3: ci'i phyir theg pa chen po las sprul ba sh'akya thub pa sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa yin par bstan la / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#542412#542421#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12090;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12091# de la tshigs su bcad pa phyed dang pos ni khong du ma chud pa smos nas kun nas nyon mongs pa mi spong ba'i nyes dmigs bstan to // / +tshigs su bcad pa phyed 'og mas ni kun nas nyon mongs pa ma spangs pa  las brtsams nas yongs su ma grub pa mngon du mi byed pa'i nyes dmigs rab tu ston to // /

column3: theg pa chen po ma yin pa  la ma yin zhe na / / +byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni rgya chen po la mos pa yin pas / / +de rnams la sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid dang  mthu'i bdag nyid chen po'i khyad par bstan pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa skye ba bstan pa'i mdo bzhin du de ltar bstan par bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#542422#542431#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12091;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12092# tshigs su bcad pa phyed 'og mas ni kun nas nyon mongs pa ma spangs pa  las brtsams nas yongs su ma grub pa mngon du mi byed pa'i nyes dmigs rab tu ston to // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#542432#542444#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12092;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12093# de la nyams par 'gyur zhes bya bas ni stor bar 'gyur ba ste / /
column6: 0.024#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#248658#248658#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4396# 'di ltar sku rnam pa gnyis las sprul  pa'i sku ni rgyu las 'byung ba'i phyir skye ba 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid dang bcas pa'o // /

column3: gzhan du na ni  de rnams de ltar sems mngon par 'du byed par mi 'gyur la / / +mi rigs par 'gyur ba ji skad du bstan pa de'i lan yang ji ltar btab par 'gyur / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#542445#542457#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12093;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12094;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12095;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12096# 'di ltar kun nas nyon mongs pa ma spangs pa'i phyir shin tu gya nom pa'i de bzhin nyid rnam par dag pa'i  mtshan nyid kyi chos stor cing nyams par 'gyur bas so // /

column3: nyan thos gang dag de lta bu la mos pa'i skal ba can de dag ni de nyid las thos par 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#542458#542466#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12095;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12096;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12097# tshigs su bcad pa phyi ma bshad pa yang rnam pa gnyis te / / +dang po'i tshig gnyis kyis ni bag med pa'i nyes dmigs bstan to // /
column5: 0.021#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#494579#494583#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_5964;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_5965# bar ma'i tshig gnyis kyis ni 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i nyes dmigs bstan to // /

column3: gang dag skal ba med pa de rnams  la ni de bstan pa nyid skyon du 'gyur ro // / +de bas na theg pa chen po sangs rgyas kyi gsung yin no zhes bya ba de ni mi 'gal lo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#542467#542477#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12097;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12098# tshig phyi  ma gnyis kyis ni le lo'i nyes dmigs bstan to // /

column3: de'i phyir shin tu rgyas pa'i sde theg pa chen po yin no zhes bya ba 'gal ba med do // / +rnam par bshad pa'i rigs ba las le'ur bcad pa bzhi pa'o //// /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#542478#542491#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12098;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12099;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12100# de la 'du byed skyon la rtog par mi byed pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni 'di ltar rmongs pa'i dbang gis 'du byed rnams kyi skyon la mi rtog pas na / /

column3: brgal ba dang lan gyi rnam pa yang bstan / / +ji ltar mdo sde bshad par bya ba'i rigs pa yang bstan to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#542492#542502#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12099;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12100;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12101;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12102# des bag med pa bskyed nas sems can rnams la gnod  par 'gyur ba'o // / +le los chos gnas gyo ba'i chos rnams la // /
column5: 0.026#TD4047E.TXT.r#1214866#1214866#TD4047E.TXT.r_13307# de gnyi ga'i gnas las brtsams te gang bstan pa dang zhes bya ba yin te bstan pa'i chos dang  rtogs pa'i chos rnams kyi rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid kyi gnas phyin ci ma log pa'i rang dang spyi'i  mtshan nyid yongs su gsal bar byed pa'i dbang du byas pa la 'jug pa nyid ni bstan pa'i chos yin no // /
column6: 0.029#TD4047E.TXT.r#1133873#1133873#TD4047E.TXT.r_1821;TD4047E.TXT.r_1822# de lta bas na gan 'ga' zhig phan pa la rjes su zhugs pa de ni 'bras bu gyur pa'i bde ba la rjes su zhugs pa yin par rig par bya'o // / +mthong ba'i chos dang de las gzhan pa'i zhes bya ba ni mthong ba'i chos kyi 'bras bu dang  ma 'ongs pa'i 'bras bu bstan pa yin  no // /

column3: gzhan yang chos smra ba pos thog ma kho nar mdo sde bkod nas brgal zhing brtag par bya ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#542501#542513#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12101;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12102;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12103# zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni le lo'i nyes dmigs bstan pa ste / / +'di ltar le lo can gang yin pa de dag ni skyon rnams kyi rgyu dang yon tan rnams kyi sgrib pa yin pas so // /

column3: 'khor lan rnams la sred pa bskyed pa'i phyir ro // / +'on kyang sred pa chung ba yin ba    rnams la yang rna blag tu gzhug pa'i phyir gus par mnyan pa dang ldan pa bshad par bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#542512#542529#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12102;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12103;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12104;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12105# 'di ltar le lo can gang yin pa de dag ni skyon rnams kyi rgyu dang yon tan rnams kyi sgrib pa yin pas so // / +chos gnas pa  zhes bya ba ni mya ngan las 'das pa rtag tu gnas shing mi 'jig pa'i phyir gnas pa zhes bya'o // /
column5: 0.020#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#543345#543345#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12207;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12208# mig gis blta bar bya ba yin pa'i phyir gzugs so zhes bya ba nas / / +chos shes par nus pa'i phyir chos zhes bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar dag go // /

column3: gus par mnyan pa dang ldan pa 'di ci zhig ce na / / +gtam gang las gus par mnyan pa bstan pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#542528#542538#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12104;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12105;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12106# gyo ba'i chos zhes bya ba ni 'khor ba'i chos de snga ma byung bas phyis 'gag cing / / +srid pa gsum na 'khor ba'i phyir gyo ba'i chos zhes bya'o // /

column3: rna blags na dgos pa la sogs pa'i rim bas mdo sde bshad par bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#542539#542546#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12106;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12107;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12108# yang na chos gnas  pa zhes bya ba ni ting nge 'dzin to // / +gyo ba'i chos zhes bya ba ni rnam par gyeng ba'o // /

column3: brgal  zhing brtag pa byas na yang brgal ba ci'i phyir smos she na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#542547#542554#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12107;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12108;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12109;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12110# gyo ba'i chos zhes bya ba ni rnam par gyeng ba'o // / +med yod nyams pas snying brtser bya ba yin // /

column3: brgal ba'i mjug thogs su lan rnams bde bar khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir ro // / +sngar / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#542555#542562#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12108;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12109;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12110# med yod nyams pas snying brtser bya ba yin // / +zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste / / +le lor gyur pa'i phyir chos rnams la med pa dang  gyo ba'i chos la yod pa nyid du 'dzin pas med pa     // /

column3: mdo sde'i che ba nyid thos na // / +mnyan pa dang ni gzung ba la // / +nyan pa po ni gus byed 'gyur // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#542563#542571#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12110;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12111;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12112# le lor gyur pa'i phyir chos rnams la med pa dang  gyo ba'i chos la yod pa nyid du 'dzin pas med pa     // / +dang yod pa de'i dbang gis nyes dmigs su gyur pa'o // /

column3: de phyir thog mar dgos pa brjod // / +ces bstan  pa yin na / / +de ci'i phyir thog mar gus par mnyan pa dang ldan pa bshad par bya zhe na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#542572#542583#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12111;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12112;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12113# dang yod pa de'i dbang gis nyes dmigs su gyur pa'o // / +nyams par gyur pa de'i phyir ni shin tu thugs brtse ba'i gnas su gyur pa ste / /
column5: 0.016#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2389039#2389042#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9263;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9264# gzhan yang de nyid las gzhan la phan 'dogs pa'i nang na gzhan la phan 'dogs pa'i spyod pa'o zhes 'byung ste / / +rgya cher ni bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o // /
column6: 0.020#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2342000#2342000#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3609# mkhas pa rnam pa lnga rgya cher bshad pa ni bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o // /
column7: 0.020#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2349083#2349083#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4383# sems rtse gcig pa nyid rgya cher bshad pa yang bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o // /
column8: 0.026#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#259035#259035#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5616;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5617;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5618# shes bya'i sgrib pa de las rnam par grol ba'i shes pa'i spyod yul gang yin pa de ni shes bya'i sgrib pa rnam par dag pa'i shes pa'i yul gyi de kho na zhes 'byung ste / / +rgya cher de nyid las bstan pa bzhin te / / +bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las kyang de skad  du 'byung ngo // /

column3: dgos pa bstan ba la yang gus par mnyan par bya ba'i phyir ro // / +kha cig mdo sde'i don khong du chud par mi nus ba dag 'byung bas de dag la chos tsam la yang gus bar mnyan pas bsod nams  bskyed par bya ba'i phyir dang  don khong du chud pa la smos bas shes rab kyi khams bskyed par bya ba'i phyir / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#542584#542598#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12113;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12114;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12115# nyams par 'gyur ba rgya cher bshad pa ni bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las 'byung ba bzhin du rig par  bya'o // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni chos yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin shes pas na / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#542599#542612#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12115;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12116;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12117;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12118# kun nas nyon mongs chos kyi mtshan nyid spong // /
column6: 0.011#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#542260#542266#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12070;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12071# kun nas nyon mongs mtshan nyid chos mi spong // /
column7: 0.024#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#522461#522462#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9479;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9480;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9481# mdo sde'i mjug gi tshig mngon par bstod do zhes bya ba ni 'phags pa 'jam dpal tha mar 'byung BA'I PHYIR RO // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni / /
column8: 0.024#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2357499#2357500#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5436;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5437# phyogs bcu bye brag med pa'i mtshan nyid dang chos kyi snang ba tshad med pa yang dag par shes pa zhes bya ba ni gsum pa chos kyi  snang ba yang DAG PAR KHONG DU CHUD pa'i 'bras bu bstan pa'o // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du / /
column9: 0.024#TD4001E.TXT.r#1975106#1975106#TD4001E.TXT.r_369# kun nas nyon mongs spong 'dod pas // /
column10: 0.026#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#225121#225121#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1452;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1453# rgyun mi 'chad par dge ba'i phyogs kyi chos bsgom par mi nus te / / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par 'grel ba'i mdo las ni lus kyi mngon sum du zhes 'byung ngo // /
column11: 0.027#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2399142#2399142#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10457;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10458# rgya cher rnam par 'byed pa ni gong du rnal 'byor rnam par 'byed pa'i le'u las bshad pa'i skabs su bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni mos pas spyod pa'i sa de las yang dag  par 'das nas ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po rgyud la yod pa'i 'jug go zhes gsungs so // /
column12: 0.029#TD4049E.TXT.r#2302898#2302898#TD4049E.TXT.r_2666# sred pas ni ro myong ba'i kun nas nyon mongs pas  kun nas nyon mongs so // /

column3: gdon mi za bar thog mar gus par mnyan ba dang ldan pa bshad par bya'o // / +ji ltar bshad par bya zhe na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#542613#542621#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12117;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12118;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12119;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12120# rnam par dag pa'i chos ni thob par 'gyur // / +'dus  byas skyon la rtog par mi byed pa // /

column3: rnam pa gsum dag gis te / / +yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug  pa nyid dang  dgos pa yang dag par bstan pa nyid dang  rmugs pa dang  gnyid dang log pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams kyis zhum pa dang  sems rnam par gyengs pa rnams la yang mtshan dang  rab tu dga' ba dang  skyo ba'i gtam nye bar bsgrub pa nyid kyis so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#542622#542640#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12119;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12120;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12121;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12122;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12123;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12124# le lo dang ni bag med rab tu bcom // / +chos rnams dag ni rtag tu mi gyo bas // /
column5: 0.021#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#230242#230242#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2095;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2096# 'dod PA LA DGA' BA DANG  longs spyod dang  dbang  phyug ces 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni / /
column6: 0.024#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#270215#270215#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7085;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7086# sngon shes rab  bsgoms pa las byung ba'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni / /
column7: 0.024#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2385684#2385684#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8907;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8908# slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel ba las ni sems can gyi dngos po rnams la log par sgrub pa zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las kyang ltung ba phra mo'i 'khrul ba zhes 'byung ngo // /
column8: 0.025#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2384463#2384464#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8775;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8776# ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs kyi nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i  phyir SEMS RNAM PAR GYENG BAR gyur pa gang yin pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni gal te byang chub sems dpa' gnyid kyis non pa dang  sems kyis ting nge 'dzin la mngon par zhen pa dang  ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa gzhan gyi  nyon mongs par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni nang DU SEMS RNAM PAR GYENG BA zhes bya'o zhes gsungs te / /
column9: 0.025#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2384830#2384831#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8820;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8821# phyi rol gyi mtshan ma la brten nas nang gi yul gyi mtshan ma yid la byed pa gang yin pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni / /
column10: 0.026#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#248951#248952#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4430;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4431# bdud btul ba dang  mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa dang  chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang  yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las mtshan nyid rnam pa bcu gnyis su ston pa yang / /
column11: 0.026#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#256224#256224#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5241;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5242# yang dag par blang ba'i spyod lam bstan pa zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs  pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni yang dag par blang ba'i chos bstan pa zhes 'byung ngo // /
column12: 0.027#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#533913#533913#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10988;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10989;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10990# de dag gi 'di LA RNAM PAR RTOG PAS bdag tu 'dzin par gyur na ngan 'gro rnams su lhung zhing 'phags pa'i lam la sgrib par 'gyur bar dgongs pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam par phye ste ma bstan to zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa     // / +zab mo nges par 'grel ba'i mdo las chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o //// /
column13: 0.027#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#242248#242248#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3608;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3609# nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi sa kho na la bskal pa gsum du  bstan to zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni rkang la yod pa lta bu rnam pa du zhig spangs pas nyon mongs pa spangs pa zhes bgyi lags / /
column14: 0.027#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2334726#2334727#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_2787;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_2788# mdo las 'byung ba bzhin du rig par bya'o zhes 'byung ngo / / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las / /
column15: 0.027#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2386840#2386840#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9024;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9025# ming rnam par gzhag cing ngo bo nyid brjod pa yang spyir rmongs pa gnyis bsdus par bshad na yang don du 'gal ba med pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las  mtshan ma rnams kun du 'byung ba zhes gsungs pa dang  mdo 'di nyid las mtshan ma mang po kun du 'byung ba zhes gsungs pa dang  don gyis bstan bcos rnams las 'byung ba dang mthun te / /
column16: 0.027#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2403468#2403471#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11008;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11009# mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni snang ba'i sa zhes 'byung ngo // /
column17: 0.027#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2405615#2405615#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11202;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_11203# mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni nam mkha' lta bu'i nyes pa dag la ni sprin chen po lta bu'i chos kyi skus  kun du khyab pas zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni sems can nyon mongs pa'i nyes pa las byung ba'i lus gang yin pa de ni nam mkha' dang mtshungs la / /
column18: 0.027#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#227468#227468#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1740;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1741# ba'i thabs kyi brtson 'grus dang  sems can la phan 'dogs pa'i brtson 'grus zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni sems bskyed pa'i brtson 'grus dang  dge ba'i chos bsgom pa'i brtson 'grus dang  sems  can la phan 'dogs pa'i brtson 'grus so zhes 'byung ngo // /
column19: 0.027#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228689#228689#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1880;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1881# mtshams rnam par grol ba'i mdo las ni thog ma med pa dang  nyes pa med pa dang  rnam par  rtog pa med pa dang  yongs su bsngo ba'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni ma chags pa dang re ba med pa dang  nyes pa med pa dang  rnam par rtog pa med pa dang  yongs su bsngo ba'o zhes 'byung ngo // /
column20: 0.027#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228866#228866#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1903;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1904# pha rol tu phyin pa dang mi mthun pa'i dngos po la mngon par zhen pa gang yin pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo  rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las kyang chags pa med pa nyid ni 'di lta ste / /
column21: 0.027#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228981#228981#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1919;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1920# pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa dang  da ltar gyi rnyed pa la sems 'brel pa med ba gang yin pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las / /
column22: 0.027#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#229505#229505#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1987;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1988# pha rol tu phyin pa rnams byas nas 'phel bar 'gyur ba dag byang chub chen po'i 'bras bu gnyer ba gang yin pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las kyang yongs su bsngo ba ni 'di lta ste / /
column23: 0.027#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#230802#230802#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2154;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2155# drug pa ni rang gi lus la gnod pa byed pa med cing las su rung ba chen po dang ldan pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni bsod nams can  gyi longs spyod thob pa'i phyir dang  bde 'gror 'gro ba'i phyir dang  khon med pa'i phyir dang  dbyen med cing bde ba med pa'i phyir dang  rtag par sems can gyi bdag po byed pa'i phyir bdag nyid kyi lus la gnod pa med pa'i phyir dang  mthu chen po'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ste /// /
column24: 0.027#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#247471#247471#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4259;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4260# mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni yang dag pa ma yin pa dang bral ba dang  mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni / /
column25: 0.027#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#258661#258662#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5573;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5574# de kho na'i don rtogs pa dang  thob pa'i rtogs pa bshad pa'i gos pa dang  mtha' gnyis par bral  ba'i rtogs pa dang  bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rtogs pa dang  dgongs pa'i rtogs pa zhes 'byung ngo / / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni / /
column26: 0.027#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#260979#260979#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5878;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_5879# yod par gyur pa'i grub pa dang  bya ba'i dngos po grub pa dang  grogs byas te grub pa dang  chos kyis grub pa'o zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las / /
column27: 0.027#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#273162#273162#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7444;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7445# mtshams  rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni rnam par grol ba'i lus las dngos po 'di lta bu yod pa ma yin no zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni / /
column28: 0.027#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#233239#233239#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2452;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_2453# mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni 'jig rten med pa dang  tshol ba med pas bzod par byed pa zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni / /
column29: 0.028#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#228651#228651#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1877;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1878# mtshams rnam par grol ba'i mdo las ni rnam pa lnga zhes 'byung ngo // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni don rnam pa lnga zhes 'byung ngo // /

column3: ji ltar  na yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug pa nyid kyis she na / / +gus bar chos mnyan par bya'o zhes bya bas yang dag par 'dzud pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#542641#542657#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12124;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12125;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12126;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12127# rang gi ngo bo nyid med  pa'i mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste lnga pa'o //// /
column5: 0.018#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#533925#533927#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10990;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10991;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10992# zab mo nges par 'grel ba'i mdo las chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o //// / +bam po nyi shu gnyis pa / / +le'u 'di rnam par bshad pa yang rnam pa gnyis su dbye ste / /
column6: 0.019#TD4037E.TXT.r#1376019#1376020#TD4037E.TXT.r_7931;TD4037E.TXT.r_7932# byang chub sems dpa'i sa'i gzhi'i rnal 'byor gyi gnas tha ma las mtshan dang dpe byad bzang  po'i le'u ste lnga pa'o //// / +bam po nyi shu rtsa gcig pa / /

column3: 'dir yang dag par 'dzud pa ni yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug pa yin par rig par bya'o // / +sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni 'khor la chos ston par mdzad  pa na dbyangs yan lag lnga dang ldan pa zhal nas 'byung ngo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#486341#486347#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_4835;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_4836# le'u'i ming rnam par bshad pa dang  mdo'i tshig gi don rnam par bshad pa'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#542657#542671#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12127;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12128;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12129;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12130# le'u nyid kyi ming rnam par bshad pa dang  mdo'i tshig don rnam par bshad pa'o // /
column6: 0.016#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#522545#522549#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9501;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9502# le'u 'di gcig rnam par bshad pa yang rnam pa gnyis kyis  bstan te / / +le'u 'di nyid kyi ming rnam par bshad pa dang  mdo'i tshig 'di yang rnam par bshad pa'o // /
column7: 0.016#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2339927#2339931#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3401;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3402;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3403# le'u 'di'i bshad pa yang mdor bsdu na rnam pa gnyis te / / +le'u 'di nyid kyi ming rnam par bshad pa dang  mdo'i tshig nyid yang dag par bshad pa'o // /

column3: re zhig de yang de lta bu'i yon tan dang ldan pa'i gsung gis chos ston pa na / / +dge slong dag khyed la chos bstan gyi de'i phyir nyon la legs par rab tu yid la byos shig ces de ltar yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug par mdzad pa yin     // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#542670#542686#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12128;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12129;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12130;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12131# de la rang gi ngo bo nyid med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi  le'u zhes bya ba la / / +ngo bo nyid med pa ni mdor bsdu na rnam pa gsum ste / / +mtshan nyid rang gi ngo bo nyid med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang skye ba rang gi ngo bo nyid med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang  don dam pa rang gi ngo bo nyid de / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#542686#542694#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12131;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12132# de la rang gi ngo bo nyid med pa zhes bya bas ni  ngo bo nyid med pa rnam pa gsum rab tu bstan pa'i phyir rang gi ngo bo nyid med pa zhes bya ba gsungs so / /
column6: 0.026#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#548163#548163#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12752# ngo bo nyid med pa rnam pa gsum tha dad par mthong ba la ngo bo nyid ces bya ba ma yin pas de'i phyir  ngo bo nyid med pa nyid rnam pa gsum zhes bshad pa yin no zhes bstan par 'gyur ro // /
column7: 0.027#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#238888#238889#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3199;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3200# 'di  ltar de bzhin nyid kyi rnam pa gcig la ngo bo nyid dang bcas pa dang  ngo bo nyid med pa'i don tshang bar yod pa'i phyir ro // / +yang na ngo bo nyid med pa nyid rnam pa gsum po dag la yang ngo bo nyid med pa dang  ngo bo nyid dang bcas pa'i don yang rnam pa gnyis kyang yod na ci'i phyir ngo bo nyid dang bcas pa'i don  'dzin par mi byed ces bya ba'i tha tshig go // /

column3: na bdag cag la lta smos kyang ci dgos pas so // / +dbyangs kyi yan lag lnga ni 'brug sgra ltar zab ba dang  snyan cing 'jebs la rnar snyan pa dang  yid du 'ong zhing dga' bar byed pa dang  rnam par gsal zhing rnam par rig par bya ba dang  mnyan par 'os shing  mi mthun pa med pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#542693#542706#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12131;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12132;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12133;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12134# de la rang gi ngo bo nyid med pa zhes bya bas ni  ngo bo nyid med pa rnam pa gsum rab tu bstan pa'i phyir rang gi ngo bo nyid med pa zhes bya ba gsungs so / / +de la mtshan nyid ces bya ba ni ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#542706#542717#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12134;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12135# ngo bo nyid med pa gsum po de dag kyang go rims bzhin du ngo bo  nyid rnam pa gsum gyi bdag nyid kyi mtshan nyid do // /
column6: 1.192#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#522650#522652#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9516;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9517;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9518# yul tha dad pa drug po dag la rags par  gyo ba dang  bar du chod pa'i rnam par rig pas 'jug pa'i phyir ro // / +de la mtshan nyid ces bya ba ni / / +ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam yang na dbyibs kyi mtshan nyid do // /
column7: 0.025#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#533975#533977#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10998;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10999;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11000# mtshan nyid ni 'di lta ste / / +ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam / / +yang na mtshan nyid ni dbyibs kyi mtshan nyid de / /

column3: 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbyangs kyi yon tan lnga po rgya che ba nyid dang  rigs pa'i don dang ldan pa nyid dang  gzung sla ba nyid dang  sna tshogs ci 'dod ba nyid yongs su bstan to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#542718#542737#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12135;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12136;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12137# le'u 'di las ngo bo nyid med pa rnam pa gsum gyi bdag nyid kyi mtshan nyid rgya cher ston pas de'i phyir rang gi ngo bo nyid med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi le'u zhes gsungs so // /
column5: 0.017#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#450762#450762#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_68# de'i phyir dgongs pa zab mo nges par 'grel ba'i mdo gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o zhes gsungs so // /

column3: yon tan lnga po 'di dag ni mnyan pa dang  rnam par mi gyeng ba dang   rnam par grol ba dang  khong du chud par byed pa dang  yongs su smin par byed pa'i yan lag tu go rims bzhin du 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#542738#542745#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12137;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12138;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12139# byang chub sems dpa' don dam pa mngon par grub pas zhus pa'i le'u zhes 'byung ba ni gang zag las ming du btags pa yin te / /
column5: 1.192#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2329129#2329134#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_2178;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_2179# tha dad du gyur ba gzhan ci yang med pas de de bzhin du khyod kyis zung shig ces bya ba ni bzhi pa mchog la bslab par bskul ba'o // / +de nas byang chub sems dpa' don dam yang dag    'phags kyis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column6: 0.029#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#500260#500260#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_6674# gzhan yang 'phags pa dri ma med par  grags pas brten pa'i mdo gnyis su med par 'jug pa'i le'u las / /

column3: bsdus pa'i tshigs su bcad pa dag ni / / +yon tan lnga ni rgya chen dang  snyan dan rigs don ldan nyid dang / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#542746#542756#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12138;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12139# lo ts'a ba dag gi bsam pa tha dad pa'i phyir ro // / +de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don dam yang dag 'phags  kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni mdo'i tshig gi don rnam par bshad pa ston te // /
column5: 1.192#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#544186#544188#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12303;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12304# ma mchis pa dang  gzod ma nas zhi ba dang  rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i dgongs pa gang lags pa bshad du gsol zhes bya ba ni gsum pa gang bshad par gsol ba'i mdo nyid smos pa'o // / +de nas bcom ldan 'das  kyis byang chub sems dpa' don dam yang dag 'phags la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par bshad pa'i phyogs zhes bya ba ston to // /
column6: 1.192#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2336801#2336804#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3027;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3028# chos spyod rnam pa bcu po 'di dag ni sngar gong du bshad pa bzhin du rig par bya'o // / +de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' don dam yang dag 'phags la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to // /
column7: 0.016#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3110629#3110633#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_2672;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_2673;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_2674# mdo las ji skad 'byung ba bzhin blta bar bya ste / / +bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' don dam yang dag 'phags kyis 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column8: 0.016#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3113710#3113713#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_3149;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_3150# de skad ces bka' stsal ba dang  bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' don dam yang  dag 'phags kyis 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column9: 0.020#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2326387#2326389#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_1897# de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' don dam yang dag 'phags kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces    gsol to // /
column10: 0.020#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2338273#2338275#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3189# de nas byang chub sems dpa' don dam yang dag 'phags kyis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column11: 0.021#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#458392#458396#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_1107;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_1108# de'i phyir 'og nas mdo las so // / +de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' don dam yang dag 'phags kyis 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column12: 0.023#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#496152#496152#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_6210# de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'  chen po chos 'phags kyis 'di skad ces gsol to zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa rtog ge'i spyod yul las yang dag par 'das pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya ba bstan to // /
column13: 0.024#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3112703#3112706#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_3007;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_3008# de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la / / +byang chub sems dpa' don dam yang dag 'phags kyis 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column14: 0.024#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3113589#3113590#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_3130# de skad ces gsol ba dang  bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' don dam yang dag 'phags la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to // /
column15: 0.028#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3113405#3113405#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_3102# de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' don dam yang dag 'phags kyis 'di skad ces gsol to // /

column3: gzung sla sna tshogs ci 'dod nyid // / +'di  dag lnga yi yan lag ste // / +mnyan dang rnam par mi gyeng dang / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#542757#542766#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12139;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12140;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12141# de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don dam yang dag 'phags  kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni mdo'i tshig gi don rnam par bshad pa ston te // /

column3: rnam grol khong du chud pa dang / / +smin par byed pa yin te des // / +thub chen gsung ni yan lag lnga // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#542767#542775#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12140;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12141;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12142# ngo bo nyid yod pa dang  ngo bo nyid med pa'i yul bstan pa las / / +de yan chad du ngo bo nyid rnam pa gsum gyi yul bshad zin nas / /

column3: 'phags pa sh'a ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa dag dge slong chos smra ba pos gzhan dag la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam smra  ba na ; /

column3: de las ji skad gsungs she na de'i phyir shes ldan rgyal ba'i sras dag ma chags pa'i sems dang  zhe sdang med pa'i sems dang  las su rung    ba'i sems dang  rnam par ma rmongs pa'i sems dang  zhi ba'i sems dang  rtsub pa med pa'i sems dang  rgyud gcig tu gyur pa'i sems dang  dge ba'i sems dang  bye brag phyed pa'i sems dang  gus pa'i sems dang  mos pa'i sems dang  legs par rnam  par gnas pa'i sems dang  le lo med ba'i sems dang  gzung ba'i sems dang  phan 'dogs pa'i sems dang  rab tu 'dzin pa'i sems dang  sgrub pa'i sems dang  don la lta ba'i sems dang  skyon yid la mi byed pa'i sems dang  don la rton pa'i sems  dang ; /

column3: tshig lhag ma bcu drug po dag gis ni don rgyas ba  las 'phags pa sh'a ri'i bus rnam pa bcu drug po gang dag gis chos mnyan par bya bar gsungs pa'i rnam pa bcu drug po dag la yang dag par 'dzin du bcug pa yin no // /

column5: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#543021#543024#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12172;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12173;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12170;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12171# de'i  phyir dgongs ba zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las / / +dben pa'i gnas na rnam par rtog pa'i sems skyes zhes GSUNGS PA YIN NO // /
column6: 0.015#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#222939#222940#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1171;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1172# 'di ni dang po'o // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni bsgom pa'i chos rnam pa lnga ste zhes 'byung ngo // /
column7: 0.018#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#522459#522460#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9479;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9480# mdo sde'i mjug gi tshig mngon par bstod do zhes bya ba ni 'phags pa 'jam dpal tha mar 'byung ba'i phyir ro // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni / /
column8: 0.018#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2373966#2373966#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7506;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7507# 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis chu rnyog ma'i snod kyi dpe dang  me long yongs su ma dag pa'i dpe dang  mtshe'u 'khrugs pa'i dpe rnam pa gsum po de dag gis rang gi bzhin gyi gzugs brnyan gyi  mtshan ma so sor brtag par mi nus par gsungs pa'i phyir ro // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni / /
column9: 0.018#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#534316#534316#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11052;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11053# dus la brten nas zhu ba po dang lan  gsungs pa'i rnam par 'byed pa'o // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba bstan pa'i mdo las yon tan gyi tshal zhes bya ba ni 'di ltar yon tan gyis gang zag yongs su smin par byed pa ji ltar shing mang po las tshal du gyur pa bzhin pas na dpe dang don gnyi  ga smos pa'i phyir yon tan gyi tshal zhes bya'o zhes 'byung ngo // /
column10: 0.020#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#498011#498011#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_6410# dgongs pa zab mo rnam par 'grel ba'i mdo las ni tha dad pa'i lta ba dang  tha dad pa'i mngon par zhen pa  bskyed nas tha dad pa'i sder gyur ces 'byung ngo // /
column11: 0.021#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2372636#2372639#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7368;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7369# 'di ltar  byang chub sems dpa' rnams yid la byed pa rnams kyi nang nas de bzhin nyid yin la byed pa'i dbang gis zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni / /
column12: 0.022#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#229386#229387#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1972;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1973# pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la sgra ji bzhin du rang gi mtshan nyid du mngon par zhen pa med pa'o zhes gang yin pa'o // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las kyang rnam par mi rtog pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa las sgra ji bzhin  du rang gi mtshan nyid du mngon bar zhen ba med ba'o zhes 'byung ngo // /
column13: 0.022#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2384117#2384117#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8737;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8738# 'du 'dzi'i mtshan ma'o zhes  bshad do // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni nyams par 'gyur ba rnam pa gsum dang ldan par bshad de / /
column14: 0.024#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2329288#2329288#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_2197;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_2198# yul b'a r'a na s'i zhes bya ba  la sogs pas ni mdo sde gsungs pa'i gnas bstan te / / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni b'a r'a na s'i grong khyer drang srong 'dus pa ri dags rgyu ba'i gnas zhes 'byung ngo // /
column15: 0.025#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2372563#2372564#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7360;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7361# rnal 'byor ji lta bu zhig dang rnal 'byor gyi cho ga ji 'dra ba zhig gis zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // / +dgongs ba zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las sems gang gis chos kyi mtshan ma gang zhig la rtog  par bgyid ces 'byung ba ni lo ts'a ba dag gis nor ro // /

column18: 0.027#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#548086#548086#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12745;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12746# mdo sde'i tshig dang rjes su mthun pa'i phyir ro // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las kyang 'di dang mthun par 'byung ngo // /
column19: 0.027#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2385475#2385475#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8886;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8887# sgrib pa zhes bya ba'i tshig gis ston pa'i phyir ro // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las / /

column21: 0.029#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2333291#2333291#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_2651;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_2652# theg pa chen PO LA YANG DAG PAR gzhol ba'i ched du gsungs pa'o // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las     // /

column3: de la chos mnyan pa dang mthun pa'i spyod lam la rnam par gnas pa'i phyir legs par rnam par gnas pa'i sems so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#542994#543004#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12167;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12168;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12169;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12170# dben pa'i gnas na RNAM PAR RTOG PA'I SEMS skyes zhes 'byung ba ni snga ma bzhin du dbye bar bya ste / /

column3: rab tu 'dzin pa'i phyir le lo spangs te nyan pa'i phyir / / +le lo med pa'i sems dang  gzung ba'i bsam pa ni gzung ba'i sems so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#543002#543015#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12168;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12169;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12170;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12171;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12172# lo  ts'a ba dag gi bsam pa tha dad pa'i phyir ro // / +rtog pa de yang bshad na rnam pa bzhi yod de / /

column3: chos smra ba la gus pa dang bcas pa'i phyir phan 'dogs pa'i sems so // / +de nyid kyis sems kyi rjes su 'jug pas lus dang  ngag dag     // /
column4: 0.012#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2311022#2311023#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_46;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_48;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_47# shes pa bcu'i gang zag mngon par yid ches pa la sogs pas rgyud yongs su smin par byed pa gang yin pa'o // / +phyir dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las / /

column3: gis sems yang dag par rab tu 'dzin pa'i phyir rab tu 'dzin pa'i sems so // / +chos 'di ni don chen po'o snyam pa ni don la lta ba'i sems so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#528035#528037#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10247;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10248# de la mngal na gnas pa'i dus brgyad ni  'di lta ste mer mer po la sogs pa'o // / +de'i phyir bstan bcos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#543025#543038#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12172;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12173;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12174;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12175# de'i  phyir dgongs ba zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las / / +dben pa'i gnas na rnam par rtog pa'i sems skyes zhes gsungs pa yin no // /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2320968#2320970#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_1177;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_1178# rang gi lta ba mchog tu 'dzin pa la gnas pas zhes bya  ba ni gang du nges pa'i don theg pa chen po yongs su mi tshol bar rtag par sgra ji bzhin du mngon par zhen nas khong du ma chud pa'i phyir zhes bstan pa ste / / +de'i phyir bstan bcos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las ci'i phyir shin tu rgyas pa la sems can kha cig mos kyang nges par 'byung bar    mi 'gyur zhe na / /
column7: 0.019#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2347967#2347967#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4261# 'di ni bstan bcos sa mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las / /
column8: 0.020#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#451132#451132#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_123# de'i phyir chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa'i bstan bcos las chos gsum gyi le'u zhes    'byung ngo // /
column9: 0.020#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#494139#494139#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_5911# de'i phyir bstan bcos chos mngon pa  sna tshogs kun las btus pa las / /
column10: 0.020#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#513404#513404#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8324# de'i phyir bstan bcos chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las chung du dang 'bring gi rnam pa gnyis las ni nga rgyal skye'o // /
column11: 0.020#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#533433#533433#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10933# de'i phyir bstan bcos chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las bdag nyid kyis nang gi myong ba gang yin pa de ni don shes pa    zhes bya zhes 'byung ste / /
column12: 0.020#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2321563#2321563#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_1251# de'i phyir bstan bcos chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las mdo de nyid bshad pa'i phyir / /
column13: 0.020#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2387970#2387970#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9130# de'i phyir bstan bcos chos mngon pa sna tshogs  kun las btus pa las / /
column14: 0.020#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2392454#2392454#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9673# de'i phyir bstan bcos chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang  byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen po thob pa ni ji ltar bzhed cing 'dod pa bzhin du skad cig skad cig la ting nge 'dzin tshad med pa dag la snyoms  par 'jug pas rab tu dbye ba'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no // /
column15: 0.020#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2394211#2394211#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_9882# de'i phyir bstan bcos chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las kyang mig la sogs pa'i dbang pa dag yongs su longs spyod pa'i mthu'i phyir dbang po drug  skyes par gyur te zhes bshad pas tshor ba gnyis po 'di ni nang gi dbang po drug la brten nas phyi rol gyi yul drug po dag la dmigs par byed pas yul las ming thob pa yin pa'i phyir de'i 'bras bu yul rig pa zhes gsungs te // /
column16: 0.020#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#536217#536217#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11297# bstan bcos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las mtshan nyid ji lta bu zhe na / /
column17: 0.022#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#502831#502831#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_7039# bstan bcos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa la sogs pa las ni 'dod chags dang  zhe sdang dang gti mug gi rtsod pa'i ngo bo nyid do zhes bshad do // /
column18: 0.022#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#223930#223930#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1294# rgya cher ni bstan bcos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus  pa la sogs pa las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o // /
column19: 0.023#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#519413#519413#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9048;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9049# yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba ni yang dag  pa'i ngag dang  las kyi mtha' ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhe'o // / +bstan bcos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las / /
column20: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2364571#2364572#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6302# so so nas bshad pa mi mthun pas bstan bcos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las / /
column21: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2358455#2358456#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5554;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5555# theg  pa chen po bsdus pa ni brag pa med pa'i dbang du mdzad pa'i phyir sa bcu dang sbyar te bstan to // / +bstan bcos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las ni rnam pa gsum du bsngags pa brjod nas 'bras bu lnga sdud par ston to // /
column22: 0.028#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#224604#224604#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1393;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_1394# rim gyis sgrib pa rab tu sel ba dang  sangs rgyas kyi chos sgrub pa dang  sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'o // / +bstan bcos mngon pa sna tshogs kun    las btus pa las ni / /
column23: 0.029#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#520729#520730#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9241;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9242# bdag med pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya'o zhes 'byung ste / / +bstan bcos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las kyang de skad du ston to // /

column3: tshul khrims dang  rigs dang  rus kyi skyon yid la mi byed pa'i phyir / / +skyon yid  la mi byed pa'i sems so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#543039#543048#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12175;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12176# de'i phyir bstan bcos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las rnam par rtog pa la  spyod pa ni dbugs rngub ba dang  'byung ba dran pa'i yul la dmigs so zhes bshad pa yin no // /

column3: gzhung gi tshig 'bru nyams pa la don la rton pa'i sems dang  ngag gi las phun sum tshogs pa la sangs rgyas dang 'dra ba nyid kyis ri mo bya ba'i sems so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#543049#543059#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12175;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12176# de'i phyir bstan bcos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las rnam par rtog pa la  spyod pa ni dbugs rngub ba dang  'byung ba dran pa'i yul la dmigs so zhes bshad pa yin no // / +mdzod kyi bstan bcos las kyang rtog pa ni phal cher sems rnam par gyeng bar byed pas rnam par rtog pa la spyod pa zhes bya'o zhes 'byung ste / /

column3: lhag ma ni go sla ba'i phyir ma bshad do // / +de lta bu ni yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa nyid  kyis so // / +ji ltar na dgos pa yang dag par bstan pa nyid kyis yin / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#543060#543070#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12176;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12177;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12178# mdzod kyi bstan bcos las kyang rtog pa ni phal cher sems rnam par gyeng bar byed pas rnam par rtog pa la spyod pa zhes bya'o zhes 'byung ste / /

column3: ci'i phyir gus par chos mnyan par bya zhe na / / +snod gsum dag tu ni lhas char phab kyang chu'i bya ba mi byed de / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#543069#543081#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12177;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12178;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12179;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12180# de dbugs    dran pa la brten bsgom pa la yang dag par 'jug pa'am / / +yang na rtog par dang dpyod pa la spyir rnam par rtog pa la spyod pa zhes bya'o zhes bstan pa'o // /

column3: kha gzhan tu phyogs ba'am bcad pa gang du mi 'bab pa nyid dang  mi gtsang ba gang du bab  kyang skyon can du 'gyur ba dang  bu ga dang bcas pa gang du mi gnas pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#543082#543096#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12179;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12180;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12181;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12182# bzhi pa ni shes rab kyi grangs su song ba yongs su tshol ba ji lta bu ste / / +la la nas de skad du  bshad pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: de bzhin du skye bo nyan pa po'i yid kyi / / +snod gsum dag tu chos smra bas chos kyi char phab kyang / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#543097#543107#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12182# bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mar phung po rnams kyi rang gi mtshan nyid dang  skye ba'i mtshan nyid dang  'jig pa'i mtshan nyid dang  gtan du spangs pa dang yongs su shes pa yang bka' stsal zhes bya ba la  sogs pas ni gnyis pa zhu ba'i bstan pa nyid smos pa ston to // /

column3: chos kyi chu'i bya ba mi byed de / / +rnam par gyeng ba dang  rmugs pa dang  gnyid dag gis mi nyan  pa'i phyir / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#543108#543117#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12182;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12183# bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mar phung po rnams kyi rang gi mtshan nyid dang  skye ba'i mtshan nyid dang  'jig pa'i mtshan nyid dang  gtan du spangs pa dang yongs su shes pa yang bka' stsal zhes bya ba la  sogs pas ni gnyis pa zhu ba'i bstan pa nyid smos pa ston to // /

column3: gang du mi 'bab pa dang  tshul bzhin yid la mi byed pa'i phyir / / +gang du bab kyang skyon can du 'gyur ba dang  dran pa brjed ngas pa'i phyir gang du mi gnas pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#543117#543131#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12183;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12184# 'di yang rnam pa gnyis te ngo bo nyid yod par gsungs pa'i bstan pa smos pa dang  bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhan yang zhes bya ba man chad kyis ngo bo nyid med par gsungs pa'i bstan pa smos pa'o / /
column5: 0.026#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2326434#2326434#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_1904# byang chub sems dpa' go bar gyur ba bstan pa dang  de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhes bya ba man chad de bzhin gshegs pas bsgrub par bskul ba'o // /

column3: de lta bas na de'i skyon yongs su spang ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i phyir nyon la legs par  rab tu yid la byos shig ces gsungs pa yin pas na mnyan pa'i skyon de bdag cag la 'byung na mi rung ba'i phyir / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#543132#543140#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12184;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12185# dang po la sgo rnam pa bcu gsum yod pa de dag kyang rnam pa lngar bsdus nas bstan te / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#543141#543153#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12185;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12186# phung po la sogs pa'i bstan pa smos pa dang  dben pa'i bstan pa smos pa dang khams rnams bstan pa dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la sogs pa bstan pa dang  'phags  pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bstan pa ste / /

column3: gus par chos mnyan par bya'o // / +nad pa gcig gis ni sman pa'i lung ma shes la / / +gnyis pas ni nyes par bzung ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#543152#543170#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12185;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12186;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12187;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12188;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12189# phung po la sogs pa'i bstan pa smos pa dang  dben pa'i bstan pa smos pa dang khams rnams bstan pa dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la sogs pa bstan pa dang  'phags  pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bstan pa ste / / +'di ni dang po phung po'i bstan pa'i sgo'o // /
column5: 0.025#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2353537#2353540#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4963;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4964;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4965# chos la gnas pa dang mi  gnas pa bstan pa'i sgo dang 'dres pa dang ma 'dres pa'i chos la dmigs pa'i bstan pa'i sgo dang  'dres pa'i chos la dmigs pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i sgo'o // / +'di ni dang po ste / /

column3: dper na 'khrus pa la 'bras khu lud  cig ces bsgo ba las / /
zho ga chu blud pa dang  drod chung ba la phye ma sbyar ba las phyung ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#543171#543179#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12189;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12190# 'di ni dang po mtshan nyid rnam pa lngas phung po'i bstan pa rnam  par 'byed pa'o // /

column3: pho sum re re 'goms shig ces bsgo ba las rgyun mi 'chad par thams cad 'gams ba dang  'di ltar snum thong la 'di ltar bkru sman 'thungs shig / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#543180#543197#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12190;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12191;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12192# rnam grangs du ma zhes bya ba la bshad pa rnam pa gnyis yod de / /
column5: 0.023#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#517090#517090#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8727;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8728# 'di la yang bshad pa rnam pa gnyis yod de / / +kha cig na re snga ma'i phung po la sogs pa'i chos ni rtogs pa'i yul la brten nas shes pa brda sprod pa yin la / /

column3: 'thungs nas kyang 'di ltar    'bras khu dang  thug pa la sogs pa rim gyis longs spyod cig ces bsgo ba las / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#543198#543209#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12191;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12192# kha cig na re phung po la yod pa'i rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid la sogs pa'i rnam grangs gcig kho na ma yin pa'i phyir du ma zhes bya'o zhe'o // / +kha cig na re bstan du yod pa dang   bstan du med pa dang  gzugs yod pa dang  gzugs med PA LA SOGS PA'I RNAM grangs gcig kho na ma yin pa'i phyir du ma zhas bya'o zhe'o // /

column3: nyi ma gcig nyid la thams cad byas so // / +gsum pas ni legs par bzung nas chud gzan pa lta bu ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#543210#543220#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12192;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12193;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12194;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12195# kha cig na re bstan du yod pa dang   bstan du med pa dang  gzugs yod pa dang  gzugs med pa la sogs pa'i rnam grangs gcig kho na ma yin pa'i phyir du ma zhas bya'o zhe'o // / +de la rang gi mtshan nyid ces bya ba ni bye brag gi mtshan nyid yin te / /

column3: de rnams las bar ma ni thams cad pas tha chad yin no // / +bstan pa 'di la yang  gang zag de lta bu gsum yod pas de'i gnyen por bcom ldan 'das kyis nyon la legs pa dang  rab tu yid la bya bas mnyan pa la yang dag par gzung pa mdzad do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#543221#543232#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12194;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12195;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12196;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12197# ji skad du gzugs ni thogs pa dang     // / +bcas pa'o zhes bya ba nas / / +rnam par shes pa ni rnam par rig pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar du bshad pa lta bu'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#543232#543246#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12197;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12198;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12199# skye ba'i mtshan nyid dang  'jig pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya ba ni spyi'i mtshan nyid yin te / /
column6: 0.016#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1493631#1493631#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_10864;TD4092.1E.TXT.r_10865# dgra bcom pa'i 'du byed ma rig pa med pa ni bsod nams su nye bar 'gro ba'i rnam par shes pa nas / / +mi gyo ba nye bar 'gro ba'i rnam par shes pa'i bar du yang mi  'gyur bas 'du byed kyi yan lag 'di yang rigs pas grub ste / /
column7: 0.017#TD4019E.TXT.r#2471113#2471115#TD4019E.TXT.r_8364;TD4019E.TXT.r_8365# de bzhin du tshor ba ni nyams su myong ba'i mtshan  nyid dang  'du shes ni mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i mtshan nyid dang  'du byed ni sems mngon par 'du byed pa'i mtshan nyid dang  rnam par shes pa ni dmigs pa rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid de / / +de ni mtshan nyid med par de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas  so zhes pa'i bar du gsungs pa lta bu'o // /
column8: 0.018#TD4049E.TXT.r#2291145#2291145#TD4049E.TXT.r_684;TD4049E.TXT.r_685# ci'i phyir gzugs dbu ba rngos pa lta bu'o zhes bya ba nas / / +rnam par shes pa sgyu ma lta bu'o zhes bya ba'i bar du zhe na / /
column9: 0.023#TD4013E.TXT.r#613425#613425#TD4013E.TXT.r_417# de ltar na bsod nams kyi tshogs yongs su gzung ba'i phyir thabs kyi khyad par pha rol mi dpogs pa byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun du bzang po'i spyod pas  'thob par byed pa'i mtshan nyid kyi 'di ni dad pas bskyed pa'i sems kyis thos pa'i tshe yang sems kyi rgyun rnam par dag par byed na rtag tu byed pas nyin gcig bzhin du dus gsum du bsgrub pas lta smos kyang ci dgos / /
column10: 0.023#TD4013E.TXT.r#616715#616716#TD4013E.TXT.r_886;TD4013E.TXT.r_887# 'di skad du gsung gi dkyil 'khor gcig gis bsdus pa skad ci khyad par thams cad dang ldan pa de dag gis phyogs dang dus thams cad na rnam par bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das  rnams kyi chos gdul bya'i bsam pa tha dad pas so sor tha dad par bshad par bya'o zhes bshad PA YIN NO // / +de nyid bstan pa'i phyir / /
column11: 0.025#TD4054E.TXT.r#1032808#1032808#TD4054E.TXT.r_6857;TD4054E.TXT.r_6858# 'di gsum ni nyon mongs pa'i gnyen por rig par bya'o // / +de la byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa'i mtshan nyid gang zhe na / /
column12: 0.025#TD4070E.TXT.r#2821372#2821372#TD4070E.TXT.r_3018;TD4070E.TXT.r_3019# 'di ltar de'i mtshan nyid ni brtags pa'o // / +brtags pa'i mtshan nyid de bstan pa'i phyir / /
column13: 0.025#TD4019E.TXT.r#2459346#2459346#TD4019E.TXT.r_6865# dmigs pa'i rkyen ni rang snang ba'i yan lag dang  skyed bar byed pa'i yan lag gnyis  dang ldan pa shes pa'i rnam par 'jog par byed pa'o 'dir mtshan nyid ni shes pa'i rnam par 'jog pa'o zhes byed pas nye bar mtshon pa'i mtshan nyid du sbyar kyang 'gal ba med de / /
column14: 0.026#TD4010E.TXT.r#2236050#2236050#TD4010E.TXT.r_707;TD4010E.TXT.r_708# chos thams cad ni nam mkha'i rang bzhin no zhes bya bas mtshan nyid med pa'i mtshan nyid ni dngos po'i mtshan nyid shes pa'o // / +mdo sde mngon par bsgrub pa'i shes pa zhes bya  ba la ; /
column15: 0.026#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2549529#2549529#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_1697;TD4092.2E.TXT.r_1698# rnam  par smin pa'i phyir mthong ba'i chos la myong bar 'gyur bar nges pa dang ma nges pa'o // / +myong bar 'gyur bar ma nges pa'i bar du yang de dang 'dra'o zhes bya ba ni rnam par smin pa'i phyir skyes nas myong bar 'gyur bar nges pa dang ma nges pa dang  lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur bar nges pa  dang ma nges pa dang  myong bar 'gyur bar ma nges pa mthong ba'i chos la sogs pa la myong bar 'gyur bar ma nges pa gang yin pa de yang nges pa dang ma nges pa ste / /
column16: 0.027#TD4037E.TXT.r#1319765#1319766#TD4037E.TXT.r_541# kha na ma tho ba med pa'i mtshan nyid dang  phan 'dogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang  tshe 'di pa dang  tshe gzhan pa dang  zhi bar  byed pa'o // /
column17: 0.027#TD4054E.TXT.r#1034510#1034510#TD4054E.TXT.r_7064;TD4054E.TXT.r_7065# shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du bsgom pas / / +byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i bsam pa'o // /
column18: 0.027#TD4054E.TXT.r#1046177#1046177#TD4054E.TXT.r_8724;TD4054E.TXT.r_8725# stong pa nyid gzugs so zhes bya ba nas rnam par shes pa'i bar du gsungs te / / +kun brtags pa'i  ngo bo nyid med pa'i mtshan nyid yin pas / /
column19: 0.028#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#511148#511148#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8065# rtogs par dka' ba mchog tu rtogs par dka' ba gcig pa dang tha dad pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid las yang dag par 'das pa'i don dam pa'i bden pa'i mtshan nyid mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te / /
column20: 0.028#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3107282#3107282#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_2190# ngas  ni don dam pa rtog ge thams CAD LAS YANG DAG PAR 'das pa'i mtshan nyid mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te / /
column21: 0.028#TD4051E.TXT.r#1246016#1246016#TD4051E.TXT.r_1893;TD4051E.TXT.r_1894# 'di ltar ming ni ngo bo nyid kyis  stong ngo zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i bar du ste / / +brtags pas so zhes bya bar dgongs pa'o // /
column22: 0.029#TD4035E.TXT.r#188186#188186#TD4035E.TXT.r_10804# de'i 'og ma bzhi pa ni dus kyi mtshan nyid dang  skye ba'i mtshan nyid dang  rga ba'i mtshan nyid dang  gnas pa'i mtshan nyid dang  mi rtag pa'i mtshan nyid dang  sdug bsngal ba'i mtshan nyid dang  stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang  bdag  med pa'i mtshan nyid dang  dngos po'i mtshan nyid dang  rnam par shes par bya ba'i mtshan nyid dang  gzung ba'i mtshan nyid dang  sdug pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang  phan 'dogs pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang  tha snyad kyi mtshan ma'i mtshan nyid dang  log    bar bsgrub pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma'i mtshan nyid dang  de lta bu dang mthun pa'i mtshan nyid de / /
column23: 0.029#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2872185#2872185#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_666# tshul khrims nas shes rab kyi bar du lhag ma rnams la yang dngos po la gnas te bsgom pa nas dbang yod pa la gnas te bsgom pa'i bar du rnam pa lngar bsgom par bshad do zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column24: 0.029#TD4053E.TXT.r#3000634#3000634#TD4053E.TXT.r_4767# tshig 'di dag gi so so'i nus    pa ni ji ltar gang du rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid du bshad pa bzhin du rig par bya'o // /

column26: 0.029#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#522645#522645#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9516# yul tha dad pa drug po dag la rags par  gyo ba dang  bar du chod pa'i rnam par rig pas 'jug pa'i phyir ro // /
column27: 0.029#TD4047E.TXT.r#1181471#1181471#TD4047E.TXT.r_8687# sa bcu la legs par zhugs par gyur pa'i rtogs pa'i khyad par thob par gyur pa'i chos bdag med pa'i mtshan nyid  can shin tu rnam par dag pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur ro // /

column3: de lta bas na nad pa lta bur gyur na mi rung bas gus par chos mnyan par bya'o // / +nad pa gsum po dag ni phal  gnod de / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#543243#543263#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12198;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12199;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12200# gzugs la sogs pa la skye ba dang  'jig pa'i mtshan  nyid yod pa'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir ro // / +gtan du spangs pa dang  yongs su shes pa zhes bya ba ni sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid de / /
column5: 0.021#TD4029E.TXT.r#2159474#2159476#TD4029E.TXT.r_5101;TD4029E.TXT.r_5102# yongs su shes par bya ba'i chos rnams ni kun nas nyon mongs pa'o zhes bya ba ni sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung gi bden pa dag go // /

column3: zas mi za ba gang yin pa dang  mi 'phrod pa za ba gang yin pa dang  'phrod pa zos pa skyugs pa gang yin pa'o // /

de bzhin du nyon mongs pa'i nad pa rnams kyang chos kyi yab sangs rgyas la gnod de / / +dam pa'i chos mi nyan pa gang yin pa dang  tshul bzhin yid la mi  byed pa gang yin pa dang  legs par yid la med pa'i phyir brjed pa gang yin pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#543264#543271#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12200;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12201;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12202# kun 'byung gi bden pa las dang nyon mongs pa ni gtan du spang bar bya ba yin pa'i phyir dang  sdug bsngal gyi bden pa  'khor ba'i 'bras bu ni yongs su shes par bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro // / +yang na rang gi mtshan nyid ces bya ba ni rang gi ngo bo dang bye brag gi mtshan nyid de / /

column3: de lta bas na chos kyi yab sangs rgyas la gnod par gyur na mi rung pas / /

column5: 0.009#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3110666#3110669#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_2678# phung po rnams kyi ji lta ba de  bzhin du skye mched rnams dang  rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang  zas rnams kyi yang bka' stsal / /

column3: ma thos pa thos par  'gyur ba dang  thos pa yongs su byang bar 'gyur ba dang  som nyi spong ba dang  lta ba drang por byed pa dang  shes rab kyis don dang  tshig zab mo rtogs par 'gyur ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#543301#543316#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12204;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12205# phung po rnams kyi ji lta ba de bzhin du skye mched rnams dang  rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang  zas rnams kyi yang bka' stsal ces bya ba ni gnyis pa zlas bstan pa gsum  smos pa'o // /

column3: de la ji ltar na ma thos pa thos par 'gyur ba yin zhe na / / +thog ma med pa can gyi 'khor ba nas  bstan bcos gzhan thams cad las ma thos pa phung po dang  skye mched dang  khams dang  rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang  'phags pa'i bden pa dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang  yang dag par spong ba dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang  dbang po dang  stobs  dang ; /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#543317#543332#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12205;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12206# ji ltar phung po la mtshan nyid lnga yod par gsungs pa de bzhin du skye mched bcu gnyis dang  RTEN CING 'BREL BAR 'BYUNG BA DANG ZAS rnams la yang de bzhin du rig par bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#543333#543345#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12206;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12207;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12208# 'di lta ste skye mched rnams kyi rang gi mtshan nyid ni gzugs mthong  bar nus pa'i phyir mig ces bya'o // /

column3: byang chub kyi yan lag dang  dbugs rngubs pa dang  'byung ba dran pa dang  bslab pa dang  shes nas dad pa rnam par gzhag pa dang  kun nas nyon mongs pa dang  rnam par byang ba'i chos rnams kyi bar dang spyi dang rgyu dang 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid phyin ci ma log pa ston pa     // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#543344#543365#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12207;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12208;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12209;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12210;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12211# mig gis blta bar bya ba yin pa'i phyir gzugs so zhes bya ba nas / / +chos shes par nus pa'i phyir chos zhes bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar dag go // /
column5: 0.020#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#542519#542519#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12103;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12104# chos gnas pa  zhes bya ba ni mya ngan las 'das pa rtag tu gnas shing mi 'jig pa'i phyir gnas pa zhes bya'o // / +gyo ba'i chos zhes bya ba ni 'khor ba'i chos de snga ma byung bas phyis 'gag cing / /

column3: dang  bdag tu lta ba'i nye bar len pa spong ba yongs su ston pa dang  gang zag slob pa dang  mi slob pa'i bar du dbye ba dang  che ba'i bdag nyid dang  dge sbyong gi 'bras bu dang  rnam par thar pa dang  zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched dang  zad par gyi skye  mched dang  nyon mongs pa med pa dang  smon nas shes pa la sogs pa dang  de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang  mi 'jigs pa dang  sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang  che ba'i bdag nyid la sogs pa gang yin pa de thos par 'gyur ro // /

column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#543439#543456#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12216;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12218;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12217# ci'i phyir don dam pa'i bden pa'i mtshan nyid kyi le'u las ni mtshan nyid rnam pa drug gis phung po la sogs pa rnam par phye zhing bden pa bzhi yang yongs su rdzogs par gsungs la le'u 'di las ni sdug bsngal dang   kun 'byung nyi tshe gsungs shing 'gog pa dang lam ni ma bstan ce na / / +le'u snga ma las mngon par rtogs pa'i bye brag rab tu dbye bar bzhed pa'i phyir ni bden pa bzhi tshang bar gsungs la le'u 'di las ni ngo bo nyid yod pa dang ngo bo nyid med pa'i bstan pa  rnam pa gnyis kyi byi brag ston par mdzad pas de'i phyir 'dir ni mdor bsdus nas ma gsungs te / /
column5: 0.021#TD4069E.TXT.r#655114#655114#TD4069E.TXT.r_4585# de ltar na bden pa bzhi mthong bar bya ba'i phyir sgrub pa yin no zhes bya bar rig par bya'o // /

column7: 0.029#TD4068E.TXT.r#577710#577710#TD4068E.TXT.r_914# kun 'byung ba'i bden pa la yang rgyu dang kun 'byung ba dang rkyen dang rab tu 'byung ba'i tshul lta bur nyes par brtags pas na bden pa bzhi la brtag pa'i  dngos po zhes bya'o // /

column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#543478#543489#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12220;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12221# rnam grangs du mar bden pa rnams kyi rang gi mtshan nyid dang  yongs su shes pa dang  gtan du spang ba dang   mngon du bgyi ba dang  bsgom pa yang bka' stsal zhes bya bas ni gnyis pa bden pa'i bstan pa smos pa'o // /

column3: ji ltar na thos pas mya ngan las 'das pa 'thob ce na / / +'di lta ste / / +'di na kha cig de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba las lhag pa'i shes rab kyi  bslab pa thos na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#543634#543648#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12238;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12239;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12240# dran  pa nye bar gzhag pa bstan pa dang  zlas sgo gzhan lnga po dag bstan pa'o // / +dang po la tshig lnga yod pa dang  rang gi mtshan nyid la bshad pa gnyis yod pa ni phung po bzhin du rig par bya'o // /

column3: de la brten pas zag pa zad pa mngon sum du byed do // / +'dis ni dam pa'i chos mnyan pa la phan yon rnam pa bzhi po yang dag pa'i lta ba rnyed pa dang  bslab pa gsum la yang dag par brten pas / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#543649#543663#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12240;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12241# dran pa nye bar gzhag PA BZHI PO 'DI DAG ni shes rab kyi ngo  bo nyid de / / +lus la sogs pa'i yul la gnas pas shes rab nye bar gnas pa zhes bya ba'i rigs pa las dran pa nye bar gzhag pa zhes gsungs pa ni dran pa dang mthun par gyur nas lus la sogs pa'i yul la gnas pa'i phyir dran pa nye bar gzhag  pa zhes gsungs te / /

column3: sdig pa las yang dag par rgal ba dang  'dod pa  las yang dag par rgal ba dang  yang srid pa las yang dag par rgal ba yod par go rims bzhin du yongs su bstan to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#543664#543680#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12241;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12242# lus la sogs pa'i yul la gnas pas shes rab nye bar gnas pa zhes bya ba'i rigs pa las dran pa nye bar gzhag pa zhes gsungs pa ni dran pa dang mthun par gyur nas lus la sogs pa'i yul la gnas pa'i phyir dran pa nye bar gzhag  pa zhes gsungs te / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#240212#240212#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3369# rnam par bshad pa drug las 'di ni bdag po'i dbang du byas pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o // /

column7: 0.021#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#240545#240546#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3414# 'di ni rnam par bshad pa drug las las yongs su 'dzin pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o // /
