yang rnam pa bzhi ste / / +de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la dad pa rnyed pa dang  rab tu 'byung ba dang  dbang  po'i sgo bsrungs pa nyid kyi rim pas bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar du ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#543709#543717#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12245# dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par spong ba dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang  dbang po dang  stobs dang  byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi yang de bzhin du bka'  stsal zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa zlas sgo gzhan lnga po dag bstan pa'o // /
column5: 0.012#TD4035E.TXT.r#187286#187287#TD4035E.TXT.r_10654# mi dge ba'i chos rnams kyang mi sdug pa'i 'bras bu mngon par 'grub pa la de de dang 'dra ba dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang  yang dag par spong ba  rnams dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang  dbang po rnams dang  stobs rnams dang  byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang  lam gyi yan lag byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams ni byang chub thob par bya ba la bya ba bsgrub pa'i spyi'i mtshan nyid kyis spyi'i mtshan nyid rnams  so // /
column6: 0.013#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3110725#3110729#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_2685# dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag pa'i spong ba rnams dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang  dbang po rnams dang  stobs rnams dang  byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi yang bka' stsal / /
column7: 0.014#TD4036E.TXT.r#18377#18378#TD4036E.TXT.r_2669;TD4036E.TXT.r_2670# bcom ldan 'das kyis de dang de dag tu gdul ba de dang de dag dang gdul ba'i spyod pa rnams las brtsams  nas phung po dang ldan pa'i gtam dang  skye mched dang ldan pa dang  rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang ldan pa dang  zas dang  bden pa dang  khams dang ldan pa dang  nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang de bzhin gshegs pa dang ldan pa dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang      // / +yang dag par spong ba dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang  dbang po dang  stobs dang  byang chub kyi yan lag dang  lam gyi yan lag dang ldan pa dang  mi sdug pa dang  dbugs rngub pa dang  dbugs 'byung ba dang  bslab pa dang / /
column8: 0.014#TD4039E.TXT.r#1815502#1815505#TD4039E.TXT.r_20# de dang der 'dul ba la gzigs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa dang  de'i 'og tu yang dag par sdud par byed pa rnams kyis bstan pa yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir sdom gyi tshigs su bcad pa sbyar bar ci rigs par go  rims su phab ste gtam du sbyar ba dang  de bzhin du zas dang bden pa dang  khams dang tshor ba dang ldan pa dang  nyan thos dang  de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa dang ldan pa dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang  yang dag par spong ba dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa  dang  dbang po dang  stobs dang  byang chub kyi yan lag dang  lam gyi yan lag dang  dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba dran pa dang  bslab pa rnams dang  shes nas dad pa dang ldan pa dang  'khor brgyad kyi dbang du byas nas 'khor dang ldan pa'o // /
column9: 0.015#TD4039E.TXT.r#1880486#1880487#TD4039E.TXT.r_7676;TD4039E.TXT.r_7677# byed pas sgo drug nas dge ba la brten te / / +dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang  yang dag par spong ba dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang  dbang po dang  stobs dang  byang chub kyi yan lag dang  lam gyi yan lag rnams so // /
column10: 0.017#TD4031E.TXT.r#2960322#2960323#TD4031E.TXT.r_229# ngo tsha'i rnam par dbye ba dang  brtan pa dang  mi skyo ba dang  bstan bcos shes pa dang  'jig rten shes pa dang  rton pa dang  so  so yang dag par rig pa dang  tshogs gnyis dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang  yang dag par spong ba dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang  dbang po dang  stobs dang  byang chub kyi yan lag dang  'phags pa'i lam dang  zhi gnas dang  lhag mthong dang  thabs la  mkhas pa dang  gzungs dang  smon lam dang  ting nge 'dzin dang  chos kyi sdom dang  de'i skad cig ma dang  bdag med pa dang  ngo tsha la sogs pa'i las mdor bsdus pa bstan pa'o // /
column11: 0.017#TD4061E.TXT.r#1543341#1543343#TD4061E.TXT.r_4166# thog ma med pa can gyi 'khor ba nas  bstan bcos gzhan thams cad las ma thos pa phung po dang  skye mched dang  khams dang  rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang  'phags pa'i bden pa dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang  yang dag par spong ba dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang  dbang po dang  stobs  dang ; /
column12: 0.021#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#520216#520216#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9173# ngas skye mched dang  rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang   zas dang  bden pa dang  khams dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang  yang dag pa'i spong ba dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang  dbang po dang  stobs dang  byang chub kyi yan lag dang  lam gyi yan lag thams cad la / /
column13: 0.021#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#521334#521334#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9331# rab 'byor ji ltar phung po de dag phan tshun tha dad pa'i mtshan nyid du gyur pa dang  ji ltar skye mched dang  rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang  zas dang  bden pa dang  khams dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang  yang dag pa'i spong ba dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang  dbang po dang  stobs dang  byang chub kyi yan lag dang  lam gyi yan lag de dag phan tshun tha dad pa'i mtshan nyid du gyur pa de bzhin du zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni  gsum pa skyon rnam pa gsum dang bral bas ro gcig pa'i mtshan nyid rnam par bshad pa ston to // /
column14: 0.021#TD4035E.TXT.r#175293#175293#TD4035E.TXT.r_8904# dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang  yang dag pa'i spong ba dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang  dbang po dang  stobs dang  byang chub kyi yan lag dang  lam gyi yan lag rnams dang  dge sbyong  gi 'bras bu bzhi ste / /
column15: 0.021#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2790236#2790236#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_12376# mngon par rtogs pa'i shes pa bden pa mngon par rtogs pa ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang  yang dag pa'i spong ba dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang  dbang po dang  stobs dang  byang chub kyi yan lag dang  lam gyi yan lag byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i chos kyi rab tu dbye bas rnam pa du ma yod do // /
column16: 0.021#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3108952#3108952#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_2426;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_2427# rab 'byor phung po rnams la rnam par dag pa'i dmigs pa gang yin pa de ni ngas don dam  pa yin par yongs su bstan cing rab 'byor skye mched rnams dang  rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang  zas rnams dang  bden pa rnams dang  khams rnams dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang  yang dag pa'i spong ba rnams dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang      // / +dbang po rnams dang  stobs rnams dang  byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang  rab 'byor 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la rnam par dag pa'i dmigs pa gang yin pa de ni / /
column17: 0.021#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3109026#3109026#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_2437# yang de las gzhan pa'i phung po rnams dang  khams rnams dang  skye mched rnams dang  rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnams dang  zas rnams dang  bden pa rnams dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang  yang dag pa'i  spong ba rnams dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang  dbang po rnams dang  stobs rnams dang  byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so so dang  'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa so so la de bzhin nyid don dam pa chos bdag med pa yongs su tshol bar mi byed kyi / /
column18: 0.021#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3113022#3113023#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_3055# bden pa rnams la ji lta ba de bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa    rnams dang  yang dag pa'i spong ba rnams dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang  dbang po rnams dang  stobs rnams dang  byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang  lam gyi yan lag rnams kyi yan lag re re la yang de bzhin du sbyar bar bgyi lags so // /
column19: 0.028#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2328110#2328110#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_2079# 'phags pa'i bden pa la ji lta ba bzhin du dran ba nye bar gzhag pa dang  yang dag pa'i spong ba dang     rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang  dbang po dang  stobs dang  byang chub kyi yan lag dang  lam gyi yan lag rnams la yang de bzhin du rgya cher bshad par bgyi lags so zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa byang chub kyi phyogs las brtsams nas ngo bo nyid med par gsungs pas khong  du chud par bstan pa'o // /
column20: 0.029#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#520401#520401#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9191# yang de nyid las gzhan pa'i phung po dang  skye mched dang  rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang  zas dang bden pa dang  khams dang  dran pa  nye bar gzhag pa dang  yang dag pa'i spong pa dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang  dbang po dang  stobs dang  byang chub kyi yan lag dang  lam gyi yan lag rnams kyis so so la de bzhin nyid dang  don dam pa dang  chos bdag med pa nyid yongs su tshol bar    mi byed kyi zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gsum pa kun du khyab pa'i don rnam pa gsum las brtsams nas / /

column3: de ni 'dod pa'i khams las 'dod chags dang bral ba'i phyir / / +gnod pa spong ba dang  'phags pa'i bden pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa'i rim pas zag pa zad pa'i bar du ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4006E.TXT.r#1086629#1086632#TD4006E.TXT.r_328# pha  rol tu phyin pa bcu dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang  yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang  dbang po lnga dang  stobs lnga dang  byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang  'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang  bden pa bzhi dang  tshad med pa bzhi dang  bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi  dang ; /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#543718#543736#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12245;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12246# dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams KYI JI LTA BA BZHIN DU YANG dag par spong ba dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang  dbang po dang  stobs dang  byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi yang de bzhin du bka'  stsal zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa zlas sgo gzhan lnga po dag bstan pa'o // /
column6: 0.0#TD4017E.TXT.r#2685995#2685999#TD4017E.TXT.r_4277# dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang  yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang  dbang po lnga dang  stobs lnga dang  byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang  'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o // /
column7: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#175946#175949#TD4035E.TXT.r_9008# dkri ba'i don gyi mdo sde la ma yin pa dang  ye shes la rton gyi rnam par shes pa la ma yin pa dang  tshad med pa bzhi dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang  yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang   rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang  dbang po lnga dang  stobs lnga dang  byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang  'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang  so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang  chos kyi gnas bzhi dang  zhi gnas dang  lhag mthong dang  lhag pa'i tshul  khrims dang  lhag pa'i sems dang  lhag pa'i shes rab dang  bslab pa rnams dang  rnam par thar pa rnams dang  zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched rnams dang  zad par gyi skye mched rnams so // /
column8: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#34387#34390#TD4036E.TXT.r_5258;TD4036E.TXT.r_5259# dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi  dang ; / +yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang  dbang po lnga dang  stobs lnga dang  byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang  'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ste / /
column9: 0.0#TD4091E.TXT.r#745915#745918#TD4091E.TXT.r_9217# dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang  yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi  dang  dbang po lnga dang  stobs lnga dang  byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang  'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad do // /
column10: 0.0#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1723529#1723532#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_3423# 'di lta ste dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang  yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang  dbang po lnga dang  stobs lnga dang  byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang  'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad de / /
column11: 0.010#TD4094.2E.TXT.r#1896990#1896992#TD4094.2E.TXT.r_1628;TD4094.2E.TXT.r_1629# yang dag par spong ba bzhi legs par bsgoms pa yin / / +rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang  dbang po lnga dang  stobs lnga dang  byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang  'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad bsgoms  pa legs par bsgoms pa yin no // /

column3: nya gro dha la sogs  pa'i mdo sde rnams kyis bsgrub par bya'o // / +de ltar phan yon rnam pa mang po yang dag par mthong ba nyid kyis gus par chos mnyan par bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#543736#543746#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12246;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12247# dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la tshig lnga yod pa bzhin du YANG DAG PAR SPONG BA bzhi dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang  dbang po lnga dang  stobs lnga dang  byang chub kyi yan lag bdun  rnams la yang tshig lnga yod par gong ma bzhin du rig par bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /
column5: 0.024#TD4090.2E.TXT.r#1064780#1064781#TD4090.2E.TXT.r_1993# byang chub kyi phyogs dang  mthun pa sum cu rtsa bdun ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang  YANG DAG PAR SBONG BA zhi dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang  dbang po lnga dang  stobs lnga dang  byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang  'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad do // /

column3: yang ci'i phyir zhe na / / +'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyi chos 'dul ba ni legs par gsungs pa yin pas so // / +yang ji ltar na legs par  gsungs pa yin zhe na / /

rnam pa bcu dag gis te / / +yang dag par bslang ba nyid kyis dang  dbang du mdzad pa nyid kyis dang  'jug pa nyid kyis dang  rab tu bstan pa nyid kyis dang  rab tu dbye ba nyid kyis dang  rten nyid kyis dang  go bar mdzad pa nyid kyis dang  gdags  pa nyid kyis dang  dus nyid kyis dang  yon tan yongs su 'dzin pa nyid kyis so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#543757#543770#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12247;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12248# rnam grangs du mar 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i rang gi mtshan nyid dang  gnyen po dang  mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang  bsgom pa dang  ma skyes pa bskyed pa dang  skyes  pa rnams gnas pa dang  mi bskyud pa dang  slar zhing 'byung ba dang  'phel zhing yangs pa nyid kyang bka' stsal zhes bya ba ni lnga pa 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bstan pa ste / /
column5: 5.960#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3110717#3110717#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_2684# mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang  gnyen po dang  ma skyes pa rnams skye ba dang  skyes pa rnams gnas pa dang  mi bskyed pa dang  slar zhing 'byung ba dang  'phel zhing yangs pa nyid kyang bka'  stsal ; /
column6: 5.960#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3110751#3110752#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_2687# mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang  gnyen po dang  bsgom pa dang  ma skyes pa rnams skye ba dang  skyes pa rnams gnas pa dang  mi bskyed pa dang  slar zhing 'byung ba dang  'phel zhing yangs pa nyid    kyang bka' stsal / /

column3: ji ltar na yang dag par bslang ba nyid kyis she na / / +yang dag par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas gsungs pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#543771#543782#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12247;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12248;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12249# rnam grangs du mar 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i rang gi mtshan nyid dang  gnyen po dang  mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang  bsgom pa dang  ma skyes pa bskyed pa dang  skyes  pa rnams gnas pa dang  mi bskyud pa dang  slar zhing 'byung ba dang  'phel zhing yangs pa nyid kyang bka' stsal zhes bya ba ni lnga pa 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bstan pa ste / / +tshig lnga yod pa ni gong ma bzhin du rig par bya'o // /

column3: ji ltar na dbang du mdzad pa nyid kyis she na / / +sems can thams  cad kyi dbang du mdzad nas gsungs pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#543780#543793#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12249;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12250;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12251# sgo phyi ma bdun po 'di dag  ni byang chub kyi phyogs sum cu rtsa bdun bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor bstan pa yin te / /

column3: ji ltar na 'jug pa nyid kyis she na / / +res 'ga' ma yin gyi / / +yang dang yang du rgyun du gsungs pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#543794#543803#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12250;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12251;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12252;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12253;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12254;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12255# 'di dag gi don ni mtshan nyid bstan pa dag las 'byung ba bzhin no // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhan yang chos rnams thams cad ni ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa / /
column5: 0.005#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#458447#458451#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_1115# bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon dus gnyis pa'i tshe theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la chos rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa dang  skye ba ma mchis pa dang  'gag pa ma mchis pa dang  gzod ma nas zhi ba dang  rang bzhin gyis yongs su  mya ngan las 'das pa nyid las brtsams nas / /
column6: 0.005#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#458495#458499#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_1122# bcom ldan 'das kyis deng dus gsum pa 'dir theg pa chen po de la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa dang  skye ba ma mchis pa dang  'gag pa ma mchis  pa dang  gzod ma nas zhi ba dang  rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa nyid las brtsams nas 'di ltar rab tu phye ba'i rnam pas yang dag pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba 'di ni shin tu ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba lags te / /
column7: 0.005#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2333210#2333214#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_2643# bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon dus gnyis pa'i tshe theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la chos  rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa dang  skye ba ma mchis pa dang  'gag pa ma mchis pa dang  gzod ma nas zhi ba dang  rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa nyid las brtsams nas 'di ltar mi mngon pa'i rnam pas yang dag pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba zhes bya ba 'di man  chad ni gnyis pa mtshan nyid med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bstan pa'o // /
column8: 0.005#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2333857#2333861#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_2707# bcom ldan  'das kyis deng dus gsum pa 'dir theg pa thams cad la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la chos thams cad ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa dang  skye ba ma mchis pa dang  'gag pa ma mchis pa dang  gzod ma nas zhi ba dang  rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa    nyid las brtsams nas 'di ltar rab tu phye ba'i rnam pas yang dag pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gsum pa nges pa'i don theg pa chen po yang dag par ston to // /
column9: 0.005#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2336669#2336673#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3019# bcom ldan    'das rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa dang  skye ba ma mchis pa dang  'gag pa ma mchis pa dang  gzod ma nas zhi ba dang  rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa nyid las brtsams nas gsungs  pa shin tu zab pa nges pa'i don bstan pa zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa bsod nams kyi khyad par yang dag par zhus pa'o // /
column10: 0.012#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#544030#544032#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12287;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12288;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12289;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12290# bcom ldan 'das kyis ci las dgongs nas chos thams cad ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa / / +skye ba ma mchis pa / / +'gag pa ma mchis pa / /
column11: 0.012#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#544163#544167#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12302;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12303# chos rnams thams cad ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa dang  skye ba ma mchis pa dang  'gag pa     // /
column12: 0.014#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3113199#3113200#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_3078;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_3077# skye ba ma mchis pa dang  'gag pa ma mchis pa  dang  gzod ma nas zhi ba dang  rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa nyid las brtsams nas / /
column13: 0.014#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3113459#3113460#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_3111;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_3110# skye ba ma mchis pa dang  'gag pa ma mchis pa dang  gzod ma nas zhi ba dang  rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa nyid las brtsams nas / /
column14: 0.014#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3113501#3113502#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_3119;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_3118# skye ba ma mchis pa nyid dang  'gag pa ma mchis pa nyid dang  gzod ma nas zhi ba dang  rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa nyid las brtsams nas / /

column3: ji ltar na rab tu bstan pa nyid kyis she na / / +slob dpon gyis dpe mkhyud kyis 'ga' la yang bar chad ma byas par bar  chad med par yang dag par gsungs pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#543802#543816#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12252;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12253;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12254;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12255;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12256# skye ba ma mchis pa / / +'gag  pa ma mchis pa / / +gzod ma nas zhi ba / /
column5: 2.384#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3110766#3110774#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_2691;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_2692;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_2693# gzod ma nas zhi ba rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa zhes kyang bka' stsal lags na / /
column6: 0.028#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3110781#3110784#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_2694;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_2695;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_2696;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_2697# chos thams cad ma skyes pa / / +ma 'gags pa / / +gzod ma nas zhi ba / / +rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bka' stsal snyam bgyid lags te / /

column3: ji ltar na rab tu dbye ba nyid kyis she na / / +sems can gyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par gsungs pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#543815#543825#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12255;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12256# rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa zhes kyang bka' stsal lags na zhes bya ba ni ngo bo nyid med par gsungs pa'i bstan pa smos pa'o // / +'di ni 'og nas mdo las dus gsum po dag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor  bar gsungs pa las brtsams pa yin te / /

column3: ji ltar na rten nyid kyis she na / / +dbyangs yan lag lnga dang ldan pa can yang dag par gsungs pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#543826#543842#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12256;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12257;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12258;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12259# 'di ni 'og nas mdo las dus gsum po dag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor  bar gsungs pa las brtsams pa yin te / / +dus dang po'i tshe ni bden pa bzhi bstan pa gsungs so // /

column3: ji ltar na go bar mdzad pa nyid kyis she na / / +dbyangs gcig gis 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas par go bar mdzad pa yang dag par gsungs pa'i phyir dang  'khor gyi dkyil 'khor ji snyed ba la thug par go bar mdzad pa yang dag par gsungs pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#460158#460161#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_1386# ngas kun tu brtags pa'i rang gi ngo bo nyid la dgongs nas mdo sde gzhan dag las chos thams cad rang bzhin med pa dang  skye ba med pa dang  'gag pa med pa dang  gzod ma nas zhi ba dang  rang bzhin gyis mya  ngan las 'das pa'o zhes ston to // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#543842#543854#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12258;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12259;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12260;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12261;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12262;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12263;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12264;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12265# dus gnyis pa'i tshe ni mtshan nyid med pa'i bstan pa gsung so // / +dus gsum pa'i tshe ni nges pa'i don gsungs te / /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#544347#544349#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12318;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12319;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12320;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12321# khyod legs par nyon cig dang ngas khyod la chos rnams thams cad ngo bo nyid med pa / / +skye ba med pa 'gag pa med pa / / +gzod ma nas zhi ba / /
column7: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#546179#546182#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12554;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12555;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12556# ngas  mtshan nyid ngo bo nyid med pa nyid las dgongs nas chos rnams thams cad ni skye ba med pa / / +'gag pa med pa / / +gzod ma nas zhi ba rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bstan to zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa ngo bo nyid med pa dang po dang tha ma las brtsams nas chos  thams cad skye ba med pa dang  'gag pa med pa la sogs pa'i tshig gi bshad pa ston to // /
column8: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#546381#546384#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12576;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12577;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12578;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12579# rigs kyi bu chos thams cad bdag med pa nyid kyis rab tu phye ba'i don dam pa ngo bo nyid med pa nyid las dgongs nas kyang chos rnams thams cad skye ba med pa / / +'gag pa med pa / / +gzod ma nas zhi ba / /
column9: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#546425#546428#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12583;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12584# 'di ltar yongs su grub pa don dam pa'i bden pa la don rnam pa bzhi yod de / / +skye ba med pa dang  'gag pa med pa dang  gzod ma nas zhi ba dang  rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa ste / /
column10: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#546954#546957#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12640# bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis ngas kun brtags pa'i ngo bo nyid  las dgongs nas mdo gzhan dag la chos thams cad ngo bo nyid med pa dang  skye ba med pa dang 'gag pa med pa dang  gzod ma nas zhi ba dang  rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'o zhes ston to zhes gsungs so zhes 'byung ba lta bu'o // /
column11: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#547058#547061#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12648# gzhan yang de nyid las bcom ldan 'das kyis ci las dgongs nas chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang  'gag pa med pa dang  gzod ma nas zhi ba dang  rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa zhes gsungs smras pa / /
column12: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#547229#547232#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12667# gzhan yang de nyid las chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang 'gag pa med pa dang  gzod ma nas zhi ba dang  rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'o zhes gsungs pa ci las dgongs te gsungs / /
column13: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#547414#547417#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12681;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12682# de'i phyir ngas chos bdag med pa nyid kyis rab tu phye ba'i  don dam pa ngo bo nyid med pa nyid las dgongs nas chos rnams thams cad ni skye ba med pa dang  'gag pa med pa gzod ma nas zhi ba / /
column14: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2319031#2319034#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_960;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_961;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_962# chos thams cad skye ba med pa / / +'gag pa med pa / / +gzod ma nas zhi ba dang  rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'o zhes ston to zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa rigs nyid las brtsams nas bstan pa gsungs par gyur pa bstan pa'o // /
column15: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2321582#2321588#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_1253# theg pa  chen po'i mdo dag las chos thams cad ngo bo nyid med pa dang  skye ba med pa dang  'gag pa med pa dang  gzod ma nas zhi ba dang  rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba la sogs par gsungs pa'i tshig thos nas dgongs pa legs pas khong du ma chud pas  sgra'i don gyi rjes su mos pa bskyed nas 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis chos thams cad ni ngo bo nyid med pa dang  skye ba med pa kho na'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so snyam nas / /
column16: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2324400#2324402#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_1645# gal te sems can  gang dag de'i lta ba'i rjes su 'brang bar mi byed pa dag ni de dag las chos rnams thams cad ngo bo nyid med pa dang  skye ba med pa dang  'gag pa med pa dang  gzod ma nas zhi ba dang  rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'o zhes thos na skrag  cing dngang la zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa de dag gi lta ba'i rjes su 'brang bar mi byed cing / /
column17: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2334414#2334417#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_2755# bcom ldan 'das kyis theg pa gsum bsgrub pa'i gang zag rnams  yongs su bzla ba'i ched du chos thams cad ngo bo nyid med pa dang  skye ba med pa dang  'gag pa med pa dang  gzod ma nas zhi ba dang  rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'o zhes rab tu bstan pa ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i mtshan nyid kyi 'khor lo bstan pa yin  pas chos kyi 'khor lo de ni shin tu rnam par dag pa ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa / /
column18: 0.014#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#546290#546290#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12565;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12566# skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni 'gag pa med pa yin no // / +skye ba med pa dang 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni gzod ma nas zhi ba yin / /
column19: 0.019#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3112344#3112345#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_2945# chos rnams kyi skye ba med pa dang  'gags pa med pa dang  gzod ma nas zhi ba dang  rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa thos nas skrag cing dngang la / /

column3: ji ltar na gdags  pa nyid kyis she na / / +mtha' gnyis spangs pa'i lam gsungs pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#543853#543862#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12262;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12263;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12264;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12265;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12266# skye ba med pa / / +'gag pa med pa / / +gzod ma nas zhi ba / / +rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa zhes gsungs pas ngo bo nyid med pa yin no // /

column9: 0.025#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2324402#2324402#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_1645# gal te sems can  gang dag de'i lta ba'i rjes su 'brang bar mi byed pa dag ni de dag las chos rnams thams cad ngo bo nyid med pa dang  skye ba med pa dang  'gag pa med pa dang  gzod ma nas zhi ba dang  rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'o zhes thos na skrag  cing dngang la zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa de dag gi lta ba'i rjes su 'brang bar mi byed cing / /
column10: 0.027#TD4069E.TXT.r#662417#662417#TD4069E.TXT.r_5584;TD4069E.TXT.r_5585# de la chos thams cad ni ma 'gags bzhes bstan pa gang yin pa lung dang 'gal ba yin no // / +chos thams cad ni gzod ma nas zhi ba rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bstan pa gang yin pa de  yang lung dang 'gal ba yin te / /

column3: ji ltar na dus nyid kyis she na / / +'dul ba yongs su smin pa rnams la gsungs pa'i phyir ro // / +ji ltar na yon tan yongs su 'dzin pa nyid kyis she na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#543861#543872#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12265;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12266;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12267# rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa zhes gsungs pas ngo bo nyid med pa yin no // / +'dir ni dus gnyis pa dus gsum pa dang po la ltos pa las  brtsams nas zhu ba gsol ba yin te / /

column3: gsung yon tan rnam pa drug cu dang ldan pa  yang dag par gsungs pa'i phyir te / / +ji skad du theg pa chen po'i mdo sde de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba las / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#543873#543885#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12266;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12267;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12268;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12269# 'dir ni dus gnyis pa dus gsum pa dang po la ltos pa las  brtsams nas zhu ba gsol ba yin te / / +sngar ni mtshan nyid yod par gsungs la phyis ni mtshan nyid med par gsungs pa dang sbyar na / /

column3: zhi ba'i blo gros gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung ni rnam pa drug cu dang ldan par 'byung ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#543886#543893#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12269;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12270# sngar mtshan nyid yod par gsungs pa dang 'gal ba'i phyir ro zhes mtshan nyid med  pas zhu ba'i gleng bslang ba yin no // /

column3: mnyen pa dang  'jam pa dang  yid du 'ong ba dang  yid du 'thad  ba dang  dag pa dang  dri ma med pa dang  gsal ba dang  snyan cing 'jebs pa dang  mnyan par 'os pa dang  mi tshugs pa dang  snyan pa dang  'dul ba dang  mi rtsub pa dang  mi brlang ba dang  rab tu dul ba dang  rnar snyan pa dang  lus tshim par byed ba dang  sems  tshim par byed pa dang  snying dga' bar byed pa dang  dga' ba dang  bde ba bskyed pa dang  yongs su gdung ba med pa dang  kun du shes par bya ba dang  rnam par rig par bya ba dang  rnam par gsal ba dang  dga' bar byed pa dang  mngon par dga' bar byed pa dang  kun  du shes par byed pa dang  rnam par rig par byed pa dang  rigs pa dang  'brel bar byed pa dang  zlos pa'i skyon med pa dang  seng ge'i sgra'i shugs dang  glang po che'i sgra skad dang  'brug gi sgra skad dang  klu'i dbang po'i sgra dbyangs dang  dri za'i glu dbyangs dang  ka la  pim ka'i sgra dbyangs dang  tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs bsgrags pa dang  shang shang te'u'i sgra dbyangs su grags pa dang  lha'i dbang po'i sgra dbyangs ltar snyan pa dang  rnga'i sgra dang  ma khengs pa dang  mi dma' ba dang sgra thams cad kyi rjes su zhugs pa dang  tshig zur chag med     // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#543894#543908#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12269;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12270;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12271# sngar mtshan nyid yod par gsungs pa dang 'gal ba'i phyir ro zhes mtshan nyid med  pas zhu ba'i gleng bslang ba yin no // / +mdo 'di nyid dang sbyar nas sngar ni yod pa nyid du gsungs pa phyis ni med pa nyid du ston to // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#543909#543916#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12271;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12272;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12273# don tshad med par bstan pa'i mdo las ni snga phyi'i dus gnyi gar yang stong pa dang yod pa nyid du ston te / /

column9: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#543954#543963#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12277# dge slong rnams dang  byang chub sems dpa' mang po rnams kyi ched de rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis dang  pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag rnam par phye rab tu bstan chos rnams  gzod ma nas stong zhing zhi ba'o zhes kyang bshad do zhes gsungs pa yin te / /

column14: 0.024#TD4050E.TXT.r#1109904#1109905#TD4050E.TXT.r_1753;TD4050E.TXT.r_1754# spyod lam thams cad du byang chub kyi sems yongs su sbyong BAR BYED PA DANG ZHES bya ba'i tshig gi don ni spyod lam yongs su dag pa'i mdo bzhin no // /
column15: 0.028#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2342479#2342479#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3666;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3667# shes bya'i dngos po de nyid la rnam par rtog pa med pa'i ye shes dang  mthong ba mngon sum du gyur nas bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par zhugs pa gang yin pa de bsam gtan thob pa'i tshe bsam gtan dang po'i spyod yul nas 'du shes med 'du  shes med min gyi skye mched la snyoms par zhugs pa gang yin pa de snyoms par zhugs pa'i che snyoms par 'jug pa de nyid kyi spyod yul la dmigs pa gang yin pa'i bar de dag ni dgongs pa yongs su grub pa'o zhes bshad de / / +zhib tu ni de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no // /

column3: pa dang  ma tshang ba med pa dang  ma zhum pa dang  ma zhan pa dang  rab tu dga' ba dang  khyab pa dang  chub pa dang  rgyun chags pa dang  'bel ba dang  sgra thams cad rdzogs par byed pa dang  dbang po thams cad tshim par byed pa dang  ma  smad pa dang  mi 'gyur ba dang  ma rtags pa dang  'khor kun du grags pa dang  rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'o // /

column6: 0.010#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2375882#2375882#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7767;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_7769# ci'i phyir mdo 'di las mtshan ma rnam pa bcu dang  stong pa nyid bcu bdun bstan zhe na / / +'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las / /

column6: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#544023#544032#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12286;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12287;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12288;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12289;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12290# so so nas phyogs re re smos pa yin pas phan tshun 'gal ba med do // / +bcom ldan 'das kyis ci las dgongs nas chos thams cad ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa / /

column8: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2333209#2333214#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_2643# bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon dus gnyis pa'i tshe theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la chos  rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa dang  skye ba ma mchis pa dang  'gag pa ma mchis pa dang  gzod ma nas zhi ba dang  rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa nyid las brtsams nas 'di ltar mi mngon pa'i rnam pas yang dag pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba zhes bya ba 'di man  chad ni gnyis pa mtshan nyid med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bstan pa'o // /
column9: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2333856#2333861#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_2707# bcom ldan  'das kyis deng dus gsum pa 'dir theg pa thams cad la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la chos thams cad ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa dang  skye ba ma mchis pa dang  'gag pa ma mchis pa dang  gzod ma nas zhi ba dang  rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa    nyid las brtsams nas 'di ltar rab tu phye ba'i rnam pas yang dag pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gsum pa nges pa'i don theg pa chen po yang dag par ston to // /
column10: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2336668#2336673#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3019# bcom ldan    'das rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa dang  skye ba ma mchis pa dang  'gag pa ma mchis pa dang  gzod ma nas zhi ba dang  rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa nyid las brtsams nas gsungs  pa shin tu zab pa nges pa'i don bstan pa zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa bsod nams kyi khyad par yang dag par zhus pa'o // /
column11: 0.012#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#543799#543802#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12251;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12252;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12253;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12254# bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhan yang chos rnams thams cad ni ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa / / +skye ba ma mchis pa / / +'gag  pa ma mchis pa / /
column12: 0.019#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2328721#2328723#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_2141# de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang chos rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa dang  skye ba ma mchis pa dang  'gag pa ma mchis pa dang  gzod  ma nas zhi ba dang  rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa nyid las brtsams nas ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa nyid nges pa'i don bstan pa 'di yang drang ba'i don gyi mdo sde thams cad du stsal bar mdzad lags so zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa chos dpe dang mtshungs par bstan pa ste / /

column3: dag pa ni 'jig rten las 'das pa gong na med pa'i rjes su thob pa'i phyir ro // / +dri ma med pa ni nyon mongs pa'i bag la nyal dang  bag chags thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir ro // /

column3: gsal  ba ni tshig dang yi ger rab tu grags pa'i phyir ro // / +snyan cing 'jebs pa ni mu stegs can blo gros ngan pa thams cad kyi lta ba 'joms pa'i stobs kyi yon tan dang ldan pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#544043#544060#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12291;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12292;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12293;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12294# rang bzhin  gyis mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bka' stsal lags zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni / / +gsum pa bstan pa ji lta ba bzhin du zhu ba gsol ba ston to // /

column3: mnyan par 'os pa ni bsgrubs pas nges par 'byin pa'i phyir ro // / +mi tshugs pa ni phas kyi  rgol ba thams cad kyis mi brdzi ba'i phyir ro // /

column3: snyan pa ni dga' bar byed pa'i phyir ro //// / +bam po dgu pa / / +'dul ba ni 'dod chags kyi gnyen po yin pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#544070#544079#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12296# 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis sngar ni phung po dang  skye mched dang khams la sogs pa'i chos kyi sgo mo rnam pa bcu gsum po dag ngo bo nyid yod par  gsungs pa phyis ni yang chos rnams thams cad ni ngo bo nyid med pa skyes ba med pa 'gag pa med pa la sogs par gsungs pas ngo bo nyid yod par gsungs pa dang phyis ngo bo nyid med par gsungs pa'i bstan pa gnyis phan tshun 'gal bas na / /

column3: mi rtsub pa ni bslab pa bca' ba'i thabs bde ba'i phyir ro // / +mi brlang ba ni de las  'das na nges par 'byung ba'i thabs yang dag par ston pa'i phyir ro // /

column5: 0.019#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#547849#547849#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12722# bcom ldan  'das kyis gzhan yang chos rnams thams cad ni ngo bo nyid med pa dang  skye ba med pa dang  'gag pa med pa la sogs par gsungs pa gang yin pa de ni rnam pa bzhi las mtshan nyid la ldem por dgongs pa'o // /

column3: rab tu dul ba ni theg pa gsum char gyis 'dul ba ston pa'i phyir ro // /
rnar snyan pa ni rnam par gyeng ba'i gnyen po yin pa'i phyir ro // / +lus tshim par byed pa ni ting nge 'dzin skyed pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: sems  tshim par byed pa ni lhag mthong gis rab tu dga' ba skyed pa'i phyir ro // / +snying dga' bar byed pa ni the tshom gcod par byed pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#544111#544122#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12297;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12298;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12299# bcom ldan  'das kyis ci las dgongs nas ngo bo nyid med pa la sogs par gsungs pa ma rtogs na zhes bya ba'i don to // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni tshig lnga 'byung ste / /
column5: 0.018#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#548087#548087#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12745;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12746# mdo sde'i tshig dang rjes su mthun PA'I PHYIR RO // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las kyang 'di dang mthun par 'byung ngo // /
column6: 0.018#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2385476#2385476#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8886;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8887# sgrib pa zhes bya ba'i tshig gis STON PA'I PHYIR RO // / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las / /
column7: 0.019#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2314134#2314134#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_373# bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par bya bar mi nus so zhes gsungs pa dang  gzhan yang dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las  don mchog mngon par grub pa'i nyan thos zhi ba'i rigs can gyi gang zag ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mthu ci mnga' ba gtugs te gdul bar mdzad kyang de byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug ste / /
column8: 0.021#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#517474#517474#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_8773# dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni tshig bdun 'byung ste / /

column10: 0.029#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#264904#264904#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6440;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6441# mngon sum gyi tshad ma'i phyir dang  rjes su dpag pa'i tshad ma'i phyir dang  dpe'i phyir dang  yongs su grags pa'i phyir dang  lung gi  tshad ma'i phyir mtshan nyid lnga po dag yongs su dag pa'o zhes 'byung ste / / +dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las kyang de skad du ston to // /

column3: dga' ba dang bde ba skyed pa ni log par nges par sel ba'i phyir ro // / +yongs su gdung ba med pa ni bsgrub pa la 'gyod pa med pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#544121#544133#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12298;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12299# dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni tshig lnga 'byung ste / / +chos thams cad gzod ma nas ngo bo nyid med pa dang  chos thams cad  gzod ma nas ma skyes pa dang  chos thams cad gzod ma nas ma 'gags pa dang  chos thams cad gzod ma nas zhi ba dang  chos thams cad gzod ma nas rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa zhes 'byung ngo // /

column3: kun du shes par bya ba ni thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab phun sum tshogs pa'i rten yin pa'i phyir ro // / +rnam par rig par bya ba ni bsam pa las byung ba'i shes rab phun sum tshogs pa'i rten yin pa'i phyir ro // /

column15: 0.021#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3110629#3110631#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_2672;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_2673# mdo las ji skad 'byung ba bzhin blta bar bya ste / / +bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' don dam yang dag 'phags kyis 'di skad ces gsol to // /
column16: 0.024#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#245717#245717#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4046# de nas bcom ldan  'das kyis don de nyid yang bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa tshigs su bcad pas mdor bstan pa zhes bya ba ston to // /

column3: glang po che'i sgra skad ni rgya che ba'i phyir ro // / +'brug gi sgra dbyangs ni zab pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#544202#544212#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12304;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12305;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12306# de nas bcom ldan 'das  kyis byang chub sems dpa' don dam yang dag 'phags la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par bshad pa'i phyogs zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang rnam pa gnyis te / /
column5: 0.015#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#523025#523026#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9566;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9567;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9568# legs so legs so zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa zhus pa bzhin du lan yang dag par gsungs pa zhes bya ba ston to // / +'di yang rnam pa gnyis kyis bstan  te / / +zhu ba gsol ba la bsngags shing bshad par snang ba dang  blo gros yangs pa 'di ltar shes par bya ste zhes bya ba man chad kyis zhus pa bzhin du lan yang dag par bstan pa'o // /

column3: klu'i dbang po'i sgra ni gzung bar 'os pa'i phyir ro // / +dri za'i glu dbyangs ni snyan pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#544211#544220#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12306# zhu ba gsol ba la bsngags  shing bshad par gnang ba bstan pa dang  don dam yang dag 'phags 'di ltar shes par bya ste zhes bya ba man chad kyis zhu ba bzhin du lan yang dag par bstan pa'o // /
column5: 5.960#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#544515#544516#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12334# chos thams cad ngo bo nyid med par gsungs pa rnam par bshad pa dang  don dam yang dag 'phags 'di ltar shes par bya ste zhes bya ba man chad kyis ngo bo nyid med par dang po dang tha ma las brtsams nas chos  thams cad skye ba med pa dang  'gag pa med pa la sogs pa'i tshig gis bshad pa bstan pa'o // /
column6: 0.027#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#544367#544369#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12321;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12322# rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das  pa zhes bya ba gsungs pa'i dgongs pa bshad par bya'o zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa gnyen por bskul zhing bshad par gnang ba bstan pa'o // / +don dam yang dag 'phags 'di ltar shes par bya ste / /

column3: ka la  pim ka'i sgra dbyangs ni rgyun mi 'chad pa dang 'jigs pa'i phyir ro // / +tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs bsgrags pa ni thag ring por grags pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#544221#544232#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12306;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12307;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12308# zhu ba gsol ba la bsngags  shing bshad par gnang ba bstan pa dang  don dam yang dag 'phags 'di ltar shes par bya ste zhes bya ba man chad kyis zhu ba bzhin du lan yang dag par bstan pa'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#544232#544243#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12308;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12309;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12307# zhu ba gsol ba la phan yon yod par bsngags  pa dang  mnyan par bskul zhing bshad par gnang ba'o // /
column6: 0.006#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#534566#534569#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11079;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11080# mdo'i tshig 'di yang rnam pa gnyis su dbye ste / / +zhu ba gsol ba la phan yon che bar bsngags pa dang  don zab mo zhus pa'i legs     // /
column7: 0.010#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2355413#2355414#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5196;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5197;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5198# 'dres pa chung du'i chos la dmigs pa la sogs pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i sgo dang 'dres pa'i chos la dmigs pa rkyen dang ldan par rab tu bstan pa'i sgo dang rtogs pa dang thob pa'i gnas skabs rnam par 'byed pa'i sgo ste 'di ni dang po'o // / +dang po yang rnam pa gnyis su  dbye ste / / +zhu ba gsol ba dang lan du gsungs pa'o // /
column8: 0.021#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2395504#2395505#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10015;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10016# 'di yang rnam pa gsum  du dbye ste / / +zhu ba gsol ba la phan yon yod par bsngags pa dang  ngas kyang zhes bya ba man chad sangs rgyas rnams kyis mtshungs par gsungs pa nyid du bstan pa dang  rigs kyi bu zhes bya ba man chad kyis bsgrub par bskul ba bstan pa'o // /
column9: 0.023#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2345474#2345474#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4019;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4020# 'di yang rnam pa gnyis su dbye ste / / +zhu ba gsol ba dang lan du gsungs pa'o // /
column10: 0.023#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2360583#2360583#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5793;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_5794# dang po chos dang don yang dag par rig pa bstan pa de yang rnam pa gnyis su dbye ste / / +zhu ba gsol ba  dang lan du gsungs pa'o // /
column11: 0.023#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#274680#274680#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7636;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_7637# phyogs 'di yang rnam pa gnyis su dbye ste / / +zhu ba gsol pa dang  lan du gsungs pa'o // /

column3: shang shang te'u'i sgra dbyangs su grags pa ni sgrub pa thams cad kyi sngon du 'gro ba'i bkra shis yin pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.024#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#251830#251830#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_4712# gsung des zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gsung gi nus pa'i  phan yon bstan pa'o // /
column5: 0.027#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#523194#523194#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9587# 'di nyid 'dri bar  sems sam zhes bya bas ni gnyis pa zhu ba gsol ba la phan yon yod par bsngags pa'o // /

column3: lha'i dbang po'i sgra dbyangs  ltar snyan pa ni mi 'da' bar bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#544244#544258#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12309;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12310# zhu ba gsol ba la phan yon yod par bsngags pa yang rnam pa bzhir dbye ste / / +'chad pa po rnam par 'byed pa dang  zhu ba gsol ba'i rigs pa dang mthun par bsngags pa dang  don zab mo zhus pa'i  bsngags pa brjod pa dang  zhu ba gsol ba'i phan yon bsngags pa ste / /

column3: rnga'i sgra ni bdud dang phyir rgol ba thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba'i sngon du 'gro ba yin pa'i phyir ro // / +ma khengs pa ni bstod kyang kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#544259#544266#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12310;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12311;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12312# 'chad pa po rnam par 'byed pa dang  zhu ba gsol ba'i rigs pa dang mthun par bsngags pa dang  don zab mo zhus pa'i  bsngags pa brjod pa dang  zhu ba gsol ba'i phan yon bsngags pa ste / /

column3: mi dma' ba ni smad kyang kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i  phyir ro // / +sgra thams cad kyi rjes su zhugs pa ni / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#544265#544274#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12311;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12312# 'di ni dang po'o // / +don dam yang dag 'phags khyod sems kyi rtog pa dge pa tshul bzhin skyes pa legs so legs so zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa zhu ba gsol ba rigs pa dang mthun par gyur par bsngags  pa'o // /

column3: brda sprod pa thams cad kyi mtshan nyid kyi rnam pa thams cad kyi rjes su zhugs pa'i phyir ro // / +tshig zung chag pa med pa ni bsnyel te mi gsung ba'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#544273#544286#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12312;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12313# don dam yang dag 'phags khyod sems kyi rtog pa dge pa tshul bzhin skyes pa legs so legs so zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa zhu ba gsol ba rigs pa dang mthun par gyur par bsngags  pa'o // /
column5: 0.022#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2378983#2378983#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8145# de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams  pa la legs so legs so zhes bsngags pa brjod nas rigs kyi bu khyod kyis deng 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa la 'di ltar don zab mo 'dri ba ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid las rab tu nyams par mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i ched du'o zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa de  bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to // /

column3: ma tshang ba med pa ni 'dul ba'i bya ba la dus thams cad du nye bar gnas     // / +pa'i phyir ro // / +ma zhum pa ni rnyed pa dang bkur sti la mi brten pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#544287#544298#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12313;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12314# rigs kyi bu khyod kyis deng 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa la don zab mo 'dri ba legs so legs so zhes bya ba ni gsum pa don zab mo zhus pa'i bsngags pa brjod pa ste / /

column3: mi zhan pa ni bsnyengs pa dang bral ba'i phyir ro // / +rab tu dga' ba ni mi skyo ba'i phyir ro // / +khyab pa ni rig pa'i gnas thams cad la mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#544297#544310#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12313;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12314;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12315# rigs kyi bu khyod kyis deng 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa la don zab mo 'dri ba legs so legs so zhes bya ba ni gsum pa don zab mo zhus pa'i bsngags pa brjod pa ste / / +gong du bstan pa'i tshig 'bru dang  don gnyi ga dge ba'i phyir tshig zlos bus legs so  legs so zhes bya ba gsungs so // /

column3: chub pa ni sems  can rnams kyi de dag gi don thams cad sgrub par byed pa'i phyir ro // / +rgyun chags pa ni rgyun ma chad pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#544309#544328#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12314;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12315;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12316# gong du bstan pa'i tshig 'bru dang  don gnyi ga dge ba'i phyir tshig zlos bus legs so  legs so zhes bya ba gsungs so // / +khyod skye bo mang po la phan pa dang bde ba dang 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang  lha dang  mi dang  lha ma yin la sogs pa'i don dang  phan pa dang  bde ba'i phyir dris pa yin pas zhes bya ba ni / /
column5: 0.016#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#523179#523180#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9586# khyod skye bo tshad med pa dag la phan pa dang bde ba dang  'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang  lha dang mi dang lha ma yin la sogs pa'i don dang  phan pa dang bde ba dang thob par bya ba'i phyir / /
column6: 0.024#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#534541#534541#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11076# yon tan 'byung gnas khyod de ltar skye bo tshad med pa la phan pa dang  bde ba dang  'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang  lha dang mi dang  lha ma yin la sogs pa'i don dang  phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir / /

column3: 'bel ba ni rnam pa sna tshogs su nye bar gnas pa'i phyir ro // / +sgra thams cad rdzogs par byed pa ni / /
gsung gcig las sgra'i rnam par rig pa rnam pa du ma nye bar gnas  pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#534579#534584#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11081;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11082;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11083# ba'i bsngags pa ste / / +gong ma bzhin du rig par bya'o // / +khyod legs par nyon cig dang  ngas khyod la chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid bshad par bya'o zhes bya ba ni gsum pa mnyan par bskul zhing bshad par gnang ba'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#544329#544338#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12315;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12316;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12317;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12318# khyod skye bo mang po la phan pa dang bde ba dang 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang  lha dang  mi dang  lha ma yin la sogs pa'i don dang  phan pa dang  bde ba'i phyir dris pa yin pas zhes bya ba ni / / +bzhi pa gsol ba'i phan    yon gyi bsngags pa brjod pa ste / /
column6: 0.008#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#523450#523451#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9625;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9626# rigs ma nges pa'i ched kho nar gsungs par mdzad pas so // / +khyod kyis legs par nyon cig dang   ngas khyod la sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa'i gsang ba'i don bshad par bya'o zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa bshad par bkas gnang ba'o // /
column7: 0.020#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2379250#2379250#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8169;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8170# rgya cher de nyid las bstan pa  bzhin du rig par bya'o // / +de'i phyir khyod kyis legs par nyon cig dang  khyod la stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid bsdus pa bshad par bya'o zhes bya ba ni gsum pa mnyam par bskul zhing bshad par gnang ba bstan pa'o // /

column3: dbang po thams cad tshim par byed pa ni gcig las don du ma'i rnam par rig pa nye bar gnas pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#543851#543853#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12261;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12262;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12263;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12264;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12265# nyid med pa / / +skye ba med pa / / +'gag pa med pa / / +gzod ma nas zhi ba / /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#544337#544347#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12317;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12318;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12319;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12320# gong ma bzhin du rig par bya'o // / +khyod legs par nyon cig dang ngas khyod la chos rnams thams cad ngo bo nyid med pa / /
column6: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#546177#546181#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12554;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12555;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12556# ngas  mtshan nyid ngo bo nyid med pa nyid las dgongs nas chos rnams thams cad ni skye ba med pa / / +'gag pa med pa / /
column7: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#546379#546383#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12576;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12577;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12578;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12579# rigs kyi bu chos thams cad bdag med pa nyid kyis rab tu phye ba'i don dam pa ngo bo nyid med pa nyid las dgongs nas kyang chos rnams thams cad skye ba med pa / / +'gag pa med pa / /
column8: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#546426#546427#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12584# skye ba med pa dang  'gag pa med pa dang  gzod ma nas zhi ba dang  rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa ste / /
column9: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#546952#546956#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12640# bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis ngas kun brtags pa'i ngo bo nyid  las dgongs nas mdo gzhan dag la chos thams cad ngo bo nyid med pa dang  skye ba med pa dang 'gag pa med pa dang  gzod ma nas zhi ba dang  rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'o zhes ston to zhes gsungs so zhes 'byung ba lta bu'o // /
column10: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#547057#547060#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12648# gzhan yang de nyid las bcom ldan 'das kyis ci las dgongs nas chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang  'gag pa med pa dang  gzod ma nas zhi ba dang  rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa zhes gsungs smras pa / /
column11: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#547228#547231#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12667# gzhan yang de nyid las chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang 'gag pa med pa dang  gzod ma nas zhi ba dang  rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'o zhes gsungs pa ci las dgongs te gsungs / /
column12: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#547412#547416#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12681;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12682# de'i phyir ngas chos bdag med pa nyid kyis rab tu phye ba'i  don dam pa ngo bo nyid med pa nyid las dgongs nas chos rnams thams cad ni skye ba med pa dang  'gag pa med pa gzod ma nas zhi ba / /
column13: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2319030#2319033#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_959;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_960;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_961;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_962# zab mo nyid las brtsams nas drang ba'i don gyi mdo gsang ba'i mtshan nyid kyi chos rnams kyi dgongs pa  brjod pa 'di lta ste / / +chos thams cad skye ba med pa / / +'gag pa med pa / /
column14: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2321582#2321586#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_1253# theg pa  chen po'i mdo dag las chos thams cad ngo bo nyid med pa dang  skye ba med pa dang  'gag pa med pa dang  gzod ma nas zhi ba dang  rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba la sogs par gsungs pa'i tshig thos nas dgongs pa legs pas khong du ma chud pas  sgra'i don gyi rjes su mos pa bskyed nas 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis chos thams cad ni ngo bo nyid med pa dang  skye ba med pa kho na'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so snyam nas / /
column15: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2324397#2324402#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_1645# gal te sems can  gang dag de'i lta ba'i rjes su 'brang bar mi byed pa dag ni de dag las chos rnams thams cad ngo bo nyid med pa dang  skye ba med pa dang  'gag pa med pa dang  gzod ma nas zhi ba dang  rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'o zhes thos na skrag  cing dngang la zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa de dag gi lta ba'i rjes su 'brang bar mi byed cing / /
column16: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2334412#2334416#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_2755# bcom ldan 'das kyis theg pa gsum bsgrub pa'i gang zag rnams  yongs su bzla ba'i ched du chos thams cad ngo bo nyid med pa dang  skye ba med pa dang  'gag pa med pa dang  gzod ma nas zhi ba dang  rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'o zhes rab tu bstan pa ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i mtshan nyid kyi 'khor lo bstan pa yin  pas chos kyi 'khor lo de ni shin tu RNAM PAR DAG PA NGO mtshar rmad du byung ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa / /
column17: 0.015#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#460159#460163#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_1386# ngas kun tu brtags pa'i rang gi ngo bo nyid la dgongs nas mdo sde gzhan dag las chos thams cad rang bzhin med pa dang  skye ba med pa dang  'gag pa med pa dang  gzod ma nas zhi ba dang  rang bzhin gyis mya  ngan las 'das pa'o zhes ston to // /
column18: 0.018#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#546350#546352#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12572;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12573;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12574# de lta bas na ngas mtshan nyid ngo bo nyid med pa nyid las dgongs nas chos rnams thams cad ni skye ba med pa / / +'gag pa med pa / /
column19: 0.023#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#546291#546291#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12566# skye ba med pa dang 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni gzod ma nas zhi ba yin / /
column20: 0.024#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#547848#547849#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12722# bcom ldan  'das kyis gzhan yang chos rnams thams cad ni ngo bo nyid med pa dang  skye ba med pa dang  'gag pa med pa la sogs par gsungs pa gang yin pa de ni rnam pa bzhi las mtshan nyid la ldem por dgongs pa'o // /
column21: 0.024#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#523450#523451#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9625;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9626# rigs ma nges pa'i ched kho nar gsungs par mdzad pas so // / +khyod kyis legs par nyon cig dang   ngas khyod la sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa'i gsang ba'i don bshad par bya'o zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa bshad par bkas gnang ba'o // /

column3: ma smad pa ni dam bcas pa ji lta ba bzhin pa'i phyir ro // / +mi 'gyur ba ni dus la bab bar rab tu sbyor ba'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#544348#544361#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12319;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12320;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12321# skye ba med pa 'gag pa med pa / / +gzod ma nas zhi ba / /
column5: 0.020#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3112344#3112344#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_2945# chos rnams kyi skye ba med pa dang  'gags pa med pa dang  gzod ma nas zhi ba dang  rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa thos nas skrag cing dngang la / /
column6: 0.023#TD4072E.TXT.r#2098469#2098469#TD4072E.TXT.r_861;TD4072E.TXT.r_863# ji ltar rang bzhin med pa de bzhin du ma skyes pa dang  ma 'gags pa dang  gzod ma nyid nas zhi ba dang  rang bzhin gyis mya ngan las 'das     // / +yang de'i dgongs pa ni yongs su mi shes pas rang gi rnam par dpyod pa la gnas nas skye ba med pa nyid ni med pa nyid do zhes sgra ji bzhin par bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa yin no zhes dngos po med pa'i mtshan ma la mngon par zhen pa de dag ni  mtshan mar lta ba'o // /
column7: 0.026#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3111194#3111195#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_2764;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_2765;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_2766# ma 'gags pa / / +gzod ma nas zhi ba / / +rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das  pa'o zhes bstan to // /

column3: ma rtabs pa ni rtab rtab bor mi gsung ba'i phyir ro // / +'khor kun tu grags pa ni / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#544359#544369#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12321;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12322# rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das  pa zhes bya ba gsungs pa'i dgongs pa bshad par bya'o zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa gnyen por bskul zhing bshad par gnang ba bstan pa'o // /
column5: 0.008#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2379261#2379262#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8170# de'i phyir khyod kyis legs par nyon cig dang  khyod la stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid bsdus pa bshad par bya'o zhes bya ba ni gsum pa mnyam par bskul zhing bshad par gnang ba bstan pa'o // /

column3: 'khor nye ba dang  ring bas mtshungs par thos pa'i phyir ro // / +rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa ni 'jig rten pa'i don thams cad dpe'i chos su sgyur ba'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#544367#544383#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12321;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12322;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12323;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12324# rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das  pa zhes bya ba gsungs pa'i dgongs pa bshad par bya'o zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa gnyen por bskul zhing bshad par gnang ba bstan pa'o // / +don dam yang dag 'phags 'di ltar shes par bya ste / /
column5: 0.022#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#546166#546167#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12553;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12554# don dam yang dag 'phags 'di ltar shes par bya ste / /

column3: yang ci'i phyir zhe na / / +'khor lo legs par sbyar ba yang 'phul bar byed pa dang  sa dang  gnyis kyi yon tan gyis 'dril te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#544384#544395#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12324;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12325;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12326# chos rnams thams  cad ngo bo nyid med pa zhes bstan to zhes bya ba 'di man chad gnyis pa zhus pa bzhin du lan yang dag par bstan pa ston to // /

column6: 0.027#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#523015#523015#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9566# legs so legs so zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa zhus pa bzhin du lan yang dag par gsungs pa zhes bya ba ston to // /
column7: 0.029#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2379302#2379302#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8172;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8173# mdo'i tshig 'di yang rnam pa gnyis te / / +zhus pa bzhin du lan yang dag par bstan pa dang  de ni zhes bya ba man chad ni mjug bsdu zhing gzhan dag gis brgal ba'i lan btab pa'o // /

column3: gal te 'phul bar byed pas kyang legs par 'phul ba la / / +gang du dbul bar bya ba'i sa yang mi mnyam pa med pa yin na'o // /

column5: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#544432#544439#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12329# mdo sde'i tshig rnams rnam par bshad pa dang  gzhan yang don dam yang dag 'phags zhes bya ba man chad kyis ngo bo nyid gsum gyi rnal 'byor las brtsams nas ngo bo nyid med pa  rnam pa gsum rnam par bzhag pa'i dgongs pa bstan pa dang  gzhan yang don dam yang dag 'phags zhes bya ba man chad kyis gnas skabs las brtsams nas ngo bo nyid med pa rnam pa gsum rnam par gzhag pa'i dgongs pa bstan pa dang  gzhan yang don dam  yang dag 'phags zhes bya ba man chad kyis ngo bo nyid med pa rnam pa gsum gyi rnal 'byor las brtsams nas theg pa gcig gi don rnam par 'byed pa dang  gzhan yang don dam yang dag 'phags zhes bya ba man chad kyis ngo bo nyid med par ston pa po'i bstan pa las  brtsams nas mos pa mi mthun par gyur pa rnam par 'byed pa'o // /

column6: 0.0#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2312236#2312240#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_156# rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i rigs can gyi sems can dang  de bzhin gshegs pa'i theg pa'i rigs can gyi sems can rnams kyis kyang lam 'di nyid dang  sgrub pa'i gnas 'di nyid kyi phyir bla na med pa'i bde ba mya ngan las 'das pa thob par  'gyur bas zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bzhi pa ngo bo nyid med pa rnam pa gsum gyi rnal 'byor las brtsams nas theg pa gcig pa'i don rnam par dbye ba ston par mdzad do // /

column5: 1.192#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2318173#2318174#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_869;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_870# legs par bstan pa'i chos la ni sems can rnams kyi mos pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi rim pa yang snang ste zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni lnga pa ngo bo nyid med par ston pa'i    bstan pa las brtsams nas / /

column3: rigs ba yang yin te / / +ji skad du chos kyis chos tshol bar byed de / / +chos ma yin pas ma yin no zhes 'byung ba lta bu'o // /
de lta bas na rigs pa'i chos dang ma bral ba'i bstan pa ni chos kyi 'khor lo zhes pa yin no // / +'khor lo dang chos mthun pas 'khor lo ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#544495#544503#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12330;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12331;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12332;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12333# 'di ni dang po'i ngo bo nyid med pa rnam pa gsum las brtsams nas mdo sde'i tshig rnams rnam par bshad pa ste / /

column3: 'dul ba'i rgyud gzhan dag la bskor ba'i phyir ro // / +gzhan mu stegs can dag la yang chos kyi 'khor  lo yod mod kyi / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#544504#544514#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12332;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12333;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12334# ngo bo nyid med pa rnam pa gsum las brtsams     // / +nas mdo sde dag las / /

column3: chos dang ldan pa ni ma yin te / / +rigs pa'i chos dang bral ba'i phyir ro // / +de lta bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo kho na chos dang ldan pa zhes bya bar nges par gzung bar bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#544515#544528#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12334# chos thams cad ngo bo nyid med par gsungs pa rnam par bshad pa dang  don dam yang dag 'phags 'di ltar shes par bya ste zhes bya ba man chad kyis ngo bo nyid med par dang po dang tha ma las brtsams nas chos  thams cad skye ba med pa dang  'gag pa med pa la sogs pa'i tshig gis bshad pa bstan pa'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#546195#546202#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12556# gzod ma nas zhi ba rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bstan to zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa ngo bo nyid med pa dang po dang tha ma las brtsams nas chos  thams cad skye ba med pa dang  'gag pa med pa la sogs pa'i tshig gi bshad pa ston to // /
column6: 5.960#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#544214#544215#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12306# zhu ba gsol ba la bsngags  shing bshad par gnang ba bstan pa dang  don dam yang dag 'phags 'di ltar shes par bya ste zhes bya ba man chad kyis zhu ba bzhin du lan yang dag par bstan pa'o // /

column3: de ltar bas na ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi 'khor lo rjes su skor bar  byed par 'gyur snyam nas / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#544529#544548#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12334;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12335;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12336# chos thams cad ngo bo nyid med par gsungs pa rnam par bshad pa dang  don dam yang dag 'phags 'di ltar shes par bya ste zhes bya ba man chad kyis ngo bo nyid med par dang po dang tha ma las brtsams nas chos  thams cad skye ba med pa dang  'gag pa med pa la sogs pa'i tshig gis bshad pa bstan pa'o // /

column3: gus par chos mnyan par bya'o // / +'phags pa sh'a ri'i bus / / +de ltar 'phags pa nyan thos chos yang dag par nyan na 'chad pa po la mtho mi 'tsham pa dang  gtam gyi bcud rtogs pa dang  chos nyid kyis ston pa la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang  bdag gi don rjes  su 'thob pa dang  mya ngan las 'das pa yang 'thob po zhes gsungs pa 'dis ci zhig bstan pa yin zhe na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#544549#544558#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12336# sgo bstan nas mdor bshad pa dang  rigs kyi bu zhes bya ba man chad kyis zhus pa dang lan dag gis rgya cher rnam  par bshad pa dang  rigs kyi bu zhes bya ba man chad kyis bshad zin nas spyi'i mjug bsdu ba'o // /
column5: 0.011#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#544448#544448#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12329# mdo sde'i tshig rnams rnam par bshad pa dang  gzhan yang don dam yang dag 'phags zhes bya ba man chad kyis ngo bo nyid gsum gyi rnal 'byor las brtsams nas ngo bo nyid med pa  rnam pa gsum rnam par bzhag pa'i dgongs pa bstan pa dang  gzhan yang don dam yang dag 'phags zhes bya ba man chad kyis gnas skabs las brtsams nas ngo bo nyid med pa rnam pa gsum rnam par gzhag pa'i dgongs pa bstan pa dang  gzhan yang don dam  yang dag 'phags zhes bya ba man chad kyis ngo bo nyid med pa rnam pa gsum gyi rnal 'byor las brtsams nas theg pa gcig gi don rnam par 'byed pa dang  gzhan yang don dam yang dag 'phags zhes bya ba man chad kyis ngo bo nyid med par ston pa po'i bstan pa las  brtsams nas mos pa mi mthun par gyur pa rnam par 'byed pa'o // /

column3: chos yang dag par mnyan na dus gsum dag tu phan yon gsum yod par bstan pa yin te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#544574#544582#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12338;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12339# ngo bo nyid med pa rnam pa gsum las brtsams nas mdo sde'i dgongs pa bstan  pa dang  grangs bzhin du ngo bo nyid med pa rnam pa gsum gyis ming bkod pa ste / /

column3: nyan pa'i dus na 'chad pa po'i bsam pa gang yin pa rdzogs par byed cing / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#544583#544591#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12338;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12339;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12340# ngo bo nyid med pa rnam pa gsum las brtsams nas mdo sde'i dgongs pa bstan  pa dang  grangs bzhin du ngo bo nyid med pa rnam pa gsum gyis ming bkod pa ste / / +'di ni dang po'o // / +'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis chos thams cad ngo bo nyid med pa zhes gsungs pa ni ngas ngo bo nyid med pa rnam pa gsum la brten nas chos thams cad ngo bo nyid  med pa'o zhes gsungs so zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /

column3: bdag nyid kyis  kyang chos kyi don gyi bcud 'thob pas gzhan dang  bdag rjes su 'dzin pa dang  bsgrub pa'i dus su ston pa'i dgongs pa gang yin pa rdzogs par byed cing bdag nyid kyis kyang zag pa zad pas rjes su 'thob pas / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#544589#544610#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12340;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12341;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12342# 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis chos thams cad ngo bo nyid med pa zhes gsungs pa ni ngas ngo bo nyid med pa rnam pa gsum la brten nas chos thams cad ngo bo nyid  med pa'o zhes gsungs so zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /
column5: 2.980#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2328015#2328018#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_2071# 'di ltar  sdug bsngal gyi bden pa ngo bo nyid rnam pa gsum dang ldan pas ngo bo nyid rnam pa gsum po dag la brten nas ngo bo nyid med pa rnam pa gsum rnam par gzhag pa de bzhin du bden pa gsum po 'di dag kyang ngo bo nyid rnam pa gsum dang ldan te / /

column3: bdag dang gzhan rjes su 'dzin pa dang  tha ma'i dus su sdug bsngal  thams cad kyi mthar phyin pa phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa 'thob bo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#544611#544628#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12342;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12343;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12344;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12345# ngo bo nyid rnam pa gsum la brten nas ngo bo nyid med pa rnam pa gsum rnam par gzhag pas de'i phyir mdo sde rnams las chos  thams cad ni ngo bo nyid med pa'o zhes gsungs te / /

column3: gal te dus gsum dag tu yin na ci'i phyir nyan na zhes gsungs she na / / +ji ltar smra zhing 'gro bar byed ces bya ba'i bya ba gnyis dus gcig pa nyid du bsam pa de lta bur ni nyan na ji skad smos pa bzhin du byed pa ni     // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#534264#534273#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11040;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11041;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11042;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11043;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11044# rigs pa de'i phyir slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i tshig le 'ur byas pa sum cu pa las / / +ngo bo nyid ni rnam gsum gyis // / +ngo bo nyid med rnam gsum la / /

column7: 0.0#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3097778#3097789#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_870;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_871;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_872;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_873;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_874# 'dul ba'i dbang gis de dang der ngo bo nyid med pa nyid rnam pa gsum las dgongs nas gsungs te / / +mtshan nyid ngo bo nyid med pa nyid dang  skye ba ngo bo nyid med pa nyid dang   don dam pa ngo bo nyid med pa nyid do // /
column8: 0.0#TD4064E.TXT.r#424396#424404#TD4064E.TXT.r_1161;TD4064E.TXT.r_1162;TD4064E.TXT.r_1163;TD4064E.TXT.r_1164;TD4064E.TXT.r_1165# gal te gzhan gyi dbang rdzas nyid ni yin na ji ltar mdo sde la chos thams cad ni ngo bo nyid med pa ma skyes pa ma 'gags pa zhes bstan zhe na 'gal  ba med de 'di ltar / / +ngo bo nyid ni rnam gsum gyi // / +ngo bo nyid med rnam gsum la // /

column12: 0.028#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3111511#3111512#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_2819# 'on kyang skye ba ngo bo nyid med pa de la mtshan nyid ngo bo nyid med pa nyid dang  don dam pa ngo bo nyid med pa nyid rnam pa gnyis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mi shes pas / /

column3: 'on kyang nyan ba'i rgyu nyid la dgongs pa yin te / / +dper na mar zos na brta par byed do zhes bya ba lta bu'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#544647#544659#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12349;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12350;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12351# 'di lta ste mtshan nyid ngo bo nyid med pa nyid dang  skye ba ngo bo nyid med pa nyid dang  don dam pa ngo bo nyid med PA NYID DO ZHES BYA BA NI gnyis pa grangs bzhin du ming bkod pa ste / /

column3: de ltar na phan yon rnam pa lnga 'dod pas gus par chos mnyan par bya'o // / +ji ltar long ba dang mig btsums pa la mar me sbar ba mtshungs pa ltar  skal ba med pa lta ba log par zhugs pa dang  rna ba blags pa yang de lta bu yin pas / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#544660#544668#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12350;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_12351# mtshan nyid ngo bo nyid med pa la sogs pa rnam pa gsum mo // / +rigs kyi bu chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid ngo bo nyid med pa gang zhe na zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa zhus pa dang lan dag gis rgya cher rnam par bshad pa bstan te / /
